Huwal lazee ja'ala lakumul laila litaskunoo feehi wannahaara mubsiraa; 
	inna fee zaalika la Aayaatil li qawminy yasma'oon
verses.68:
Qaalut takhazal laahu waladan Subhaanahoo Huwal Ghaniyyu lahoo maa fis 
	samaawaati wa maa fil ard; in 'indakum min sultaanin bihaazaaa; a' taqooloona 'al allaahi maa laa ta'lamoon
verses.69: Qul innal lazeena yaftaroona 'al allaahil kaziba laa yuflihoon
verses.70:
Mataa'un fiddunyaa thumma ilainaa marji'uhum thumma nuzeequhumul 'azaabash 
	shadeeda bimaa kaanoo yakfuroon(section 7)
verses.71:
Watlu 'alaihim naba-a-Noohin iz qaala liqawmihee yaa qawmi in kaana 
	kabura 'alaikum maqaamee wa tazkeeree bi Aayaatil laahi fa'alal laahi 
	tawakkaltu fa ajmi'ooo amrakum wa shurakaaa'akum thumma laa yakun amrukum 'alaikum 
	ghummatan thummaq dooo ilaiya wa laa tunziroon
verses.72:
Fa in tawallaitum famaa sa altukum min ajrin; in ajriya illaa 'al allaahi 
	wa umirtu an akoona minal muslimeen
verses.73:
Fa kazzaboohu fa najjainaahu wa man ma'ahoo  fil fulki wa ja'alnaahum 
	khalaaa'ifa wa aghraqnal lazeena kazzaboo bi aayaatinaa fanzur kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul 
	munzareen
verses.75:
Thumma ba'asnaa min ba'dihim Moosaa Wa Haaroona ilaa Fir'awna wa 
	mala'ihee bi aayaatinaa fastakbaroo wa kaanoo qawman mujrimeen
verses.76: Falammaa jaaa'ahumul haqqu min 'indinaa qaalooo inna haazaa la sihrun mubeen
verses.77:
Qaalaa Moosaaa 'a taqooloona lil haqqi lammmaa jaaa'a kum 'a sihrun haazaa wa 
	laa yuflihus saahiroon
verses.78:
Qaaloo aji'tanaa litalfitanaa 'ammaa wajadnaa 'alaihi aabaaa'anaa wa 
	takoona lakumal kibriyaaa'u fil ardi wa maa nahnu lakumaa bi mu'mineen
verses.79: Wa qaala Fir'awnu' toonee bikulli saahirin 'aleem
verses.80: Falammaa jaaa'assa haratu qaala lahum Moosaaa alqoo maaa antum mulqoon
verses.81:
Falammaaa alqaw qaala Moosaa maa ji'tum bihis sihr; innal laaha sa 
	yubtiluhoo; innal laaha laa yuslihu 'amalal mufsideen
verses.82:
Wa yuhiqqul laahul haqqa bi Kalimaatihee wa law karihal mujrimoon 
	(section 8)
verses.83:
Famaaa aamana li-Moosaaa illaa zurriyyatun min qawmihee 'alaa khawfin min Fir'awna wa mala'ihim 'any yaftinahum; wa inna Fir'awna la'aalin fil ardi 
	wa innahoo laminal musrifeen
verses.84:
Wa qaala Moosaa yaa qawmi in kuntum aamantum billaahi fa'alaihi 
	tawakkalooo in kuntum muslimeen
verses.85:
Faqaaloo 'alal laahi tawakkalnaa Rabbanaa laa taj'alnaa fitnatal 
	lilqawmiz zaalimeen
verses.86: Wa najjinaa birahmatika minal qawmil kaafireen
verses.87:
Wa awhainaaa ilaa Moosaa wa akheehi an tabaw wa aali qawmikuma bi Misra 
	buyootanw waj'aloo buyootakum qiblatanw wa aqeemus Salaah; wa bashshiril 
	mu'mineen
verses.88:
Wa qaala Moosaa Rabbanaaa innaka aataita Fir'awna wa mala ahoo zeenatanw 
	wa amwaalan fil hayaatid dunyaa Rabbanaa liyudillo 'ansabeelika Rabbanat mis 
	'alaaa amwaalihim washdud 'alaa quloobihim falaa yu'minoo hatta yarawul 'azaabal 
	aleem
verses.89:
Qaala qad ujeebad da'watukumaa fastaqeemaa wa laa tattabi'aaanni 
	sabeelal lazeena laa ya'lamoon
verses.90:
Wa jaawaznaa bi Baneee Israaa'eelal bahra fa atba'ahum Fir'awnu wa 
	junooduhoo baghyanw wa 'adwaa; hattaaa izaaa adrakahul gharaqu qaala aamantu 
	annahoo laaa ilaaha illal lazeee aamanat bihee Banooo Israaa'eela wa ana 
	minal muslimeen
verses.91: Aaal 'aana wa qad 'asaita qablu wa kunta minal mufsideen
verses.92:
Falyawma nunajjeeka bibadanika litakoona liman khalfaka Aayah; wa inna 
	kaseeran minan naasi 'an aayaatinaa laghaafiloon (section 9)
verses.93:
Wa laqad bawwa'naa Baneee Israaa'eela mubawwa 'a sidqinw wa razaqnaahum 
	minat taiyibaati fa makhtalafoo hattaa jaaa'ahmul 'ilm; inna Rabbaka yaqdee 
	bainahum Yawmal Qiyaamati feemaa kaanoo feehi yakhtalifoon
verses.94:
Fa in kunta fee shakkin mimmaaa anzalnaaa ilaika fas'alil lazeena 
	yaqra'oonal Kitaaba min qablik; laqad jaaa'akal haqqu mir Rabbika fa laa 
	takoonanna minal mumtareen
verses.95:
Wa laa takoonanna minal lazeena kazzaboo bi Aayaatil laahi fatakoona 
	minal khaasireen
verses.96: Innal lazeena haqqat 'alaihim Kalimatu Rabbika laa yu'minoon
verses.97: Wa law jaaa'at hum kullu Aayatin hattaa yarawul 'azaabal aleem
verses.98:
Falaw laa kaanat qaryatun aamanat fa nafa'ahaaa eemaanuhaaa illaa qawma 
	Yoonusa lammaaa aamanoo kashafnaa 'anhum 'azaabal khizyi fil hayaatid dunyaa 
	wa matta'naahum ilaa heen
verses.99:
Wa law shaaa'a Rabbuka la aamana man fil ardi kulluhum jamee'aa; afa 
	anta tukrihun naasa hattaa yakoonoo mu'mineen
verses.100:
Wa maa kaana linafsin an tu'mina illaa bi iznil laah; wa yaj'alur rijsa 
	'alal lazeena laa ya'qiloon
verses.101:
Qulin zuroo maazaa fissamaawaati wal ard; wa maa tughnil Aayaatu 
	wannuzuru 'an qawmil laa yu'minoon
verses.102:
Fahal yantaziroona illaa misla ayyaamil lazeena khalaw min qablihim; qul 
	fantazirooo innee ma'akum minal muntazireen
verses.103:
Thumma nunajjee Rusulana wallazeena aamanoo; kazaalika haqqan 'alainaa 
	nunjil mu'mineen (section 10)
verses.104:
Qul yaaa ayyuhan naasu in kuntum fee shakk-in min deenee fa laa a'budul 
	lazeena ta'budoona min doonil laahi wa laakin a'budul laahal lazee 
	yatawaffaakum wa umirtu an akoona minal mu'mineen
verses.105:
Wa an aqim wajhaka liddeeni Haneefanw wa laa takoonanna minal 
	mushrikeen
verses.106:
Wa laa tad'u min doonil laahi maa laa yanfa'uka wa laa yadurruk; fa in 
	fa'alta fa innaka izam minaz zaalimeen
verses.108:
Qul yaaa ayyuhan naasu qad jaaa'akumul haqqu mir Rabbikum; famanih tadaa 
	fa innamaa yahtadee li nafsih; wa man dalla fa innamaa yadillu 'alaihaa; wa 
	maaa ana 'alaikum bi wakeel
verses.109:
Wattabi' maa yoohaaa ilaika wasbir hattaa yahkumal laah; wa Huwa khairul 
	haakimeen (section 11)

verses.1:
Alif-Laaam-Raa; Kitaabun uhkimat Aayaatuhoo summa fussilat mil ladun 
	Hakeemin Khabeer
verses.2: Allaa ta'budooo illal laah; innanee lakum minhu nazeerunw wa basheer
verses.3:
Wa anis taghfiroo Rabbakum summa toobooo ilaihi yumatti'kum mataa'an 
	hasanan ilaaa ajalim musammanw wa yu'ti kulla zee fadlin fadlahoo wa in 
	tawallaw fa inneee akhaafu 'alaikum 'azaaba Yawmin Kabeer
verses.4: Ilal laahi marji'ukum wa Huwa 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer
verses.5:
Alaa innahum yasnoona sudoorahum liyastakhfoo minh; alaa heena 
	yastaghshoona siyaabahum ya'lamu maa yusirroona wa maa yu'linoon; innahoo 'aleemun 
	bizaatis sudoor (End Juz 11)
verses.6:
Wa maa min daaabbatin fil ardi illaa 'alal laahi rizquhaa wa ya'lamu 
	mustaqarrahaa wa mustawda'ahaa; kullun fee Kitaabim Mubeen
verses.7:
Wa Huwal lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal arda fee sittati aiyaaminw wa 
	kaana 'Arshuhoo alal maaa'i liyabluwakum aiyukum ahsanu 'amalaa; wa la'in 
	qulta innakum mab'oosoona min ba'dil mawti la yaqoolannal lazeena kafaroo in 
	haazaaa illaa sihrum mubeen
verses.8:
Wala'in akharnaa 'anhumul 'azaaba ilaaa ummatim ma'doodatil la 
	yaqoolunna maa yahbisuh; alaa yawma ya'teehim laisa masroofan 'anhum wa 
	haaqa bihim maa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon (section 1)
verses.9:
Wa la'in azaqnal insaana minnaa rahmatan summa naza'naahaa minhu, 
	innahoo laya'oosun kafoor
verses.10:
Wala'in azaqnaahu na'maaa'a ba'da darraaa'a massat hu la yaqoolanna 
	zahabas saiyiaatu 'anneee; innahoo lafarihun fakhoor
verses.11:
Illal lazeena sabaroo wa 'amilus saalihaati ulaaa'ika lahum maghfiratunw 
	wa ajrun kabeer
verses.12:
Fala'allaka taarikum ba'da maa yoohaaa ilaika wa daaa'iqum bihee sadruka 
	ai yaqooloo law laaa unzila 'alaihi kanzun aw jaaa'a ma'ahoo malak; innamaa 
	anta nazeer; wallaahu 'alaa kulli shai'inw wakeel
verses.13:
Am yaqooloonaf taraahu qul faatoo bi'ashri Suwarim mislihee 
	muftarayaatinw wad'oo manis tata'tum min doonil laahi in kuntum saadiqeen
verses.14:
Fa il lam yastajeeboo lakum fa'lamooo annamaaa unzilla bi'ilmil laahi wa 
	al laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa fahal antum muslimoon
verses.15:
Man kaana yureedul hayaatad dunyaa wa zeenatahaa nuwaffi ilaihim a'maa 
	lahum feehaa wa hum feehaa laa yubkhasoon
verses.16:
Ulaaa'ikal lazeena laisa lahum fil Aakhirati illan Naaru wa habita maa 
	sana'oo feehaa wa baatilum maa kaanoo ya'maloon
verses.17:
Afaman kaana 'ala baiyinatim mir Rabbihee wa yatloohu shaahidum minhu 
	wa min qablihee Kitaabu Moosaaa imaamanw wa rahmah; ulaaa 'ika yu'minoona 
	bih; wa mai yakfur bihee minal Ahzaabi fan Naaru maw'iduh; falaa taku fee 
	miryatim minh; innahul haqqu mir Rabbika wa laakinna aksaran naasi laa 
	yu'minoon
verses.19:
Allazeena yasuddoona 'an sabeelil laahi wa yabghoonahaa 'iwajanw wa hum 
	bil Aakhiratihum kaafiroon
verses.20:
Ulaaa'ika lam yakoonoo mu'jizeena fil ardi wa maa kaana lahum min doonil 
	laahi min awliyaaa'; yudaa'afu lahumul 'azaab; maa kaanoo yastatee'oonas 
	sam'a wa maa kaanoo yubsiroon
verses.21:
Ulaaa'ikal lazeena khasirooo anfusahum wa dalla 'anhum maa kaanoo 
	yaftaroon
verses.22: Laa jarama annahum fil Aakhirati humul akhsaroon
verses.23:
Innal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati wa akhbatooo ilaa Rabbihim 
	ulaaa'ika Ashaabul Jannati hum feehaa khaalidoon
verses.24:
Masalul fareeqaini kal a'maa wal asammi walbaseeri wassamee'; hal 
	yastawiyaani masalaa; afalaa tazakkaroon (section 2)
verses.25: Wa laqad arsalnaa Noohan ilaa qawmihee innee lakum nazeerum mubeen
verses.26:
Al laa ta'budooo illal laaha inneee akhaafu 'alaikum 'azaaba Yawmin 
	aleem
verses.27:
Faqaalal mala ul lazeena kafaroo min qawmihee ma naraaka illaa basharam 
	mislanaa wa maa naraakat taba'aka illal lazeena hum araazilunaa baadiyar 
	raayi wa maa naraa lakum 'alainaa min fadlim bal nazunnukum kaazibeen
verses.28:
Qaala yaa qawmi ara'aitum in kuntu 'alaa baiyinatim mir Rabbee wa 
	aataanee rahmatam min 'indihee fa'um miyat 'alaikum anulzimuku moohaa wa 
	antum lahaa kaarihoon
verses.30:
Wa yaa qawmi mai yansurunee minal laahi in tarattuhum; afalaa tazak 
	karoon
verses.31:
Wa laa aqoolu lakum 'indee khazaa'inul laahi wa laaa a'lamul ghaiba wa 
	laa aqoolu innee malakunw wa laaa aqoolu lillazeena tazdareee a'yunukum lai 
	yu'tiyahumul laahu khairan Allaahu a'lamu bimaa feee anfusihim innee izal 
	laminaz zaalimeen
verses.32:
Qaaloo yaa Noohu qad jaadaltanaa fa aksarta jidaalanaa faatinaa bimaa 
	ta'idunaaa in kunta minas saadiqeen
verses.33: Qaala innamaa yaateekum bihil laahu in shaaa'a wa maaa antum bimu'jizeen
verses.34:
Wa laa yanfa'ukum nusheee in arattu an ansaha lakum in kaanal laahu 
	yureedu ai yughwi yakum; Huwa Rabbukum wa ilaihi turja'oon
verses.35:
Am yaqooloonaf taraahu qul inif taraituhoo fa'alaiya ijraamee wa ana 
	bareee'um mimmaa tujrimoon (section 3)
verses.36:
Wa oohiya ilaa Noohin annahoo lany-yu'mina min qawmika illaa man qad 
	aamana falaa tabta'is bimaa kaanoo yaf'aloon
verses.37:
Wasna'il fulka bi-a'yuninaa wa wahyinaa wa laa tukhaa tibnee fil lazeena 
	zalamoo; innahum mughraqoon
verses.38:
Wa yasna'ul fulka wa kullamaa marra 'alaihi mala'um min qawmihee sakhiroo 
	minh; qaala in taskharoo minnaa fa innaa naskharu minkum kamaa taskharoon
verses.39:
Fasawfa ta'lamoona mai ya'teehi 'azaabuny yukhzeehi wa yahillu 'alaihi 
	'azaabun muqeem
verses.40:
Hattaaa izaa jaaa'a amrunaa wa faarat tannooru qulnah mil feehaa min 
	kullin zawjainis naini wa ahlaka illaa man sabaqa 'alaihil qawlu wa man 
	aaman; wa maaa aamana ma'ahooo illaa qaleel
verses.41:
Wa qaalar kaboo feehaa bismil laahi majraihaa wa mursaahaa; inna Rabbee 
	la Ghafoorur Raheem
verses.42:
Wa hiya tajree bihim fee mawjin kaljibaali wa naadaa Noohunib nahoo wa 
	kaana fee ma'ziliny yaa bunai yarkam ma'anaa wa laa takum ma'al kaafireen
verses.43:
Qaala sa aaweee ilaa jabaliny ya'simunee minal maaa'; qaala laa 'aasimal 
	yawma min amril laahi illaa mar rahim; wa haala bainahumal mawju fakaana 
	minal mughraqeen
verses.44:
Wa qeela yaaa ardubla'ee maaa'aki wa yaa samaaa'u aqli'ee wa gheedal 
	maaa'u wa qudiyal amru wastawat 'alal joodiyyi wa qeela bu'dal lilqawmiz 
	zaalimeen
verses.45:
Wa naadaa noohur Rabbahoo faqaala Rabbi innabnee min ahlee wa inna 
	wa'dakal haqqu wa Anta ahkamul haakimeen
verses.46:
Qaala yaa Noohu innahoo laisa min ahlika innahoo 'amalun ghairu saalihin 
	falaa tas'alni maa laisa laka bihee 'ilmun inneee a'izuka an takoona minal 
	jaahileen
verses.47:
Qaala rabbi inneee a'oozu bika an as'alaka maa laisa lee bihee 'ilmunw 
	wa illaa taghfir lee wa tarhamneee akum minal khaasireen
verses.48:
Qeela yaa Noohuh bit bisalaamim minnaa wa barakaatin 'alaika wa 'alaaa 
	umamim mimmam ma'ak; wa umamun sanumatti'uhum summa yamassuhum minna 'azaabun 
	aleem
verses.49:
Tilka min ambaaa'il ghaibi nooheehaaa ilaika maa kunta ta'lamuhaaaa anta 
	wa laa qawmuka min qabli haazaa fasbir innal 'aaqibata lilmuttaqeen (section 
	4)
verses.50:
Wa ilaa 'aadin akhaahum Hoodaa; qaala yaa qawmi' budul laaha maa lakum 
	min ilaahin ghairuhooo in antum illaa muftaroon
verses.51:
Yaa qawmi laaa as'alukum 'alaihi ajran in ajriya illaa 'alal lazee 
	fataranee; afalaa ta'qiloon
verses.52:
Wa yaa qawmis taghfiroo Rabbakum summa toobooo ilaihi yursilis samaaa'a 
	'alaikum midraaranw wa yazidkum quwwatan ilaa quwwatikum wa laa tatawallaw 
	mujrimeen
verses.53:
Qaaloo yaa Hoodu maa ji'tanaa bibaiyinatinw wa maa nahnu bitaarikeee 
	aalihatinaa 'an qawlika wa maa nahnu laka bimu'mineen
verses.54:
In naqoolu illa' taraaka ba'du aalihatinaa bisooo'; qaala inneee 
	ushhidul laaha wash hadooo annee bareee'um mimmaa tushrikoon
verses.55: Min doonihee fakeedoonee jamee'an summa laa tunziroon
verses.56:
Innee tawakkaltu 'alallaahi Rabbee wa Rabbikum; maa min daaabbatin illaa 
	Huwa aakhizum binaasiyatihaa; inna Rabbee 'alaa Siraatim mustaqeem
verses.57:
Fa in tawallaw faqad ablaghtukum maaa ursiltu biheee ilaikum; wa 
	yastakhlifu Rabbee qawman ghairakum wa laa tadur roonahoo shai'aa; inna 
	Rabbee 'alaa kulli shai'in Hafeez
verses.58:
Wa lammaa jaaa'a amrunaa najainaa Hoodanw wallazeena aamanoo ma'ahoo 
	birahmatim minnaa wa najainaahum min 'azaabin ghaleez
verses.59:
Wa tilka 'aad, jahadoo bi Aayaati Rabbihim wa 'asaw Rusulahoo 
	wattaba'ooo amra kulli jabbaarin 'aneed
verses.60:
Wa utbi'oo fee haazihid dunyaa la'natanw wa Yawmal Qiyaamah; alaaa inna 
	'Aadan kafaroo Rabbahum; alaa bu'dal li 'Aadin qawmin Hood (section 5)
verses.61:
Wa ilaa Samooda akhaahum Saalihaa; qaala yaa qawmi' budul laaha maa 
	lakum min ilaahim ghairuhoo Huwa ansha akum minal ardi wasta' marakum feehaa 
	fastaghfiroohu summa toobooo ilaih; inna Rabbee Qareebum Mujeeb
verses.62:
Qaaloo yaa Saalihu qad kunta feenaa marjuwwan qabla haazaaa atanhaanaaa 
	an na'bu da maa ya'budu aabaaa'unaa wa innanaa lafee shakkim mimmaa 
	tad'oonaaa ilaihi mureeb
verses.63:
Qaala yaa qawmi ara'aytum in kuntu 'alaa baiyinatim mir Rabbee wa 
	aataanee minhu rahmatan famai yansurunee minal laahi in 'asaituhoo famaa 
	tazeedoonanee ghaira takhseer
verses.64:
Wa yaa qawmi haazihee naaqatul laahi lakum aayatan fazaroohaa taakul 
	feee ardil laahi wa laa tamassoohaa bisooo'in fa yaakhuzakum azaabun qareeb
verses.65:
Fa 'aqaroohaa faqaala tamatta'oo fee daarikum salaasata aiyaamin zaalika 
	wa'dun ghairu makzoob
verses.66:
Falammaa jaaa'a amrunaa najjainaa Saalihanw wal lazeena aamanoo ma'ahoo 
	birahmatim minnaa wa min khizyi Yawmi'iz inna Rabbaka Huwal Qawiyyul 'Azeez
verses.67: Wa akhazal lazeena zalamus saihatu fa asbahoo fee diyaarihim jaasimeena
verses.68:
Ka al lam yaghnaw feehaaa; alaaa inna Samooda kafaroo Rabbahum; alaa 
	bu'dal li Samood. (section 6)
verses.69:
Wa laqad jaaa'at Rusulunaaa Ibraaheema bilbushraa qaaloo salaaman qaala 
	salaamun famaa labisa an jaaa'a bi'ijlin haneez
verses.70:
Falammaa ra aaa aidiyahum laa tasilu ilaihi nakirahum wa awjasa minhum 
	kheefah; qaaloo laa takhaf innaaa ursilnaaa ilaa qawmi Loot
verses.71:
Wamra atuhoo qaaa'imatun fadahikat fabashsharnaahaa bi Ishaaqa wa minw 
	waraaa'i Ishaaqa Ya'qoob
verses.72:
Qaalat yaa wailataaa 'aalidu wa ana 'ajoozunw wa haaza ba'lee shaikhan 
	inna haazaa lashai'un 'ajeeb
verses.73:
Qaalooo ata'jabeena min amril laahi rahmatul laahi wa barakaatuhoo 'alaikum 
	Ahlal Bayt; innahoo Hameedun Majeed
verses.74:
Falammaa zahaba an Ibraaheemar raw'u wa jaaa'at hul bushraaa 
	yujaadilunaa fee qawmi Loot
verses.75: Inna Ibraaheema la haleemun awwaahun muneeb
verses.76:
Yaaa Ibraaheemu a'rid 'an haazaaa innahoo qad jaaa'a amru Rabbika wa 
	innahum aateehim 'azaabun ghairu mardood
verses.77:
Wa lammaa jaaa'at Rusulunaa Lootan seee'a bihim wa daaqa bihim zar'anw 
	wa qaala haazaa yawmun 'aseeb
verses.78:
Wa jaaa'ahoo qawmuhoo yuhra'oona ilaihi wa min qablu kaanoo ya'maloonas 
	saiyiaat; qaala yaa qawmi haaa'ulaaa'i banaatee hunna atharu lakum fattaqul 
	laaha wa laa tukhzooni fee daifee alaisa minkum rajulur rasheed
verses.79:
Qaaloo laqad 'alimta maa lanaa fee banaatika min haqq, wa innaka 
	lata'lamu maa nureed
verses.80: Qaala law anna lee bikum quwwatan aw aaweee ilaa ruknin shadeed
verses.81:
Qaaloo yaa Lootu innaa Rusulu Rabbika lai yasiloo ilaika fa asri bi 
	ahlika biqit 'im minal laili wa laa yaltafit minkum ahadun illam ra ataka 
	innahoo museebuhaa maaa asaabahum; inna maw'i dahumus subh; alaisas subhu 
	biqareeb
verses.82:
Falammaa jaaa'a amrunaa ja'alnaa 'aaliyahaa saafilahaa wa amtarnaa 'alaihaa 
	hijaaratam min sijjeelim mandood
verses.83:
Musawwamatan 'inda Rabbik; wa maa hiya minaz zaalimena biba'eed (section 
	7)
verses.84:
Wa ilaa Madyana akhaahum Shu'aibaa; qaala yaa qawmi' budul laaha maa 
	lakum min ilaahin ghairuhoo wa laa tanqusul mikyaala walmeezaan; inneee 
	araakum bikhairinw wa innee akhaafu 'alaikum 'azaaba Yawmim muheet
verses.85:
Wa yaa qawmi awful mikyaala walmeezaana bilqisti wa laa tabkhasun naasa 
	ashyaaa'ahum wa laa ta'saw fil ardi mufsideen
verses.86:
Baqiyyatul laahi khairul lakum in kuntum mu'mineen; wa maa ana 'alaikum 
	bihafeez
verses.87:
Qaaloo yaa Shu'aybu 'a salaatuka ta'muruka an natruka maa ya'budu 
	aabaaa'unaaa aw an naf'ala feee amwaalinaa maa nashaaa'oo innaka la antal 
	haleemur rasheed
verses.88:
Qaala yaa qawmi ara'aitum in kuntu 'alaa baiyinatim mir Rabbee wa 
	razaqanee minhu rizqan hasanaa; wa maaa ureedu an ukhaalifakum ilaa maaa 
	anhaakum 'anh; in ureedu illal islaaha mastata't; wa maa tawfeeqeee illaa 
	billaah; 'alaihi tawakkaltu wa ilaihi uneeb
verses.89:
Wa yaa qawmi laa yajri mannakum shiqaaqeee ai yuseebakum mislu maaa 
	asaaba qawma Noohin aw qawma Hoodin aw qawma Saalih; wa maa qawmu Lootim 
	minkum biba'eed
verses.90: Wastaghfiroo Rabbakum summa toobooo ilaih; inna Rabbee Raheemunw Wadood
verses.91:
Qaaloo yaa Shu'aibu maa nafqahu kaseeram mimmaa taqoolu wa innaa 
	lanaraaka feenaa da'eefanw wa law laa rahtuka larajamnaaka wa maaa anta 'alainaa 
	bi'azeez
verses.92:
Qaala yaa qawmi arahteee a'azzu 'alaikum minal laahi wattakhaztumoohu 
	waraaa'akum zihriyyan inna Rabbee bimaa ta'maloona muheet
verses.93:
Wa yaa qawmi' maloo 'alaa makaanatikum innee 'aamilun sawfa ta'lamoona 
	many ya'teehi 'azaabuny yukhzeehi wa man huwa kaazib; wartaqibooo innnee 
	ma'akum raqeeb
verses.94:
Wa lammaa jaaa'a amrunaa najjainaa shu'aibanw wal lazeena aamanoo 
	ma'ahoo birahmatim minnaa wa akhazatil lazeena zalamus saihatu fa asbahoo 
	fee diyaarihim jaasimeen
verses.95:
Ka-al-lam yaghnaw feehaaa; alaa bu'dal li Madyana Kamaa ba'idat Samood 
	(section 8)
verses.96: Wa laqad arsalnaa Moosaa bi Aayaatinaa wa sultaanim mubeen
verses.97:
Ilaa Fir'awna wa mala'ihee fattaba'ooo amra Fir'awna wa maaa amru 
	Fir'awna birasheed
verses.98:
Yaqdumu qawmahoo Yawmal Qiyaamati fa awrada humun Naara wa bi'sal wirdul 
	mawrood
verses.99:
Wa utbi'oo fee haazihee la'natanw wa Yawmal Qiyaamah; bi'sar rifdul 
	marfood
verses.100:
Zaalika min ambaaa'il quraa naqussuhoo 'alaika minhaa qaaa'imunw wa 
	haseed
verses.101:
Wa maa zalamnaahum wa laakin zalamooo anfusahum famaaa aghnat 'anhum 
	aalihatuhumul latee yad'oona min doonil laahi min shai'il lammaa jaaa'a amru 
	Rabbika wa maa zaadoohum ghaira tatbeeb
verses.102:
Wa kazaalika akhzu Rabbika izaaa akhazal quraa wa hiya zaalimah; inna 
	akhzahooo aleemun shadeed
verses.103:
Inna fee zaalika la aayatal liman khaafa 'azaabal Aakhirah; zaalika 
	Yawmum majmoo'ul lahun naasu wa zaalika Yawmum mashhood
verses.104: Wa maa nu'akhkhiruhooo illaa li ajalim ma'dood
verses.105:
Yawma yaati laa takallamu nafsun illaa bi iznih; faminhum shaqiyyunw wa 
	sa'eed
verses.106: Fa ammal lazeena shaqoo fafin Naari lahum feehaa zafeerunw wa shaheeq
verses.107:
Khaalideena feehaa maa daamatis samaawaatu wal ardu illaa maa shaaa'a 
	Rabbuk; inna Rabbaka fa' 'aalul limaa yureed
verses.108:
Wa ammal lazeena su'idoo fafil Jannati khaalideena feehaa maa daamatis 
	samaawaatu wal ardu illaa maa shaaa'a Rabbuk; ataaa'an ghaira majzooz
verses.109:
Falaa taku fee miryatim mimmmaa ya'budu haaa'ulaaa'; maa ya'budoona 
	illaa kamaa ya'budu aabaaa'uhum min qabl; wa innaa lamuwaf foohum naseebahum 
	ghaira manqoos (section 9)
verses.110:
Wa laqad aatainaa Moosal Kitaaba fakhtulifa feeh; wa law laa Kalimatun 
	sabaqat mir Rabbika laqudiya bainahum; wa innahum lafee shakkim minhu mureeb
verses.111:
Wa inna kullal lammaa la yuwaffiyannahum Rabbuka a'maalahum; innahoo 
	bimaa ya'maloona Khabeer
verses.112:
Fastaqim kamaaa umirta wa man taaba ma'aka wa laa tatghaw; innahoo bimaa 
	ta'maloona Baseer
verses.113:
Wa laa tarkanooo ilal lazeena zalamoo fatamassa kumun Naaru wa maa lakum 
	min doonil laahi min awliyaaa'a summa laa tunsaroon
verses.114:
Wa aqimis Salaata tarafayin nahaari wa zulafam minal layl; innal 
	hasanaati yuzhibnas saiyi aat; zaalika zikraa liz zaakireen
verses.115: Wasbir fa innal laaha laa yudee'u ajral muhsineen
verses.116:
Falaw laa kaana minal qurooni min qablikum ooloo baqiyyatiny yanhawna 'anil 
	fasaadi fil ardi illaa qaleelam mimman anjainaa minhum; wattaba'al lazeena 
	zalamoo maaa utrifoo feehi wa kaanoo mujrimeen
verses.117: Wa maa kaana Rabbuka liyuhlikal quraa bizulminw wa ahluhaa muslihoon
verses.118:
Wa law shaaa'a Rabbuka laja'alannnaasa ummatanw waa hidatanw wa laa 
	yazaaloona mukhtalifeen
verses.119:
Illaa mar rahima Rabbuk; wa lizaalika khalaqahum; wa tammat Kalimatu 
	Rabbika la amla'ana Jahannama minal jinnati wannnaasi ajma'een
verses.120:
Wa kullan naqussu 'alaika min ambaaa'ir Rusuli maa nusabbitu bihee 
	fu'aadak; wa jaaa'aka fee haazihil haqqu wa maw'izatunw wa zikraa lilmu' 
	mineen
verses.121: Wa qul lillazeena laa yu'minoo na'maloo 'alaa makaanatikum innaa 'aamiloon
verses.123:
Wa lillaahi ghaibus samaawaati wal ardi wa ilaihi yurja'ul amru kulluhoo 
	fa'bud hu wa tawakkal 'alaih; wa maa Rabbuka bighaafilin 'ammaa ta'maloon 
	(section 10)

verses.3:
Nahnu naqussu 'alaika ahsanal qasasi bimaaa awhainaaa ilaika haazal 
	quraana wa in kunta min qablihee laminal ghaafileen
verses.4:
Iz qaala Yoosufu li abeehi yaaa abati innee ra aytu ahada 'ashara 
	kawkabanw wash shamsa walqamara ra aytuhum lee saajideen
verses.5:
Qaala yaa bunaiya laa taqsus ru'yaaka 'alaaa ikhwatika fayakeedoo laka 
	kaidaa; innash Shaitaana lil insaani 'aduwwum mubeen
verses.6:
Wa kazaalika yajtabeeka rabbuka wa yu'allimuka min ta'weelil ahaadeesi 
	wa yutimmu ni'matahoo 'alaika wa 'alaaa Aali Ya'qooba kamaaa atammahaa 'alaaa 
	abawaika min qablu Ibraaheema wa Ishaaq; inna Rabbaka 'Aleemun hakeem 
(section 1)
verses.7: Laqad kaana fee Yoosufa wa ikhwatiheee Aayaatul lissaaa'ileen
verses.8:
Iz qaaloo la Yoosufu wa akhoohu ahabbu ilaaa Abeenaa minnaa wa nahnu 'usbatun; 
	inna abaanaa lafee dalaalim mubeen
verses.9:
Uqtuloo Yoosufa awitra hoohu ardany yakhlu lakum wajhu abeekum wa 
	takoonoo mim ba'dihee qawman saaliheen
verses.10:
Qaalaa qaaa'ilum minhum laa taqtuloo Yoosufa wa alqoohu fee ghayaabatil 
	jubbi yaltaqithu badus sai yaarati in kuntum faa 'ileen
verses.11:
Qaaloo yaaa abaanaa maa laka laa ta'mannaa 'alaa Yoosufa wa innaa lahoo 
	lanaa sihoon
verses.12: Arsillhu ma'anaa ghadany yarta' wa yal'ab wa innaa lahoo la haafizoon
verses.13:
Qaala innee la yahzununeee an tazhaboo bihee wa akhaafu any ya'kulahuz 
	zi'bu wa antum 'anhu ghaafiloon
verses.14: Qaaloo la in akalahuzzi'bu wa nahnu 'usbatun innaaa izal lakhaasiroon
verses.16: Wa jaaa'ooo abaahum 'ishaaa 'any yabkoon
verses.17:
Qaaloo yaaa abaanaaa innaa zahabnaa nastabiqu wa taraknaa Yoosufa 'inda 
	mataa'inaa fa akalahuz zi'b, wa maaa anta bimu'minil lanaa wa law kunnaa 
	saadiqeen
verses.18:
Wa jaaa'oo 'alaa qameesi hee bidamin kazib qaala bal sawwalat lakum 
	anfusukum amraa; fasabrun jameel; wallaahul musta'aanu 'alaa maatasifoon
verses.19:
Wa jaaa'at saiyaaratun fa-arsaloo waaridahum fa adlaa dalwah; qaala yaa 
	bushraa haaza ghulaam; wa asarroohu bi-daa'ah; wallaahu 'aleemun bimaa 
	ya'maloon
verses.20:
Wa sharawhu bisamanim bakhsin daraahima ma'doo datinw wa kaanoo feehi 
	minaz zaahideen (section 2)
verses.21:
Wa qaalal lazish taraahu mim Misra limra atiheee akrimee maswaahu 'asaaa 
	any-yanfa'anaaa aw nattakhizahoo waladaa; wa kazaalika mak-kannaa li-Yoosufa 
	fil ardi wa linu'allimahoo min ta'weelil ahaadees; wallaahu ghaalibun 'alaaa 
	amrihee wa laakinna aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon
verses.22:
Wa lammaa balagha ashuddahooo aatainaahu hukmanw wa 'ilmaa; wa kazaa 
	lika najzil muhsineen
verses.23:
Wa raawadat hul latee huwa fee baitihaa 'an nafsihee wa ghallaqatil 
	abwaaba wa qaalat haita lak; qaala ma'aazal laahi innahoo rabbeee ahsana 
	maswaay; innahoo laa yuflihuz-zaalimoon
verses.24:
Wa laqad hammat bihee wa hamma bihaa law laaa ar ra-aa burhaana rabbih; kazaalika linasrifa 'anhu sooo'a walfahshaaa'; innahoo min 'ibaadi nal 
	mukhlaseen
verses.25:
Wastabaqal baaba wa qaddat qameesahoo min duburinw wa alfayaa 
	saiyidahaa ladal baab; qaalat maa jazaaa'u man araada bi ahlika sooo'an 
	illaaa any-yusjana aw azaabun 'aleem
verses.26:
Qaala hiya raawadatnee 'an nafsee wa shahida shaahidum min ahlihaa in 
	kaana qameesuhoo qudda min qubulin fasadaqat wa huwa minal kaazibeen
verses.27:
Wa in kaana qameesuhoo qudda min duburin fakazabat wa huwa minas 
	saadiqeen
verses.28:
Falammaa ra-aa qamee sahoo qudda min duburin qaala innahoo min 
	kaidikunna inna kaidakunna 'azeem
verses.29:
Yoosufu a'rid 'an haaza wastaghfiree li zanbiki innaki kunti minal 
	khaati'een (section 3)
verses.30:
Wa qaala niswatun fil madeenatim ra atul'Azeezi turaawidu fataahaa 'an 
	nafsihee qad shaghafahaa hubbaa; innaa lana raahaa fee dalaalim mubeen
verses.31:
Falammaa sami'at bimak rihinna arsalat ilaihinna wa a'tadat lahunna 
	muttaka anw wa aatat kulla waahidatim min hunna sikkeenanw wa qaala tikh ruj 
	'alaihinna falammaa ra aynahooo akbarnahoo wa qatta'na aydiyahunna wa qulna 
	haasha lillaahi maa haaza basharaa; in haazaaa illaa malakun kareem
verses.32:
Qaalat fazaalikunnal lazee lumtunnanee feeh; wa laqad raawattuhoo 'an 
	nafsihee fasta'sam; wa la'il lam yaf'al maaa aamuruhoo la yusjananna wa la 
	yakoonan minas saaghireen
verses.33:
Qaala rabbis sijnu ahabbu ilaiya mimma yad'oo naneee 'ilaihi wa illaa 
	tasrif 'annee kaidahunna asbu ilaihinna wa akum minal jaahileen
verses.34:
Fastajaaba lahoo rabbuhoo fasarafa 'anhu kaidahunn; innahoo huwas Samee'ul 'Aleem (section 
	4)
verses.35:
Summa badaa lahum min ba'di maa ra-awul Aayaati layasjununnahoo hatta 
	heen
verses.36:
Wa dakhala ma'a hussijna fata-yaan; qaala ahaduhumaaa inneee araaneee 
	a'siru khamranw wa qaalal aakharu inneee araaneee ahmilu fawqa ra'see 
	khubzan ta'kulut tairu minhu; nabbi'naa bi ta'weelih; innaa naraaka minal 
	muhsineen
verses.37:
Qaala laa ya'teekumaa ta'aamun turzaqaaniheee illaa nabba'tukumaa 
	bi ta'weelihee; qabla any ya'ti yakumaa; zaalikumaa mimmaa 'allamanee rabbee; 
	innee taraktu millata qawmil laa yu'minoona billaahi wahum bil aakhirati hum 
	kaafiroon
verses.38:
Wattaba'tu millata aabaaa'eee Ibraaheema wa Ishaaqa wa Ya'qoob; maa kaana 
	lanaaa an nushrika billaahi min shai'; zaalikamin fadlil laahi 'alainaa wa 'alan 
	naasi wa laakinna aksaran naasi laa yashkuroon
verses.39:
Yaa saahibayis sijni 'a-arbaabum mutafarriqoona khayrun amil laahul 
	waahidul qahhaar
verses.40:
Maa  ta'budoona min doonihee illaaa asmaaa'an sam maitumoohaaa 
	antum wa aabaaa'ukum maaa anzalal laahu bihaa min sultan; inilhukmu illaa 
	lillaah; amara allaa ta'budooo illaaa iyyaah; zaalikad deenul qaiyimu wa 
	laakinna aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon
verses.41:
Yaa saahibayis sijni ammaaa ahadukumaa fa yasqee rabbahoo khamranw wa 
	ammal aakharu fa yuslabu fata'kulut tairu mir ra'sih; qudiyal amrul lazee 
	feehi tastaftiyaan
verses.42:
Wa qaala lillazee zanna annahoo najim minhumaz kurnee 'inda rabbika 
	fa-ansaahush Shaitaanu zikra Rabbihee falabisa fis sijni bid'a sineen 
(section 5)
verses.43:
Wa qaalal maliku inneee araa sab'a baqaraatin simaaniny ya'kuluhunna 
	sab'un 'ijaafunw wa sab'a sumbulaatin khudrinw wa ukhara yaabisaat; yaaa 
	ayuhal mala-u aftoonee fee ru'yaaya in kuntum lirru'yaa ta'buroon
verses.44: Qaalooo adghaasu ahlaa minw wa maa nahnu bi ta'weelil ahlaami bi'aalimeen
verses.45:
Wa qaalal lazee najaa minhumaa waddakara ba'da ummatin ana unabbi'ukum 
	bi ta'weelihee fa-arsiloon
verses.46:
Yoosufu ayyuhas siddeequ aftinaa fee sab'i baqaraatin simaaniny 
	ya'kuluhunna sab'un 'ijaafunw wa sabi'i sumbulaatin khudrinw wa ukhara 
	yaabisaatil la'alleee arji'u ilan naasi la'allahum ya'lamoon
verses.47:
Qaala tazra'oona sab'a sineena da aban famaa hasattum fazaroohu fee 
	sumbu liheee illaa qaleelam mimmaa ta'kuloon
verses.48:
Thumma ya'tee mim ba'di zaalika sab'un shidaaduny ya'kulna maa qaddamtum 
	lahunna illaa qaleelam mimma tuhsinoon
verses.49:
Thumma ya'tee mim ba'di zalika 'aamun feehi yughaa sun naasu wa feehi 
	ya'siroon (section 6)
verses.50:
Wa qaalal maliku'toonee bihee falammaa jaaa'ahur rasoolu qaalar-ji ilaa 
	rabbika fas'alhu maa baalun niswatil laatee qatta'na aydiyahunn; inna Rabbee 
	bikaidihinna 'Aleem
verses.51:
Qaala maa khatbukunna iz raawattunna Yoosufa 'annafsih; qulna haasha 
	lillaahi maa 'alimnaa 'alaihi min sooo'; qaalatim ra atul 'Azeezil 'aana 
	hashasal haqq, ana raawat tuhoo 'an nafsihee wa innahoo laminas saadiqeen
verses.52:
Zaalika liya'lama annee lam akhunhu bilghaibi wa annal laaha laa yahdee 
	kaidal khaaa'ineen (End Juz 12)
verses.53:
Wa maa ubarri'u nafsee; innan nafsa la ammaaratum bissooo'i illaa maa 
	rahima Rabbee; inna Rabbee Ghafoorur Raheem
verses.54:
Wa qaalal maliku' toonee biheee astakhlishu linafsee falammaa kallamahoo 
	qaala innakal yawma ladainaa makeenun ameen
verses.55: Qaalaj 'alnee 'alaa khazaaa'inil ardi innee hafeezun 'aleem
verses.56:
Wa kazaalika makkannaa li Yoosufa fil ardi yatabawwa'u minhaa haisu 
	yashaaaa'; nuseebu birahmatinaa man nashaaa'u wa laa nudee'u ajral muhsineen
verses.57:
Wa la ajrul Aakhirati khairul lillazeena aamanoo wa kaanoo yattaqoon 
(section 7)
verses.58:
Wa jaaa'a ikhwatu Yoosufa fadakhaloo 'alaihi fa'arafahum wa hum lahoo 
	munkiroon
verses.59:
Wa lammaa jahhazahum bijahaazihim qaala' toonee bi akhil lakum min 
	abeekum; alaa tarawna anneee oofil kaila wa ana khairul munzileen
verses.60: Fa il lam taatoonee bihee falaa kaila lakum 'indee wa laa taqraboon
verses.61: Qaaloo sanuraawidu 'anhu abaahu wa innaa lafaa'iloon
verses.62:
Wa qaala lifityaanihij 'aloo bidaa'atahum fee rihaalihim la'allahum 
	ya'rifoonahaaa izan qalabooo ilaaa ahlihim la'allahum yarji'oon
verses.63:
Falammaa raja'ooo ilaaa abeehim qaaloo yaaa abaanaa muni'a minnal kailu 
	fa arsil ma'anaaa akhaanaa naktal wa innaa lahoo lahaafizoon
verses.64:
Qaala hal aamanukum 'alaihi illaa kamaa amintukum 'alaaa akheehi min qabl; 
	fal laahu khairun haafizanw wa Huwa arhamur Raahimeen
verses.65:
Wa lammaa fatahoo mataa 'ahum wajadoo bidaa'atahum ruddat ilaihim qaaloo 
	yaaa abaanaa maa nabghee; haazihee bida 'atunaa ruddat ilainaa wa nameeru 
	ahlanaa wa nahfazu akhaanaa wa nazdaadu kaila ba'eer; zaalika kailuny yaseer
verses.66: Qaala lan ursilahoo ma'akum hattaa tu'tooni mawsiqam minal laahee lataa tunnanee biheee illaaa ai yuhaata bikum falammaaa aatawhu mawsiqahum qaalal laahu 'alaa maa naqoolu Wakeel
verses.67:
Wa qaala yaa baniyya laa tadkhuloo mim baabinw waa hidinw wadkhuloo min 
	abwaabim mutafarriqah; wa maaa ughnee 'ankum minal laahi min shai'in; inil 
	hukmu illaa lillaahi 'alaihi tawakkaltu wa 'alaihi fal yatawakkalil 
	Mutawakkiloon
verses.68:
Wa lammaa dakhaloo min haisu amarahum aboohum maa kaana yughnee 'anhum 
	minal laahi min shai'in illaa haajatan fee nafsi Ya'qooba qadaahaa; wa 
	innahoo lazoo 'ilmil limaa 'allamnaahu wa laakinna aksaran naasi laa 
	ya'lamoon (section 8)
verses.69:
Wa lammaa dakhaloo 'alaa Yoosufa aawaaa ilaihi akhaahu qaala inneee ana 
	akhooka falaa tabta'is bimaa kaanoo ya'maloon
verses.70:
Falammaa jahhazahum bijahaazihim ja'alas siqaayata fee rahli akheehi 
	summa azzana mu'azzinun ayyatuhal'eeru innakum lasaariqoon
verses.71: Qaaloo wa aqbaloo 'alaihim maazaa tafqidoon
verses.72:
Qaaloo nafqidu suwaa'al maliki wa liman jaaa'a bihee himlu ba'eerinw wa 
	ana bihee za'eem
verses.73:
Qaaloo tallaahi laqad 'alimtum maa ji'na linufsida fil ardi wa maa 
	kunnaa saariqeen
verses.74: Qaaloo famaa jazaaa'u hooo in kuntum kaazibeen
verses.75:
Qaaloo jazaaa'uhoo manw wujida fee rahlihee fahuwa jazaaa'uh; kazaalika 
	najziz zaalimeen
verses.76:
Fabada-a bi-aw'iyatihim qabla wi'aaa'i akheehi summas takhrajahaa minw 
	wi 'aaa'i akheeh; kazaalika kidnaa li Yoosuf; maa kaana liyaakhuza akhaahu 
	fee deenil maliki illaaa any yashaaa'al laah; narfa'u darajaatim man nashaaa'; 
	wa fawqa kulli zee 'ilmin 'Aleem
verses.77:
Qaaloo iny yasriq faqad saraqa akhul lahoo min qabl; fa asarrahaa 
	Yoosufu fee nafsihee wa lam yubdihaa lahum; qaala antum sharrum makaananw 
	wallaahu a'lamu bimaa tasifoon
verses.78:
Qaaloo yaaa ayyuhal 'Azeezu inna lahooo aban shaikhan kabeeran fakhuz 
	ahadanaa makaanahoo innaa naraaka minal muhsineen
verses.79:
Qaala ma'aazal laahi an naakhuza illaa manw wajadnaa mataa'anaa 'indahoo 
	innaaa izal lazaalimoon 
	(section 9)
verses.80: Falammas tay'asoo minhu khalasoo najiyyan qaala kabeeruhum alam ta'lamoo anna abaakum qad akhaza 'alaikum mawthiqam min Allahi wa min qablu maa farrattum fee Yoosufa falan abrahal arda hattaa ya'zana leee abeee aw yahkumal laahu lee wa huwa khairul haakimeen
verses.81:
Irji'ooo ilaaa abeekum faqooloo yaaa abaanaaa innab naka saraq; wa maa 
	shahidnaaa illaa bimaa 'alimnaa wa maa kunnaa lilghaibi haafizeen
verses.82:
Was'alil qaryatal latee kunnaa feehaa wal'eeral lateee aqbalnaa feehaa 
	wa innaa lasaadiqoon
verses.83:
Qaala bal sawwalat lakum anfusukum amran fasabrun jameelun 'asal laahu 
	any yaa tiyanee bihim jamee'aa; innahoo Huwal 'Aleemul Hakeem
verses.84:
Wa tawallaa 'anhum wa qaala yaaa asafaa 'alaa Yoosufa wabyaddat 'aynaahu 
	minal huzni fahuwa kazeem
verses.85:
Qaaloo tallaahi tafta'u tazkuru Yoosufa hattaa takoona haradan aw 
	takoona minal haalikeen
verses.86:
Qaala innamaaa ashkoo bassee wa huzneee ilal laahi wa a'lamu minal laahi 
	maa laa ta'lamoon
verses.87:
Yaa baniyyaz haboo fatahassasoo miny Yoosufa wa akheehi wa laa tai'asoo 
	mir rawhil laahi innahoo laa yai'asu mir rawhil laahi illal qawmul kaafiroon
verses.88:
Falammaa dakhaloo 'alaihi qaaloo yaaa ayyuhal 'Azeezu massanaa wa 
	ahlanad durru wa ji'naa bi bidaa 'im muzjaatin fa awfi lanal kaila wa 
	tasaddaq 'alainaa innal laaha yajzil mutasaddiqeen
verses.89: Qaala hal 'alimtum maa fa'altum bi Yoosufa wa akheehi iz antum jaahiloon
verses.90:
Qaaloo 'a innaka la anta Yoosufu qaala ana Yoosufu wa haazaaa akhee qad 
	mannal laahu 'alainaa innahoo mai yattaqi wa yasbir fa innal laaha laa 
	yudee'u ajral muhsineen
verses.91: Qaaloo tallaahi laqad aatharakal laahu 'alainaa wa in kunnaa lakhaati'een
verses.92:
Qaala laa tathreeba 'alaikumul yawma yaghfirul laahu lakum wa Huwa 
	arhamur raahimeen
verses.93:
Izhaboo biqameesee haazaa fa alqoohu 'alaa wajhi abee ya'ti baseeranw 
	wa'toonee bi ahlikum ajma'een 
	(section 10)
verses.94:
Wa lammaa fasalatil 'eeru qaala aboohum innee la ajidu reeha Yoosufa law 
	laaa an tufannidoon
verses.95: Qaaloo tallaahi innaka lafee dalaalikal qadeem
verses.96:
Falammaaa an jaaa'albasheeru alqaahu 'alaa wajhihee fartadda baseeran 
	qaala alam aqul lakum inneee a'lamu minal laahi maa laa ta'lamoon
verses.97: Qaaloo yaaa abaanas taghfir lanaa zunoobanaa innaa kunnaa khaati'een
verses.98: Qaala sawfa astaghfiru lakum Rabbeee innahoo Huwal Ghafoorur Raheem
verses.99:
Falammaa dakhaloo 'alaa Yoosufa aawaaa ilaihi abawaiyhi wa qaalad khuloo 
	Misra inshaaa'al laahu aamineen
verses.100:
Wa raf'a abawaihi 'alal 'arshi wa kharroo lahoo sujjadaa; wa qaala yaaa 
	abati haaza taaweelu ru'yaaya min qablu qad ja'alahaa Rabbee haqqaa; wa qad 
	ahsana beee iz akhrajanee minas sijni wa jaaa'a bikum minal badwi mim ba'di 
	an nazaghash Shaitaanu bainee wa baina ikhwatee; inna Rabbee lateeful limaa 
	yashaaa'; innahoo Huwal 'Aleemul Hakeem
verses.102:
Zaalika min ambaaa'il ghaibi nooheehi ilaika wa maa kunta ladaihim iz 
	ajma'ooo amrahum wa hum yamkuroon
verses.103: Wa maa aksarun naasi wa law harasta bimu'mineen
verses.104:
Wa maa tas'aluhum 'alaihi min ajr; in huwa illaa zikrul lil'aalameen 
(section 11)
verses.105:
Wa ka ayyim min Aayatin fis samaawaati wal ardi yamurroona 'alaihaa wa 
	hum 'anhaa mu'ridoon
verses.106: Wa maa yu'minu aksaru hum billaahi illaa wa hum mushrikoon
verses.107:
Afa aminooo an taatiya hum ghaashiyatum min 'azaabil laahi aw 
	taatiyahumus Saa'atu baghtatanw wa hum laa yash'uroon
verses.108:
Qul haazihee sabeeleee ad'ooo ilal laah; 'alaa baseera tin ana wa manit 
	taba'anee wa Subhaanal laahi wa maaa ana minal mushrikeen
verses.109:
Wa maaa arsalnaa min qablika illaa rijaalan nooheee ilaihim min ahlil 
	quraa; afalam yaseeroo fil ardi fa yanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul lazeena 
	min qablihim; wa la Daarul Aakhirati Khairul lillazeenat taqaw; afalaa 
	ta'qiloon
verses.110:
Hattaaa izas tai'asar Rusulu wa zannooo annahum qad kuziboo jaaa'ahum 
	nas runaa fanujjiya man nashaaa'u wa laa yuraddu ba'suna 'anil qawmil 
	mujrimeen
verses.111:
Laqad kaana fee qasasihim 'ibratul li ulil albaab; maa kaana hadeethany 
	yuftaraa wa laakin tasdeeqal lazee baina yadaihi wa tafseela kulli shai'inw 
	wa hudanw wa rahmatal liqawminy yu'minoon 
(section 12)

verses.1:
Alif-Laaam-Meeem-Raa; tilka Aayaatul Kitaab; wallazee unzila ilaika mir 
	Rabbikal haqqu wa laakinna aksaran naasi laa yu'minoon
verses.2:
Allaahul lazee raf'as samaawaati bighairi 'amadin tarawnahaa summas 
	tawaa 'alal 'Arshi wa sakhkharash shamsa walqamara kulluny yajree li ajalim 
	musammaa; yudabbirul amra yufassilil Aayaati la'allakum biliqaaa'i Rabbikum 
	tooqinoon
verses.4:
Wa fil ardi qita'um muta jaawiraatunw wa jannaatum min a'naabinw wa 
	zar'unw wa nakheelun sinwaanunw wa ghairu sinwaaniny yusqaa bimaaa'inw 
	waahid; wa nufaddilu ba'dahaa 'alaa ba'din fil-ukul; inna fee zaalika la 
	aayaatil liqawminy ya'qiloon
verses.5:
Wa in ta'jab fa'ajabun qawluhum 'a-izaa kunna turaaban 'a-inna lafee 
	khalqin jadeed; ulaaa 'ikal lazeena kafaroo bi Rabbihim wa ulaaa'ikal 
	aghlaalu feee a'naaqihim wa ulaaa'ika Ashaabun Naari hum feehaa khaalidoon
verses.6:
Wa yasta'jiloonaka bis saiyi'ati qablal hasanati wa qad khalat min 
	qablihimul masulaat; wa inna Rabbaka lazoo maghfiratil linnaasi 'alaa 
	zulmihim wa inna Rabbaka lashadeedul 'iqaab
verses.7:
Wa yaqoolul lazeena kafaroo law laaa unzila 'alaihi Aayatum mir Rabbih; 
	innamaaa anta munzirunw wa likulli qawmin haad (section 1)
verses.8:
Allaahu ya'lamu maa tahmilu kullu unsaa wa maa tagheedul arhaamu wa maa 
	tazdaad, wa kullu shai'in 'indahoo bimiqdaar
verses.9: 'Aalimul Ghaibi wash shahaadatil Kaabeerul Muta'aal
verses.10:
Sawaaa'um minkum man asarral qawla wa man jahara bihee wa man huwa 
	mustakhfim billaili wa saaribum binnahaar
verses.11:
Lahoo mu'aqqibaatum mim baini yadaihi wa min khalfihee yahfazoonahoo min 
	amril laah; innal laaha laa yughaiyiru maa biqawmin hattaa yughaiyiroo maa 
	bianfusihim; wa izaaa araadal laahu biqawmin sooo'an falaa maradda lah; wa 
	maa lahum min dooniheeminw waal
verses.12:
Huwal lazee yureekumul barqa khawfanw wa tama'anw wa yunshi'us sahaabas 
	siqaal
verses.13:
Wa yusabbihur ra'du bihamdihee walmalaaa'ikatu min kheefatihee wa 
	yursilus sawaa'iqa fa yuseebu bihaa mai yashaaa'u wa hum yujaadiloona fil 
	laahi wa Huwa shadeedul mihaal
verses.14:
Lahoo da'watul haqq; wallazeena yad'oona min doonihee laa yastajeeboona 
	lahum bishai'in illaa kabaasiti kaffaihi ilal maaa'i liyablugha faahu wa maa 
	huwa bibaalighih; wa maa du'aaa'ul kaafireena illaa fee dalaal
verses.15: Wa lillaahi yasjudu man fis samaawaati wal ardi taw 'anw wa karhanw wa zilaaluhum bilghuduwwi wal aasaal (make sajda)
verses.16:
Qul mar Rabbus samaawaati wal ard; qulillaah; qul afattakhaztum min 
	dooniheee awliyaaa'a laa yamlikoona li anfusihim naf'anw wa laa darraa; qul 
	hal yastawil a'maa wal baseeru am hal tastawiz zulumaatu wannoor; am ja'aloo 
	lillaahi shurakaaa'a khalaqoo kakhalqihee fatashaa bahal khalqu 'alaihim; 
	qulil laahu Khaaliqu kulli shai'inw wa Huwal Waahidul Qahhar
verses.17:
Anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an fasaalat awdiyatum biqadarihaa fahtamalas 
	sailu zabadar raabiyaa; wa mimmmaa yooqidoona 'alaihi fin naarib tighaaa'a 
	bilyatin aw mataa'in zabadum misluh; kazaalika yadribul laahul haqqa wal 
	baatil; fa ammaz zabadu fa yazhabu jufaaa'aa; wa ammaa maa yanfa'un naasa fa 
	yamkusu fil ard; kazaalika yadribul laahul amsaal
verses.18:
Lillazeenas tajaaboo lirabbihimul husnaa; wallazeena lam yastajeeboo 
	lahoo law anna lahum maa fil ardi jamee'anw wa mislahoo ma'ahoo laftadaw bih; 
	ulaaa'ika lahum sooo'ul hisaab; wa ma'waahum Jahannamu wa bi'sal mihaad 
	(section 2)
verses.19:
Afamai ya'lamu annamaaa unzila ilaika mir Rabbikal haqqu kaman huwa 
	a'maa; innamaa yatazakkaru ulul albaab
verses.20: Allazeena yoofoona bi'ahdil laahi wa laa yanqu doonal meesaaq
verses.21:
Wallazeena yasiloona maaa amaral laahu bihee ai yoosala wa yakhshawna 
	Rabbahum wa yakhaafoona sooo'al hisaab
verses.22:
Wallazeena sabarub tighaaa'a Wajhi Rabbihim wa aqaamus Salaata wa 
	anfaqoo mimmaa razaqnaahum sirranw wa 'alaaniyatanw wa yadra'oona 
	bilhasanatis saiyi'ata ulaaa'ika lahum 'uqbad daar
verses.23:
Jannaatu 'adiny yadkhu loonahaa wa man salaha min aabaaa'ihim wa azwaajihim wa zurriyyaatihim walmalaaa'i katu 
	yadkhuloona 'alaihim min kulli baab
verses.24: Salaamun 'alaikum bimaa sabartum; fani'ma 'uqbad daar
verses.25:
Wallazeena yanqudoona 'Ahdal laahi mim ba'di  meesaaqihee wa 
	yaqta'oona maaa amaral laahu biheee ai yoosala wa yufsidoona fil ardi 
	ulaaa'ika lahumul la'natu wa lahum sooo'ud daar
verses.26:
Allaahu yabsutur rizqa limai yashaaa'u wa yaqdir; wa farihoo bilhayaatid 
	dunyaa wa mal hayaatud dunya fil Aakhirati illaa mataa' (section 3)
verses.27:
Wa yaqoolul lazeena kafaroo law laaa unzila 'alaihi Aayatum mir Rabbih; 
	qul innal laaha yudillu mai yashaa'u wa yahdeee ilaihi man anaab
verses.28:
Allazeena aamanoo wa tatma'innu quloobuhum bizikril laah; alaa bizikril 
	laahi tatma'innul quloob
verses.29: Allazeena aamanoo wa a'amilus saalihaati toobaa lahum wa husnu ma aab
verses.30:
Kazaalika arsalnaaka feee ummatin qad khalat min qablihaaa umamul 
	litatluwa 'alaihimul lazeee awhainaaa ilaika wa hum yakfuroona bir Rahmaaan; 
	qul Huwa Rabbee laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa 'alaihi 
	tawakkaltu wa ilaihi mataab
verses.31:
Wa law anna Quraanan suyyirat bihil jibaalu aw qutti'at bihil ardu aw 
	kullima bihil mawtaa; bal lillaahil amru jamee'aa; afalam yai'asil lazeena 
	aamanooo al law yashaaa 'ullaahu lahadan naasa jamee'aa; wa laa yazaalul 
	lazeena kafaroo tuseebuhum bimaa sana'oo qaari'atun aw tahullu qareebam min 
	daarihim hatta ya'tiya wa'dul laah; innal laaha laa yukhliful mee'aad 
	(section 4)
verses.32:
Wa laqadis tuhzi'a bi Rusulim min qablika fa amlaitu lillazeena kafaroo 
	summa akhaztuhum fakaifa kaana 'iqaab
verses.33:
Afaman Huwa qaaa'imun 'alaa kulli nafsim bimaa kasabat; wa ja'aloo 
	lillaahi shurakaaa'a qul samoohum; am tunabbi'oona hoo bimaa laa ya'lamu fil 
	ardi; am bizaahirim minal qawl; bal zuyyina lillazeena kafaroo makruhum wa 
	suddoo 'anis sabeel; wa mai yudlilil laahu famaa lahoo min haad;
verses.34:
Lahum 'azaabun fil hayaatid dunyaa wa la'azaabul Aakhirati ashaq, wa 
	maa lahum minal laahi min-waaq
verses.35:
Masalul Jannatil latee wu'idal muttaqoona tajree min tahtihal anhaaru 
	ukuluhaa daaa'imunw wa zilluhaa; tilka uqbal lazeenat taqaw wa 'uqbal 
	kafireenan Naar
verses.36:
Wallazeena aatainaa humul Kitaaba yafrahoona bimaa unzila ilaika wa 
	minal Ahzaabi mai yunkiru ba'dah; qul innamaa umirtu an a'budal laaha wa 
	laaa ushrika bih; ilaihi ad'oo wa ilaihi maab
verses.37:
Wa kazaalika anzalnaahu hukman 'Arabiyyaa; wa la'init taba'ta ahwaaa 'ahum 
	ba'da maa jaaa'aka minal 'ilmi maa laka minal laahi minw waliyinw wa laa 
	waaq (section 5)
verses.39: Yamhul laahu maa yashaaa'u wa yusbitu wa 'indahooo ummul Kitaab
verses.40:
Wa im maa nurriyannaka ba'dal lazee na'iduhum aw nata waffayannaka fa 
	innamaa 'alaikal balaaghu wa 'alainal hisaab
verses.41:
Awalam yaraw annaa na'til arda nanqusuhaa min atraafihaa; wallaahu 
	yahkumu laa mu'aqqiba lihukmih; wa Huwa saree'ul hisaab
verses.42:
Wa qad makaral lazeena min qablihim falillaahil makru jamee'aa; ya'lamu 
	maa taksibu kullu nafs; wa sa ya'lamul kuffaaru liman 'uqbad daar
verses.43:
Wa yaqoolul lazeena kafaroo lasta mursalaa; qul kafaa billaahi shaheedam 
	bainee wa bainakum wa man 'indahoo 'ilmul Kitaab (section 6)

verses.1:
Alif-Laaam-Raa; Kitaabun anzalnaahu ilaika litukhrijan-naasa minaz 
	zulumaati ilan noori bi-izni Rabbihim ilaa siraatil 'Azeezil Hameed
verses.2:
Allaahil lazee lahoo maa fis samaawaati wa maa fill ard; wa wailul 
	lilkaafireena min 'azaabin shadeed
verses.3:
Allazeena yastahibboo nal hayaatad dunyaa 'alal aakhirati wa yasuddoona 
	'ansabeelil laahi wa yabghoonahaa 'iwajaa; ulaaa 'ika fee dalaalin ba'eed
verses.4:
Wa maaa arsalnaa mir Rasoolin illaa bilisaani qawmihee liyubaiyina lahum 
	fa yudillul laahu mai yashaaa'u wa yahdee mai yashaaa'; wa Huwal 'Azeezul 
	Hakeem
verses.5:
Wa laqad arsalnaa Moosaa bi Aayaatinaa an akhrij qawmaka minaz zulumaati 
	ilan noori wa zak kirhum bi ayyaamil laah; inna fee zaalika la aayaatil 
	likulli sabbaarin shakoor
verses.6:
Wa iz qaala Moosaa liqawmihiz kuroo ni'matal laahi 'alaikum iz anjaakum 
	min Aali Fir'awna yasoomoo nakum sooo'al 'azaabi wa yuzabbihoona abnaaa'akum 
	wa yastahyoona nisaaa'akum; wa fee zaalikum balaaa'un mir Rabbikum 'azeem 
	(section 1)
verses.7:
Wa iz ta azzana Rabbukum la'in shakartum la azeedannakum wa la'in 
	kafartum inna 'azaabee lashadeed
verses.8:
Wa qaala Moosaaa in takfurooo antum wa man fil ardi jamee'an fa innal 
	laaha la Ghaniyyun Hameed
verses.9:
Alam ya'tikum naba'ul lazeena min qablikum qawmi Noohinw wa 'Aadinw wa 
	Samood, wallazeena mim ba'dihim; laa ya'lamuhum illallaah; jaaa'at hum 
	Rusuluhum bilbaiyinaati faraddooo aydiyahum feee afwaahihim wa qaalooo innaa 
	kafarnaa bimaaa ursiltum bihee wa innaa lafee shakkim mimmaa tad'oonanaaa 
	ilaihi mureeb
verses.10:
Qaalat Rusuluhum afillaahi shakkun faatiris samaawaati wal ardi 
	yad'ookum liyaghfira lakum min zunoobikum wa yu'akhirakum ilaaa ajalin musammaa; qaaloo in antum illaa basharum mislunaa tureedoona an tasuddoonaa 
	'ammaa kaana ya'budu aabaaa'unaa fa'toonaa bi sultaanin mubeen
verses.11:
Qaalat lahum Rusuluhum in nahnu illaa basharum mislukum wa laakinnal 
	laaha yamunnu 'alaa mai yashaaa'u min 'ibaadihee wa maa kaana lanaaa an 
	na'tiyakum bisul taanin illaa bi iznil laah; wa 'alal laahi falyatawakkalil 
	mu'minoon
verses.12:
Wa maa lanaa allaa natawakkala 'alal laahi wa qad hadaanaa subulanaa; wa 
	lanasbiranna 'alaa maaa aazaitumoonaa; wa 'alal laahi falyatawakkalil 
	mutawakkiloon (section 2)
verses.13:
Wa qaalal lazeena kafaroo li Rusulihim lanukhrijanna kum min aardinaaa 
	aw la ta'oodunna fee millatinaa fa awhaaa ilaihim Rabbuhum lanuhlikannaz 
	zaalimeen
verses.14:
Wa lanuskinan nakumul arda min ba'dihim; zaalika liman khaafa maqaamee 
	wa khaafa wa'eed
verses.15: Wastaftahoo wa khaaba kullu jabbaarin 'aneed
verses.16: Minw waraaa'ihee jahannamu wa yusqaa min maaa'in sadeed
verses.17:
Yatajarra'uhoo wa laa yakaadu yuseeghuhoo wa ya'teehil mawtu min kulli 
	makaaninw wa maa huwa bimaiyitinw wa minw waraaa'ihee 'azaabun ghaleez
verses.19: Alam tara annal laaha khalaqas samaawaati wal arda bilhaqq; iny yasha yuzhibkum wa ya'ti bikhalqin jadeed
verses.20: Wa maa zaalika 'alal laahi bi 'azeez
verses.21:
Wa barazoo lillaahi jamee'an faqaalad du'afaaa'u lil lazeenas takbarooo 
	innaa kunnaa lakum taba'an fahal antum mughnoona 'annaa min 'azaabil laahi 
	min shai'; qaaloo law hadaanal laahu la hadaynaakum sawaaa'un 'alainaaa 
	ajazi'naa am sabarnaa maa lanaa min mahees 
(section 3)
verses.22:
Wa qaalash Shaitaanu lammaa qudiyal amru innal laaha wa'adakum wa'dal 
	haqqi wa wa'attukum fa akhlaftukum wa maa kaana liya 'alaikum min sultaanin 
	illaaa an da'awtukum fastajabtum lee falaa taloomoonee wa loomooo anfusakum 
	maaa ana bimusrikhikum wa maaa antum bimusrikhiyya innee kafartu bimaaa 
	ashraktumooni min qabl; innaz zaalimeena lahum azaabun aleem
verses.23:
Wa udkhilal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati Jannaatin tajree min 
	tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena feehaa bi izni Rabbihim tahiyyatuhum feeha 
	salaam
verses.24:
Alam tara kaifa darabal laahu masalan kalimatan taiyibatan kashajaratin 
	taiyibatin asluhaa saabitunw wa far'uhaa fis samaaa'
verses.25:
Tu'teee ukulahaa kulla heenim bi izni Rabbihaa; wa yadribul laahul 
	amsaala linnaasi la'allahum yatazak karoon
verses.26:
Wa masalu kalimatin khabeesatin kashajaratin khabee satinij tussat min 
	fawqil ardi maa lahaa min qaraar
verses.27:
Yusabbitul laahul lazeena aamanoo bilqawlis saabiti fil hayaatid dunyaa 
	wa fil Aakhirati wa yudillul laahuz zaalimeen; wa yaf'alul laahu maa yashaaa'
	(section 4)
verses.28:
Alam tara ilal lazeena baddaloo ni'matal laahi kufranw wa ahalloo 
	qawmahum daaral bawaar
verses.29: Jahannama yaslawnahaa wa bi'sal qaraar
verses.30:
Wa ja'aloo lillaahi andaadal liyudilloo 'an sabeelih; qul tamatta'oo fa 
	innaa maseerakum ilan Naar
verses.31:
Qul li'ibaadiyal lazeena aamanoo yuqeemus Salaata wa yunfiqoo mimmaa 
	razaqnaahum sirranw wa 'alaaniyatam min qabli any yaatiya Yawmul laa bai'un 
	feehi wa laa khilaal
verses.32:
Allaahul lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal arda wa anzala minas samaaa'i 
	maaa'an faakhraja bihee minas samaraati rizqal lakum wa sakhkhara lakumul 
	fulka litajriya fil bahri bi amrihee wa sakhkhara lakumul anhaar
verses.33:
Wa sakhkhara lakumush shamsa walqamara daaa'ibaini wa sakhkhara lakumul 
	laila wannahaar
verses.34:
Wa aataakum min kulli maa sa altumooh; wa in ta'uddoo ni'matal laahi laa 
	tuhsoohaa; innal insaana lazaloo mun kaffaar 
(section 5)
verses.35:
Wa iz qaala Ibraaheemu Rabbij 'al haazal balada aaminanw wajnubnee wa 
	baniyya an na'budal asnaam
verses.36:
Rabbi innahunna adlalna kaseeram minan naasi faman tabi'anee fa innahoo 
	minnee wa man 'asaanee fa innaka Ghafoorur Raheem
verses.37:
Rabbanaaa inneee askantu min zurriyyatee biwaadin ghairi zee zar'in 'inda 
	Baitikal Muharrami Rabbanaa liyuqeemus Salaata faj'al af'idatam minan naasi 
	tahweee ilaihim warzuqhum minas samaraati la'allahum yashkuroon
verses.38:
Rabbanaaa innaka ta'lamu maa nukhfee wa maa nu'lin; wa maa yakhfaa 'alal 
	laahi min shai'in fil ardi wa laa fis samaaa'
verses.39:
Alhamdu lillaahil lazee wahaba lee 'alal kibari Ismaa'eela wa Ishaaq; 
	inna Rabbee lasamee'ud du'aaa
verses.40:
Rabbij 'alnee muqeemas Salaati wa min zurriyyatee Rabbanaa wa taqabbal 
	du'aaa'
verses.41:
Rabbanagh fir lee wa liwaalidaiya wa lilmu'mineena Yawma yaqoomul hisaab 
	(section 6)
verses.42:
Wa laa tahsabannal laaha ghaafilan 'ammaa ya'maluz zaalimoon; innamaa 
	yu'akh khiruhum li Yawmin tashkhasu feehil absaar
verses.43:
Muhti'eena muqni'ee ru'oosihim laa yartaddu ilaihim tarfuhum wa 
	af'idatuhum hawaaa'
verses.44:
Wa anzirin naasa Yawma yaateehimul 'azaabu fa yaqoolul lazeena zalamoo 
	Rabbanaaa akhkhirnaaa ilaaa ajalin qareebin nujib da'wataka wa nattabi 'ir 
	Rusul; awalam takoonooo aqsamtum min qablu maa lakum min zawaal
verses.45:
Wa sakantum fee masaakinil lazeena zalamooo anfusahum wa tabaiyana lakum 
	kaifa fa'alnaa bihim wa darabnaa lakumul amsaal
verses.46:
Wa qad makaroo makrahum wa 'indal laahi makruhum wa in kaana makruhum 
	litazoola minhul jibaal
verses.47:
Falaa tahsabannal laaha mukhlifa wa'dihee Rusulah; innal laaha 'azeezun 
	zuntiqaam
verses.48:
Yawma tubaddalul ardu ghairal ardi wassamaawaatu wa barazoo lillaahil 
	Waahidil Qahhaar
verses.49: Wa taral mujrimeena Yawma 'izim muqarraneena filasfaad
verses.50: Saraabeeluhum min qatiraaninw wa taghshaa wujoohahumun Naar
verses.51: Liyajziyal laahu kulla nafsim maa kasabat; innal laaha saree'ul hisaab
verses.52:
Haaza balaaghul linnaasi wa liyunzaroo bihee wa liya'lamooo annamaa Huwa 
	Illaahunw Waahidunw wa liyaz zakkara ulul albaab 
(section 7) (End Juz 13)

verses.1: Alif-Laaam-Raa; tilka Aayaatul Kitaabi wa Qur-aa-nim Mubeen
verses.2: Rubamaa yawaddul lazeena kafaroo law kaanoo muslimeen
verses.3: Zarhum yaakuloo wa yatamatta'oo wa yulhihimul amalu fasawfa ya'lamoon
verses.4: Wa maaa ahlaknaa min qaryatin illaa wa lahaa kitaabum ma'loom
verses.5: Maa tasbiqu min ummatin ajalahaa wa maa yastaakhiroon
verses.6: Wa qaaloo yaaa aiyuhal lazee nuzzila 'alaihiz Zikru innaka lamajnoon
verses.7: Law maa taateenaa bil malaaa'ikati in kunta minas saadiqeen
verses.8:
Maa nunazzilul malaaa'i kata illaa bilhaqqi wa maa kaanooo izam 
	munzareen
verses.9: Innaa Nahnu nazalnaz Zikra wa Innaa lahoo lahaa fizoon
verses.10: Wa laqad arsalnaa min qablika fee shiya'il awwaleen
verses.11: Wa maa yaateehim mir Rasoolin illaa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon
verses.12: kazaalika naslukuhoo fee quloobil mujrimeen
verses.13: Laa yu'minoona bihee wa qad khalat sunnatul awwaleen
verses.14: Wa law fatahnaa 'alaihim baabam minas samaaa'i fazaloo feehi ya'rujoon
verses.15:
Laqaaloo innamaa sukkirat absaarunaa bal nahnu qawmum mashooroon 
	(section 1)
verses.16: Wa laqad ja'alnaa fissamaaa'i buroojanw wa zaiyannaahaa linnaazireen
verses.17: Wa hafiznaahaa min kulli Shaitaanir rajeem
verses.18: Illaa manis taraqas sam'a fa atba'ahoo shihaabum mubeen
verses.19:
Wal arda madadnaahaa wa alqainaa feehaa rawaasiya wa ambatnaa feehaa min 
	kulli shai'im mawzoon
verses.20: Wa ja'alnaa lakum feehaa ma'aayisha wa mal lastum lahoo biraaziqeen
verses.21:
Wa im min shai'in illaa 'indanaa khazaaa 'inuhoo wa maa nunazziluhooo 
	illaa biqadarim ma'loom
verses.22:
Wa arsalnar riyaaha la waaqiha fa anzalnaa minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa 
	asqai naakumoohu wa maaa antum lahoo bikhaazineen
verses.23: Wa innnaa la nahnu nuhyee wa numeetu wa nahnul waarisoon
verses.24: Wa la qad 'alimnal mustaqdimeena minkum wa laqad 'alimnal mustaakhireen
verses.25: Wa inna Rabbaka Huwa yahshuruhum; innahoo Hakeemun 'Aleem (section 2)
verses.26: Wa laqad khalaqnal insaana min salsaalim min hama im masnoon
verses.27: Waljaaanna khalaqnaahu min qablu min naaris samoom
verses.28:
Wa iz qaala Rabbuka lilmalaaa' ikati innee khaaliqum basharam min 
	salsaalim min hama im masnoon
verses.29: Fa izaa sawwaituhoo wa nafakhtu feehi mir roohee faqa'oo lahoo saajideen
verses.30: Fasajadal malaaa'ikatu kulluhum ajma'oon
verses.31: Illaaa ibleesa abaaa ai yakoona ma'as saajideen
verses.32: Qaala yaaa Ibleesu maa laka allaa takoona ma'as saajideen
verses.33:
Qaala lam akul li asjuda libasharin khalaqtahoo min salsaalim min hama 
	im masnoon
verses.34: Qaala fakhruj minhaa fa innaka rajeem
verses.35: Wa inna 'alaikal la'nata ilaa Yawmid Deen
verses.36: Qaala Rabbi fa anzirneee ilaa Yawmi yub'asoon
verses.37: Qaala fa innaka minal munzareen
verses.38: Ilaa Yawmil waqtil ma'loom
verses.39:
Qaala Rabbi bimaaa aghwaitanee la uzayyin anna lahum fil ardi wa la 
	ughwiyan nahum ajma'een
verses.40: Illaa 'ibaadaka minhumul mukhlaseen
verses.41: Qaala haaza Siraatun 'alaiya Mustaqeem
verses.42:
Inna 'ibaadee laisa laka 'alaihim sultaanun illaa manittaba'aka minal 
	ghaaween
verses.43: Wa inna jahannama lamaw'iduhum ajma'een
verses.44: Lahaa sab'atu abwaab; likulli baabim minhum juz'um maqsoom (section 3)
verses.45: Innal muttaqeena fee Jannaatinw wa 'uyoon
verses.46: Udkhuloohaa bisalaamin aamineen
verses.47:
Wa naza'naa ma fee sudoorihim min ghillin ikhwaanan 'alaa sururim 
	mutaqaabileen
verses.48: Laa yamas suhum feehaa nasabunw wa maa hum minhaa bimukhrajeen
verses.49: Nabbi' 'ibaadeee annneee anal Ghafoorur Raheem
verses.50: Wa anna 'azaabee huwal 'azaabul aleem
verses.51: Wa nabbi'hum 'an daifi Ibraaheem
verses.52: Iz dakhaloo 'alaihi faqaaloo salaaman qaala innaa minkum wajiloon
verses.53: Qaaloo la tawjal innaa nubashshiruka bighulaamin 'aleem
verses.54: Qaala abashshartumoonee 'alaaa am massaniyal kibaru fabima tubashshiroon
verses.55: Qaaloo bashsharnaaka bilhaqqi falaa takum minal qaaniteen
verses.56: Qaala wa mai yaqnatu mir rahmati Rabbiheee illad daaaloon
verses.57: Qaala famaa khatbukum aiyuhal mursaloon
verses.58: Qaaloo innaaa ursilnaaa ilaa qawmim mujrimeen
verses.59: Illaaa Aala Loot; innaa lamunajjoohum ajma'een
verses.60: Illam ra atahoo qaddarnaaa innahaa laminal ghaabireen (section 4)
verses.61: Falamma jaaa'a Aala Lootinil mursaloon
verses.62: Qaala innakum qawmum munkaroon
verses.63: Qaaloo bal ji'naaka bimaa kaanoo feehi yamtaroon
verses.64: Wa atainaaka bilhaqqi wa innaa lasaadiqoon
verses.65:
Fa asri bi ahlika biqit'im minal laili wattabi' adbaarahum wa laa 
	yaltafit minkum ahadunw wamdoo haisu tu'maroon
verses.66:
Wa qadainaaa ilaihi zaalikal amra anna daabira haaa'ulaaa'i maqtoo'um 
	musbiheen
verses.67: Wa jaaa'a ahlul madeenati yastabshiroon
verses.68: Qaala inna haaa'ulaaa'i daifee falaa tafdahoon
verses.69: Wattaqul laaha wa laa tukhzoon
verses.70: Qaalooo awalam nanhaka 'anil 'aalameen
verses.71: Qaala haaa'ulaaa'i banaateee in kuntum faa'ileen
verses.72: La'amruka innahum lafee sakratihim ya'mahoon
verses.73: Fa akhazat humus saihatu mushriqeen
verses.74: Faja'alnaa 'aaliyahaa saafilahaa wa amtarnaa 'alaihim hijaaratam min sijjeel
verses.75: Inna fee zaalika la Aayaatil lilmutawassimeen
verses.76: Wa innahaa labi sabeelim muqeem
verses.77: Inna fee zaalika la Aayatal lilmu'mineen
verses.78: Wa in kaana Ashaabul Aikati lazaalimeen
verses.79: Fantaqamnaa minhum wa innahumaa labi imaamim mubeen (section 5)
verses.80: Wa laqad kazzaba ashaabul Hijril mursaleen
verses.81: Wa aatainaahum Aayaatinaa fakaanoo 'anhaa mu'rideen
verses.82: Wa kaanoo yanhitoona minal jibaali buyootan aamineen
verses.83: Fa akhazat humus saihatu musbiheen
verses.84: Famaaa aghnaa 'anhum maa kaanoo yaksiboon
verses.85:
Wa maa khalaqnas samaawaati wal arda wa maa bainahumaaa illaa bilhaqq; 
	wa innas Saa'ata la aatiyatun fasfahis safhal jameel
verses.86: Inna Rabbaka Huwal khallaaqul 'aleem
verses.87: Wa laqad aatainaaka sab'am minal masaanee wal Qur-aanal 'Azeem
verses.88:
Laa tamuddanna 'ainaika ilaa maa matta 'naa biheee azwaajam minhum wa 
	laa tahzan 'alaihim wakhfid janaahaka lilmu 'mineen
verses.89: Wa qul inneee anan nazeerul mubeen
verses.90: Kamaaa anzalnaa 'alal muqtasimeen
verses.91: Allazeena ja'alul Quraana'ideen
verses.92: Fawa Rabbika lanas'a lannahum ajma'een
verses.93: 'Ammaa kaanoo ya'maloon
verses.94: Fasda' bimaa tu'maru wa a'rid anil mushrikeen
verses.95: Innaa kafainaakal mustahzi'een
verses.96: Allazeena yaj'aloona ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhar; fasawfa ya'lamoon
verses.97: Wa laqad na'lamu annaka yadeequ sadruka bimaa yaqooloon
verses.98: Fasabbih bihamdi Rabbika wa kum minas saajideen

verses.1:
Ataaa amrullaahi falaa tasta'jilooh; Subhaanahoo wa Ta'aalaa 'ammaa 
	yushrikoon
verses.2:
Yunazzilul malaaa 'ikata birroohi min amrihee 'alaa mai yashaaa'u min 'ibaadiheee 
	an anzirooo annahoo laaa ilaaha illaaa ana fattaqoon
verses.3: Khalaqas samaawaati wal arda bilhaqq; Ta'aalaa 'ammaa yushrikoon
verses.4: Khalaqal insaana min nutfatin fa izaa huwa khaseemum mubeen
verses.5:
Wal an 'amaa khalaqahaa; lakum feehaa dif'unw wa manaafi'u wa minhaa 
	taakuloon
verses.6: Wa lakum feehaa jamaalun heena tureehoona wa heena tasrahoon
verses.7:
Wa tahmilu asqaalakum ilaa baladil lam takoonoo baaligheehi illaa 
	bishiqqil anfus; inna Rabbakum la Ra'oofur Raheem
verses.8:
Walkhaila wal bighaala wal hameera litarkaboohaa wa zeenah; wa yakhluqu 
	maa laa ta'lamoon
verses.9:
Wa 'alal laahi qasdus sabeeli wa minhaa jaaa'ir; wa law shaaa'a 
	lahadaakum ajma'een (section 1)
verses.10:
Huwal lazeee anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'al lakum minhu sharaabunw wa 
	minhu shajarun feehi tuseemoon
verses.11:
Yumbitu lakum bihiz zar'a wazzaitoona wanna kheela wal-a'naaba wa min 
	kullis samaraat, inna fee zaalika la Aayatal liqawminy yatafakkaroon
verses.12:
Wa sakkhkhara lakumul laila wannahaara wash shamsa walqamara wannujoomu 
	musakhkharaatum bi amrih; inna fee zaalika la Aayaatil liqawminy ya'qiloon
verses.13:
Wa maa zara a lakum fil ardi mukhtalifan alwaanuh; inna fee zaalika la 
	Aayatal liqawminy yazakkaroon
verses.14:
Wa Huwal lazee sakhkharal bahra litaakuloo minhu lahman tariyyanw wa 
	tastakhrijoo minhu hilyatan talbasoonahaa wa taral fulka mawaakhira feehi wa 
	litabtaghoo min fadlihee wa la'allakum tashkuroon
verses.15:
Wa alqaa fil ardi rawaasiya an tameeda bikum wa anhaaranw wa sublulal la 
	'allakum tahtadoon
verses.16: Wa 'alaamaat; wa bin najmi hum yahtadoon
verses.17: Afamany yakhluqu kamallaa yakhluq; afalaa tazak karoon
verses.18:
Wa in ta'uddoo ni'matal laahi laa tuhsoohaa; innal laaha la Ghafoorur 
	Raheem
verses.19: Wallaahu ya'lamu maa tusirroona wa maa tu'linoon
verses.20:
Wallazeena yad'oona min doonil laahi laa yakhluqoona shai'anw wa hum 
	yukhlaqoon
verses.21:
Amwaatun ghairu ahyaaa'inw wa maa yash'uroona aiyaana yub'asoon (section 
	2)
verses.22:
Illahukum Ilaahunw Waahid; fallazeena laa yu'minoona bil Aakhirati 
	quloobuhum munkiratunw wa hum mustakbiroon
verses.23:
Laa jarama annal laaha ya'lamu maa yusirrona wa ma yu'linoon; innahoo 
	laa yuhibbul mustakbireen
verses.24: Wa izaa qeela lahum maazaaa anzala Rabbukum qaaloo asaateerul awwaleen
verses.25:
Liyahmilooo awzaarahum kaamilatany Yawmal Qiyaamati wa min awzaaril 
	lazeena yudilloonahum bighairi 'ilm; alaa saaa'a maa yaziroon (section 3)
verses.26:
Qad makaral lazeena min qablihim fa atal laahu bunyaa nahum minal 
	qawaa'idi fakharra 'alaihimus saqfu min fawqihim wa ataahumul 'azaabu min 
	haisu laa yash'uroon
verses.27:
Summa Yawmal Qiyaamati yukhzeehim wa yaqoolu aina shurakaaa'iyal lazeena 
	kuntum tushaaaqqoona feehim; qaalal lazeena ootul 'ilma innal khizyal Yawma 
	wassooo'a 'alal kaafireen
verses.28:
Allazeena tatawaf faahu mul malaaa'ikatu zaalimeee anfusihim fa alqawus 
	salama maa kunnaa na'malu min sooo'; balaaa innal laaha 'aleemum bimaa 
	kuntum ta'maloon
verses.29:
Fadkhulooo abwaaba jahannama khaalideena feeha falabi'sa maswal mutakab 
	bireen
verses.31:
Jannaatu 'Adniny yadkhuloonahaa tajree min tahtihal anhaaru lahum feehaa 
	maa yashaaa'oon; kazaalika yajzil laahul muttaqeen
verses.32:
Allazeena tatawaf faahumul malaaa'ikatu taiyibeena yaqooloona salaamun 
	'alai kumud khulul Jannata bimaa kuntum ta'maloon
verses.33:
Hal yanzuroona illaaa an taatiyahumul malaaa'ikatu aw yaatiya amru 
	Rabbik; kazaalika fa'alal lazeena min qablihim; wa maa zalamahumul laahu wa 
	laakin kaanoo anfusahum yazlimoon
verses.34:
Fa asaabahum saiyi aatu maa 'amiloo wa haaqa bihim maa kaano bihee 
	yastahzi'oon (section 4)
verses.35:
Wa qaalal lazeena ashrakoo law shaaa'al laahu ma 'abadnaa min doonihee 
	min shai'in nahnu wa laaa aabaaa'unaa wa laa harramnaa min doonihee min shai'; 
	kazaalika fa'alal lazeena min qablihim fahal 'alar Rusuli illal balaaghul 
	mubeen
verses.37:
In tahris 'alaa hudaahum fa innal laaha laa yahdee mai yudillu wa maa 
	lahum min naasireen
verses.38:
Wa aqsamoo billaahi jahda aimaanihim laa yab'asul laahu mai yamoot; 
	balaa wa'dan 'alaihi haqqanw wa laakinna aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon
verses.39:
Liyubaiyina lahumul lazee yakhtalifoona feehi wa liya'lamal lazeena 
	kafarooo annahum kaanoo kaazibeen
verses.40:
Innamaa qawlunaa lishay'in izaa aradnaahu an naqoola lahoo kun fa 
	yakoon (section 5)
verses.41:
Wallazeena haajaroo fil laahi mim ba'di maa zulimoo lanubawwi' annahum 
	fiddunyaa hasanatanw wa la ajrul Aakhirati akbar; law kaanoo ya'lamoon
verses.42: Allazeena sabaroo wa 'alaa Rabbihim yatawak kaloon
verses.43:
Wa maaa arsalnaa min qablika illaa rijaalan nooheee ilaihim; fas'alooo 
	ahlaz zikri in kuntum laa ta'lamoon
verses.44:
Bilbaiyinaati waz Zubur; wa anzalnaaa ilaikaz Zikra litubaiyina linnaasi 
	maa nuzzila ilaihim wa la'allahum yatafakkaroon
verses.45:
Afa aminal lazeena makarus saiyi aati ai yakhsifal laahu bihimul arda aw 
	yaaa tiyahumul 'azaabu min haisu laa yash'uroon
verses.46: Aw yaakhuzahum fee taqallubihim famaa hum bi mu'jizeen
verses.47: Aw yaakhuzahum 'alaa takhawwuf; fa inna Rabbakum la Ra'oofur Raheem
verses.48:
Awa lam yaraw ilaa maa khalaqal laahu min shai'iny-yatafaiya'u 
	zilaaluhoo 'anil yameeni washshamaaa' ili sujjadal lillaahi wa hum 
	daakhiroon
verses.49:
Wa lillaahi yasjudu maa fis samaawaati wa maa fil ardi min daaabbatinw 
	walma laaa'ikatu wa hum laa yastakbiroon
verses.50:
yakhaafoona Rabbahum min fawqihim wa yaf'aloona maa yu'maroon (section 
	6) (make sajda)
verses.51:
Wa qaalal laahu laa tatta khizooo ilaahainis naini innamaa Huwa Ilaahunw 
	Waahid; fa iyyaaya farhaboon
verses.52:
Wa lahoo maa fis samaawaati wal ardi wa lahud deenu waasibaa; afaghairal 
	laahi tattaqoon
verses.53:
Wa maa bikum minni'matin faminal laahi summa izaa massakumud durru fa 
	ilaihi taj'aroon
verses.54:
Summaa izaa kashafad durra 'ankum izaa fareequm minkum bi Rabbihim 
	yushrikoon
verses.55: Liyakfuroo bimaa aatainaahum; fatamatta'oo, fasawfa ta'lamoon
verses.56:
Wa yaj'aloona limaa laa ya'lamoona naseebam mimmaa razaqnnaahum; 
	tallaahi latus'alunaa 'ammaa kuntum taftaroon
verses.57: Wa yaj'aloona lillaahil banaati Subhaanahoo wa lahum maa yashtahoon
verses.58:
Wa izaa bushshira ahaduhum bil unsaa zalla wajhuhoo muswaddanw wa huwa 
	kazeem
verses.59:
yatawaaraa minal qawmimin sooo'i maa bushshira bih; a-yumsikuhoo 'alaa 
	hoonin am yadussuhoo fit turaab; alaa saaa'a maa yahkumoon
verses.60:
Lillazeena laa yu'minoona bil Aakhirati masalus saw'i wa lillaahil 
	masalul a'laa; wa Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem (section 7)
verses.61:
Wa law yu'aakhizul laahun naasa bizulminhim maa taraka 'alaihaa min 
	daaabbatinw wa laakiny yu'akhkhiruhum ilaaa ajalim musamman fa izaa jaaa'a 
	ajaluhum laa yastaakhiroona saa'atanw wa laa yastaqdimoon
verses.62:
Wa yaj'aloona lillaahi maa yakrahoona wa tasifu alsinatuhumul kaziba 
	anna lahumul husnaa laa jarama anna lahumun Naara wa annahum mufratoon
verses.63:
Tallaahi laqad arsalnaaa ilaaa umamim min qablika fazayyana lahumush 
	Shaitaanu a'maalahum fahuwa waliyyuhumul yawma wa lahum 'azaabun aleem
verses.64:
Wa maaa anzalnaa 'alaikal Kitaaba illaa litubaiyina lahumul lazikh 
	talafoo feehi wa hudanw wa rahmatal liqawminy yu'minoon
verses.65:
Wallaahu anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa ahyaa bihil arda ba'da 
	mawtihaa; inna fee zaalika la aayatal liqaw miny yasma'oon (section 8)
verses.66:
Wa inna lakum fil an'aami la'ibrah; nusqeekum mimmmaa fee butoonihee mim 
	baini farsinw wa damil labanann khaalisan saaa'ighallish shaaribeen
verses.67:
Wa min samaraatin nakheeli wal a'nnaabi tattakhizoona minhu sakaranw wa 
	rizqann hasanaa; inna fee zaalika la Aayatal liqawminy ya'qiloon
verses.68:
Wa awhaa Rabbuka ilan-nahli anit takhizee minal jibaali buyootanw wa 
	minash shajari wa mimmaa ya'rishoon
verses.70:
Wallaahu khalaqakum suma yatawaffaakum; wa minkum many-yuradu ilaaa 
	arzalil 'umuri likai laa ya'lama ba'da 'ilmin shai'aa; innal laaha 'Aleemun 
	Qadeer (section 9)
verses.72:
Wallaahu ja'ala lakum min anfusikum azwaajanw wa ja'ala lakum min 
	azwaajikum baneena wa hafadatanw wa razaqakum minat taiyibaat; afabil 
	baatili yu'minoona wa bini'matil laahi hum yakkfuroon
verses.73:
Wa ya'budoona min doonil laahi maa laa yamliku lahum rizqam minas 
	samaawaati wal ardi shai'anw wa laa yastatee'oon
verses.74:
Falaa tadriboo lillaahil amsaal; innal laaha ya'lamu wa antum laa 
	ta'lamoon
verses.76:
Wa darabal laahu masalar rajulaini ahaduhumaaa abkamu laa yaqdiru 'alaa 
	shai'inw wa huwa kallun 'alaa mawlaahu ainamaa yuwajjihhu laa yaati 
	bikhairin hal yastawee huwa wa many-yaamuru bil'adli wa huwa 'alaa Siraatim 
	Mustaqeem (section 10)
verses.77:
Wa lillaahi ghaibus samaawaati wal ard; wa maaa amrus Saa'ati illaa 
	kalamhil basari aw huwa aqrab; innal laaha 'alaaa kulli shai'in Qadeer
verses.78:
Wallaahu akhrajakum mim butooni ummahaatikum laa ta'lamoona shai'anw wa 
	ja'ala lakumus sam'a wal absaara wal af'idata la'allakum tashkuroon
verses.79:
Alam yaraw ilat tairi musakhkharaatin fee jawwis samaaa'i maa 
	yumsikuhunna illal laah; inna fee zaalika la Aayaatil liqawminy yu'minoon
verses.80:
Wallaahu ja'ala lakum mim buyootikum sakananw wa ja'ala lakum min 
	juloodil an'aami buyootan tastakhif foonahaa yawma za'nikum wa yawma 
	iqaamatikum wa min aswaafihaa wa awbaarihaa wa ash'aarihaaa asaasanw wa 
	mataa'an ilaa heen
verses.81:
Wallaahu ja'ala lakum mimmaa khalaqa zilaalanw wa ja'ala lakum minal 
	jibaali aknaananw wa ja'ala lakum saraabeela taqeekumul harra wa saraabeela 
	taqeekum baasakum; kazaalika yutimmu ni'matahoo alaikum la'allakum tuslimoon
verses.82: Fa in tawallaw fa innamaa 'alaikal balaaghul mubeen
verses.83:
Ya'rifoona ni'matal laahi summa yunkiroonahaa wa aksaruhumul kaafiroon 
	(section 11)
verses.84:
Wa yawma nab'asu min kulli ummatin shaheedan summa laa yu'zanu 
	lillazeena kafaroo wa laa hum yusta'taboon
verses.85:
Wa izaa ra al lazeena zalamul 'azaaba falaa yukhaf fafu 'anhum wa laa 
	hum yunzaroon
verses.86:
Wa izaa ra al lazeena ashrakoo shurakaaa'ahum qaaloo Rabbana 
	haaa'ulaaa'i shurakaaa'unal lazeena kunnaa nad'oo min doonika fa alqaw 
	ilaihimul qawla innakum lakaaziboon
verses.87:
Wa alqaw ilal laahi yawma'izinis salama wa dalla 'anhum maa kaanoo 
	yaftaroon
verses.88:
Allazeena kafaroo wa saddoo 'an sabeelil laahi zidnaahum 'azaaban fawqal 
	'azaabi bimaa kaanoo yufsidoon
verses.89:
Wa yawma nab'asu fee kulli ummmatin shaheedan 'alaihim min anfusihim wa 
	ji'naa bika shaheedan 'alaa haaa'ulaaa'; wa nazzalnaa 'alaikal Kitaaba 
	tibyaanal likulli shai'inw wa hudanw wa rahmatanw wa bushraa lilmuslimeen 
	(section 12)
verses.90:
Innal laaha ya'muru bil 'adli wal ihsaani wa eetaaa'i zil qurbaa wa 
	yanhaa 'anil fahshaaa'i wal munkari walbagh-i' ya'izukum la'allakum 
	tazakkaroon
verses.91:
Wa awfoo bi Ahdil laahi izaa 'aahattum wa laa tanqudul aimaana ba'da 
	tawkeedihaa wa qad ja'altumul laaha 'alaikum kafeelaa; innal laaha ya'lamu 
	maa taf'aloon
verses.92:
Wa laa takoonoo kallatee naqadat ghazlahaa mim ba'di quwwatin ankaasaa; 
	tattakhizoona aimaanakum dakhalam bainakum an takoona ummatun hiya arbaa 
	min ummah; innnamaa yablookumul laahu bih; wa la yubaiyinanna lakum yawmal 
	Qiyaamati maa kuntum feehi takhtalifoon
verses.93:
Wa law shaaa'al laahu laja'alakum ummmatanw waahidatanw wa laakiny 
	yudillu many-yashaaa'u wa yahdee many-yashaaa'; wa latus'alunna 'ammaa 
	kuntum ta'maloon
verses.94:
Wa laa tattakhizooo aimaanakum dakhalam bainakum fatazilla qadamum ba'da 
	subootihaa wa tazooqus sooo'a bima sadattum 'an sabeelil laahi wa lakum 'azaabun 
	'azeem
verses.95:
Wa laa tashtaroo bi 'ahdil laahi samanan qaleelaa; innamaa 'indal laahi 
	huwa khairul lakum in kuntum ta'lamoon
verses.96:
maa 'indakum yanfadu wa maa 'indal laahi baaq; wa lanajziyannal lazeena 
	sabarooo ajjrahum bi ahsani maa kaanoo ya'maloon
verses.97:
Man 'amila saaliham min zakarin aw unsaa wa huwa mu'minun 
	falanuhyiyannahoo hayaatan taiiyibatanw wa lanajzi yannnahum ajrahum bi 
	ahsani maa kaanoo ya'maloon
verses.98: Fa izaa qara tal Quraana fasta'iz billaahi minashh Shai taanir rajeem
verses.99:
Innahoo laisa lahoo sultaanun 'alal lazeena aamanoo wa 'alaa Rabbihim 
	yatawakkaloon
verses.100:
Innnamaa sultaanuhoo 'alal lazeena yatawallawnahoo wallazeena hum bihee 
	mushrikoon (section 13)
verses.101:
Wa izaa baddalnaaa Aayatam makaana Aayatinw wal laahu a'lamu bimaa 
	yunazzilu qaalooo innamaa anta muftar; bal aksaruhum laa ya'lamoon
verses.102:
Qul nazzalahoo Roohul Qudusi mir Rabbika bilhaqqi liyusabbital lazeena 
	aamanoo wa hudanw wa bushraa lilmuslimeen
verses.104:
Innal lazeena laa yu'minoona bi Aayaatil laahi laa yahdehimul laahu wa 
	lahum 'azaabun aleem
verses.105:
Innamaa yaftaril kazibal lazeena laa yu'minoona bi Aayaatil laahi wa 
	ulaaa'ika humul kaaziboon
verses.106:
man kafara billaahi mim ba'di eemaanihee illaa man ukriha wa qalbuhoo 
	mutmma'innum bil eemaani wa laakim man sharaha bilkufri sadran fa'alaihim 
	ghadabum minal laahi wa lahum 'azaabun 'azeem
verses.107:
Zaalika bi annahumus tahabbul hayaatad dunyaa 'alal Aakhirati wa annal 
	laaha laa yahdil qawmal kaafireen
verses.108:
Ulaaa'ikal lazeena taba'al laahu 'alaa quloobihim wa sam'ihim wa 
	absaarihim wa ulaaa'ika humul ghaafiloon
verses.109: Laa jarama annnahum fil Aakhirati humul khasiroon
verses.110:
Summa inna Rabbaka lillazeena haajaroo mim ba'dimaa futinoo summma 
	jaahadoo wa sabaroo inna Rabbaka mim ba'dihaa la Ghafoorur Raheem (section 
	14)
verses.111:
Yawma taatee kullu nafsin tujaadilu 'an nafsihaa wa tuwaffaa kullu 
	nafsim maa 'amilat wa hum laa yuzlamoon
verses.112:
Wa darabal laahu masalan qaryatan kaanat aaminatam mutma'innatany 
	yaaateehaa rizquhaa raghadam min kulli makaanin fakafarat bi an'umil laahi fa 
	azaaqahal laahu libaasal joo'i walkhawfi bimaa kaanoo yasna'oon
verses.113:
Wa laqad jaaa'ahum Rasoolum minhum fakazzaboohu fa akhazahumul 'azaabu 
	wa hum zaalimoon
verses.114:
Fakuloo mimmaa razaqa kumul laahu halaalan taiyibanw washkuroo ni'matal 
	laahi in kuntum iyyaahu ta'budoon
verses.115:
Innamaa harama 'alai kumul maitata waddama wa lahmal khinzeeri wa maaa 
	uhilla lighairil laahi bihee famanid turra ghaira baaghinw wa laa 'aadin fa 
	innal laaha Ghafoorur Raheem
verses.116:
Wa laa taqooloo limaa tasifu alsinatukumul kaziba haaza halaalunw wa 
	haazaa haraamul litaftaroo 'alal laahil kazib; innal lazeena yaftaroona 'alal 
	laahil kaziba laa yuflihoon
verses.118:
Wa 'alal lazeena haadoo harramnaa ma qasasnaa 'alaika min qablu wa maa 
	zalamanaahum  wa laakin kaanoo anfusahum yazlimoon
verses.119:
Summma inna Rabbaka lillazeena 'amilus sooo'a bijahaalatin summa taaboo 
	mim ba'di zaaalika wa aslahoo inna Rabbaka mim ba'dihaa la Ghafoorur Raheem 
	(section 15)
verses.120:
Inna Ibraaheema kaana ummatan qaanital lillaahi Haneefanw wa lam 
	yakuminal mushrikeen
verses.121: Shaakiral li an'umih; ijtabaahu wa hadaahu ilaa Siraatim Muustaqeem
verses.122:
Wa aatainaahu fid dunyaa hasanah; wa innahoo fil Aakhirati laminas 
	saaliheen
verses.123:
Summma awhainaa ilaika anit tabi' Millata Ibraaheema haneefaa; wa maa 
	kaana minal mushrikeen
verses.124:
Innnamaa ju'ilas Sabtu 'alal lazeenakhtalafoo feeh; wa inna Rabbaka la 
	yahkumu bainahum Yawmal Qiyaamati feemaa kaanoo feehi yakhtalifoon
verses.125:
Ud'u ilaa sabeeli Rabbika bilhikmati walmaw 'izatil hasanati wa 
	jaadilhum billatee hiya ahsan; inna Rabbaka huwa a'almu biman dalla 'an 
	sabeelihee wa Huwa a'lamu bilmuhtadeen
verses.126:
Wa in 'aaqabtum fa'aaqiboo bimisli maa 'ooqibtum bihee wa la'in sabartum 
	lahuwa khairul lissaabireen
verses.127:
Wasbir wa maa sabruka illaa billaah; wa laa tahzan 'alaihim wa laa taku 
	fee daiqim mimmaa yamkuroon
verses.128:
Innal laaha ma'al lazeenat taqaw wal lazeena hum muhsinoon (section 16)
	(End Juz 14)

verses.1:
Subhaanal lazeee asraa bi'abdihee lailam minal Masjidil Haraami ilal 
	Masjidil Aqsal-lazee baaraknaa haw lahoo linuriyahoo min aayaatinaa;innahoo 
	Huwas Samee'ul-Baseer
verses.2:
Wa aatainaa Moosal-Kitaaba wa ja'alnaahu hudal-liBaneee Israaa'eel;
	allaa tat-takhizoo min doonee wakeelaa.
verses.3: Zurriyyata man hamalnaa ma'a Noohin innahoo kaana 'abdan shakooraa
verses.4:
Wa qadainaaa ilaa Baneee Israaa'eela fil Kitaabi latufsidunna fil ardi 
	marratain; wa lata'lunna'uluwwan kabeeraa
verses.5:
Fa-izaa jaaa'a wa'duoolaahumaa ba'asnaaa 'alykum 'ibaadal-lanaaa ulee 
	baasin shadeedin fajaasoo khilaalad diyaar; wa kaana wa'dam maf'oolaa
verses.6:
Summa radadnaa lakumul karrata 'alaihim wa amdad-naakum-bi amwaalinuw wa 
	baneen; wa ja'alnaakum aksara nafeeraa
verses.7:
In ahsantum ahsantum li anfusikum wa in asaatum falahaa; fa izaa jaaa'a 
	wa'dul aakhirati liyasooo'oo wujoo hakum wa liyadkhulul masjida kamaa 
	dakhaloohu awwala marratinw wa liyutabbiroo maa a'law tatbeera
verses.8:
'Asaa rabbukum anyyarhamakum; wa in 'uttum 'udnaa; wa ja'alnaa jahannama 
	lilkaafireena haseera
verses.9:
Inna haazal Quraana yahdee lillatee hiya aqwamu wa yubashshirul 
	mu'mineenal lazeena ya'maloonas saalihaati anna lahum ajran kabeeraa
verses.10:
Wa annal lazeena laa yu'minoona bil aakhirati a'tadnaa lahum 'azaaban 
	aleemaa (section 1)
verses.11:
Wa  yad'ul insaanu bishsharri du'aaa 'ahoo bilkhayr; wa kaanal 
	insaanu 'ajoola
verses.12:
Wa ja'alnal laila wannahaara Aayatayni famahawnaaa Aayatal laili wa 
	ja'alnaaa Aayatan nahaari mubsiratal litabtaghoo fadlam mir Rabbikum wa 
	lita'lamoo 'adadas sineena walhisaab; wa kulla shai'in fassalnaahu tafseelaa
verses.13:
Wa kulla insaanin alzamnaahu taaa'irahoo fee 'unuqihee wa nukhriji lahoo 
	Yawmal Qiyaamati kitaabany yalqaahu manshooraa
verses.14: Iqra kitaabaka kafaa bi nafsikal Yawma 'alaika haseebaa
verses.15:
Manihtadaa fa innamaa yahtadee linafsihee wa man dalla fa innamaa 
	yadillu 'alaihaa; wa laa taziru waaziratunw wizra ukhraa; wa maa kunnaa 
	mu'azzibeena hatta nab'asa Rasoola
verses.16:
Wa izaaa aradnaaa an nuhlika qaryatan amarnaa mutrafeehaa fafasaqoo 
	feehaa fahaqqa 'alaihal qawlu fadammarnaahaa tadmeeraa
verses.17:
Wa kam ahlaknaa minal qurooni min ba'di Nooh; wa kafaa bi Rabbika 
	bizunoobi 'ibaadihee Khabeeram Baseeraa
verses.18:
Man kaana yureedul 'aajilata 'ajjalnaa lahoo feehaa maa nashaaa'u liman 
	nureedu summa ja'alnaa lahoo Jahannama yaslaahaa mazmoomammad hooraa
verses.19:
Wa man araadal Aakhirata wa sa'aa lahaa sa'yahaa wa huwa mu'minun fa 
	ulaaa'ika kaana sa'yuhum mashkooraa
verses.20:
Kullan numiddu haaa 'ulaaa'i wa haaa'ulaaa'i min 'ataaa'i rabbik; wa maa 
	kaana 'ataaa'u rabbika mahzooraa
verses.21:
Unzur kaifa faddalnaa ba'dahum 'alaa ba'd; wa lal Aakhiratu akbaru 
	darajaatinw wa akbaru tafdeelaa
verses.22:
Laa taj'al ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhara fataq'uda mazoomam makhzoolaa 
(section 2)
verses.23:
Wa qadaa Rabbuka allaa ta'budooo illaaa iyyaahu wa bilwaalidaini 
	ihsaanaa; immaa yablughanna 'indakal kibara ahaduhumaaa aw kilaahumaa falaa 
	taqul lahumaaa uffinw wa laa tanharhumaa wa qullahumaa qawlan kareemaa
verses.24:
Wakhfid lahumaa janaahaz zulli minar rahmati wa qur Rabbir hamhumaa 
	kamaa rabbayaanee sagheera
verses.25:
Rabbukum a'lamu bimaa fee nufoosikum; in takoonoo saaliheena fa innahoo 
	kaana lil awwaabeena Ghafoooraa
verses.26:
Wa aati zal qurbaa haqqahoo walmiskeena wabnas sabeeli wa laa tubazzir 
	tabzeeraa
verses.27:
Innal mubazzireena kaanoo ikhwaanash shayaateeni wa kaanash shaytaanu li 
	Rabbihee kafooraa
verses.28:
Wa immaa tu'ridanna 'anhum ubtighaaa'a rahmatim mir rabbika tarjoohaa 
	faqul lahum qawlam maisooraa
verses.29:
Wa laa taj'al yadaka maghloolatan ilaa 'unuqika wa laa tabsut haa kullal 
	basti fataq'uda maloomam mahsooraa
verses.30:
Inna Rabbaka yabsuturrizqa limai yashaaa'u wa yaqdir; innahoo kaana 
	bi'ibaadihee Khabeeran Baseera 
	(section 3)
verses.31:
Wa laa taqtulooo awlaadakum khashyata imlaaqin nahnu narzuquhum wa 
	iyyaakum; inna qatlahum kaana khit 'an kabeeraa
verses.32: Wa laa taqrabuz zinaaa innahoo kaana faahishatanw wa saaa'a sabeelaa
verses.33:
Wa laa taqtulun nafsal latee harramal laahu illaa bilhaqq; wa man qutila 
	mazlooman faqad ja'alnaa liwaliyyihee sultaanan falaa yusrif fil qatli 
	innahoo kaana mansooraa
verses.34:
Wa laa taqraboo maalal yateemi illaa billatee hiya ahsanu hattaa 
	yablugha ashuddah; wa awfoo bil'ahd, innal 'ahda kaana mas'oolaa
verses.35:
Wa awful kaila izaa kiltum wa zinoo bilqistaasil mustaqeem; zaalika 
	khairunw wa ahsanu ta'weelaa
verses.36:
Wa laa taqfu maa laisa laka bihee 'ilm; innas sam'a walbasara walfu'aada 
	kullu ulaaa'ika kaana 'anhu mas'oolaa
verses.37:
Wa laa tamshi fil ardi marahan innaka lan takhriqal arda wa lan 
	tablughal jibaala toola
verses.38: Kullu zaalika kaana sayyi'uhoo inda Rabbika makroohaa
verses.39:
Zaalika mimmaaa awhaaa ilaika Rabbuka minal hikmah; wa laa taj'al 
	ma'allaahi ilaahan aakhara fatulqaa fee Jahannama maloomam mad hooraa
verses.41:
Wa laqad sarrafnaa fee haazal Quraani liyazzakkaroo wa maa yazeeduhum 
	illaa nufooraa
verses.42:
Qul law kaana ma'ahooo aalihatun kamaa yaqooloona izal labtaghaw ilaa
