	zil 'Arshi Sabeela
verses.43: Subhaanahoo wa Ta'aalaa 'ammaa yaqooloona 'uluwwan kabeeraa
verses.45:
Wa izaa qara' tal Quraana ja'alnaa bainaka wa bainal lazeena laa 
	yu'minoona bil aakhirati hijaabam mastooraa
verses.46:
Wa ja'alnaa 'alaa quloo bihim akinnatan any yafqahoohu wa feee 
	aazaanihim waqraa; wa izaa zakarta Rabbaka fil Quraani wahdahoo wallaw 'alaaa 
	adbaarihim nufooraa
verses.47:
Nahnu a'lamu bimaa yastami'oona biheee iz yastami'oona ilaika wa iz hum 
	najwaaa iz yaqooluz zaalimoona in tattabi'oona illaa rajulam mas hooraa
verses.48: Unzur kaifa daraboo lakal amsaala fadalloo falaa yastatee'oona sabeelaa
verses.49:
Wa qaalooo 'a izaa kunnaa 'izaamanw wa rufaatan 'a innaa lamab'oosoona 
	khalqan jadeedaa
verses.50: Qul koonoo hijaaratan aw hadeedaa
verses.51:
Aw khalqam mimmaa yakburu fee sudoorikum; fasa yaqooloona mai yu'eedunaa 
	qulil lazee fatarakum awwala marrah; fasa yunghidoona ilaika ru'oosahum wa 
	yaqooloona mataahoo; qul 'asaaa any yakoona qareeba
verses.52:
Yawma yad'ookum fatastajeeboona bihamdihee wa tazunnoona il labistum 
	illaa qaleela (section 5)
verses.53:
Wa qul li'ibaadee yaqoolul latee hiya ahsan; innash shaitaana yanzaghu 
	bainahum; innash shaitaana kaana lil insaani 'aduwwam mubeenaa
verses.54:
Rabbukum a'lamu bikum iny yasha' yarhamkum aw iny yasha' yu'azzibkum; 
	wa maaa arsalnaaka 'alaihim wakeelaa
verses.55:
Wa Rabbuka a'lamu biman fis samaawaati wal ard; wa laqad faddalnaa 
	ba'dan Nabiyyeena 'alaa ba'dinw wa aatainaaa Daawooda Zabooraa
verses.56:
Qulid 'ul lazeena za'amtum min doonihee falaa yamlikoona kashfad 
	durri'ankum wa laa tahweelaa
verses.57:
Ulaaa'ikal lazeena yad'oona yabtaghoona ilaa Rabbihimul waseelata 
	ayyuhum aqrabu wa yarjoona rahmatahoo wa yakhaafoona 'azaabah; inna 'azaaba 
	rabbika kaana mahzooraa
verses.58:
Wa in min qaryatin illaa Nahnu muhlikoohaa qabla Yawmil Qiyaamati aw 
	mu'az ziboohaa 'azaaban shadeedaa; kaana zaalika fil Kitaabi mastooraa
verses.59:
Wa maa mana'anaaa an nursila bil aayaati illaaa an kazzaba bihal 
	awwaloon; wa aatainaa Samoodan naaqata mubsiratan fazalamoo bihaa; wa maa 
	nursilu bil aayaati illaa takhweefaa
verses.60:
Wa iz qulnaa laka inna rabbaka ahaata binnaas; wa maa ja'alnar ru'yal 
	lateee arainaaka illaa fitnatal linnaasi washshajaratal mal'oonata fil 
	quraan; wa nukhaw wifuhum famaa yazeeduhum illa tughyaanan kabeeraa 
	(section 6)
verses.61:
Wa iz qulnaa lil malaaa'ikatis judoo li Aadama fasajadooo illaaa Ibleesa 
	qaala 'a-asjudu liman khalaqta teena
verses.62:
Qaala ara'aytaka haazal lazee karramta 'alaiya la'in akhartani ilaa 
	Yawmil Qiyaamati la ahtanikanna zurriyyatahooo illaa qaleelaa
verses.63:
Qaalaz hab faman tabi'aka minhum fa inna Jahannama jazaaa'ukum jazaaa'am 
	mawfooraa
verses.64:
Wastafziz manis tata'ta minhum bisawtika wa ajlib 'alaihim bikhailika wa 
	rajilika wa shaarik hum fil amwaali wal awlaadi wa 'idhum; wa maa 
	ya'iduhumush Shaitaanu illaa ghurooraa
verses.65: Inna 'ibaadee laisa laka 'alaihim sultaan; wa kafaa bi Rabbika Wakeelaa
verses.66:
Rabbukumul lazee yuzjee lakumul fulka fil bahri litabtaghoo min fadlih; 
	innahoo kaana bikum Raheemaa
verses.67:
Wa izaa massakumuddurru fil bahri dalla man tad'oona illaaa iyyaahu 
	falammaa najjaakum ilal barri a'radtum; wa kaanal insaanu kafooraa
verses.68:
Afa amintum any yakhsifa bikum jaanibal barri aw yursila 'alaikum 
	haasiban summa laa tajidoo lakum wakeelaa
verses.69:
Am amintum any yu'eedakum feehi taaratan ukhraa fa yursila 'alaikum 
	qaasifam minar reehi fa yugh riqakum bimaa kafartum summa laa tajidoo lakum 
	'alainaa bihee tabee'aa
verses.70:
Wa laqad karramnaa Baneee aadama wa hamalnaahum fil barri walbahri wa 
	razaqnaahum minat taiyibaati wa faddalnaahum 'alaa kaseerim mimman khalaqnaa 
	tafdeelaa (section 7)
verses.71:
Yawma nad'oo kulla unaasim bi imaamihim faman ootiya kitaabahoo bi 
	yameenihee fa ulaaa'ika yaqra'oona kitaabahum wa laa yuzlamoona fateelaa
verses.72:
Wa man kaana fee haaziheee a'maa fahuwa fil aakhirati a'maa wa adallu 
	sabeelaa
verses.73:
Wa in kaadoo la yaftinoonaka 'anil lazeee awhainaaa ilaika litaftariya 'alainaaa 
	ghairahoo wa izallat takhazooka khaleelaa
verses.74: Wa law laaa an sabbatnaaka laqad kitta tarkanu ilaihim shai'an qaleela
verses.75:
Izal la azaqnaaka di'fal hayaati wa di'fal mamaati summa laa tajidu laka 
	'alainaa naseeraa
verses.76:
Wa in kaadoo la yastafizzoonaka minal ardi liyukhri jooka minhaa wa izal 
	laa yalbasoona khilaafaka illaa qaleelaa
verses.77:
Sunnata man qad arsalnaa qablakamir Rusulinaa wa laa tajidu lisunnatinaa 
	tahweelaa
verses.78:
Aqimis Salaata liduloo kish shamsi ilaa ghasaqil laili wa quraanal Fajri 
	inna quraa nal Fajri kaana mashhoodaa
verses.79:
Wa minal laili fatahajjad bihee naafilatal laka 'asaaa any yab'asaka 
	Rabbuka Maqaamam Mahmoodaa
verses.80:
Wa qur Rabbi adkhilnee mudkhala sidqinw wa akhrijnee mukhraja sidqinw 
	waj'al lee milladunka sultaanan naseeraa
verses.81: Wa qul jaaa'al haqqu wa zahaqal baatil; innal baatila kaana zahooqaa
verses.82: Wa nunazzilu minal quraani maa huwa shifaaa'unw wa rahmatullil mu'mineena wa laa yazeeduz zaalimeena illaa khasaaraa
verses.83:
Wa izaaa an'amnaa 'alal insaani a'rada wa na-aa bijaani bihee wa izaa 
	massahush sharru kaana ya'oosaa
verses.84:
Qul kulluny ya'malu 'alaa shaakilatihee fa rabbukum a'lamu biman huwa 
	ahdaa sabeelaa (section 9)
verses.85:
Wa yas'aloonaka 'anirrooh; qulir roohu min amri rabbee wa maaa ooteetum 
	minal 'ilmi illaa qaleelaa
verses.86:
Wa la'in shi'naa lanaz habanna billazeee awhainaaa ilaika summa laa 
	tajidu laka bihee 'alainaa wakeelaa
verses.87: Illaa rahmatam mir Rabbik; inna fadlahoo kaana 'alaika kabeeraa
verses.88:
Qul la'inij tama'atil insu waljinnu 'alaaa any ya'too bimisli haazal 
	quraani laa ya'toona bimislihee wa law kaana ba'duhum liba 'din zaheeraa
verses.89:
Wa laqad sarrafnaa linnaasi fee haazal quraani min kulli masalin fa 
	abaaa aksarun naasi illaa kufooraa
verses.90: Wa qaaloo lan nu'mina laka hattaa tafjura lanaa minal ardi yamboo'aa
verses.91:
Aw takoona laka jannatum min nakheelinw wa 'inabin fatufajjiral anhaara 
	khilaalahaa tafjeeraa
verses.92:
Aw tusqitas samaaa'a kamaa za'amta 'alainaa kisafan aw ta'tiya billaahi 
	wal malaaa'ikati qabeelaa
verses.93:
Aw yakoona laka baitum min zukhrufin aw tarqaa fis samaaa'i wa lan 
	nu'mina liruqiyyika hatta tunazzila 'alainaa kitaaban naqra'uh; qul Subhaana 
	Rabbee hal kuntu illaa basharar Rasoolaa 
	(section 10)
verses.94:
Wa maa mana'an naasa any yu'minooo iz jaaa'ahumul hudaaa illaaa an 
	qaalooo aba'asal laahu basharar Rasoolaa
verses.95:
Qul law kaana fil ardi malaaa 'ikatuny yamshoona mutma'in neena 
	lanazzalnaa 'alaihim minas samaaa'i malakar Rasoolaa
verses.96:
Qul kafaa billaahi shaheedam bainee wa bainakum; innahoo kaana 
	bi'ibaadihee Khabeeram Baseeraa
verses.97:
Wa mai yahdil laahu fahuwal muhtad; wa mai yudlil falan tajida lahum 
	awliyaaa'a min doonih; wa nahshuruhum Yawmal Qiyaamati 'alaa wujoohihim 
	umyanw wa bukmanw wa summaa; ma'waahum Jahannamu kullamaa khabat zidnaahum 
	sa'eeraa
verses.98:
Zaalika jazaa'uhum bi annahum kafaroo bi aayaatinaa wa qaalooo 'a izaa 
	kunnaa 'izaamanw wa rufaatan 'a innaa la mab'oosoona khalqan jadeedaa
verses.99:
Awalam yaraw annal laahal lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal arda qaadirun 'alaaa 
	any yakhluqa mislahum wa ja'ala lahum ajalal laa raiba fee; fa abaz 
	zaalimoona illaa kufooraa
verses.100:
Qul law antum tamlikoona khazaaa'ina rahmati Rabbeee izal la amsaktum 
	khash yatal infaaq; wa kaanal insaanu qatooraa 
(section 11)
verses.101:
Wa laqad aatainaa Moosaa tis'a Aayaatim baiyinaatin fas'al Baneee 
	Israaa'eela iz jaaa'ahum faqaala lahoo Fir'awnu inee la azunnuka yaa Moosaa 
	mas hooraa
verses.102:
Qaala laqad 'alimta maaa anzala haaa'ulaaa'i illaa Rabbus samaawaati wal 
	ardi basaaa'ira wa innee la azun nuka yaa Fir'awnu masbooraa
verses.103:
Fa araada any yastafizzahum minal ardi fa aghraqnaahu wa mam ma'ahoo 
	jamee'aa
verses.104:
Wa qulnaa min ba'dihee li Baneee Israaa'eelas kunul arda fa izaa jaaa'a 
	wa'dul aakhirati ji'naa bikum lafeefaa
verses.105:
Wa bilhaqqi anzalnaahu wa bilhaqqi nazal; wa maaa arsalnaaka illaa 
	mubash shiranw wa nazeeraa
verses.106:
Wa quraanan faraqnaahu litaqra ahoo 'alan naasi 'alaa muksinw wa 
	nazzalnaahu tanzeelaa
verses.107:
Qul aaminoo biheee aw laa tu'minoo; innal lazeena ootul 'ilma min 
	qabliheee izaa yutlaa 'alaihim yakhirroona lil azqaani sujjadaa
verses.108: Wa yaqooloona Subhaana Rabbinaaa in kaana wa'du Rabbinaa lamaf'oolaa
verses.109:
Wa yakhirroona lil azqaani yabkoona wa yazeeduhum khushoo'aa 
	(make sajda)
verses.110:
Qulid'ul laaha awid'ur Rahmaana ayyam maa tad'oo falahul asmaaa'ul 
	Husnaa; wa laa tajhar bi Salaatika wa laa tukhaafit bihaa wabtaghi baina 
	zaalika sabeela
verses.111:
Wa qulil hamdu lillaahil lazee lam yattakhiz waladanw wa lam yakul lahoo 
	shareekun fil mulki wa lam yakul lahoo waliyyum minaz zulli wa kabbirhu 
	takbeeraa (section 12)

verses.1:
Alhamdu lillaahil lazeee anzala 'alaa 'abdihil kitaaba wa lam yaj'al 
	lahoo 'iwajaa
verses.2:
Qaiyimal liyunzira ba'asan shadeedam mil ladunhu wa yubashshiral 
	mu'mineenal lazeena ya'maloonas saalihaati anna lahum ajran hasanaa
verses.3: Maakiseena feehi abadaa
verses.4: Wa yunziral lazeena qaalut takhazal laahu waladaa
verses.5:
Maa lahum bihee min 'ilminw wa laa li aabaaa'ihim; kaburat kalimatan 
	takhruju min afwaahihim; iny yaqooloona illaa kazibaa
verses.6:
Fala'allaka baakhi'un nafsaka 'alaaa aasaarihim illam yu'minoo bihaazal 
	hadeesi asafaa
verses.7:
Innaa ja'alnaa ma 'alal ardi zeenatal lahaa linabluwahum ayyuhum ahsanu 
	'amalaa
verses.8: Wa innaa la jaa'iloona maa 'alaihaa sa'eedan juruzaa
verses.9: Am hasibta anna Ashaabal Kahfi war Raqeemi kaanoo min Aayaatinaa 'ajabaa
verses.10:
Iz awal fityatu ilal Kahfi faqaaloo Rabbanaaa aatinaa mil ladunka 
	rahmatanw wa haiyi' lanaa min amrinaa rashadaa
verses.11: Fadarabnaa 'alaaa aazaanihim fil Kahfi seneena 'adadaa
verses.12:
Summa ba'asnaahum lina'lama ayyul hizbaini ahsaa limaa labisooo amadaa
	(section 1)
verses.13:
Nahnu naqussu 'alaika naba ahum bilhaqq; innahum fityatun aamanoo bi 
	Rabbihim wa zidnaahum hudaa
verses.14:
Wa rabatnaa 'alaa quloo bihim iz qaamoo faqaaloo Rabbunaa Rabbus 
	samaawaati wal ardi lan nad'uwa min dooniheee ilaahal laqad qulnaaa izan 
	shatataa
verses.15:
Haaa'ulaaa'i qawmunat takhazoo min dooniheee aalihatal law laa yaatoona 
	'alaihim bisultaanim baiyin; faman azlamu mimmaniftaraa 'alal laahi kazibaa
verses.16:
Wa izi'tazal tumoohum wa maa ya'budoona illal laaha faawooo ilal kahfi 
	yanshur lakum Rabbukum mir rahmatihee wa yuhaiyi' lakum min amrikum mirfaqa
verses.17:
Wa tarash shamsa izaa tala'at tazaawaru 'an kahfihim zaatal yameeni wa 
	izaa gharabat taqriduhum zaatash shimaali wa hum fee fajwatim minh; zaalika 
	min Aayaatillaah; mai yahdil laahu fahuwal muhtad, wa mai yudlil falan 
	tajida lahoo waliyyam murshidaa 
(section 2)
verses.18:
Wa tahsabuhum ayqaazanw wa hum ruqood; wa nuqallibuhum zaatal yameeni wa 
	zaatash shimaali wa kalbuhum baasitun ziraa'ayhi bilwaseed; lawit tala'ta 'alaihim 
	la wallaita minhum firaaranw wa lamuli'ta minhum ru'ba
verses.19:
Wa kazaalika ba'asnaahum liyatasaaa'aloo bainahum; qaala qaaa'ilum 
	minhum kam labistum qaaloo labisnaa yawman aw ba'da yawm; qaaloo Rabbukum 
	a'lamu bimaa labistum fab'asooo ahadakum biwariqikum haazihee ilal madeenati 
	falyanzur ayyuhaaa azkaa ta'aaman falyaatikum birizqim minhu walyatalattaf 
	wa laa yush'iranna bikum ahadaa
verses.20:
Innahum iny yazharoo 'alaikum yarjumookum aw yu'eedookum fee millatihim 
	wa lan tuflihooo izan abadaa
verses.21:
Wa kazaalika a'sarnaa 'alaihim liya'lamooo anna wa'dal laahi haqqunw wa 
	annas Saa'ata laa raiba feehaa iz yatanaaza'oona bainahum amrahum faqaalub 
	noo 'alaihim bunyaanaa; Rabbuhum a'lamu bihim; qaalal lazeena ghalaboo 'alaaa 
	amrihim lanat takhizanna 'alaihim masjidaa
verses.22:
Sa yaqooloona salaasatur raabi'uhum kalbuhum wa yaqooloona khamsatun 
	saadisuhum kalbuhum rajmam bilghaib; wa yaqooloona sab'atunw wa saaminuhum 
	kalbuhum; qur Rabbeee a'lamu bi'iddatihim maa ya'lamuhum illaa qaleel; falaa 
	tumaari feehim illaa miraaa'an zaahiranw wa laa tastafti feehim minhum 
	ahadaa (section 3)
verses.23: Wa laa taqoolanna lishai'in innee faa'ilun zaalika ghadaa
verses.24:
Illaaa any yashaaa'al laah; wazkur Rabbaka izaa naseeta wa qul 'asaaa 
	any yahdiyani Rabbee li aqraba min haazaa rashadaa
verses.25: Wa labisoo fee kahfihim salaasa mi'atin sineena wazdaadoo tis'aa
verses.26:
Qulil laahu a'lamu bimaa labisoo lahoo ghaibus samaawaati wal ardi absir 
	bihee wa asmi'; maa lahum min doonihee minw waliyyinw wa laa yushriku fee 
	hukmihee ahadaa
verses.27:
Watlu maaa oohiya ilaika min Kitaabi Rabbika laa mubaddila li 
	Kalimaatihee wa lan tajida min doonihee multahadaa
verses.28:
Wasbir nafsaka ma'al lazeena yad'oona Rabbahum bilghadaati wal'ashiyyi 
	yureedoona Wajhahoo wa laa ta'du 'aynaaka 'anhum tureedu zeenatal hayaatid 
	dunyaa wa laa tuti' man aghfalnaa qalbahoo 'an zikrinaa wattaba'a hawaahu wa 
	kaana amruhoo furutaa
verses.29:
Wa qulil haqqu mir Rabbikum faman shaaa'a falyu'minw wa man shaaa'a 
	falyakfur; innaaa a'tadnaa lizzaalimeena Naaran ahaata bihim suraadiquhaa; 
	wa iny yastagheesoo yughaasoo bimaaa'in kalmuhli yashwil wujooh' 
	bi'sash-sharaab; wa saaa'at murtafaqaa
verses.30:
Innal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati innaa laa nudee'u ajra man 
	ahsana 'amalaa
verses.31:
Ulaaa'ika lahum Jannaatu 'Adnin tajree min tahtihimul anhaaru yuhallawna 
	feehaa min asaawira min zahabinw wa yalbasoona siyaaban khudram min 
	sundusinw wa istabraqim muttaki'eena feehaa 'alal araaa'ik; ni'mas sawaab; 
	wa hasunat murtafaqaa (section 4)
verses.32:
Wadrib lahum masalar rajulaini ja'alnaa li ahadihimaa jannataini min 
	a'naabinw wa hafafnaahumaa binakhilinw wa ja'alnaa bainahumaa zar'aa
verses.33:
Kiltal jannataini aatat ukulahaa wa lam tazlim minhu shai'anw wa 
	fajjarnaa khi laalahumaa naharaa
verses.34:
Wa kaana lahoo samarun faqaala lisaahibihee wa huwa yuhaawiruhoo ana 
	aksaru minka maalanw wa a'azzu nafaraa
verses.35:
Wa dakhala jannatahoo wa huwa zaalimul linafsihee qaala maaa azunnu an 
	tabeeda haaziheee abadaa
verses.36:
Wa maaa azunnus Saa'ata qaaa'imatanw wa la'ir rudittu ilaa Rabbee la 
	ajidanna khairam minhaa munqalabaa
verses.37:
Qaala lahoo saahibuhoo wa huwa yuhaawiruhooo akafarta billazee khalaqaka 
	min turaabin summa min nutfatin summa sawwaaka rajulaa
verses.38: Laakinaa Huwal laahu Rabbee wa laa ushriku bi Rabbeee ahadaa
verses.39:
Wa law laaa iz dakhalta jannataka qulta maa shaaa'al laahu laa quwwata 
	illaa billaah; in tarani ana aqalla minka maalanw wa waladaa
verses.40:
Fa'asaa Rabeee any yu'tiyani khairam min jannatika wa yursila 'alaihaa 
	husbaanam minas samaaa'i fatusbiha sa'eedan zalaqaa
verses.41: Aw yusbiha maaa'uhaaa ghawran falan tastatee'a lahoo talabaa
verses.42:
Wa uheeta bisamarihee faasbaha yuqallibu kaffaihi 'alaa maaa anfaqa 
	feehaa wa hiya khaawiyatun 'alaa 'urooshihaa wa yaqoolu yaalaitanee lam 
	ushrik bi Rabbeee ahadaa
verses.43:
Wa lam takul lahoo fi'atuny yansuroonahoo min doonil laahi wa maa kaana 
	muntasiraa
verses.44:
Hunaalikal walaayatu lillaahil haqq; huwa khairun sawaabanw wa khairun 'uqbaa
	(section 5)
verses.45:
Wadrib lahum masalal hayaatid dunyaa kamaaa'in anzalnaahu minas samaaa'i 
	fakhtalata bihee nabaatul ardi fa asbaha hasheeman tazroo hur riyaah; wa 
	kaanal laahu 'alaa kulli shai'im muqtadiraa
verses.46:
Almaalu walbanoona zeenatul hayaatid dunya wal baaqiyaatus saalihaatu 
	khairun 'inda Rabbika sawaabanw wa khairun amalaa
verses.47:
Wa yawma nusaiyirul jibaala wa taral arda baariza tanw wa hasharnaahum 
	falam nughaadir minhum ahadaa
verses.48:
Wa 'uridoo 'alaa Rabbika saffaa, laqad ji'tumoonaa kamaa khalaqnaakum 
	awala marrah; bal za'amtum allannaj'ala lakum maw'idaa
verses.49:
Wa wudi'al kitaabu fataral mujrimeena mushfiqeena mimmaa feehi wa 
	yaqooloona yaa wailatanaa maa lihaazal kitaabi laa yughaadiru saghee ratanw 
	wa laa kabeeratan illaaa ahsaahaa; wa wajadoo maa 'amiloo haadiraa; wa laa 
	yazlimu Rabbuka ahadaa (Section 
	6)
verses.50:
Wa iz qulnaa lil malaaa'ikatis judoo li Aadama fasajadooo illaaa Ibleesa 
	kaana minal jinni fafasaqa 'an amri Rabbih; afatattakhizoonahoo wa 
	zurriyatahooo awliyaaa'a min doonee wa hum lakum 'aduww; bi'sa lizzaalimeena 
	badalaa
verses.51:
Maaa ash hattuhum khalqas samaawaati wal ardi wa laa khalqa anfusihim wa 
	maa kuntu muttakhizal mudilleena 'adudaa
verses.52:
Wa Yawma yaqoolu naadoo shurakaaa'i yal lazeena za'amtum fada'awhum 
	falam yastajeeboo lahum wa ja'alnaa bainahum maw biqaa
verses.53:
Wa ra al mujrimoonan Naara fazannooo annahum muwaaqi'oohaa wa lam 
	yajidoo 'anhaa masrifaa 
	(section 7)
verses.54:
Wa laqad sarrafnaa fee haazal quraani linnaasi min kulli masal; wa kaanal 
	insaanu aksara shai'in jadalaa
verses.55:
Wa maa mana'an naasa any yu'minooo iz jaaa'ahumul hudaa wa yastaghfiroo 
	Rabbahum illaaa an taatiyahum sunnatul awwaleena aw yaatiyahumul 'azaabu 
	qubulaa
verses.56:
Wa maa nursilul mursaleena illaa mubashshireena wa munzireen; wa 
	yujaadilul lazeena kafaroo bilbaatili liyudhidoo bihil haqqa wattakhazooo 
	Aayaatee wa maaa unziroo huzuwaa
verses.57:
Wa man azlamu mimman zukkira bi ayaati Rabbihee fa-a'rada 'anhaa wa 
	nasiya maa qaddamat yadaah; innaa ja'alnaa 'alaa quloobihim akinnatan any 
	yafqahoohu wa feee aazaanihim waqraa; wa in tad'uhum ilal hudaa falany 
	yahtadooo izan abadaa
verses.58:
Wa Rabbukal Ghafooru zur rahmati law yu'aakhi zuhum bimaa kasaboo 
	la 'ajjala lahumul 'azaab; bal lahum maw'idul lany yajidoo min doonihee 
	maw'ilaa
verses.59:
Wa tilkal quraaa ahlak nahum lammaa zalamoo wa ja'alnaa limahlikihim 
	maw'idaa (section 8)
verses.60:
Wa iz qaalaa Moosaa lifataahu laaa abrahu hattaaa ablugha majma'al 
	bahrayni aw amdiya huqubaa
verses.61:
Falammaa balaghaa majma'a bainihimaa nasiyaa hootahumaa fattakhaza 
	sabeelahoo fil bahri sarabaa
verses.62:
Falammaa jaawazaa qaala lifataahu aatinaa ghadaaa'anaa laqad laqeena min 
	safarinaa haazaa nasabaa
verses.63:
Qaala ara'ayta iz awainaaa ilas sakhrati fa innee naseetul hoota wa maaa 
	ansaaneehu illash Shaitaanu an azkurah; wattakhaza sabeelahoo fil 
	bahri'ajabaa
verses.64: Qaala zaalika maa kunnaa nabghi; fartaddaa 'alaa aasaari him maa qasasaa
verses.65:
Fa wajadaa 'abdam min 'ibaadinaaa aatainaahu Rahmatam min 'indinaa wa 'allamnaahu 
	mil ladunnaa 'ilmaa
verses.66:
Qaala lahoo Moosaa hal attabi'uka 'alaaa an tu'allimani mimmaa 'ullimta 
	rushdaa
verses.67: Qaalaa innaka lan tastatee'a ma'iya sabraa
verses.68: Wa kaifa tasbiru 'alaa maa lam tuhit bihee khubraa
verses.69: Qaala satajiduneee in shaa 'al laahu saabiranw wa laaa a'see laka amraa
verses.70:
Qaala fa init taba'tanee falaa tas'alnee 'an shai'in hattaaa uhdisa laka 
	minhu zikraa (section 9)
verses.71:
Fantalaqaa hattaaa izaa rakibaa fis safeenati kharaqahaa qaala 
	akharaqtahaa litughriqa ahlahaa laqad ji'ta shai'an imraa
verses.72: Qaala alam aqul innaka lan tastatee'a ma'iya sabraa
verses.73: Qaala laa tu'aakhiznee bimaa naseetu wa laa turhiqnee min amree 'usraa
verses.74:
Fantalaqaa hattaa izaa laqiyaa ghulaaman faqatalahoo qaala aqatalta 
	nafsan zakiy yatam bighairi nafs; laqad ji'ta shai'an nukraa 
	(End Juz 15)
verses.75: Qaala alam aqul laka innaka lan tastatee'a ma'iya sabraa
verses.76:
Qaala in sa altuka 'an shai'im ba'dahaa falaa tusaahibnee qad balaghta 
	mil ladunnee 'uzraa
verses.77:
Fantalaqaa hattaaa izaaa atayaaa ahla qaryatinis tat'amaaa ahlahaa fa 
	abaw any yudaiyifoohumaa fawajadaa feehaa jidaarany yureedu any yanqadda fa 
	aqaamah; qaala law shi'ta lattakhazta 'alaihi ajraa
verses.78:
Qaala haazaa firaaqu bainee wa bainik; sa unabbi'uka bi ta'weeli maa lam 
	tastati' 'alaihi sabraa
verses.79:
Ammas safeenatu fakaanat limasaakeena ya'maloona fil bahri fa arattu an 
	a'eebahaa wa kaana waraaa' ahum malikuny yaakhuzu kulla safeenatin ghasbaa
verses.80:
Wa aammal ghulaamu fakaana abawaahu mu'minaini fakhasheenaaa any yurhiqa 
	humaa tughyaananw wa kufraa
verses.81:
Faradnaa any yubdila humaa Rabbuhumaa khairam minhu zakaatanw wa aqraba 
	ruhmaa
verses.82:
Wa ammal jidaaru fakaana lighulaamaini yateemaini fil madeenati wa kaana 
	tahtahoo kanzul lahumaa wa kaana aboohumaa saalihan fa araada Rabbuka any 
	yablughaaa ashuddahumaa wa yastakhrijaa kanzahumaa rahmatam mir Rabbik; wa 
	maa fa'altuhoo 'an amree; zaalika taaweelu maa lam tasti' 'alaihi sabra 
(section 10)
verses.83: Wa yas'aloonaka 'an Zil Qarnaini qul sa atloo 'alaikum minhu zikraa
verses.84: Innaa makkannaa lahoo fil ardi wa aatainaahu min kulli shai'in sababaa
verses.85: Fa atba'a sababaa
verses.86:
Hattaaa izaa balagha maghribash shamsi wajadahaaa taghrubu fee 'aynin 
	hami'a tinw wa wajada 'indahaa qawmaa; qulnaa yaa Zal Qarnaini immaaa an 
	tu'az ziba wa immaaa an tattakhiza feehim husnaa
verses.87:
Qaala amma man zalama fasawfa nu'azzibuhoo summa yuraddu ilaa Rabbihee 
	fa yu 'azzibuhoo azaaban nukraa
verses.88:
Wa ammaa man aamana wa 'amila saalihan falahoo jazaaa'anil husnaa wa 
	sanaqoolu lahoo min amrinaa yusraa
verses.89: Summa atba'a sababaa
verses.90:
Hattaaa izaa balagha matli'ash shamsi wajdahaa tatlu'u alaa qawmil lam 
	naj'al lahum min doonihaa sitraa
verses.91: Kazaalika wa qad ahatnaa bimaa ladaihi khubraa
verses.92: Summa atba'a sababaa
verses.93:
Hattaaa izaa balagha bainas saddaini wajada min doonihimaa qawmal laa 
	yakaa doona yafqahoona qawlaa
verses.94:
Qaaloo yaa Zal qarnaini inna Ya'jooja wa Ma'jooja mufsidoona fil ardi 
	fahal naj'alu laka kharjan 'alaaa an taj'ala bainanaa wa bainahum saddaa
verses.95:
Qaala maa makkannee feehi Rabbee khairun fa-a'eenoonee biquwwatin aj'al 
	bainakum wa bainahum radmaa
verses.96:
Aatoonee zubaral hadeed, hattaaa izaa saawaa bainas sadafaini qaalan 
	fukhoo hattaaa izaa ja'alahoo naaran qaala aatooneee ufrigh 'alaihi qitraa
verses.97: Famas taa'ooo any yazharoohu wa mastataa'oo lahoo naqbaa
verses.98:
Qaala haaza rahmatun mir Rabbee fa izaa jaaa'a wa'du Rabbee ja'alahoo 
	dakkaaa'a; wa kana wa'du Rabbee haqqaa
verses.99:
Wa taraknaa ba'dahum Yawma'iziny yamooju fee ba'dinw wa nufikha fis 
	Soori fajama'naahum jam'aa
verses.101:
Allazeena kaanat a'yunuhum fee ghitaaa'in 'an zikree wa kaanoo laa yastatee'oona sam'aa (section 
	11)
verses.102:
Afahasibal lazeena kafarooo any yattakhizoo 'ibaadee min dooneee 
	awliyaaa'; innaaa a'tadnaa jahannama lil kaafireena nuzulaa
verses.104:
Allazeena dalla sa'yuhum fil hayaatid dunyaa wa hum yahsaboona annahum 
	yuhsinoona sun'aa
verses.105:
Ulaaa'ikal lazeena kafaroo bi aayaati Rabbihim wa liqaaa'ihee fahabitat 
	a'maaluhum falaa nuqeemu lahum Yawmal Qiyaamati waznaa
verses.106:
Zaalika jazaaa'uhum jahannamu bimaa kafaroo wattakhazooo Aayaatee wa 
	Rusulee huzuwaa
verses.107:
Innal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati kaanat lahum Jannaatul 
	Firdawsi nuzulaa
verses.109:
Qul law kaanal bahru midaadal li kalimaati Rabbee lanafidal bahru qabla 
	an tanfada Kalimaatu Rabbee wa law ji'naa bimislihee madadaa
verses.110:
Qul innamaaa ana basharum mislukum yoohaaa ilaiya annamaa ilaahukum 
	Ilaahunw Waahid; faman kaana yarjoo liqaaa'a Rabbihee falya'mal 'amalan 
	saalihanw wa laa yushrik bi'ibaadati Rabbiheee ahadaa 
(section 12)

verses.3: Iz naadaa Rabbahoo nidaaa'an khafiyyaa
verses.4:
Qaala Rabbi innee wahanal 'azmu minnee washta 'alar ra'su shaibanw wa lam 
	akum bidu'aaa'ika Rabbi shaqiyyaa
verses.5: Wa innee khiftul mawaaliya minw waraaa'ee wa kaanat imra atee 'aqiran fa hablee mil ladunka waliyyaa
verses.6: Yarisunee wa yarisu min aali Ya'qoob, waj'alhu Rabbi radiyya
verses.7:
Yaa Zakariyyaaa innaa nubashshiruka bi ghulaamin ismuhoo Yahyaa lam 
	naj'al lahoo min qablu samiyyaa
verses.8:
Qaala Rabbi annaa yakoonu lee ghulaamunw wakaanat imra atee 'aaqiranw wa 
	qad balaghtu minal kibari 'itiyyaa
verses.9:
Qaala kazaalika qaala Rabbuka huwa 'alaiya haiyinunw wa qad khalaqtuka 
	min qablu wa lam taku shai'aa
verses.10:
Qaala Rabbij 'al leee Aayah; qaala Aayatuka allaa tukalliman naasa 
	salaasa layaalin sawiyyaa
verses.11:
Fakharaja 'alaa qawmihee minal mihraabi fa-awhaaa ilaihim an sabbihoo 
	bukratanw wa 'ashiyyaa
verses.12: Yaa Yahyaa khuzil Kitaaba biquwwatinw wa aatainaahul hukma sabiyyaa
verses.13: Wa hanaanam mil ladunnaa wa zakaatanw wa kaana taqiyyaa
verses.14: Wa barram biwaalidayhi wa lam yakum jabbaaran 'asiyyaa
verses.15:
Wa salaamun 'alaihi yawma wulida wa yawma yamootu wa yawma yub'asu 
	haiyyaa (section 1)
verses.16: Wazkur fil Kitaabi Maryama; izin tabazat min ahlihaa makaanan sharqiyyaa
verses.17:
Fattakhazat min doonihim hijaaban fa arsalnaaa ilaihaa roohanaa 
	fatamassala lahaa basharan sawiyyaa
verses.18: Qaalat inneee a'oozu bir Rahmaani minka in kunta taqiyyaa
verses.19: Qaala innamaa ana rasoolu Rabbiki li ahaba laki ghulaaman zakiyyaa
verses.20:
Qaalat anna yakoonu lee ghulaamunw wa lam yamsasnee bashrunw wa lam aku 
	baghiyyaa
verses.21:
Qaala kazaaliki qaala Rabbuki huwa 'alaiya haiyimunw wa linaj 'alahooo 
	Aayatal linnaasi wa rahmatam minnaa; wa kaana amram maqdiyyaa
verses.22: Fahamalat hu fantabazat bihee makaanan qasiyyaa
verses.23:
Fa ajaaa 'ahal makhaadu ilaa jiz'in nakhlati qaalat yaa laitanee mittu 
	qabla haazaa wa kuntu nasyam mansiyyaa
verses.24:
Fanaadaahaa min tahtihaaa allaa tahzanee qad ja'ala Rabbuki tahtaki 
	sariyyaa
verses.25: Wa huzzeee ilaiki bijiz 'in nakhlati tusaaqit 'alaiki rutaban janiyyaa
verses.26:
Fakulee washrabee wa qarree 'ainaa; fa immaa tarayinnna minal bashari 
	ahadan faqooleee innee nazartu lir Rahmaani sawman falan ukallimal yawma 
	insiyyaa
verses.27:
Fa atat bihee qawmahaa tahmiluhoo qaaloo yaa Maryamoo laqad ji'ti 
	shai'an fariyyaa
verses.28:
Yaaa ukhta Haaroona maa kaana abookimra'a saw'inw wa maa kaanat ummuki 
	baghiyyaa
verses.29: Fa ashaarat ilaih; qaaloo kaifa nukallimu man kaana fil mahdi sabiyyaa
verses.30: Qaala innee 'abdullaahi aataaniyal Kitaaba wa ja'alanee Nabiyyaa
verses.31:
Wa ja'alanee mubaarakan aina maa kuntu wa awsaanee bis Salaati waz 
	Zakaati maa dumtu haiyaa
verses.32: Wa barram biwaalidatee wa lam yaj'alnee jabbaaran shaqiyyaa
verses.33: Wassalaamu 'alaiya yawma wulidtu wa yawma amootu wa yawma ub'asu haiyaa
verses.34: Zaalika 'Eesab-nu Maryama; qawlal haqqil lazee feehi yamtaroon
verses.35:
Maa kaana lillaahi ai yattakhiza minw waladin Subhaanah; izaa qadaaa 
	amran fa innamaa yaqoolu lahoo kun fa yakoon
verses.36: Wa innal laaha Rabbee wa Rabbukum fa'budooh; haazaa Siraatum Mustaqeem
verses.37:
Fakhtalafal ahzaabu min bainihim fawailul lillazeena kafaroo min 
	mashhadi Yawmin 'azeem
verses.38:
Asmi' bihim wa absir Yawma ya'toonanaa laakiniz zaalimoonal yawma fee 
	dalaalin mubeen
verses.39:
Wa anzirhum Yawmal hasrati iz qudiyal amr; wa hum fee ghaflatinw wa hum 
	laa yu'minoon
verses.40:
Innaa nahnu narisul arda wa man 'alaihaa wa ilainaa yurja'oon (section 
	2)
verses.41: Wazkur fil Kitaabi Ibraaheem; innahoo kaana siddeeqan Nabiyyaa
verses.42:
Iz qaala li abeehi yaaa abati lima ta'budu maa laa yasma'u wa laa 
	yubsiru wa laa yughnee 'anka shai'aa
verses.43:
Yaaa abati innee qad jaaa'anee minal 'ilmi maa lam ya'tika fattabi'neee 
	ahdika siraatan Sawiyyaa
verses.44: Yaaa abati laa ta'budish Shaitaan; innash Shaitaana kaana lir Rahmaani 'asiyyaa
verses.45:
Yaaa abati innee akhaafu ai yamassaka 'azaabum minar Rahmaani fatakoona 
	lish Shaitaani waliyyaa
verses.46:
Qaala araaghibun anta 'an aalihatee yaaa Ibraaheemu la 'il lam tantahi 
	la arjumannaka wahjurnee maliyyaa
verses.47:
Qaala salaamun 'alaika sa astaghfiru laka Rabbeee innahoo kaana bee 
	hafiyyaa
verses.48:
Wa a'tazilukum wa maa tad'oona min doonil laahi wa ad'oo Rabbee 'asaaa 
	allaaa akoona bidu'aaa'i Rabbee shaqiyyaa
verses.49:
Fa lam ma'tazalahum wa maa ya'budoona min doonil laahi wahabnaa lahoo is-haaqa 
	wa ya'qoob; wa kullan ja'alnaa Nabiyyaa
verses.50:
Wa wahabnaa lahum mirrahmatinaa wa ja'alnaa lahum lisaana sidqin 'aliyyaa 
	(section 3)
verses.51:
Wazkur fil Kitaabi Moosaaa; innahoo kaana mukhlasanw wa kaana Rasoolan 
	Nabiyyaa
verses.52: Wa naadainaahu min jaanibit Tooril aimani wa qarrabnaahu najiyyaa
verses.53: Wa wahabnaa lahoo mir rahmatinaaa akhaahu Haaroona Nabiyyaa
verses.54:
Wazkur fil Kitaabi ismaa'eel; innahoo kaana saadiqal wa'di wa kaana 
	Rasoolan Nabiyyaa
verses.55:
Wa kaana ya'muru ahlahoo bis Salaati waz zakaati wa kaana 'inda Rabbihee 
	mardiyyaa
verses.56: Wazkur fil Kitaabi Idrees; innahoo kaana siddeeqan Nabiyyaa
verses.57: Wa rafa'naahu makaanan 'aliyyaa
verses.58:
Ulaaa'ikal lazeena an'amal laahu 'alaihim minan Nabiyyeena min 
	zurriyyati Aadama wa mimman hamalnaa ma'a Noohinw wa min zurriyyati 
	Ibraaheema wa Israaa'eela wa mimman hadainaa wajta bainaaa; izaa tutlaa 'alaihim 
	Aayaatur Rahmaani kharroo sujjadanw wa bukiyyaa (make sajda)
verses.59:
Fakhalafa min ba'dihim khalfun adaa'us Salaata wattaba'ush shahawaati 
	fasawfa yalqawna ghaiyyaa
verses.60:
Illaa man taaba wa aamana wa 'amila saalihan fa ulaaa'ika yadkhuloonal 
	jannata wa laa yuzlamoona shai'aa
verses.61:
Jannaati 'adninil latee wa'adar Rahmaanu ibaadahoo bilghaib; innahoo 
	kaana wa'duhoo ma'tiyyaa
verses.62:
Laa yasma'oona feehaa laghwan illaa salaamaa; wa lahum rizquhum feehaa 
	bukratanw wa 'ashiyyaa
verses.63: Tilkal jannatul latee noorisu min 'ibaadinaa man kaana taqiyyaa
verses.64:
Wa maa natanazzalu illaa bi amri Rabbika lahoo maa baina aideenaa wa maa 
	khalfanaa wa maa baina zaalik; wa maa kaana Rabbuka nasiyyaa
verses.65:
Rabbus samaawaati wal ardi wa maa bainahumaa fa'bud hu wastabir 
	li'ibaadatih; hal ta'lamu lahoo samiyyaa (section 4)
verses.66: Wa yaqoolul insaanu 'a izaa maa mittu lasawfa ukhraju haiyaa
verses.67: 'A wa laa yazkurul insaanu annaa khalaqnaahu min qablu wa lam yaku shai'aa
verses.68:
Fawa Rabbika lanahshu rannahum wash shayaateena summa lanuhdirannahum 
	hawla jahannama jisiyyaa
verses.69: Summa lanan zi'anna min kulli shee'atin aiyuhum ashaddu 'alar Rahmaani 'itiyyaa
verses.70: Summa lanahnu a'lamu billazeena hum awlaa bihaa siliyyaa
verses.71: Wa in minkum illaa waariduhaa; kaana 'alaa Rabbika hatmam maqdiyyaa
verses.72: Summa nunajjil lazeenat taqaw wa nazaruz zaalimeena feehaa jisiyyaa
verses.73:
Wa izaa tutlaa 'alaihim Aayaatunaa baiyinaatin qaalal lazeena kafaroo 
	lillazeena aamanooo aiyul fareeqaini khairum maqaamanw wa ahsanu nadiyyaa
verses.74: Wa kam ahlaknaa qablahum min qarnin hum ahsanu asaasanw wa ri'yaa
verses.75:
Qul man kaana fidda laalati falyamdud lahur Rahmaanu maddaa; hattaaa 
	izaa ra aw maa yoo'adoona immal 'azaaba wa immas Saa'ata fasa ya'lamoona man 
	huwa sharrum makaananw wa ad'afu jundaa
verses.76:
Wa yazeedul laahul lazeenah tadaw hudaa; wal baaqiyaatus saalihaatu 
	khairun 'inda Rabbika sawaabanw wa khairum maraddaa
verses.77:
Afara'aytal lazee kafara bi Aayaatinaa wa qaala la oota yanna maalanw wa 
	waladaa
verses.78: 'At tala'al ghaiba 'amit takhaza 'indar Rahmaani 'ahdaa
verses.79: Kallaa; sanaktubu maa yaqoolu wa namuddu lahoo minal 'azaabi maddaa
verses.80: Wa narisuhoo maa yaqoolu wa ya'teenaa fardaa
verses.81: Wattakhazoo min doonil laahi aalihatal liyakoonoo lahum 'izzaa
verses.82:
Kallaa; sa yakfuroona bi'ibaadatihim wa yakoonoona 'alaihim diddaa 
	(section 5)
verses.83: Alam tara annaaa arsalnash Shayaateena 'alal kaafireena ta'uzzuhum azzaa
verses.84: Falaa ta'jal alaihim innamaa na 'uddu lahum 'addaa
verses.85: Yawma nahshurul muttaqeena ilar Rahmaani wafdaa
verses.86: Wa nasooqul mujrimeena ilaa Jahannama wirdaa
verses.87: Laa yamlikoonash shafaa'ata illaa manittakhaza 'indar Rahmaani 'ahdaa
verses.88: Wa qaalut takhazar Rahmaanu waladaa
verses.89: Laqad ji'tum shai'an iddaa
verses.90:
Takaadus samaawaatu yatafattarna minhu wa tanshaq qul ardu wa takhirrul 
	jibaalu haddaa
verses.91: An da'aw lir Rahmaani waladaa
verses.92: Wa maa yambaghee lir Rahmaani ai yattakhiza waladaa
verses.93: In kullu man fis samaawaati wal ardi illaaa aatir Rahmaani 'abdaa
verses.94: Laqad ahsaahum wa addahum 'addaa
verses.95: Wa kulluhum aateehi Yawmal Qiyaamati fardaa
verses.96:
Innal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati sa yaj'alu lahumur Rahmaanu 
	wuddaa
verses.97:
Fa innamaa yassarnaahu bilisaanika litubashshira bihil muttaqeena wa 
	tunzira bihee qawmal luddaa
verses.98:
Wa kam ahlaknaa qabla hum min qarnin hal tuhissu minhum min ahadin aw 
	tasma'u lahum rikzaa (section 6)

verses.3: Illaa tazkiratal limany yakhshaa
verses.4: Tanzeelam mimman khalaqal arda was samaawaatil 'ulaa
verses.5: Ar-Rahmaanu 'alal 'Arshis tawaa
verses.6:
Lahoo maa fis samaawaati wa maa fil ardi wa maa bainahumaa wa maa 
	tahtassaraa
verses.7: Wa in tajhar bilqawli fainnahoo ya'lamus sirra wa akhfaa
verses.8: Allaahu laaa ilaaha illaa huwa lahul asmaa'ul husnaa
verses.9: Wa hal ataaka hadeesu Moosa
verses.10:
Iz ra aa naaran faqaala li ahlihim kusooo inneee aanastu naaral 
	la'alleee aateekum minhaa biqabasin aw ajidu 'alan naari hudaa
verses.11: Falammaaa ataahaa noodiya yaa Moosaa
verses.12: Inneee Ana Rabbuka fakhla' na'laika innaka bilwaadil muqaddasi Tuwaa
verses.13: Wa anakhtartuka fastami' limaa yoohaa
verses.14:
Innaneee Anal laahu laaa ilaaha illaa Ana fa'budnee wa aqimis-salaata 
	lizikree
verses.15:
Innas Saa'ata aatiyatun akaadu ukhfeehaa litujzaa kullu nafsin bimaa 
	tas'aa
verses.16:
Falaa yasuddannaka 'anhaa mal laa yu'minu bihaa wattaba'a hawaahu 
	fatardaa
verses.17: Wa maa tilka bi yamee nika yaa Moosaa
verses.18:
Qaala hiya 'asaaya atawakka'u alaihaa wa ahushshu bihaa 'alaa ghanamee 
	wa liya feehaa ma aaribu ukhraa
verses.19: Qaala alqihaa yaa Moosaa
verses.20: Fa-alqaahaa fa -izaa hiya haiyatun tas'aa
verses.21: Qaala khuzhaa wa laa ta khaf sanu'eeduhaa seeratahal oolaa
verses.22:
Wadmum yadaka ilaa janaahika takhruj baidaaa'a min ghairi sooo'in 
	Aayatan ukhraa
verses.23: Linuriyaka min Aayaatinal Kubra
verses.24: Izhab ilaa Fir'awna innahoo taghaa (section 1)
verses.25: Qaala Rabbish rah lee sadree
verses.26: Wa yassir leee amree
verses.27: Wahlul 'uqdatan milli saanee
verses.28: Yafqahoo qawlee
verses.29: Waj'al lee wazeeran min ahlee
verses.30: Haaroona akhee
verses.31: Ushdud biheee azree
verses.32: Wa ashrik hu feee amree
verses.33: Kai nusabbihaka kaseeraa
verses.34: Wa nazkuraka kaseeraa
verses.35: Innaka kunta binaa baseeraa
verses.36: Qaala qad ooteeta su'laka yaa Moosaa
verses.37: Wa laqad manannaa 'alaika marratan ukhraaa
verses.38: Iz awhainaaa ilaaa ummika maa yoohaaa
verses.39:
'Aniqzifeehi fit Taabooti faqzifeehi fil yammi fal yul qihil yammu bis 
	saahili ya'khuzhu 'aduwwul lee wa 'aduwwul lah; wa alqaitu 'alaika 
	mahabbatan minnee wa litusna'a 'alaa 'ainee
verses.40:
Iz tamsheee ukhtuka fataqoolu hal adullukum 'alaa mai yakfuluhoo faraja 
	'naaka ilaaa ummika kai taqarra 'ainuhaa wa laa tahzan; wa qatalta nafsan 
	fanajjainaaka minal ghammi wa fatannaaka futoonaa; falabista sineena feee 
	ahli Madyana summa ji'ta 'alaa qadariny yaa Moosa
verses.41: Wastana' tuka linafsee
verses.42: Izhab anta wa akhooka bi Aayaatee wa laa taniyaa fee zikree
verses.43: Izhabaaa ilaa Fir'awna innahoo taghaa
verses.44: Faqoolaa lahoo qawlal laiyinal la allahoo yatazakkkaru 'aw yakhshaa
verses.45: Qaalaa Rabbanaaa innanaa nakhaafu ai yafruta 'alainaaa aw ai yatghaa
verses.46: Qaala laa takhaafaaa innanee ma'akumaa asma'u wa araa
verses.47:
Faatiyaahu faqoolaaa innaa Rasoolaa Rabbika fa arsil ma'anaa Banee 
	Israaa'eela wa laa tu'azzibhum qad ji'naaka bi Aayatim mir Rabbika wassa 
	laamu 'alaa manit taba'al hudaa
verses.48: Innaa qad oohiya ilainaaa annnal 'azaaba 'alaa man kaz zaba wa tawalla
verses.49: Qaala famar Rabbu kumaa yaa Moosa
verses.50: Qaala Rabbunal lazeee a'taa kulla shai'in khalqahoo summa hadaa
verses.51: Qaala famaa baalul quroonil oolaa
verses.52: Qaala 'ilmuhaa 'inda Rabee fee kitaab, laa yadillu Rabbee wa laa yansaa
verses.53:
Allazee ja'ala lakumul arda mahdanw wa salaka lakum feehaa subulanw wa 
	anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa akhrajnaa biheee azwaajam min nabaatin 
	shatta
verses.54:
Kuloo war'aw an'aamakum; inna fee zaalika la Aayaatil li ulin nuhaa 
	(section 2)
verses.55:
Minhaa khalaqnaakum wa feehaa nu'eedukum wa minhaa nukhrijukum taaratan 
	ukhraa
verses.56: Wa laqad arainaahu Aayaatinaa kullahaa fakaz zaba wa abaa
verses.57: Qaala aji'tanaa litukhri janaa min ardinaa bisihrika yaa Moosa
verses.58:
Falanaatiyannaka bisihrim mislihee faj'al bainanaa wa bainaka maw'idal 
	laa nukhlifuhoo nahnu wa laaa anta makaanan suwaa
verses.59: Qaala maw'idukum yawmuz zeenati wa ai yuhsharan naasu duhaa
verses.60: Fatawallaa Fir'awnu fajjama'a kaidahoo summa ataa
verses.61:
Qaala lahum Moosaa wailakum laa taftaroo 'alal laahi kaziban fa yus 
	hitakum bi 'azaab, wa qad khaaba manif taraa
verses.62: Fatanaaza'ooo amrahum bainahum wa asarrun najwaa
verses.63:
Qaalooo in haaazaani lasaahiraani yureedaani ai yukhrijaakum min ardikum 
	bisihrihimaa wa yazhabaa bitareeqatikumul muslaa
verses.64: Fa ajmi'oo kaidakum summma'too saffaa; wa qad aflahal yawma manis ta'laa
verses.65:
Qaaloo yaa Moosaaa immaaa an tulqiya wa immaaa an nakoona awala man 
	alqaa
verses.66:
Qaala bal alqoo fa izaa hibaaluhum wa 'isiyyuhum yukhaiyalu ilaihi min 
	sihrihim annahaa tas'aa
verses.67: Fa awjasa fee nafsihee kheefatam Moosa
verses.68: Qulnaa laa takhaf innaka antal a'laa
verses.69:
Wa alqi maa fee yamee nika talqaf maa sana'oo; innamaa sana'oo kaidu 
	saahir; wa laa yuflihus saahiru haisu ataa
verses.70: Fa ulqiyas saharatu sujjadan qaalooo aamannaa bi Rabbi Haaroona wa Moosa
verses.71:
Qaala aamantum lahoo qabla an aazana lakum; innahoo lakabeerukumul lazee 
	'allama kumus sihra fala uqatti'anna aidiyakum wa arjulakum min khilaafinw 
	wa la usallibannakum fee juzoo'in nakhli wa lata'lamunna aiyunaaa ashaddu 'azaabanw 
	wa abqaa
verses.72:
Qaaloo lan nu'siraka 'alaa maa jaaa'anaa minal baiyinaati wallazee 
	fataranaa faqdimaaa anta qaad; innamaa taqdee haazihil hayaatad dunyaa
verses.73:
Innaaa aamannaa bi Rabbinaa liyaghfira lanaa khataayaanaa wa maaa 
	akrahtanaa 'alaihi minas sihr; wallaahu khairunw wa abqaa
verses.74:
Innahoo mai ya'ti Rabbahoo mujriman fa inna lahoo Jahannama laa yamootu 
	feehaa wa laa yahyaa
verses.75:
Wa mai ya'tihee mu'minan qad 'amilas saalihaati fa ulaaa'ika lahumud 
	darajaatul 'ulaa
verses.76:
Jannaatu 'Adnin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena feehaa; wa 
	zaalika jazaaa'u man tazakka (section 3)
verses.77:
Wa laqad awhainaaa ilaa Moosaaa an asri bi'ibaadee fadrib lahum tareeqan 
	fil bahri yabasal laa takhaafu darakanw wa laa takhshaa
verses.78:
Fa atba'ahum Fir'awnu bijunoodihee faghashiyahum minal yammmi maa ghashi 
	yahum
verses.79: wa adalla fir'awnu qawmahoo wa maa hadaa
verses.80:
Yaa Baneee Israaa'eela qad anjainaakum min 'aduw wikum wa wa'adnaakum 
	jaanibat Tooril aimana wa nazzalnaa 'alaikumul Manna was Salwaa
verses.81:
Kuloo min taiyibaati maa razaqnaakum wa laa tatghaw feehi fa yahilla 'alaikum 
	ghadabee wa mai yahlil 'alaihi ghadabee faqad hawaa
verses.82:
Wa innee la Ghaffaarul liman taaba wa aamana wa 'amila saalihan summah 
	tadaa
verses.83: Wa maaa a'jalaka 'an qawmika yaa Moosa
verses.84: Qaala hum ulaaa'i 'alaaa asaree wa 'ajiltu ilaika Rabbi litardaa
verses.85: Qaala fa innaa qad fatannaa qawmaka mim ba'dika wa adallahumus Saamiriyy
verses.86:
Faraja'a Moosaaa ilaa qawmihee ghadbaana asifaa; qaala yaa qawmi alam 
	ya'idkum Rabbukum wa'dan hasanaa; afataala 'alaikumul 'ahdu am arattum ai 
	yahilla 'alaikum ghadabum mir Rabbikum fa akhlaftum maw'idee
verses.87:
Qaaloo maaa akhlafnaa maw'idaka bimalkinna wa laakinna hummilnaaa 
	awzaaram min zeenatil qawmi faqazafnaahaa fakazaalika alqas Saamiriyy
verses.88:
Fa akhraja lahum 'ijlan jasadal lahoo khuwaarun faqaaloo haazaaa 
	ilaahukum wa ilaahu Moosaa fanasee
verses.89:
Afalaa yarawna allaa yarji'u ilaihim qawlanw wa laa yamliku lahum 
	darranw wa laa naf'aa (section 4)
verses.90:
Wa laqad qaala lahum Haaroonu min qablu yaa qawmi innamaa futintum bihee 
	wa inna Rabbakumur Rahmaanu fattabi'oonee wa atee'ooo amree
verses.91: Qaaloo lan nabraha 'alaihi 'aakifeena hattaa yarji'a ilainaa Moosaa
verses.92: Qaala Yaa Haaroonu maa mana 'aka iz ra aitahum dallooo
verses.93: Allaa tattabi'ani afa'asaita amree
verses.94:
Qaala yabna'umma laa ta'khuz bi lihyatee wa laa bi ra'see innee khasheetu 
	an taqoola farraqta baina Baneee Israaa'eela wa lam tarqub qawlee
verses.95: Qaala famaa khatbuka yaa Saamiriyy
verses.96:
Qaala basurtu bimaa lam yabsuroo bihee faqabadtu qabdatam min asarir 
	Rasooli fanabaztuhaa wa kazaalika sawwalat lee nafsee
verses.98:
Innamaaa ilaahu kumul laahul lazee laa ilaaha illaa Hoo; wasi'a kulla 
	shai'in ilmaa
verses.99:
Kazaalika naqussu 'alaika min anbaaa'i maa qad sabaq; wa qad aatainaaka 
	mil ladunnaa Zikraa
verses.100: Man a'rada 'anhu, fa innahoo yahmilu Yawmal Qiyaamati wizraa
verses.101: Khaalideena feehi wa saaa'a lahum Yawmal Qiyaamati himlaa
verses.102: Yawma yunfakhu fissoori wa nahshurul mujrimeena Yawma 'izin zurqaa
verses.104:
nahnu a'lamu bimaa yaqooloona iz yaqoolu amsaluhum tareeqatan illabistum 
	illaa yawmaa (section 5)
verses.105: Wa yas'aloonaka 'anil jibaali faqul yansifuhaa Rabbee nasfaa
verses.107: Laa taraa feehaa 'iwajanw wa laaa amtaa
verses.108:
Yawma iziny yattabi'oonad daa'iya laa 'iwaja lahoo wa khasha'atil 
	aswaatu lir Rahmaani falaa tasma'u illaa hamsaa
verses.109:
Yawma 'izil laa tanfa'ush shafaa'atu illaa man azina lahur Rahmaanu wa 
	radiya lahoo qawlaa
verses.110: Ya'lamu maa bainaa aideehim wa maa khalfahum wa laa yuheetoona bihee 'ilmaa
verses.111: Wa 'anatil wujoohu lil Haiiyil Qaiyoomi wa qad khaaba man hamala zulmaa
verses.112:
Wa mai ya'mal minas saalihaati wa huwa mu'minun falaa yakhaafu zulmanw 
	wa laa hadmaa
verses.113:
Wa kazaalika anzalnaahu Qur-aanan 'Arabiyyanw wa sarrafnaa fee hi minal 
	wa'eedi la'allahum yattaqoona aw yuhdisu lahum zikraa
verses.114:
Fata'aalal laahul Malikul Haqq; wa laa ta'jal bil Quraani min qabli ai 
	yuqdaaa ilaika wahyuhoo wa qur Rabbi zidnee 'ilmaa
verses.115:
Wa laqad 'ahidnaaa ilaaa Aadama min qablu fanasiya wa lam najid lahoo 'azmaa 
	(section 6)
verses.116:
Wa iz qulnaa lilma laaa'ikatis judoo li Aadama fasajadooo illaaa Ibleesa; 
	abaa
verses.117:
Faqulnaa yaaa Aadamu inna haazaa 'aduwwul laka wa lizawjika falaa 
	yukhrijan nakumaa minal Jannati fatashqaa
verses.118: Innaa laka allaa tajoo'a feeha wa laa ta'raa
verses.119: Wa annaka laa tazma'u feehaa wa laa tadhaa
verses.120:
Fa waswasa ilaihish Shaitaanu qaala yaaa Aadamu hal adulluka 'alaa 
	shajaratil khuldi wa mulkil laa yablaa
verses.121:
Fa akalaa minhaa fabadat lahumaa saw aatuhumaa wa tafiqaa yakhsifaani 'alaihimaa 
	minw waraqil jannah; wa 'asaaa Aadamu Rabbahoo faghawaa
verses.122: Summaj tabbahu Rabbuhoo fataaba 'alaihi wa hadaa
verses.123: Qaalah bita minhaa jamee'am ba'dukum liba'din 'aduww; fa immaa ya'tiyannakum minnee hudan famanit taba'a hudaaya falaa yadillu wa laa yashqaa
verses.124:
Wa man a'rada 'an Zikree fa inna lahoo ma'eeshatan dankanw wa 
	nahshuruhoo Yawmal Qiyaamati a'maa
verses.125: Qaala Rabbi lima hashar tanee a'maa wa qad kuntu baseeraa
verses.126:
Qaala kazaalika atatka Aayaatunaa fanaseetahaa wa kazaalikal Yawma 
	tunsaa
verses.127:
Wa kazaalika najzee man asrafa wa lam yu'min bi Aayaati Rabbih; wa 
	la'azaabul Aakhirati ashaddu wa abqaa
verses.128:
Afalam yahdi lahum kam ahlaknaa qablahum minal qurooni yamshoona fee 
	masaakinihim; inna fee zaalika la Aayaatil li ulinnuhaa (section 7)
verses.129:
Wa law laa Kalimatun sabaqat mir Rabbika lakaana lizaamanw wa 'ajalun 
	musammaa
verses.130:
Fasbir 'alaa maa yaqooloona wa sabbih bihamdi Rabbika qabla tuloo'ish 
	shamsi wa qabla ghuroobihaa wa min aanaaa'il laili fasabbih wa atraafan 
	nahaari la 'allaka tardaa
verses.131:
Wa laa tamuddanna 'ainaika ilaa ma matta'na biheee azwajam minhum 
	zahratal hayaatid dunya linaftinahum feeh; wa rizqu Rabbika khairunw wa 
	abqaa
verses.132:
Wa'mur ahlaka bis Salaati wastabir 'alaihaa laa nas'aluka rizqaa; nahnu 
	narzuquk; wal 'aaqibatu littaqwaa
verses.133:
Wa qaaloo law laa ya'teenaa bi aayatin mir Rabbih; awa lam ta'tihim 
	baiyinatu maa fis suhufil oolaa
verses.134:
Wa law annaaa ahlaknaahum bi 'azaabin min qablihee laqaaloo Rabbanaa law 
	laaa arsalta ilainaa Rasoolan fanattabi'a Aayaatika min qabli an nazilla wa 
	nakhzaa
verses.135:
Qul kullum mutarabbisun fa tarabbasoo fa sa ta'lamoona man Ashaabus Siraatis 
	Sawiyyi wa manih tadaa (section 8) (End Juz 16)

verses.1: Iqtaraba linnaasi hisaabuhum wa hum fee ghaflatim mu'ridoon
verses.2:
Maa ya'teehim min zikrim mir Rabbihim muhdasin illas tama'oohu wa hum 
	yal'aboon
verses.3:
Laahiyatan quloobuhum; wa asarrun najwal lazeena zalamoo hal haazaaa 
	illaa basharum mislukum 'afa ta'toonas sihra wa antum tubsiroon
verses.4: Qaala Rabbee ya'lamul qawla fis samaaa'i wal ardi wa Huwas Samee'ul 'Aleem
verses.5:
Bal qaalooo adghaasu ahlaamin bal  iftaraahu bal huwa shaa'irun 
	fal ya'tinaa bi Aayatin kamaa ursilal awwaloon
verses.6: Maaa aaamanat qablahum min qaryatin ahlaknaahaa a-fahum yu'minoon
verses.7:
Wa maaa arsalnaa qablaka illaa rijaalan nooheee ilaihim fas'aloo ahlaz 
	zikri in kuntum laa ta'lamoon
verses.8:
Wa maa ja'alnaahum jasadal laa ya'kuloonat ta'aama wa maa kaanoo 
	khaalideen
verses.9:
Summa sadaqnaa humul wa'da fa-anjainaahum wa man nashaaa'u wa ahlaknal 
	musrifeen
verses.10:
Laqad anzalnaaa ilaikum Kitaaban feehi zikrukum afalaa ta'qiloon
	
	(Section 1)
verses.11:
Wa kam qasamnaa min qaryatin kaanat zaalimatanw wa ansha' naa ba'dahaa 
	qawman aakhareen
verses.12: Falammaaa ahassoo ba'sanaaa izaa hum minhaa yarkudoon
verses.13:
Laa tarkudoo warji'ooo ilaa maaa utriftum feehi wa masaakinikum 
	la'allakum tus'aloon
verses.14: Qaaloo yaa wailanaaa innaa kunnaa zaalimeen
verses.15: Famaa zaalat tilka da'waahum hattaa ja'alnaahum haseedan khaamideen
verses.16: Wa maa khalaqnas samaaa'a wal arda wa maa bainahumaa laa'ibeen
verses.17:
Law aradnaaa an nattakhiza lahwal lat takhaznaahu mil ladunnaaa in 
	kunnaa faa'ileen
verses.18:
Bal naqzifu bilhaqqi 'alal baatili fa yadmaghuhoo fa izaa huwa zaahiq; 
	wa lakumul wailu mimmaa tasifoon
verses.19:
Wa lahoo man fis samaawaati wal ard; wa man 'indahoo laa yastakbiroona 
	'an 'ibaada tihee wa laa yastahsiroon
verses.20: Yusabbihoona laila wannahaara laa yafturoon
verses.21: Amit takhazooo aalihatam minal ardi hum yunshiroon
verses.22:
Law kaana feehimaaa aalihatun illal laahu lafasadataa; fa-Subhaanal 
	laahi Rabbil 'Arshi 'ammaa yasifoon
verses.23: Laa yus'alu 'ammaa yaf'alu wa hum yus'aloon
verses.24:
Amit takhazoo min doonihee aalihatan qul haatoo burhaanakum haaza zikru 
	mam ma'iya wa zikru man qablee; bal aksaruhum laa ya'lamoonal haqqa fahum 
	mu'ridoon
verses.25:
Wa maaa arsalnaa min qablika mir Rasoolin illaa nooheee ilaihi annahoo 
	laaa ilaaha illaaa Ana fa'budoon
verses.26: Wa qaalut takhazar Rahmaanu waladaa; Subhaanahu bal 'ibaadum mukramoon
verses.27: Laa yasbiqoonahoo bil qawli wa hum bi amrihee ya'maloon
verses.28:
Ya'lamu maa baina aideehim wa maa khalfahum wa laa yashfa'oona illaa 
	limanir tadaa wa hum min khash yatihee mushfiqoon
verses.29:
Wa mai yaqul minhum inneee ilaahum min doonihee fazaalika najzeehi 
	Jahannam; kazaalika najziz zaalimeen (section 2)
verses.30:
Awalam yaral lazeena kafarooo annas samaawaati wal arda kaanataa ratqan 
	fafataqnaa humaa wa ja'alnaa minal maaa'i kulla shai'in haiyin afalaa 
	yu'minoon
verses.31:
Wa ja'alnaa fil ardi rawaasiya an tameeda bihim wa ja'alnaa feehaa 
	fijaajan subulal la'allahum yahtadoon
verses.32: Wa ja'alnas samaaa'a saqfam mahfoozanw wa hum 'an Aayaatihaa mu'ridoon
verses.33:
Wa Huwal lazee khalaqal laila wannahaara washshamsa wal qamara kullun 
	fee falakiny yasbahoon
verses.34:
Wa maa ja'alnaa libasharim min qablikal khuld; afa immitta fahumul 
	khaalidoon
verses.35:
Kullu nafsin zaaa'iqatul mawt; wa nablookum bi sharri walkhairi 
	fitnatanw wa ilainaa turja'oon
verses.36:
Wa izaa ra aakal lazeena kafarooo iny-yattakhizoonaka illa huzuwan; 
	ahaazal lazee yazkuru aalihatakum wa hum bi zikrir Rahmaani hum kaafiroon
verses.37: Khuliqal insaanu min 'ajal; sa ureekum Aayaatee falaa tasta'jiloon
verses.38: Wa yaqooloona mataa haazal wa'du in kuntum saadiqeen
verses.39:
Law ya'lamul lazeena kafaroo heena laa yakuffoona 'anw wujoohihimun 
	Naara wa laa 'an zuhoorihim wa laa hum yunsaroon
verses.40:
Bal ta'teehim baghtatan fatabhatuhum falaa yastatee'oona raddahaa wa laa 
	hum yunzaroon
verses.41:
Wa laqadis tuhzi'a bi-Rusulim min qablika fahaaqa billazeena sakhiroo 
	minhum maa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon (section 3)
verses.42:
Qul mai yakla 'ukum billaili wannahaari minar Rahmaan; bal hum 'an zikri 
	Rabbihim mu'ridoon
verses.43:
Am lahum aalihatun tamna'uhum min dooninaa; laa yastatee'oona nasra 
	anfusihim wa laa hum minna yus-haboon
verses.45:
Qul innamaaa unzirukum bilwahyi; wa laa yasma'us summud du'aaa 'a izaa 
	maa yunzaroon
verses.46:
Wa la'in massat hum nafhatun min 'azaabi Rabbika la yaqoolunna 
	yaawailanaaa innnaa kunnaa zaalimeen
verses.47:
Wa nada'ul mawaazeenal qista li Yawmil Qiyaamati falaa tuzlamu nafsun 
	shai'aa; wa in kaana misqaala habbatim min khardalin atainaa bihaa; wa kafaa 
	binaa haasibeen
verses.48:
Wa laqad aatainaa Moosa wa haaroonal Furqaana wa diyaa'anw wa zikral 
	lilmuttaqeen
verses.49: Allazeena yakhshawna Rabbahum bilghaibi wa hum minas Saa'ati mushfiqoon
verses.50:
Wa haazaa Zikrum Mubaarakun anzalnaah; afa antum lahoo munkiroon 
	(section 4)
verses.51: Wa laqad aatainaaa Ibraaheema rushdahoo min qablu wa kunnaa bihee 'aalimeen
verses.52:
Iz qaala li abeehi wa qawmihee maa haazihit tamaaseelul lateee antum 
	lahaa 'aakifoon
verses.53: Qaaloo wajadnaaa aabaaa'anaa lahaa 'aabideen
verses.54: Qaala laqad kuntum antum wa aabaaa'ukum fee dalaalin mubeen
verses.55: Qaalooo aji'tanaa bil haqqi am anta minal laa'ibeen
verses.56:
Qaala bar Rabbukum Rabbus samaawaati wal ardil lazee fatarahunna wa ana 
	'alaa zaalikum minash shaahideen
verses.57: Wa tallaahi la akeedanna asnaamakum ba'da an tuwalloo mudbireen
verses.58: Faja'alahum juzaazan illaa kabeeral lahum la'allahum ilaihi yarji'oon
verses.59: Qaaloo man fa'ala haazaa bi aalihatinaaa innahoo laminaz zaalimeen
verses.60: Qaaloo sami'naa fatany yazkuruhum yuqaalu lahooo Ibraaheem
verses.61: Qaaloo fa'too bihee 'alaaa a'yunin naasi la'allahum yash hadoon
verses.62: Qaalooo 'a-anta fa'alta haazaa bi aalihatinaa yaaa Ibraaheem
verses.63: Qaala bal fa'alahoo kabeeruhum haazaa fas'aloohum in kaanoo yantiqoon
verses.64: Faraja'ooo ilaaa anfusihim faqaalooo innakum antumuz zaalimoon
verses.65: Summa nukisoo 'alaa ru'oosihim laqad 'alimta maa haaa'ulaaa'i yantiqoon
verses.66:
Qaala afata'budoona min doonil laahi maa laa yanfa'ukum shai'anw wa laa 
	yadurrukum
verses.67: Uffil lakum wa limaa ta'budoona min doonil laah; afalaa ta'qiloon
verses.68: Qaaloo harriqoohu wansurooo aalihatakum in kuntum faa'ileen
verses.69: Qulnaa yaa naaru koonee bardanw wa salaaman 'alaaa Ibraaheem
verses.70: Wa araadoo bihee kaidan faja'alnaahumul akhsareen
verses.71: Wa najjainaahu wa Lootan ilal ardil latee baaraknaa feehaa lil 'aalameen
verses.72:
Wa wahabnaa lahooo Ishaaqa; wa Ya'qooba naafilah; wa kullan ja'alnaa 
	saaliheen
verses.73:
Wa ja'alnaahum a'immatany yahdoona bi amrinaa wa awhainaaa ilaihim 
	fi'lal khairaati wa iqaamas Salaati wa eetaaa'az Zakaati wa kaanoo lanaa 'aabideen
verses.74:
Wa Lootan aatainaahu hukmanw wa 'ilmanw wa najjainaahu minal qaryatil 
	latee kaanat ta'malul khabaaa'is; innahum kaanoo qawma saw'in faasiqeen
verses.75: Wa adkhalnaahu fee rahmatinaa innahoo minas saaliheen (section 5)
verses.76:
Wa noohan iz naadaa min qablu fastajabnaa lahoo fanajjainaahu wa ahlahoo 
	minal karbil 'azeem
verses.77:
Wa nasarnaahu minal qawmil lazeena kazzaboo bi Aayaatinaa; innahum 
	kaanoo qawma saw'in fa-aghraq naahum ajma'een
verses.78:
Wa Daawooda wa Sulaimaana iz yahkumaani fil harsi iz nafashat feehi 
	ghanamul qawmi wa kunnaa lihukmihim shaahideen
verses.79:
Fafahhamnaahaa sulaimaan; wa kullan aatainaa hukmanw wa'ilmanw wa sakh 
	kharnaa ma'a Daawoodal jibaala yusabbihna wattayr; wa kunnaa faa'ileen
verses.80:
Wa 'allamnaahu san'ata laboosil lakum lituhsinakum min ba'sikum fahal 
	antum shaakiroon
verses.81:
Wa li Sulaimaanar reeha 'aasifatan tajree bi amriheee ilal ardil latee 
	baaraknaa feehaa; wa kunnaa bikulli shai'in 'aalimeen
verses.82:
Wa minash Shayaateeni mai yaghoosoona lahoo wa ya'maloona 'amalan doona 
	zaalika wa kunna lahum haafizeen
verses.83:
Wa Ayyooba iz naadaa Rabbahooo annee massaniyad durru wa Anta arhamur 
	raahimeen
verses.84:
Fastajabnaa lahoo fakashaf naa maa bihee min durrinw wa aatainaahu 
	ahlahoo wa mislahum ma'ahum rahmatan min 'indinaa wa zikraa lil'aabideen
verses.85: Wa Ismaa'eela wa Idreesa wa Zal Kifli kullum minas saabireen
verses.86: Wa adkhalnaahum fee rahmatinaa innahum minas saaliheen
verses.87:
Wa Zan Nooni iz zahaba mughaadiban fa zannaa al lan naqdira 'alaihi fanaadaa fiz zulumaati al laaa ilaaha illaaa 
	Anta Subhaanaka innee kuntu minaz zaalimeen
verses.88:
Fastajabnaa lahoo wa najjainaahu minal ghamm; wa kazaalika nunjil 
	mu'mineen
verses.89:
Wa Zakariyyaaa iz naadaa Rabbahoo Rabbi laa tazarnee fardanw wa Anta 
	khairul waariseen
verses.91:
Wallateee ahsanat farjahaa fanafakhnaa feehaa min roohinaa wa 
	ja'alnaahaa wabnahaaa Aayatan lil'aalameen
verses.92: Inna haaziheee ummatukum ummatanw waahidatanw wa Ana Rabbukum fa'budoon
verses.93: Wa taqatta'ooo amrahum bainahum kullun ilainaaa raaji'oon (section 6)
verses.94:
Famai ya'mal minas saalihaati wa huwa mu'minun falaa kufraana lisa'yihee 
	wa innaa lahoo kaatiboon
verses.95: Wa haraamun 'alaa qaryatin ahlaknaahaaa annahum laa yarji'oon
verses.96:
Hattaaa izaa futihat Ya'jooju wa Ma'jooju wa hum min kulli hadabiny 
	yansiloon
verses.97:
Waqtarabal wa'dul haqqu fa-izaa hiya shaakhisatun absaarul lazeena 
	kafaroo yaawailanaa qad kunna fee ghaflatin min haaza bal kunnaa zaalimeen
verses.98:
Innakum wa maa ta'budoona min doonil laahi hasabu Jahannama antum lahaa 
	waaridoon
verses.99:
Law kaana haaa'ulaaa'i aalihatan maa waradoohaa wa kullun feehaa 
	khaalidoon
verses.100: Lahum feehaa zafeerunw wa hum feehaa laa yasma'oon
verses.101: Innal lazeena sabaqat lahum minnal husnaaa ulaaa'ika 'anhaa mub'adoon
verses.102: Laa yasma'oona hasee sahaa wa hum fee mash tahat anfusuhum khaalidoon
verses.103:
Laa yahzunuhumul faza'ul akbaru wa tatalaq qaahumul malaaa'ikatu haazaa 
	Yawmukumul lazee kuntum too'adoon
verses.104:
Yawma natwis samaaa'a kataiyis sijilli lilkutub; kamaa bada'naa awwala 
	khalqin nu'eeduh; wa'dan 'alainaa; innaa kunna faa'ileen
verses.105:
Wa laqad katabnaa fiz Zaboori min ba'diz zikri annal arda yarisuhaa 'ibaadi 
	yas saalihoon
verses.106: Inna fee haaza labalaa ghal liqawmin 'aabideen
verses.107: Wa maaa arsalnaaka illaa rahmatal lil'aalameen
verses.108:
Qul innamaa yoohaa ilaiya annamaaa ilaahukum illaahunw Waahid, fahal 
	antum muslimoon
verses.109:
Fa in tawallaw faqul aazantukum 'alaa sawaaa'; wa in adreee aqareebun am 
	ba'eedun maa too'adoon
verses.110: Innahoo ya'lamul jahra minal qawli wa ya'lamu maa taktumoon
verses.111: Wa in adree la'allahoo fitnatul lakum wa mataa'un ilaaheen
verses.112:
Qaala Rabbih kum bil haqq; wa Rabbunar Rahmaa nul musta'aanu 'alaa maa 
	tasifoon (section 7)

verses.1: Yaaa ayyuhan naasuttaqoo Rabbakum; inna zalzalatas Saa'ati shai'un 'azeem
verses.2:
Yawma tarawnahaa tazhalu kullu murdi'atin 'ammaaa arda'at wa tada'u 
	kullu zaati hamlin hamlahaa wa tarannaasa sukaaraa wa  maa hum 
	bisukaaraa wa lakinna 'azaabal laahi shadeed
verses.3:
Wa minan naasi mai yujaadilu fil laahi bighairi 'ilminw wa yattabi'u 
	kullaa shaitaanim mareed
verses.4:
Kutiba 'alaihi annahoo man tawallaahu fa annahoo yudilluhoo wa 
	yahdeehi ilaa 'azaabis sa'eer
verses.5:
Yaaa ayyuhan naasu in kuntum fee raibin minal ba'thi fa innaa 
	khalaqnaakum min turaabin thumma min nutfatin thumma min 'alaqatin thumma min mudghatin mukhallaqatinw wa ghairi mukhallaqatin linubaiyina lakum; wa 
	nuqirru fil arhaami maa nashaaa'u ilaaa ajalin musamman thumma nukhrijukum 
	tiflan thumma litablughooo ashuddakum wa minkum mai yutawaffa wa minkum mai 
	yuraddu ilaaa arzalil 'umuri likailaa ya'lama min ba'di 'ilmin shai'aa; wa 
	taral arda haamidatan fa izaaa anzalnaa 'alaihal maaa'ah tazzat wa rabat wa 
	ambatat min kulli zawjin baheej
verses.6:
Zaalika bi annal laaha Huwal haqqu wa annahoo yuhyil mawtaa wa annahoo 'alaakulli 
	shai'in Qadeer
verses.7:
Wa annas Saa'ata aatiya tul laa raiba feeha wa annal laaha yab'asuman 
	fil quboor
verses.8:
Wa minan naasi mai yujaadilu fil laahi bighairi 'ilminw wa laa hudanw wa 
	laa Kitaabim Muneer
verses.9:
Saaniya 'itfihee liyudilla 'an sabeelil laahi lahoo fiddun yaa khizyunw 
	wa nuzeequhoo Yawmal Qiyaamati 'azaabal lhareeq
verses.10:
Zaalika bimaa qaddamat yadaaka wa annal laaha laisa bizallaamil 
	lil'abeed (section 1)
verses.11:
Wa minan naasi mai ya'budul laaha 'alaa harfin fa in asaabahoo khairunit 
	maanna bihee wa in asaabat hu fitnatunin qalaba 'alaa wajhihee khasirad 
	dunyaa wal aakhirah; zaalika huwal khusraanul mubeen
verses.12:
Yad'oo min doonil laahi maa laa yadurruhoo wa maa laa yanfa'uh' zaalika 
	huwad dalaalul ba'ed
verses.13: Yad'oo laman darruhooo aqrabu min naf'ih; labi'salmawlaa wa labi'sal 'asheer
verses.14:
Innal laaha yudkhilul lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati jannaatin 
	tajree min tahtihal anhaar; innal laaha yaf'alu maa yureed
verses.15:
Man kaana yazunnu allai yansurahul laahu fid dunyaa wal aakhirati fal 
	yamdud bisababin ilas samaaa'i summal yaqta' falyanzur hal yuzhibanna 
	kaiduhoo maa yagheez
verses.16:
Wa kazaalika anzalnaahu aayaatim baiyinaatinw wa annal laaha yahdee mai 
	yureed
verses.18:
Alam tara annal laaha yasjudu lahoo man fis samaawaati wa man fil ardi 
	wash shamsu walqamaru wan nu joomu wal jibaalu wash shajaru wad dawaaabbu wa 
	kaseerum minan naasi wa kaseerun haqqa 'alaihil 'azaab; wa mai yuhinil laahu 
	famaa lahoo mim mukrim; innallaaha yaf'alu maa yashaaa (make sajda)
verses.19:
Haazaani khasmaanikh tasamoo fee Rabbihim fal lazeena kafaroo qutti'at 
	lahum siyaabum min naar; yusabbu min fawqi ru'oosihimul hameem
verses.20: Yusharu bihee maa fee butoonihim waljulood
verses.21: Wa lahum maqaami'u min hadeed
verses.22:
Kullamaa araadooo any yakhrujoo minhaa min ghammin u'eedoo feeha wa 
	zooqoo 'azaabal hareeq (section 
	2)
verses.23:
Innal laaha yudkhilul lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati jannaatin 
	tajree min tahtihal anhaaru yuhallawna feehaa min asaawira min zahabinw wa 
	lu'lu'aa; wa libaasuhum feehaa hareer
verses.24: Wa hudooo ilat taiyibi minal qawli wa hudooo ilaaa siraatil hameed
verses.25:
Innal lazeena kafaroo wa yasuddoona 'an sabeelil laahi wal Masjidil 
	Haraamil lazee ja'alnaahu linnaasi sawaaa'anil 'aakifu feehi walbaad; wa mai 
	yurid feehi bi ilhaadim bizulmin nuziqhu min 'azaabin aleem 
(section 3)
verses.26:
Wa iz bawwaanaa li Ibraaheema makaanal Baiti allaa tushrik bee shai'anw 
	wa tahhir Baitiya litaaa'ifeena walqaaa' imeena warrukka 'is sujood
verses.27:
Wa azzin fin naasi bil Hajji yaatooka rijaalanw wa 'alaa kulli daamiriny 
	yaateena min kulli fajjin 'ameeq
verses.28:
Li yashhadoo manaafi'a lahum wa yazkurus mal laahi feee 
	ayyaamimma'loomaatin 'alaa maa razaqahum mim baheematil an'aami fakuloo 
	minhaa wa at'imul baaa'isal faqeer
verses.29:
Summal yaqdoo tafasahum wal yoofoo nuzoorahum wal yattawwafoo bil Baitil 
	'Ateeq
verses.30:
Zaalika wa mai yu'azzim hurumaatil laahi fahuwa khairul lahoo 'inda 
	Rabbih; wa uhillat lakumul an'aamu illaa maa yutlaa 'alaikum fajtanibur 
	rijsa minal awsaani wajtaniboo qawlaz zoor
verses.31:
Hunafaaa'a lillaahi ghaira mushrikeena bih; wa mai yushrik billaahi faka 
	annamaa kharra minas samaaa'i fatakh tafuhut tairu aw tahwee bihir reehu bee 
	makaanin saheeq
verses.32: Zaalika wa mai yu'azzim sha'aaa'iral laahi fa innahaa min taqwal quloob
verses.33:
Lakum feehaa manaafi'u ilaaa ajalim musamman summa mahilluhaaa ilal 
	Baitil 'Ateeq (section 4)
verses.34:
Wa likulli ummatin ja'alnaa mansakal liyazkurus mal laahi 'alaa maa 
	razaqahum mim baheematil an'aam; failaahukum ilaahunw Waahidun falahooo 
	aslimoo; wa bashshiril mukhbiteen
verses.35:
Allazeena izaa zukiral laahu wajilat quloobuhum wassaabireena 'alaa maaa 
	asaabahum walmuqeemis Salaati wa mimmaa razaqnaahum yunfiqoon
verses.36:
Walbudna ja'alnaahaa lakum min sha'aaa'iril laahi lakum feehaa khairun 
	fazkurusmal laahi 'alaihaa sawaaff; fa izaa wajabat junoobuhaa fakuloo 
	minhaa wa at'imul qaani'a walmu'tarr; kazaalika sakhkharnaahaa lakum 
	la'allakum tashkuroon
verses.37:
Lany yanaalal laaha luhoo muhaa wa laa dimaaa'uhaa wa laakiny yanaaluhut 
	taqwaa minkum; kazaalika sakhkharhaa lakum litukabbirul laaha 'alaa ma 
	hadaakum; wa bashshiril muhsineen
verses.38:
Innal laaha yudaafi' 'anil lazeena aamanoo; innal laaha laa yuhibbu 
	kulla khawwaanin kafoor 
	(section 5)
verses.39:
Uzina lillazeena yuqaataloona bi annahum zulimoo; wa innal laaha 'alaa 
	nasrihim la Qaderr
verses.40:
Allazeena ukhrijoo min diyaarihim bighairi haqqin illaaa any yaqooloo 
	rabbunallaah; wa law laa daf'ul laahin naasa ba'dahum biba'dil lahuddimat 
	sawaami'u wa biya'unw wa salawaatunw wa masaajidu yuzkaru feehasmul laahi 
	kaseeraa; wa layansurannal laahu mai yansuruh; innal laaha la qawiyyun 'Azeez
verses.41:
Allazeena im makkan naahum fil ardi aqaamus Salaata wa aatawuz Zakaata 
	wa amaroo bilma'roofi wa nahaw 'anil munkar; wa lillaahi 'aaqibatul umoor
verses.42:
Wa iny yukazzibooka faqad kazzabat qablahum qawmu Noohinw wa Aadunw wa 
	Samood
verses.43: Wa qawmu Ibraaheema wa qawmu Loot
verses.44:
Wa as haabu Madyana wa kuzziba Moosaa fa amlaitu lilkaafireena summa 
	akhaztuhum fakaifa kaana nakeer
verses.45:
Faka ayyim min qaryatin ahlaknaahaa wa hiya zaalimatun fahiya 
	khaawiyatun 'alaa 'urooshihaa wa bi'rim mu'at talatinw wa qasrim masheed
verses.46:
Afalam yaseeroo fil ardi fatakoona lahum quloobuny ya'qiloona bihaaa aw 
	aazaanuny yasma'oona bihaa fa innahaa laa ta'mal absaaru wa laakin ta'mal 
	quloobul latee fissudoor
verses.47:
Wa yasta'jiloonaka bil'azaabi wa lany yukhlifal laahu wa'dah; wa inna 
	yawman 'inda Rabbika ka'alfi sanatim mimmaa ta'uddoon
verses.48:
Wa ka ayyim min qaryatin amlaitu lahaa wa hiya zaalimatun summa 
	akhaztuhaa wa ilaiyal maseer 
	(section 6)
verses.49: Qul yaaa ayyuhan naasu innamaaa ana lakum nazeerum mubeen
verses.50:
Fallazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati lahum maghfiratunw wa rizqun 
	kareem
verses.51: Wallazeena sa'aw feee Aayaatinaa mu'aajizeena ulaaa ika As-haabul jaheem
verses.52:
Wa maaa arsalnaa min qablika mir Rasoolinnw wa laa Nabiyyin illaaa izaaa 
	tamannaaa alqash Shaitaanu feee umniy yatihee fa yansakhul laahu maa yulqish 
	Shaitaanu summa yuhkimul laahu aayaatih; wallaahu 'Aleemun Hakeem
verses.53:
Liyaj'ala maa yulqish Shaitaanu fitnatal lillazeena fee quloobihim 
	maradunw walqaasiyati quloobuhum; wa innaz zaalimeena lafee shiqaaqim ba'eed
verses.54:
Wa liya'lamal lazeena ootul 'ilma annahul haqqu mir Rabbika fa yu'minoo 
	bihee fatukhbita lahoo quloobuhum; wa innal laaha lahaadil lazeena aamanoo 
	ilaa Siraatim Mustaqeem
verses.55:
Wa laa yazaalul lazeena kafaroo fee miryatim minhu hattaa taatiyahumus 
	Saa'atu baghtatan aw yaatiyahum 'azaabu Yawmin 'aqeem
verses.56:
Almulku Yawma'izil lillaahi yahkumu bainahum; fallazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus 
	saalihaati fee jannaatin Na'eem
verses.57:
Wallazeena kafaroo wa kazzaboo bi Aayaatinaa fa ulaaa'ika lahum 'azaabum 
	muheen (section 7)
verses.58:
Wallazeena haajaroo fee sabeelil laahi summa qutilooo aw maatoo la 
	yarzuqan nahumul laahu rizqan hasanaa; wa innal laaha la Huwa khairur 
	raaziqeen
verses.59:
La yudkhilan nahum mud khalany yardawnah; wa innal laaha la 'Aleemun 
	Haleem
verses.60:
Zaalika wa man 'aaqaba bimisli maa 'ooqiba bihee summa bughiya 'alaihi 
	la yansurannahul laah; innal laaha la 'Afuwwun Ghafoor
verses.61:
Zaalika bi annal laaha yoolijul laila fin nahaari wa yoolijun nahaara 
	fil laili wa annal laaha Samee'um Baseer
verses.62:
Zaalika bi annal laaha Huwal haqqu wa anna maa yad'oona min doonihee 
	huwal baatilu wa annal laaha Huwal 'Aliyyul kabeer
verses.63:
Alam tara annal laaha anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an fatusbihul ardu 
	mukhdarrah; innal laaha Lateefun Khabeer
verses.64:
Lahoo ma fis samaawaati wa ma fil ard; wa innal laaha la Huwal Ghaniyyul 
	Hameed (section 8)
verses.66:
Wa Huwal lazee ahyaakum summa yumeetukum summa yuhyeekum; innal insaana 
	la kafoor
verses.67:
Likulli ummatin ja'alnaa mansakan hum naasikoohu falaa yunaazi 'unnaka 
	fil amr; wad'u ilaa Rabbika innaka la 'alaa hudan mustaqeem
verses.68: Wa in jaadalooka faqulil laahu a'lamu bimaa ta'maloon
verses.69:
Allaahu yahkumu bainakum Yawmal Qiyaamati feemaa kuntum feehi 
	takhtalifoon
verses.70:
Alam ta'lam annal laaha ya'lamu maa fis samaaa'i wal ard; inna zaalika 
	fee kitaab; inna zaalika 'alal laahi yaseer
verses.71:
Wa ya'budoona min doonil laahi maa lam yunazzil bihee sultaananw wa maa 
	laisa lahum bihee 'ilm; wa maa lizzaalimeena min naseer
verses.72:
Wa izaa tutlaa 'alaihim Aayaatunaa baiyinaatin ta'rifu fee wujoohil 
	lazeena kafarul munkara yakaadoona yastoona bil lazeena yatloona 'alaihim 
	Aayaatinaa; qul afa unab bi'ukum bisharrim min zaalikum; an Naaru wa 'adahal 
	laahul lazeena kafaroo wa bi'sal maseer 
(section 9)
verses.73:
Yaaa ayyuhan naasu duriba masalun fastami'oo lah; innal lazeena tad'oona 
	min doonil laahi lai yakhluqoo zubaabanw wa lawijtama'oo lahoo wa iny yaslub 
	humuz zubaabu shai'an laa yastanqizoohu minh; da'ufat taalibu wal matloob
verses.74: Maa qadrul laaha haqqa qadrih; innal laaha la Qawiyyun 'Azeez
verses.75:
Allahu yastafee minal malaaa'ikati Rusulanw wa minan naas; innal laaha 
	Samee'un Baseer
verses.76:
Ya'lamu maa baina aydeehim wa maa khalfahum; wa ilal laahi turja'ul 
	umoor
verses.77:
Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanur ka'oo wasjudoo wa'budoo Rabbakum waf'alul 
	khaira la'allakum tuflihoon (make sajda)
verses.78:
Wa jaahidoo fil laahi haqqa jihaadih; Huwaj tabaakum wa maa ja'ala 'alaikum 
	fid deeni min haraj; Millata abeekum Ibraaheem; Huwa sammaakumul muslimeena 
	min qablu wa fee haaza li yakoonar Rasoolu shaheedan 'alaikum wa takoonoo 
	shuhadaaa'a 'alan naas; fa aqeemus salaata wa aatuz zakaata wa'tasimoo 
	billaahi Huwa mawlaakum fani'mal mawlaa wa ni'man naseer 
(section 10) (End Juz 17)

verses.3: Wallazeena hum 'anillaghwimu'ridoon
verses.4: Wallazeena hum liz Zakaati faa'iloon
verses.5: Wallazeena hum lifuroo jihim haafizoon
verses.6:
Illaa 'alaaa azwaajihim aw maa malakat aimaanuhum fa innahum ghairu 
	maloomeen
verses.7: Famanib taghaa waraaa'a zaalika fa ulaaa'ika humul 'aadoon
verses.8: Wallazeena hum li amaanaatihim wa 'ahdihim raa'oon
verses.9: Wallazeena hum 'alaa Salawaatihim yuhaafizoon
verses.10: Ulaaa'ika humul waarisoon
verses.11: Allazeena yarisoonal Firdawsa hum feehaa khaalidoon
verses.12: Wa laqad khalaqnal insaana min sulaalatim minteen
verses.13: Summa ja'alnaahu nutfatan fee qaraarim makeen
verses.14:
Summa khalaqnan nutfata 'alaqatan fakhalaqnal 'alaqata mudghatan 
	fakhalaq nal mudghata 'izaaman fakasawnal 'izaama lahman summa anshaanaahu 
	khalqan aakhar; fatabaarakal laahu ahsanul khaaliqeen
verses.15: Summa innakum ba'da zaalika la maiyitoon
verses.16: Summa innakum Yawmal Qiyaamati tub'asoon
verses.17:
Wa laqad khalaqnaa fawqakum sab'a taraaa'iqa wa maa kunnaa 'anil khalqi 
	ghaafileen
verses.18:
Wa anzalnaa minas samaaa'i maaa'am biqadarin fa-askannaahu fil ardi wa 
	innaa 'alaa zahaabim bihee laqaa diroon
verses.19:
Fa anshaanaa lakum bihee Jannaatim min nakheelinw wa a'naab; lakum 
	feehaa fawaakihu kaseeratunw wa minhaa taakuloon
verses.20:
Wa shajaratan takhruju min Toori Sainaaa'a tambutu bidduhni wa sibghil 
	lil aakileen
verses.21:
Wa inna lakum fil an'aami la'ibrah; nusqeekum mimmaa fee butoonihaa wa 
	lakum feehaa manaafi'u kaseeratunw wa minhaa taakuloon
verses.22: Wa 'alaihaa wa'alal fulki tuhmaloon (section 1)
verses.23:
Wa laqad arsalnaa Noohan ilaa qawmihee faqaala yaa qawmi'budul laaha maa 
	lakum min ilahin ghairuhoo afalaa tattaqoon
verses.24:
Faqaalal mala'ul lazeena kafaroo min qawmihee maa haazaaa illaa basharum 
	mislukum yureedu ai yatafaddala 'alaikum wa law shaaa'al laahu la anzala 
	malaaa'ikatam maa sami'naa bihaazaa feee aabaaa'inal  awwaleen
verses.25: In huwa illaa rajulum bihee jinnatun fatarabbasoo bihee hatta heen
verses.26: Qaala Rabbin surnee bimaa kazzaboon
verses.27:
Fa awhainaaa ilaihi anis na'il fulka bi a'yuninaa wa wahyinaa fa izaa 
	jaaa'a amrunaa wa faarat tannooru fasluk feehaa min kullin zawjainis naini 
	wa ahlaka illaa man sabaqa 'alaihil qawlu minhum walaa tukhaatibnee fil 
	lazeena zalamooo innaahum mughraqoon
verses.28:
Fa izas tawaita anta wa mam ma'aka 'alal fulki faqulil hamdu lillaahil 
	lazee najjaanaa minal qawmiz zalimeen
verses.29: Wa qur Rabbi anzilnee munzalam mubaarakanw wa Anta khairul munzileen
verses.30: Inna fee zaalika la Aayaatinw wa in kunnaa lamubtaleen
verses.31: Summaa anshaana mim ba'dihim qarnan aakhareen
verses.32:
Fa arsalnaa feehim Rasoolam minhum ani'budul laaha maa lakum min ilaahin 
	ghairuhoo afalaa tattaqoon (section 2)
verses.33:
Wa qaalal mala-u min qawmihil lazeena kafaroo wa kazzaboo bi liqaaa'il 
	Aakhirati wa atrafnaahum fil hayaatid dunyaa maa haazaaa illaa basharum 
	mislukum yaakulu mimmaa taakuloona minhu wa yashrabu mimmaa tashraboon
verses.34: Wa la'in at'atum basharam mislakum innakum izal lakhaasiroon
verses.35:
A-Ya'idukum annakum izaa mittum wa kuntum turaabanw wa izaaman annakum 
	mukhrajoon
verses.36: Haihaata haihaata limaa too'adoon
verses.37:
In hiya illaa hayaatunad dunyaa namootu wa nahyaa wa maa nahnu 
	bimab'ooseen
verses.38:
In huwa illaa rajulunif taraa 'alal laahi kazibanw wa maa nahnuu lahoo 
	bimu'mineen
verses.39: Qaala Rabbin surnee bimaa kazzaboon
verses.40: Qaala 'ammaa qaleelil la yusbihunna naadimeen
verses.41:
Fa akhazat humus saihatu bilhaqqi faja'alnaahum ghusaaa'aa; fabu'dal 
	lilqaw miz zaalimeen
verses.42: Summa anshaanaa mim ba'dihim quroonan aakhareen
verses.43: Maa tasbiqu min ummatin ajalahaa wa maa yastaakhiroon
verses.44:
Summa arsalnaa Rusulanaa tatraa kulla maa jaaa'a ummatar Rasooluhaa 
	kazzabooh; fa atba'naa ba'dahum ba'danw wa ja'alnaahum ahaadees; fabu'dal 
	liqawmil laa yu'minoon
verses.45:
Summa arsalnaa Moosaa wa akhaahu Haaroona bi Aayaatinaa wa sultaanim 
	mubeen
verses.46: Ilaa Fir'awna wa mala'ihee fastakbaroo wa kaanoo qawman 'aaleen
verses.47: Faqaaloo annu'minu libasharaini mislinaa wa qawmuhumaa lanaa 'aabidoon
verses.48: Fakazzaboohumaa fakaanoo minal muhlakeen
verses.49: Wa laqad aatainaa Moosal Kitaaba la'allahum yahtadoon
verses.50:
Wa ja'alnab na Maryama wa ummahooo aayatannw wa aawainaahumaaa ilaa 
	rabwatin zaati qaraarinw wa ma'een (section 3)
verses.51:
Yaaa aiyuhar Rusulu kuloo minat taiyibaati wa'maloo saalihan innee bimaa 
	ta'maloona 'Aleem
verses.52:
Wa inna haaziheee ummatukum ummatanw waahidatanw wa Ana Rabbukum 
	fattaqoon
verses.53:
Fataqatta'ooo amrahum bainahum zuburaa; kullu hizbim bimaa ladaihim 
	farihoon
verses.54: Fazarhum fee ghamratihim hattaa heen
verses.55: A-yahsaboona annnamaa numiduhum bihee mimmaalinw wa baneen
verses.56: Nusaari'u lahum fil khairaat; bal laa yash'uroon
verses.57: Innal lazeena hum min khashyati Rabbihim mushfiqoon
verses.58: Wallazeena hum bi Aayaati Rabbihim yu'minoon
verses.59: Wallazeena hum bi Rabbihim laa yushrikoon
verses.60:
Wallazeena yu'toona maaa aataw wa quloobuhum wajilatun annahum ilaa 
	Rabbihim raaji'oon
verses.61: Ulaaa'ika yusaari'oona fil khairaati wa hum lahaa saabiqoon
verses.62:
Wa laa nukallifu nafsan illaa wus'ahaa wa ladainaa kitaabuny yantiqu 
	bilhaqqi wa hum la yuzlamoon
verses.63:
Bal quloobuhum fee ghamratim min haazaa wa lahum a'maalum min dooni 
	zaalika hum lahaa 'aamiloon
verses.64: Hattaaa izaaa akhaznaa mutrafeehim bil'azaabi izaa hum yaj'aroon
verses.65: Laa taj'arul yawma innakum minnaa laa tunsaroon
verses.66: Qad kaanat Aayaatee tutlaa 'alaikum fakuntum 'alaaa a'qaabikum tankisoon
verses.67: Mustakbireena bihee saamiran tahjuroon
verses.68:
Afalam yaddabbarrul qawla am jaaa'ahum maa lam yaati aabaaa'ahumul 
	awwaleen
verses.69: Am lam ya'rifoo Rasoolahum fahum lahoo munkiroon
verses.70:
Am yaqooloona bihee jinnnah; bal jaaa'ahum bilhaqqi wa aksaruhum lil 
	haqqi kaarihoon
verses.71:
Wa lawit taba'al haqqu ahwaaa'ahum lafasadatis samaawaatu wal ardu wa 
	man feehinnn; bal atainaahum bizikrihim fahum 'an zikrihim mu'ridoon
verses.72:
Am tas'aluhum kharjan fakharaaju Rabbika khairunw wa Huwa khairur 
	raaziqeen
verses.73: Wa innaka latad'oohum ilaa Siraatim Mustaqeem
verses.74: Wa innnal lazeena laa yu'minoona bil Aakhirati 'anis siraati lanaakiboon
verses.75:
Wa law rahimnaahum wa kashafnaa maa bihim min durril lalajjoo fee 
	tughyaanihim ya'mahoon
verses.76:
Wa laqad akhaznaahum bil'azaabi famastakaanoo li Rabbihim wa maa 
	yatadarra'oon
verses.77:
Hattaaa izaa fatahnaa 'alaihim baaban zaa 'azaabin shadeedin izaa hum 
	feehi mublisoon (section 4)
verses.78:
Wa Huwal lazeee ansha a-lakumus sam'a wal absaara wal af'idah; qaleelam 
	maa tashkuroon
verses.79: Wa Huwal lazee zara akum fil ardi wa ilaihi tuhsharoon
verses.80:
Wa Huwal lazee yuhyee wa yumeetu wa lahukh tilaaful laili wannahaar; 
	afalaa ta'qiloon
verses.81: Bal qaaloo misla maa qaalal awwaloon
verses.82: Qaalooo 'a-izaa mitnaa wa kunnaa turaabanw wa 'izaaman 'a-innaa lamab 'oosoon
verses.83:
Laqad wu'idnaa nahnu wa aabaaa'unaa haazaa min qablu in haazaaa illaaa 
	asaateerul awwaleen
verses.84: Qul limanil ardu wa man feehaaa in kuntum ta'lamoon
verses.85: Sa-yaqooloona lillaah; qul afalaa tazakkkaroon
verses.86: Qul mar Rabbus samaawaatis sab'i wa Rabbul 'Arshil 'Azeem
verses.87: Sa yaqooloona lillaah; qul afalaa tattaqoon
verses.88:
Qul mam bi yadihee malakootu kulli shai'inw wa Huwa yujeeru wa laa 
	yujaaru 'alaihi in kuntum ta'lamoon
verses.89: Sa yaqooloona lillaah; qul fa annaa tus haroon
verses.90: Bal atainaahum bil haqqi wa innahum lakaaziboon
verses.92:
'Aalimil Ghaibi wash shahhaadati fata'aalaa 'ammaa yushrikoon (section 
	5)
verses.93: Qur Rabbi immmaa turiyannee maa yoo'adoon
verses.94: Rabbi falaa taj'alnee fil qawmiz zaalimeen
verses.95: Wa innaa 'alaaa an nuriyaka maa na'iduhum laqaadiroon
verses.96: Idfa' billate hiya ahsanus saiyi'ah; nahnu a'lamu bimaa yasifoon
verses.97: Wa qur Rabbi a'oozu bika min hamazaatish Shayaateen
verses.98: Wa a'oozu bika Rabbi ai-yahduroon
verses.99: Hattaaa izaa jaaa'a ahada humul mawtu qaala Rabbir ji'oon
verses.100:
La'alleee a'malu saalihan feemaa taraktu kallaa; innahaa kalimatun huwa 
	qaaa'iluhaa wa minw waraaa'ihim barzakhun ilaa Yawmi yub'asoon
verses.101:
Fa izaa nufikha fis Soori falaaa ansaaba bainahum yawma'izinw wa laa 
	yatasaaa'aloon
verses.102: Faman saqulat mawaazee nuhoo fa ulaaa'ika humul muflihoon
verses.103:
Wa man khaffat mawaa zeenuhoo fa ulaaa'ikal lazeena khasiroo 'anfusahum 
	fee Jahannama khaalidoon
verses.104: Talfahu wujoohahumun Naaru wa hum feehaa kaalihoon
verses.105: Alam takun Aayaatee tutlaa 'alaikum fakuntum bihaa tukazziboon
verses.106: Qaaloo Rabbanaa ghalabat 'alainaa shiqwatunaa wa kunnaa qawman daaalleen
verses.107: Rabbanaa akhrijnaa minhaa fa in 'udnaa fa innaa zaalimoon
verses.108: Qaalakh sa'oo feehaa wa laa tukallimoon
verses.109:
Innahoo kaana fareequm min 'ibaadee yaqooloona Rabbanaaa aamannaa 
	faghfir lanaa warhamnaa wa Anta khairur raahimeen
verses.110:
Fattakhaztumoohum sikhriyyan hattaaa ansawkum zikree wa kuntum minhum 
	tadhakoon
verses.111: Inee jazaituhumul Yawma bimaa sabarooo annahum humul faaa'izoon
verses.112: Qaala kam labistum fil ardi 'adada sineen
verses.113: Qaaloo labisnaa yawman aw ba'da yawmin fas'alil 'aaaddeen
verses.114: Qaala il labistum illaa qaleelal law annakum kuntum ta'lamoon
verses.115:
Afahasibtum annamaa khalaqnaakum 'abasanw wa annakum ilainaa laa 
	turja'oon
verses.116:
Fata'aalal laahul Malikul Haqq; laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa Rabbul 'Arshil 
	Kareem
verses.117:
Wa mai yad'u ma'allaahi ilaahan aakhara laa burhaana lahoo bihee fa 
	inna maa hisaabuhoo 'inda Rabbih; innahoo laa yuflihul kaafiroon
verses.118: Wa qul Rabbigh fir warham wa Anta khairur raahimeen (section 6)

verses.1:
Sooratun anzalnaahaa wa faradnaahaa wa anzalnaa feehaaa Aayaatin 
	baiyinaatil la'allakum tazakkaroon
verses.2:
Azzaaniyatu wazzaanee fajlidoo kulla waahidim minhumaa mi'ata jaldatinw 
	wa laa taakhuzkum bihimaa raafatun fee deenil laahi in kuntum tu'minoona 
	billaahi wal Yawmil Aakhiri wal yashhad 'azaabahumaa taaa'ifatum minal 
	mu'mineen
verses.3:
Azzaanee laa yankihu illaa zaaniyatan aw mushrikatanw wazzaaniyatu laa 
	yankihuhaaa illaa zaanin aw mushrik; wa hurrima zaalika 'alal mu'mineen
verses.5:
Illal lazeena taaboo mim ba'di zaalika wa aslahoo fa innal laaha 
	Ghafoorur Raheem
verses.6:
Wallazeena yarmoona azwaajahum wa lam yakul lahum shuhadaaa'u illaaa 
	anfusuhum fashahaadatu ahadihim arba'u shahaadaatim billaahi innahoo laminas 
	saadiqeen
verses.7: Wal khaamisatu anna la'natal laahi 'alaihi in kaana minal kaazibeen
verses.8:
Wa yadra'u anhal 'azaaba an tashhada arba'a shahaa daatim billaahi 
	innahoo laminal kaazibeen
verses.9: Wal khaamisata anna ghadabal laahi 'alaihaaa in kaana minas saadiqeen
verses.10:
Wa law laa fadlul laahi 'alaikum wa rahmatuhoo wa annal laaha Tawwaabun 
	Hakeem (section 1)
verses.12:
Law laaa iz sami'tumoohu zannal mu'minoona walmu'minaatu bi anfusihim 
	khairanw wa qaaloo haazaaa ifkum mubeen
verses.13:
Law laa jaaa'oo 'alaihi bi-arba'ati shuhadaaa'; fa iz lam yaatoo 
	bishshuhadaaa'i fa ulaaa 'ika 'indal laahi humul kaaziboon
verses.14:
Wa law laa fadlul laahi 'alaikum wa rahmatuhoo fiddunyaa wal aakhirati 
	lamassakum fee maaa afadtum feehi 'azaabun 'azeem
verses.15:
Iz talaqqawnahoo bi alsinatikum wa taqooloona bi afwaahikum maa laisa 
	lakum bihee 'ilmunw wa tahsaboo nahoo haiyinanw wa huwa 'indal laahi 'azeem
verses.16:
Wa law laaa iz sami'tu moohu qultum maa yakoonu lanaaa an natakallama 
	bihaazaa Subhaanaka haaza buhtaanun 'azeem
verses.17: Ya'izukumul laahu an ta'oodoo limisliheee abadan in kuntum mu'mineen
verses.18: Wa yubaiyinul laahu lakumul Aayaat; wallaahu 'Aleemun Hakeem
verses.19:
Innal lazeena yuhibboona an tashee'al faahishatu fil lazeena aamanoo 
	lahum 'azaabun aleemun fid dunyaa wal Aakhirah; wallaahu ya'lamu wa antum 
	laa ta'lamoon
verses.20:
Wa law laa fadlul laahi 'alaikum wa rahmatuhoo wa annal laaha Ra'oofur 
	Raheem (section 2)
verses.21:
Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa tattabi'oo khutuwaatish Shaitaan; wa 
	many-yattabi' khutuwaatish Shaitaani fa innahoo yaamuru bilfahshaaa'i 
	walmunkar; wa law laa fadlul laahi 'alaikum wa rahmatuhoo maa zakaa minkum 
	min ahadin abadanw wa laakinnal laaha yuzakkee many-yashaaa'; wallaahu 
	Samee'un 'Aleem
verses.22:
Wa laa yaatali ulul fadli minkum wassa'ati ai yu'tooo ulil qurbaa 
	walmasaakeena walmuhaajireena fee sabeelillaahi walya'foo walyasfahoo; alaa 
	tuhibboona ai yaghfiral laahu lakum; wal laahu Ghafoorur Raheem
verses.23:
Innal lazeena yarmoonal muhsanaatil ghaafilaatil mu'minaati lu'inoo fid 
	dunyaa wal Aakhirati wa lahum 'azaabun 'azeem
verses.24:
Yawma tashhhadu 'alaihim alsinatuhum wa aideehim wa arjuluhum bimaa 
	kaanoo ya'maloon
verses.25:
Yawma'iziny yuwaf feehimul laahu deenahumul haqqa wa ya'lamoona annal 
	laaha Huwal Haqqul Mubeen
verses.26:
Al khabeesaatu lil khabeeseena wal khabeesoona lil khabeesaati 
	wat taiyibaatu lit taiyibeena wat taiyiboona lit  taiyibaat; ulaaa'ika mubarra'oona mimma yaqooloona lahum maghfiratunw wa rizqun kareem (section 3)
verses.27:
Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa tadkhuloo buyootan ghaira buyootikum 
	hatta tastaanisoo wa tusallimoo 'alaa ahlihaa; zaalikum khairul lakum 
	la'allakum tazakkaroon
verses.28:
Fa il lam tajidoo feehaaa ahadan falaa tadkhuloohaa hattaa yu'zana lakum 
	wa in qeela lakumurji'oo farji'oo huwa azkaa lakum; wallaahu bimaa 
	ta'maloona 'Aleem
verses.29:
Laisa 'alaikum junaahun ann tadkhuloo buyootan ghaira maskoonatin feeha 
	mataa'ul lakum; wallaahu ya'lamu maa tubdoona wa maa taktumoon
verses.30:
Qul lilmu' mineena yaghuuddoo min absaarihim wa yahfazoo furoojahum; 
	zaalika azkaa lahum; innallaaha khabeerum bimaa yasna'oon
verses.31:
Wa qul lilmu'minaati yaghdudna min absaarihinna wa yahfazna furoojahunna
