	wa laa yubdeena zeenatahunna illaa maa zahara minhaa wal yadribanna 
	bikhumurihinna 'alaa juyoobihinna wa laa yubdeena zeenatahunna illaa 
	libu'oolatihinna aw aabaaa'i hinna aw aabaaa'i bu'oolati hinna aw 
	abnaaa'ihinnaa aw abnaaa'i bu'oolatihinnna aw ikhwaanihinnna aw baneee 
	ikhwaanihinna aw banee akhawaatihinna aw nisaaa'i hinna aw maa malakat 
	aimaanuhunna awit taabi'eena ghairi ilil irbati minar rijaali awit 
	tiflillazeena lam yazharoo 'alaa 'awraatin nisaaa'i wala yadribnna bi arjulihinna liyu'lama maa yukhfeena min zeenatihinn; wa toobooo ilallaahi jammee'an aiyuhal mu'minoona la'allakum tuflihoon
verses.32: Wa ankihul ayaamaa minkum was saaliheena min 'ibaadikum wa imaa'ikum; iny-yakoonoo fuqaraaa'a yughni himul laahu min fadlih; wal laahu Waasi'un 'Aleem
verses.33:
Wal yasta'fifil lazeena laa yajidoona nikaahan hatta yughniyahumul laahu 
	min fadlih; wallazeena yabtaghoonal kitaaba mimmaa malakat aimaanukum 
	fakaatiboohum in 'alimtum feehim khairanw wa aatoohum mimmaalil laahil 
	lazeee aataakum; wa laa tukrihoo fatayaatikum 'alal bighaaa'i in aradna 
	tahassunal litabtaghoo 'aradal hayaatid dunyaa; wa mai yukrihhunna fa innal 
	laaha mim ba'di ikraahihinna Ghafoorur Raheem
verses.34:
Wa laqad anzalnaaa ilaikum Aayaatim mubaiyinaatinw wa masalam minal 
	lazeena khalaw min qablikum wa maw'izatal lilmuttaqeen (section 4)
verses.35:
Allaahu noorus samaawaati wal ard; masalu noorihee kamishkaatin feehaa 
	misbaah; almisbaahu fee zujaajatin azzujaajatu ka annahaa kawkabun 
	durriyyuny yooqadu min shajaratim mubaarakatin zaitoonatil laa 
	shariqiyyatinw wa laa gharbiyyatiny yakaadu zaituhaa yudeee'u wa law lam 
	tamsashu naar; noorun 'alaa noor; yahdil laahu linoorihee mai yashaaa'; wa 
	yadribul laahul amsaala linnaas; wallaahu bikulli shai'in Aleem
verses.36:
Fee buyootin azinal laahu an turfa'a wa yuzkara feehasmuhoo yusabbihu 
	lahoo feehaa bilghuduwwi wal aasaal
verses.37:
Rijaalul laa tulheehim tijaaratunw wa laa bai'un 'an zikril laahi wa 
	iqaamis Salaati wa eetaaa'iz Zakaati yakhaafoona Yawman tataqallabu feehil 
	quloobu wal absaar
verses.38:
Liyajziyahumul laahu ahsana maa 'amiloo wa yazeedahum min fadlih; 
	wal laahu yarzuqu mai yashaaa'u bighairi hisaab
verses.39:
Wallazeena kafarooo a'maaluhum kasaraabim biqee'atiny yahsabuhuz zamaanu 
	maaa'an hattaaa izaa jaaa'ahoo lam yajid hu shai'anw wa wajadal laaha 'indahoo 
	fa waffaahu hisaabah; wallaahu saree'ul hisaab
verses.40:
Aw kazulumaatin fee bahril lujjiyyiny yaghshaahu mawjun min fawqihee mawjun min 
	fawqihee sahaab; zulumatun ba'duhaa fawqa 
	ba'din izaaa akhraja yadahoo lam yakad yaraahaa wa man lam yaj'alil laahu 
	lahoo nooran famaa lahoo min noor (section 5)
verses.41:
Alam tara annal laaha yusabbihu lahoo man fissamaawaati wal ardi wat 
	tairu saaaffaatim kullun qad 'alima Salaatahoo wa tasbeehah; wallaahu 'aleemum 
	bimaa yaf'aloon
verses.42: Wa lillaahi mulkus samaawaati wal ardi wa ilal laahil maseer
verses.43:
Alam tara annal laaha yuzjee sahaaban summa yu'allifu bainahoo summa 
	yaj'aluhoo rukaaman fataral wadqa yakhruju min khilaalihee wa yunazzilu 
	minas samaaa'i min jibaalin feehaa mim baradin fa yuseebu bihee mai yashaaa'u 
	wa yasrifuhoo 'am mai yashaaa'u yakkaadu sanaa barqihee yazhabu bil absaar
verses.44:
Yuqallibul laahul laila wannahaar; inna fee zaalika la'ibratal li ulil 
	absaar
verses.45:
Wallaahu khalaqa kulla daaabbatim mim maaa'in faminhum mai yamshee 'alaa 
	batnihee wa minhum mai yamshee 'alaa rijlaine wa minhum mai yamshee 'alaaa 
	arba'; yakhluqul laahu maa yashaaa'; innal laaha 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer
verses.46:
Laqad anzalnaaa Aayaatim mubaiyinaat; wallaahu yahdee mai yashaaa'u ilaa 
	Siraatim Mustaqeem
verses.47:
Wa yaqooloona aamannaa billaahi wa bir Rasooli wa ata'naa summa 
	yatawallaa fareequm minhum mim ba'di zaalik; wa maaa ulaaa'ika bilmu'mineen
verses.48:
Wa izaa du'ooo ilal laahi wa Rasoolihee li yahkuma bainahum izaa 
	fareequm minhum mu'ridoon
verses.49: Wa iny-yakul lahumul haqqu yaatooo ilaihi muz'ineen
verses.50:
Afee quloobihim maradun amirtaabooo am yakhaafoona any yaheefallaahu 'alaihim 
	wa Rasooluh; bal ulaaa'ika humuz zaalimoon (section 6)
verses.51:
Innamaa kaana qawlal mu'mineena izaa du'ooo ilal laahi wa Rasoolihee li 
	yahkuma bainahum ai yaqooloo sami'naa wa ata'naa; wa ulaaa'ika humul 
	muflihoon
verses.52:
Wa mai yuti'il laaha wa Rasoolahoo wa yakhshal laaha wa yattaqhi fa 
	ulaaa'ika humul faaa'izoon
verses.53:
Wa aqsamoo billaahi jahda aimaanihim la'in amartahum la yakhrujunna qul 
	laa tuqsimoo taa'atum ma'roofah innal laaha khabeerum bimaa ta'maloon
verses.54:
Qul atee'ul laaha wa atee'ur Rasoola fa in tawallaw fa innamaa 'alaihi 
	maa hummila wa 'alaikum maa hummiltum wa in tutee'oohu tahtadoo; wa maa'alar 
	Rasooli illal balaaghul mubeen
verses.55:
Wa'adal laahul lazeena aamanoo minkum wa 'amilus saalihaati la 
	yastakhlifan nahum fil ardi kamastakh lafal lazeena min qablihim wa la 
	yumakkinanna lahum deenahumul lazir tadaa lahum wa la yubaddilannahum mim 
	ba'di khawfihim amnaa; ya'budoonanee laayushrikoona bee shai'aa; wa man 
	kafara ba'da zaalika fa ulaaa'ika humul faasiqoon
verses.56:
Wa aqeemus Salaata wa aatuz Zakaata wa atee'ur Rasoola la'allakum 
	turhamoon
verses.57:
Laa tahsabannal lazeena kafaroo mu'jizeena fil ard; wa maawaahumun Naaru 
	wa labi'sal maseer (section 7)
verses.58:
Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanoo li yasta'zinkumul lazeena malakat 
	aimaanukum wallazeena lam yablughul huluma minkum salaasa marraat; min qabli 
	Salaatil Fajri wa heena tada'oona siyaa bakum minaz zaheerati wa min ba'di 
	Salaatil Ishaaa'; salaasu 'awraatil lakum; laisa 'alaikum wa laa 'alaihim 
	junaahun ba'dahunn; tawwaafoona 'alaikum ba'dukum 'alaa ba'd; kazaalika 
	yubaiyinul laahu lakumul aayaat; wallahu 'Aleemun Hakeem
verses.59:
Wa izaa balaghal atfaalu minkumul huluma fal yasta'zinoo kamas ta'zanal 
	lazeena min qablihim; kazaalika yubaiyinul laahu lakum Aayaatih; wallaahu 'Aleemun 
	Hakeem
verses.60:
Walqawaa'idu minan nisaaa'il laatee laa yarjoona nikaahan fa laisa 'alaihinna 
	junaahun ai yada'na siyaabahunna ghaira mutabarrijaatin bi zeenah; wa ai 
	yasta'fif na khairul lahunn; wallaahu Samee'un 'Aleem
verses.61:
Laisa 'alal a'maa harajunw wa laa 'alal a'raji harajunw wa laa 'alal 
	mareedi harajun wa laa 'alaa anfusikum  'an ta'kuloo min buyootikum aw buyooti 
	aabaaa'ikum aw buyooti ummahaatikum aw buyooti ikhwaanikum aw buyooti 
	akhawaatikum aw buyooti a'maamikum aw buyooti 'ammaatikum aw buyooti 
	akhwaalikum aw buyooti khaalaatikum aw maa malaktum mafaatihahooo aw 
	sadeeqikum; laisa 'alaikum junaahun 'an ta'kuloo jamee'an aw ashtaata; fa 
	izaa dakhaltum buyootan fa sallimoo 'alaaa anfusikum tahiyyatan min 'indil 
	laahi mubaarakatan taiyibah; kazaalika yubai yinul laahu lakumul Aayaati 
	la'allakum ta'qiloon (section 8)
verses.62:
Innamal mu'minoonal lazeena aamanoo billaahi wa Rasoolihee wa izaa 
	kaanoo ma'ahoo 'alaaa amrin jaami'il lam yazhaboo hattaa yasta'zinooh; innal 
	lazeena yasta'zinoonaka ulaaa'ikal lazeena yu'minoona billaahi wa Rasoolih; 
	fa izas ta'zanooka li ba'di sha'nihim fa'zal liman shi'ta minhum wastaghfir 
	lahumul laah; innal laaha Ghafoorur Raheem
verses.63:
Laa taj'aloo du'aaa'ar Rasooli bainakum ka du'aaa'i ba'dikum ba'daa; qad 
	ya'lamul laahul lazeena yatasallaloona minkum liwaazaa; fal yahzaril lazeena 
	yukhaalifoona 'an amriheee 'an tuseebahum fitnatun aw yuseebahum 'azaabun 
	aleem
verses.64:
'Alaaa inna lillaahi maa fis samaawaati wal ardi qad ya'lamu maaa antum 'alaihi 
	wa Yawma yurja'oona ilaihi fa yunabbi'uhum bimaa 'amiloo; wallaahu bikulli 
	shai'in 'Aleem (section 9)

verses.1:
Tabaarakal lazee nazzalal Furqaana 'alaa 'abdihee li yakoona 
	lil'aalameena nazeera
verses.2:
Allazee lahoo mulkus samaawaati wal ardi wa lam yattakhiz waladanw wa 
	lam yakul lahoo shareekun filmulki wa khalaqa kulla shai'in faqaddarahoo 
	taqdeeraa
verses.3:
Wattakhazoo min dooniheee aalihatal laa yakhluqoona shai'anw wa hum 
	yukhlaqoona wa laa yamlikoona li anfusihim darranw wa laa naf'anw wa laa 
	yamlikoona mawtanw wa laa hayaatanw wa laa nushooraa
verses.4:
Wa qaalal lazeena kafarooo in haazaaa illaaa ifkunif taraahu wa 
	a'aanahoo 'alaihi qawmun aakharoona faqad jaaa'oo zulmanw wa zooraa
verses.5:
Wa qaalooo asaateerul awwaleenak tatabahaa fahiya tumlaa 'alaihi 
	bukratanw wa aseelaa
verses.6:
Qul anzalhul lazee ya'lamus sirra fis samaawaati wal-ard; innahoo kaana 
	Ghafoorar Raheemaa
verses.7:
Wa qaaloo maa li haazar Rasooli ya'kulut ta'aama wa yamshee fil aswaaq; 
	law laaa unzila ilaihi malakun fa yakoona ma'ahoo nazeeraa
verses.8:
Aw yulqaaa ilaihi kanzun aw takoonu lahoo jannatuny ya'kulu minhaa; wa 
	qaalaz zaalimoona in tattabi'oona illaa rajulan mas hooraa
verses.9:
Unzur kaifa daraboo lakal amsaala fadalloo falaa yastatee'oona sabeelaa 
	(section 1)
verses.10:
Tabaarakal lazeee in shaaa'a ja'ala laka khairan min zaalika jannaatin 
	tajree min tahtihal anhaaru wa yaj'al laka qusooraa
verses.11: Bal kazzaboo bis Saa'ati wa a'tadnaa liman kazzaba bis Saa'ati sa'eeraa
verses.12:
Izaa ra'at hum min makaanin ba'eedin sami'oo lahaa taghaiyuzanw wa 
	zafeeraa
verses.13:
Wa izaaa ulqoo minhaa makaanan daiyiqam muqar raneena da'aw hunaalika 
	thuboora
verses.14: Laa tad'ul yawma thubooranw waahidanw wad'oo thubooran kaseeraa
verses.15:
Qul azaalika khairun am Jannatul khuldil latee wu'idal muttaqoon; kaanat 
	lahum jazaaa'anw wa maseeraa
verses.16:
Lahum feehaa maa yashaaa'oona khaalideen; kaana 'alaa Rabbika wa'dan 
	mas'oolaa
verses.17:
Wa Yawma yahshuruhum wa maa ya'budoona min doonil laahi fa yaqoolu 'a-antum 
	adlaltum 'ibaadee haaa'ulaaa'i am hum dallus sabeel
verses.18:
Qaaloo Subhaanaka maa kaana yanbaghee lanaaa an nattakhiza min doonika 
	min awliyaaa'a wa laakin matta'tahum wa aabaaa'ahum hattaa nasooz zikra wa 
	kaanoo qawman booraa
verses.19:
Faqad kazzabookum bimaa taqooloona famaa tastatee'oona sarfanw wa laa 
	nasraa; wa many yazlim minkum nuziqhu 'azaaban kabeeraa
verses.20:
Wa maaa arsalnaa qablaka minal mursaleena illaaa innahum la ya'kuloonat ta'aama wa yamshoona fil aswaaq; wa ja'alnaa ba'dakum liba'din fitnatan 
	atasbiroon; wa kaana Rabbuka Baseera (section 2) (End Juz 18)
verses.21:
Wa qaalal lazeena laa yarjoona liqaaa'anaa law laaa unzila 'alainal 
	malaaa'ikatu awnaraa Rabbanaa; laqadistakbaroo feee anfusihim wa 'ataw 'utuwwan 
	kabeeraa
verses.22:
Yawma yarawnal malaaa 'ikata laa bushraa Yawmaizin lil mujrimeena wa 
	yaqooloona hijran mahjooraa
verses.23: Wa qadimnaaa ilaa maa 'amiloo min 'amalin faja'alnaahuhabaaa'an manthooraa
verses.24: As haabul jannati yawma'izin khairun mustaqar ranw wa ahsanu maqeela
verses.25:
Wa Yawma tashaqqaqus samaaa'u bilghamaami wa nuzzilal malaaa'ikatu 
	tanzeela
verses.26:
Almulku Yawma'izinil haqqu lir Rahmaan; wa kaana Yawman'alal kaafireena 
	'aseeraa
verses.27:
Wa Yawma ya'adduz zaalimu 'alaa yadaihi yaqoolu yaa laitanit takhaztu 
	ma'ar Rasooli sabeelaa
verses.28: Yaa wailataa laitanee lam attakhiz fulaanan khaleelaa
verses.29:
Laqad adallanee 'aniz zikri ba'da iz jaaa'anee; wa kaanash Shaitaanu lil 
	insaani khazoolaa
verses.30:
Wa qaalar Rasoolu yaa Rabbi inna qawmit takhazoo haazal Qur'aana 
	mahjooraa
verses.31:
Wa kazaalika ja'alnaa likulli Nabiyyin 'aduwwan minal mujrimeen; wa 
	kafaa bi Rabbika haadiyanw wa naseeraa
verses.32:
Wa qaalal lazeena kafaroo law laa nuzzila 'alaihil Qur'aanu jumlatanw 
	waahidah; kazaalika linusabbita bihee fu'aadaka wa rattalnaahu tarteelaa
verses.33: Wa laa ya'toonaka bi masalin illaa ji'naaka bilhaqqi wa ahsana tafseeraa
verses.34:
Allazeena yuhsharoona 'alaa wujoohihim ilaa jahannama ulaaa'ika sharrun 
	makaananw wa adallu sabeelaa (section 3)
verses.35:
Wa laqad aatainaa Moosal Kitaaba wa ja'alnaa ma'ahooo akhaahu Haaroona 
	wazeeraa
verses.36:
Faqulnaz habaaa ilal qawmil lazeena kazzaboo bi Aayaatinaa 
	fadammarnaahum tadmeeraa
verses.37:
Wa qawma Noohin lammaa kazzabur Rusula aghraqnaahum wa ja'alnaahum 
	linnaasi Aayatanw wa a'tadnaa lizzaalimeena 'azaaban aleemaa
verses.38: Wa 'Aadanw wa Samooda wa As haabar Rassi wa quroonan baina zaalika katheeraa
verses.39: Wa kullan darabnaa lahul amsaala wa kullan tabbarnaa tatbeera
verses.40:
Wa laqad ataw 'alal qaryatil lateee umtirat mataras saw'; afalam 
	yakoonoo yarawnahaa; bal kaanoo laa yarjoona nushooraa
verses.41:
Wa izaa ra awka iny yattakhizoonaka illaa huzuwan ahaazal lazee ba'asal 
	laahu Rasoolaa
verses.42:
In kaada la yudillunaa 'an aalihatinaa law laaa an sabarnaa 'alaihaa; wa 
	sawfa ya'lamoona heena yarawnal 'azaaba man adallu sabeela
verses.43:
Ara'aita manit takhaza ilaahahoo hawaahu afa anta takoonu 'alaihi 
	wakeelaa
verses.44:
Am tahsabu anna aksarahum yasma'oona aw ya'qiloon; in hum illaa kal 
	an'aami bal hum adallu sabeelaa (section 4)
verses.45:
Alam tara ilaa Rabbika kaifa maddaz zilla wa law shaaa'a la ja'alahoo 
	saakinan thumma ja'alnash shamsa 'alaihi daleelaa
verses.46: Thumma qabadnaahu ilainaa qabdany yaseeraa
verses.47:
Wa Huwal lazee ja'ala lakumul laila libaasanw wannawma subaatanw wa 
	ja'alan nahaara nushooraa
verses.48:
Wa Huwal lazeee arsalar riyaaha bushran baina yadai rahmatih; wa 
	anzalnaa minas samaaa'i maaa'an tahooraa
verses.49: Linuhyiya bihee baldatan maitanw-wa nusqiyahoo mimmaa khalaqnaaa an'aamanw wa anaasiyya katheeraa
verses.50:
Wa laqad sarrafnaahu bainahum li yazzakkaroo fa abaaa aksarun naasi 
	illaa kufooraa
verses.51: Wa law shi'naa laba'asnaa fee kulli qaryatin nazeeraa
verses.52: Falaa tuti'il kaafireena wa jaahidhum bihee jihaadan kabeeraa
verses.53:
Wa Huwal lazee marajal bahraini haazaa 'azbun furaatunw wa haazaa milhun 
	ujaaj; wa ja'ala bainahumaa barzakhanw wa hijran mahjooraa
verses.54:
Wa Huwal lazee khalaqa minal maaa'i basharan fa ja'alahoo nasaban wa 
	sihraa; wa kaana Rabbuka Qadeeraa
verses.55:
Wa ya'budoona min doonil laahi maa laa yanfa'uhum wa laa yadurruhum; wa 
	kaanal kaafiru 'alaa Rabbihee zaheeraa
verses.56: Wa maa arsalnaaka illaa mubashshiranw wa nazeeraa
verses.57:
Qul maaa as'alukum 'alaihi min ajrin illaa man shaaa'a ai yattakhiza 
	ilaa Rabbihee sabeelaa
verses.58:
Wa tawakkal 'alal Haiyil lazee laa yamootu wa sabbih bihamdih; wa kafaa 
	bihee bizunoobi 'ibaadihee khabeeraa
verses.59:
Allazee khalaqas samaawaati wal arda wa maa bainahumaa fee sittati 
	aiyaamin thumma stawaa 'alal 'Arsh; ar Rahmaanu fas'al bihee khabeeraa
verses.60:
Wa izaa qeela lahumus judoo lir Rahmaani qaaloo wa mar Rahmaanu 'a nasjudu 
	limaa ta'murunaa wa zaadahum nufooraa (section 5) (make sajda)
verses.61:
Tabaarakal lazee ja'ala fis samaaa'i buroojanw wa ja'ala feehaa 
	siraajanw wa qamaran muneeraa
verses.62:
Wa huwal lazee ja'alal laila wannahaara khilfatan liman araada 'any 
	yazzakkara aw araadaa shukooraa
verses.63:
Wa 'ibaadur Rahmaanil lazeena yamshoona 'alal ardi hawnanw wa izaa 
	khaata bahumul jaahiloona qaaloo salaamaa
verses.64: Wallazeena yabeetoona li Rabbihim sujjadanw wa qiyaamaa
verses.65:
Wallazeena yaqooloona Rabbanas rif 'annaa 'azaaba Jahannama inna 'azaabahaa 
	kaana gharaamaa
verses.66: Innahaa saaa'at mustaqarranw wa muqaamaa
verses.67:
Wallazeena izaaa anfaqoo lam yusrifoo wa lam yaqturoo wa kaana baina 
	zaalika qawaamaa
verses.68:
Wallazeena laa yad'oona ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhara wa laa yaqtuloonan 
	nafsal latee harramal laahu illaa bilhaqqi wa laa yaznoon; wa mai yaf'al 
	zaalika yalqa 'athaamaa
verses.69: Yudaa'af lahul 'azaabu Yawmal Qiyaamati wa yakhlud feehee muhaanaa
verses.70:
Illaa man taaba wa 'aamana wa 'amila 'amalan saalihan fa ulaaa'ika yubad 
	dilul laahu saiyi aatihim hasanaat; wa kaanal laahu Ghafoorar Raheemaa
verses.71: Wa man taaba wa 'amila saalihan fa innahoo yatoobu ilal laahi mataabaa
verses.72:
Wallazeena laa yash hadoonaz zoora wa izaa marroo billaghwi marroo 
	kiraamaa
verses.73:
Wallazeena izaa zukkiroo bi Aayaati Rabbihim lam yakhirroo 'alaihaa 
	summanw wa'umyaanaa
verses.74:
Wallazeena yaqooloona Rabbanaa hab lanaa min azwaajinaa wa zurriyaatinaa 
	qurrata a'yuninw waj 'alnaa lilmuttaqeena Imaamaa
verses.75:
Ulaaa'ika yujzawnal ghurfata bimaa sabaroo wa yulaqqawna feehaa 
	tahiyyatanw wa salaamaa
verses.76: Khaalideena feehaa; hasunat mustaqarranw wa muqaamaa
verses.77:
Qul maa ya'ba'u bikum Rabbee law laa du'aaa'ukum faqad kazzabtum fasawfa 
	yakoonu lizaamaa (section 6)

verses.3: La'allaka baakhi'un nafsaka allaa yakoonoo mu'mineen
verses.4:
In nashaa nunazzil 'alaihim minas samaaa'i Aayatan fazallat a'naaquhum 
	lahaa khaadi'een
verses.5:
Wa maa yaateehim min zikrim minar Rahmaani muhdasin illaa kaanoo 'anhu 
	mu'rideen
verses.6: Faqad kazzaboo fasa yaateehim ambaaa'u maa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon
verses.7: Awa lam yaraw ilal ardi kam ambatnaa feehaa min kulli zawjin kareem
verses.8: Inna fee zaalika la Aayah; wa maa kaana aksaruhum mu'mineen
verses.9: Wa inna Rabbaka la Huwal 'Azeezur Raheem (section 1)
verses.10: Wa iz naadaa Rabbuka Moosaaa ani'-til qawmaz zaalimeen
verses.11: Qawma Fir'awn; alaa yattaqoon
verses.12: Qaala Rabbi inneee akhaafu ai yukazziboon
verses.13: Wa yadeequ sadree wa laa yantaliqu lisaanee fa arsil ilaa Haaroon
verses.14: Wa lahum 'alaiya zambun fa akhaafu ai yaqtuloon
verses.15: Qaala kallaa fazhabaa bi Aayaatinaaa innaa ma'akum mustami'oon
verses.16: Faatiyaa Fir'awna faqoolaaa innaa Rasoolu Rabbil 'aalameen
verses.17: An arsil ma'anaa Baneee Israaa'eel
verses.18:
Qaala alam nurabbika feenaa waleedanw wa labista feenaa min 'umurika 
	sineen
verses.19: Wa fa'alta fa'latakal latee fa'alta wa anta minal kaafireen
verses.20: Qaala fa'altuhaaa izanw wa ana minad daaaleen
verses.21:
Fafarartu minkum lam maa khiftukum fawahaba lee Rabbee hukmanw wa 
	ja'alanee minal mursaleen
verses.22: Wa tilka ni'matun tamun nuhaa 'alaiya an 'abbatta Baneee Israaa'eel
verses.23: Qaala Fir'awnu wa maa Rabbul 'aalameen
verses.24: Qaala Rabbus samaawaati wal ardi wa maa bainahumaa in kuntum mooqineen
verses.25: Qaala liman hawlahooo alaa tastami'oon
verses.26: Qaala Rabbukum wa Rabbu aabaaa'ikumul awwaleen
verses.27: Qaala inna Rasoolakumul lazee ursila ilaikum lamajnoon
verses.28:
Qaala Rabbul mashriqi wal maghribi wa maa baina humaa in kuntum 
	ta'qiloon
verses.29: Qaala la'init takhazta ilaahan ghairee la aj'alannaka minal masjooneen
verses.30: Qaala awalaw ji'tuka bishai'im mubeen
verses.31: Qaala faati biheee in kunta minas saadiqeen
verses.32: Fa alqaa 'asaahu fa izaaa hiya su'baanum mubeen
verses.33: Wa naza'a yadahoo faizaa hiya baidaaa'u linnaa zireen (section 2)
verses.34: Qaala lilmala-i hawlahooo inna haazaa lasaahirun 'aleem
verses.35: Yureedu ai yukhrijakum min ardikum bisihrihee famaazaa taamuroon
verses.36: Qaalooo arjih wa akhaahu wab'as filmadaaa'ini haashireen
verses.37: Yaatooka bikulli sah haarin 'aleem
verses.38: Fa jumi'as saharatu limeeqaati Yawmim ma'loom
verses.39: Wa qeela linnaasi hal antum mujtami'oon
verses.40: La'allanaa nattabi'us saharata in kaanoo humul ghaalibeen
verses.41:
Falammaa jaaa'as saharatu qaaloo li Fir'awna a'inna lanaa la ajjran in 
	kunnaa nahnul ghaalibeen
verses.42: Qaala na'am wa innakum izal laminal muqarrabeen
verses.43: Qaala lahum Moosaaa alqoo maaa antum mulqoon
verses.44:
Fa alqaw hibaalahum wa 'isiyyahum wa qaaloo bi'izzati Fir'awna innaa 
	lanahnul ghaaliboon
verses.45: Fa alqaa Moosaa 'asaahu fa izaa hiya talqafu maa yaafikoon
verses.46: Fa ulqiyas saharatu saajideen
verses.47: Qaalooo aamannaa bi Rabbil 'aalameen
verses.48: Rabbi Moosaa wa Haaroon
verses.49:
Qaala aamantum lahoo qabla an aazana lakum innahoo lakabeerukumul lazee 
	'alla makumus sihra falasawfa ta'lamoon; la uqatti'anna aidiyakum wa 
	arjulakum min khilaafinw wa la usallibanna kum ajma'een
verses.50: Qaaloo la daira innaaa ilaa Rabbinaa munqalliboon
verses.51:
Innaa natma'u ai yaghfira lanaa Rabbunaa khataa yaanaaa an kunnaaa 
	awwalal mu'mineen (section 3)
verses.52: Wa awhainaaa ilaa Moosaaa an asri bi'ibaadeee innakum muttaba'oon
verses.53: Fa arsala Fir'awnu filmadaaa'ini haashireen
verses.54: Inna haaa'ulaaa'i lashir zimatun qaleeloon
verses.55: Wa innahum lanaa laghaaa'izoon
verses.56: Wa innaa lajamee'un haaziroon
verses.57: Fa akhrajnaahum min Jannaatinw wa 'uyoon
verses.58: Wa kunoozinw wa ma qaamin kareem
verses.59: Kazaalika wa awrasnaahaa Baneee Israaa'eel
verses.60: Fa atba'oohum mushriqeen
verses.61: Falammaa taraaa'al jam'aani qaala as haabu Moosaaa innaa lamudrakoon
verses.62: Qaala kallaaa inna ma'iya Rabbee sa yahdeen
verses.63:
Fa awhainaaa ilaa Moosaaa anidrib bi'asaakal bahra fanfalaqa fakaana 
	kullu firqin kattawdil 'azeem
verses.64: Wa azlafnaa sammal aakhareen
verses.65: Wa anjainaa Moosaa wa mam ma'ahooo ajma'een
verses.66: Summa aghraqnal aakhareen
verses.67: Inna fee zaalika la Aayaah; wa maa kaana aksaru hu mu'mineen
verses.68: Wa inna Rabbaka la Huwal 'Azeezur Raheem (section 4)
verses.69: Watlu 'alaihim naba-a Ibraaheem
verses.70: Iz qaala li abeehi wa qawmihee maa ta'budoon
verses.71: Qaaloo na'budu asnaaman fanazallu lahaa 'aakifeen
verses.72: Qaala hal yasma'oona kum iz tad'oon
verses.73: Aw yanfa'oonakum aw yadurroon
verses.74: Qaaloo bal wajadnaaa aabaaa 'anaa kazaalika yaf'aloon
verses.75: Qaala afara 'aitum maa kuntum ta'budoon
verses.76: Antum wa aabaaa'ukumul aqdamoon
verses.77: Fa innahum 'aduwwwul leee illaa Rabbal 'aalameen
verses.78: Allazee khalaqanee fa Huwa yahdeen
verses.79: Wallazee Huwa yut'imunee wa yasqeen
verses.80: Wa izaa maridtu fahuwa yashfeen
verses.81: Wallazee yumeetunee summa yuhyeen
verses.82: Wallazeee atma'u ai yaghfira lee khateee' atee Yawmad Deen
verses.83: Rabbi hab lee hukmanw wa alhiqnee bis saaliheen
verses.84: Waj'al lee lisaana sidqin fil aakhireen
verses.85: Waj'alnee minw warasati Jannnatin Na'eem
verses.86: Waghfir li abeee innahoo kaana mind daalleen
verses.87: Wa laa tukhzinee Yawma yub'asoon
verses.88: Yawma laa yanfa'u maalunw wa laa banoon
verses.89: Illaa man atal laaha biqalbin saleem
verses.90: Wa uzlifatil Jannatu lilmuttaqeen
verses.91: Wa burrizatil Jaheemu lilghaaween
verses.92: Wa qeela lahum aina maa kuntum ta'budoon
verses.93: Min doonil laahi hal yansuroonakum aw yantasiroon
verses.94: Fakubkiboo feehaa hum walghaawoon
verses.95: Wa junoodu Ibleesa ajma'oon
verses.96: Qaaloo wa hum feehaa yakkhtasimoon
verses.97: Tallaahi in kunnaa lafee dalaalim mubeen
verses.98: Iz nusawweekum bi Rabbil 'aalameen
verses.102: Falaw anna lanaa karratan fanakoona minal mu'mineen
verses.103: Inna fee zaalika la Aayatanw wa maa kaana aksaruhum mu'mineen
verses.104: Wa inna Rabbaka la Huwal 'Azeezur Raheem (section 5)
verses.106: Iz qaala lahum akhoohum Noohun alaa tattaqoon
verses.109: Wa maaa as'alukum 'alaihi min ajrin in ajriya illaa 'alaa Rabbil 'aalameen
verses.112: Qaala wa maa 'ilmee bimaa kaanoo ya'maloon
verses.113: In hisaabuhum illaa 'alaa Rabbee law tash'uroon
verses.116: Qaaloo la'il lam tantahi yaa Noohu latakoonanna minal marjoomeen
verses.118:
Faftab bainee wa bai nahum fat hanw wa najjinee wa mam ma'iya minal 
	mu'mineen
verses.119: Fa anjainaahu wa mamma'ahoo fil fulkil mashhoon
verses.121: Inna fee zaalika la Aayaah; wa maa kaana aksaruhum mu'mineen
verses.122: Wa inna Rabbaka la huwal 'Azeezur Raheem (section 6)
verses.124: Iz qaala lahum akhoohum Hoodun alaa tattaqoon
verses.127: Wa maa as'alukum 'alaihi min ajrin in ajriya illaa 'alaa Rabbil 'aalameen
verses.132: Wattaqul lazeee amad dakum bimaa ta'lamoon
verses.133: Amaddakum bi an'aa minw wa baneen
verses.136: Qaaloo sawaaa'un 'alainaaa awa 'azta am lam takum minal waa'izeen
verses.139:
Fakazzaboohu fa ahlaknaahum; inna fee zaalika la aayah; wa maa kaana 
	aksaruhum mu'mineen
verses.140: Wa inna Rabbaka la huwal 'Azeezur Raheem (section 7)
verses.142: Iz qaala lahum akhoohum Saalihun alaa tattaqoon
verses.145: Wa maaa as'alukum 'alaihi  min ajrin in ajriya illaa 'alaa Rabbil 'aalameen
verses.148: Wa zuroo inw wa nakhlin tal 'uhaa hadeem
verses.149: Wa tanhitoona minal jibaali buyootan faariheen
verses.152: Allazeena yufsidoona fil ardi wa laa yuslihoon
verses.154:
Maaa anta illaa basharum mislunaa faati bi Aayatin in kunta minas 
	saadiqeen
verses.155: Qaala haazihee naaqatul lahaa shirbunw walakum shirbu yawmim ma'loom
verses.156: Wa laa tamassoohaa bisooo'in fa yaakhuzakum 'azaabu Yawmin 'Azeem
verses.158:
Fa akhazahumul 'azaab; inna fee zaalika la Aayah; wa maa kaana aksaruhum 
	mu'mineen
verses.159: Wa inna Rabbaka la Huwal 'Azeezur Raheem (section 8)
verses.161: Iz qaala lahum akhoohum Lootun alaa tattaqoon
verses.164: Wa maaa as'alukum 'alaihi min ajrin in ajriya illaa 'alaa Rabbil 'aalameen
verses.166:
Wa tazaroona maa khalaqa lakum Rabbukum min azwaajikum; bal antum qawmun 
	'aadoon
verses.167: Qaloo la'il lam tantahi yaa Lootu latakoonanna minal mukhrajeen
verses.169: Rabbi najjjinee wa ahlee mimmmaa ya'maloon
verses.173: Wa amtarnaa 'alaihim mataran fasaaa'a matarul munzareen
verses.174: Inna fee zaalika la Aayah; wa maa kaana aksaruhum mu'mineen
verses.175: Wa inna Rabbaka la Huwal 'Azeezur Raheem (section 9)
verses.177: Iz qaala lahum Shu'aybun alaa tattaqoon
verses.180: Wa maaa as'alukum 'alaihi min ajrin in ajriya illaa 'alaa Rabbil 'aalameen
verses.181: Awful kaila wa laa takoonoo minal mukhsireen
verses.183: Wa laa tabkhasun naasa ashyaaa 'ahum wa laa ta'saw fil ardi mufsideen
verses.186: Wa maaa anta illaa basharum mislunaa wa innazunnuka laminal kaazibeen
verses.187: Fa asqit 'alainaa kisafam minas samaaa'i in kunta minas saadiqeen
verses.189:
Fakazzaboohu fa akhazahum 'azaabu Yawmiz zullah; innahoo kaana 'azaaba 
	Yawmin 'Azeem
verses.190: Inna fee zaalika la Aayah; wa maa kaana aksaruhum mu'mineen
verses.191: Wa inna Rabbaka la huwal 'Azeezur Raheem (section 10)
verses.197: Awalam yakul lahum Aayatan ai ya'lamahoo 'ulamaaa'u Baneee Israaa'eel
verses.199: Faqara ahoo 'alaihim maa kaanoo bihee mu'mineen
verses.201: Laa yu'minoona bihee hattaa yarawul 'azaabal aleem
verses.202: Fayaatiyahum baghtatanw wa hum laa yash'uroon
verses.208: Wa maaa ahlaknaa min qaryatin illaa lahaa munziroon
verses.211: Wa maa yambaghee lahum wa maa yastatee'oon
verses.213: Falaa tad'u ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhara fatakoona minal mu'azzabeen
verses.215: Wakhfid janaahaka limanit taba 'aka minal mu'mineen
verses.216: Fa in asawka faqul innee bareee'um mimmmaa ta'maloon
verses.225: Alam tara annahum fee kulli waadiny yaheemoon
verses.226: Wa annahum yaqooloona ma laa yaf'aloon
verses.227:
Illal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati wa zakarul laaha kaseeranw 
	wantasaroo min ba'di maa zulimoo; wa saya'lamul lazeena zalamooo aiya 
	munqalabiny yanqaliboon (section 11)

verses.1: Taa-Seeen; tilka Aayaatul Qur-aani wa Kitaabim Mubeen
verses.3:
Allazeena yuqeemoonas Salaata wa yu'toonaz Zakaata wa hum bil Aakhirati 
	hum yooqinoon
verses.4:
Innal lazeena laa yu'minoona bil Aakhirati zaiyannaa lahum a'maalahum 
	fahum ya'mahoon
verses.5:
Ulaaa'ikal lazeena lahum sooo'ul 'azaabi wa hum fil Aakhirati humul 
	akhsaroon
verses.6: Wa innaka latulaqqal Qur-aana mil ladun Hakeemin 'Aleem
verses.7:
Iz qaala Moosaa li ahliheee inneee aanastu naaran sa'aateekum minhaa 
	bikhabarin aw aateekum bishihaabin qabasil la'allakum tastaloon
verses.8:
Falammaa jaaa'ahaa noodiya am boorika man finnnnaari wa man hawlahaa wa 
	Subhaanal laahi Rabbil 'aalameen
verses.9: Yaa Moosaaa innahooo Anal laahul 'Azeezul Hakeem
verses.10:
Wa alqi 'asaak; falammmaa ra aahaa tahtazzu ka annahaa jaaannunw wallaa 
	mudbiranw wa lam yu'aqqib; yaa Moosaa laa takhaf innee laa yakhaafu ladaiyal 
	mursaloon
verses.11:
Illaa man zalama summa baddala husnam ba'da sooo'in fa innee Ghafoorur 
	Raheem
verses.12:
Wa adkhil yadaka fee jaibika takhruj baidaaa'a min ghairisooo'in 
	feetis'i Aayaatin ilaa Fir'awna wa qawmih; innahum kaanoo qawman faasiqeen
verses.13: Falammaa jaaa'at hum Aayaatunaa mubsiratan qaaloo haazaa sihrum mubeen
verses.14:
Wa jahadoo bihaa wastaiqanat haaa anfusuhum zulmanw-wa 'uluwwaa; fanzur 
	kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul mufsideen (section 1)
verses.15:
Wa laqad aatainaa Daawooda wa sulaimaana 'ilmaa; wa qaalal hamdu lil 
	laahil lazee faddalanaa 'alaa kaseerim min 'ibaadihil mu'mineen
verses.16:
Wa warisa Sulaimaanu Daawooda wa qaala yaaa aiyuhan naasu 'ullimnaa 
	mantiqat tairi wa ooteenaa min kulli shai'in inna haazaa lahuwal fadlul 
	mubeen
verses.17:
Wa hushira li Sulaimaana junooduhoo minal jinni wal insi wattairi fahum 
	yooza'oon
verses.18:
hattaaa izaaa ataw 'alaa waadin namli qaalat namlatuny yaaa aiyuhan 
	namlud khuloo masaakinakum laa yahtimannakum Sulaimaanu wa junooduhoo wa hum 
	laa yash'uroon
verses.19:
Fatabassama daahikam min qawlihaa wa qaala Rabbi awzi'nee an ashkura 
	ni'mata kal lateee an'amta 'alaiya wa 'alaa waalidaiya wa an a'mala saalihan 
	tardaahu wa adkhilnee birahmatika fee 'ibaadikas saaliheen
verses.20:
Wa tafaqqadat taira faqaala maa liya laaa araa al hudhuda, am kaana minal 
	ghaaa'ibeen
verses.21:
La-u'azzibanahoo 'azaaban shadeedan aw la azbahannahoo aw layaatiyannee 
	bisultaanim mubeen
verses.22:
Famakasa ghaira ba'eedin faqaala ahattu bimaa lam tuhit bihee wa ji'tuka 
	min Sabaim binaba iny-yaqeen
verses.23:
Innee wajattum ra atan tamlikuhum wa ootiyat min kulli shai'inw wa lahaa 
	'arshun 'azeem
verses.24:
Wajattuhaa wa qawmahaa yasjudoona lishshamsi min doonil laahi wa zaiyana 
	lahumush Shaitaanu a'maalahum fasaddahum 'anis sabeeli fahum laa yahtadoon
verses.25:
Allaa yasjudoo lillaahil lazee yukhrijul khab'a fis samaawaati wal ardi 
	wa ya'lamu maa tukhfoona wa maa tu'linoon
verses.26: Allaahu laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa Rabbul 'Arshil Azeem (make sajda)
verses.27: Qaala sananzuru asadaqta am kunta minal kaazibeen
verses.28:
Izhab bikitaabee haaza fa alqih ilaihim summma tawalla 'anhum fanzur 
	maazaa yarji'oon
verses.29: Qaalat yaaa aiyuhal mala'u innee ulqiya ilaiya kitaabun kareem
verses.30: Innahoo min Sulaimaana wa innahoo bismil laahir Rahmaanir Raheem
verses.31: Allaa ta'loo 'alaiya waa toonee muslimeen (section 2)
verses.32:
Qaalat yaaa aiyuhal mala'u aftoonee fee amree maa kuntu qaati'atan amran 
	hattaa tashhhadoon
verses.33:
Qaaloo nahnu uloo quwwatinw wa uloo baasin shadeed; wal amru ilaiki 
	fanzuree maazaa taamureen
verses.34:
Qaalat innal mulooka izaa dakhaloo qaryatan afsadoohaa wa ja'alooo 
	a'izzata ahlihaaa azillah; wa kazaalika yaf'aloon
verses.35:
Wa innee mursilatun ilaihim bihadiyyatin fanaaziratum bima yarji'ul 
	mursaloon
verses.36:
Falammaa jaaa'a Sulaimaana qaala atumiddoonani bimaalin famaaa 
	aataaniyal laahu khairum mimmmaaa aataakum bal antum bihadiy-yatikum 
	tafrahoon
verses.37:
Irji' ilaihim falanaatiyan nahum bijunoodil laa qibala lahum bihaa wa 
	lanukhri jannahum minhaaa azillatanw wa hum saaghiroon
verses.38:
Qaala yaaa aiyuhal mala'u aiyukum yaateenee bi'arshihaa qabla ai 
	yaatoonee muslimeen
verses.39:
Qaala 'ifreetum minal jinni ana aateeka bihee qabla an taqooma mim 
	maqaamika wa innee 'alaihi laqawiyyun ameen
verses.40:
Qaalal lazee indahoo 'ilmum minal Kitaabi ana aateeka bihee qabla ai 
	yartadda ilaika tarfuk; falammaa ra aahu mustaqirran 'indahoo qaala haazaa 
	min fadli Rabbee li yabluwaneee 'a-ashkuru am akfuru wa man shakara fa 
	innamaa yashkuru linafsihee wa man kafara fa inna Rabbee Ghaniyyun Kareem
verses.41:
Qaala nakkiroo lahaa 'arshahaa nanzur atahtadeee am takoonu minal 
	lazeena laa yahtadoon
verses.42:
Falammaa jaaa'at qeela ahaakaza 'arshuki qaalat ka'annahoo hoo; wa ooteenal 
	'ilma min qablihaa wa kunnaa muslimeen
verses.43:
Wa saddahaa maa kaanat ta'budu min doonil laahi innahaa kaanat min 
	qawmin kaafireen
verses.44:
Qeela lahad khulis sarha falammaa ra at hu hasibat hu lujjatanw wa 
	kashafat 'an saaqaihaa; qaala innahoo sarhum mumarradum min qawaareer; 
	qaalat Rabbi innee zalamtu nafsee wa aslamtu ma'a Sulaimaana lillaahi Rabbil 
	'aalameen (section 3)
verses.45:
Wa laqad arsalnaaa ilaa Samooda akhaahum Saalihan ani'budul laaha fa izaa 
	hum fareeqaani yakhtasimoon
verses.46:
Qaala yaa qawmi lima tasta'jiloona bissaiyi'ati qablal hasanati law laa 
	tas taghfiroonal laaha la'allakum turhamoon
verses.47:
Qaalut taiyarnaa bika wa bimam ma'ak; qaala taaa'irukum 'indal laahi bal 
	antum qawmun tuftanoon
verses.48:
Wa kaana fil madeenati tis'atu rahtiny yufsidoona fil ardi wa laa 
	yuslihoon
verses.49:
Qaaloo taqaasamoo billaahi lanubaiyitannahoo wa ahlahoo summaa 
	lanaqoolana liwaliy yihee maa shahidnaa mahlika ahlihee wa innaa lasaadiqoon
verses.50: Wa makaroo makranw wa makarnaa makranw wa hum laa yash'uroon
verses.51:
Fanzur kaifa kaana 'aaqibatu makrihim annaa dammar naahum wa qawmahum 
	ajma'een
verses.52:
Fatilka buyootuhum khaa wiyatam bimaa zalamoo; inna fee zaalika la 
	Aayatal liqaw miny-ya'lamoon
verses.53: Wa anjainal lazeena aamanoo wa kaanoo yattaqoon
verses.54: Wa lootan iz qaala liqawmiheee ataatoonal faa hishata wa antum tubsiroon
verses.55:
A'innakum lataatoonar rijaala shahwatam min doonin nisaaa'; bal antum 
	qawmun tajhaloon (End Juz 19)
verses.56:
Famaa kaana jawaaba qawmiheee illaaa an qaalooo akhrijooo aalaa Lootim 
	min qaryatikum innahum unaasuny yatatahharoon
verses.57: Fa anjainaahu wa ahlahooo illam ra atahoo qaddarnaahaa minal ghaabireen
verses.58: Wa amtarnaa 'alaihimm mataran fasaaa'a matarul munzareen (section 4)
verses.59:
Qulil hamdu lillaahi wa salaamun 'alaa 'ibaadihil lazeenas tafaa; 
	aaallaahu khairun ammmaa yushrikoon
verses.60:
Amman khalaqas samaawaati wal arda wa anzala lakum minas samaaa'i 
	maaa'an fa anbatnaa bihee hadaaa'iqa zaata bahjah; maa kaana lakum an 
	tunbitoo shajarahaa; 'a-ilaahun ma'al laah; bal hum qawmuny ya'diloon
verses.61:
Ammann ja'alal arda qaraaranw wa ja'ala khilaalahaaa anhaaranw wa ja'ala 
	lahaa rawaasiya wa ja'ala bainal bahraini haajizaa; 'a-ilaahun ma'allah; bal 
	aksaruhum laa ya'lamoon
verses.62:
Ammany-yujeebul mud tarra izaa da'aahu wa yakshifus sooo'a wa yaj'alukum 
	khula faaa'al ardi 'a-ilaahun ma'allah qaleelan maa tazak karoon
verses.63:
Ammany-yahdeekum fee zulumaatil barri wal bahri wa many yursilu riyaaha 
	bushran baina yadai rahmatih; 'a-ilaahun ma'allah; Ta'aalal laahu 'ammaa 
	yushrikoon
verses.64:
Ammany yabda'ul khalqa thumma yu'eeduhoo wa many-yarzuqukum minas 
	sammaaa'i wal ard; 'a-ilaahun ma'allah; qul haatoo burhaanakum in kuntum 
	saadiqeen
verses.65:
Qul laa ya'lamu man fis sammaawaati wal ardil ghaiba illal laah; wa maa 
	yash'uroona aiyaana yub'asoon
verses.66:
Balid daaraka 'ilmuhum fil Aakhirah; bal hum fee shakkin minhaa bal hum 
	minhaa 'amoon (section 5)
verses.67:
Wa qaalal lazeena kafarooo 'a-izaa kunnaa turaabanw wa aabaaa'unaaa 
	a'innaa lamukhrajoon
verses.68:
Laqad wu'idnaa haazaa nahnu wa aabaaa'unaa min qablu in haazaaa illaaa 
	asaateerul awwaleen
verses.69: Qul seeroo fil ardi fanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul mujrimeen
verses.70: Wa laa tahzan 'alaihim wa laa takun fee daiqin mimmaa yamkuroon
verses.71: Wa yaqooloona mataa haazal wa'du in kuntum saadiqeen
verses.72: Qul 'asaaa any-yakoona radifa lakum ba'dul lazee tasta'jiloon
verses.73:
Wa inna Rabbaka lazoo fadlin 'alan naasi wa laakinna aksarahum laa 
	yashkuroon
verses.74: Wa inna Rabbaka la ya'lamu maa tukinnu sudooruhum wa maa yu'linoon
verses.75: Wa maa min ghaaa'ibatin fis samaaa'i wal ardi illaa fee kitaabin mubeen
verses.76:
Inna haazal Qur-aana yaqussu 'alaa Baneee israaa'eela aksaral lazee hum 
	feehi yakhtalifoon
verses.77: Wa innahoo lahudanw wa rahmatul lilmu'mineen
verses.78: Inna Rabbaka yaqdee bainahum bihukmih; wa Huwal 'Azeezul 'Aleem
verses.79: Fatawakkal 'alal laahi innaka 'alal haqqil mubeen
verses.80:
Innaka laa tusmi'ul mawtaa wa laa tusmi'us summad du'aaa izaa wallaw 
	mudbireen
verses.81:
Wa maaa anta bihaadil 'umyi 'an dalaalatihim in tusmi'u illaa mai 
	yu'minu bi aayaatinaa fahum muslimoon
verses.82:
Wa izaa waqa'al qawlu 'alaihim akhrajnaa lahum daaabbatan minal ardi 
	tukal limuhum annan naasa kaanoo bi aayaatinaa laa yooqinoon (section 6)
verses.83:
Wa Yawma nahshuru min kulli ummatin fawjan mimmany yukazzibu bi 
	Aayaatinaa fahum yooza'oon
verses.84:
Hattaaa izaa jaaa'oo qaala akazzabtum bi Aayaatee wa lam tuheetoo bihaa 
	'ilman ammaazaa kuntum ta'maloon
verses.85: Wa waqa'al qawlu 'alaihim bimaa zalamoo fahum laa yantiqoon
verses.86:
Alam yaraw annaa ja'alnal laila li yaskunoo feehi wannahaara mubsiraa; 
	inna fee zaalika la Aayaatil liqaw miny-yu'minoon
verses.87:
Wa Yawma yunfakhu fis Soori fafazi'a man fis samaawaati wa man fil ardi 
	illaa man shaaa'al laah; wa kullun atawhu daakhireen
verses.88:
Wa taral jibaala tahsabuhaa jaamidatanw wa hiya tamurru marras sahaab; 
	sun'al laahil lazeee atqana kulla shai'; innahoo khabeerun bimaa taf'aloon
verses.89:
Man jaaa'a bil hasanati falahoo khairun minhaa wa hum min faza'iny 
	Yawma'izin aaminoon
verses.90:
Wa man jaaa'a bissai yi'ati fakubbat wujoohuhum fin Naari hal tujzawna 
	illaa maa kuntum ta'maloon
verses.91:
Innamaaa umirtu an a'buda Rabba haazihil baldatil lazee harramahaa wa 
	lahoo kullu shai'inw wa umirtu an akoona minal muslimeen
verses.92:
Wa an atluwal Qur-aana famanih tadaa fa innamaa yahtadee linafsihee wa 
	man dalla faqul innamaaa ana minal munzireen
verses.93:
Wa qulil hamdu lillaahi sa yureekum Aayaatihee fa ta'rifoonahaa; wa maa 
	Rabbuka bighaafilin 'ammaa ta'maloon (section 7)

verses.3:
Natloo 'alaika min naba-i Moosaa wa Fir'awna bilhaqqi liqawminy 
	yu'miinoon
verses.4:
Inna Fir'awna 'alaa fil ardi wa ja'ala ahlahaa shiya'ai yastad'ifu 
	taaa'ifatam minhum yuzabbihu abnaaa'ahum wa yastahyee nisaaa'ahum; innahoo 
	kaana minal mufsideen
verses.5:
Wa nureedu an namunna 'alal lazeenas tud'ifoo fil ardi wa naj'alahum 
	a'immatanw wa naj'alahumul waariseen
verses.6:
Wa numakkina lahum fil ardi wa nuriya Fir'awna wa Haamaana wa 
	junoodahumaa minhum maa kaanoo yahzaroon
verses.7:
Wa awhainaaa ilaaa ummi Moosaaa an ardi'eehi faizaa khifti 'alaihi fa 
	alqeehi filyammi wa laa takhaafee wa laa tahzaneee innaa raaaddoohu ilaiki 
	wa jaa'iloohu minal mursaleen
verses.8:
Faltaqatahooo Aalu Fir'awna li yakoona lahum 'aduwwanw wa hazanaa; inna 
	Fir'awna wa Haamaana wa junooda humaa kaanoo khaati'een
verses.9:
Wa qaalatim ra atu Fir'awna qurratu 'aynil lee wa lak; laa taqtuloohu 'asaaa 
	aiyanfa'anaa aw nattakhizahoo waladanw wa hum laa yash'uroon
verses.10:
Wa asbaha fu'aadu ummi Moosaa faarighan in kaadat latubdee bihee law 
	laaa arrabatnaa 'alaa qalbihaa litakoona minal mu'mineen
verses.11:
Wa qaalat li ukhtihee qusseehi fabasurat bihee 'an junubinw wahum laa 
	yash'uroon
verses.12:
Wa harramnaa 'alaihil maraadi'a min qablu faqaalat hal adullukum 'alaaa 
	ahli baitiny yakfuloonahoo lakum wa hum lahoo naasihoon
verses.13:
Faradadnaahu ilaa ummihee kai taqarra 'ainuhaa wa laa tahzana wa 
	lita'lama anna wa'dal laahi haqqunw wa laakinna aksarahum laa ya'lamoon 
	(section 1)
verses.14:
Wa lammaa balagha ashuddahoo wastawaaa aatai naahu hukmanw wa 'ilmaa; wa 
	kazaalika najzil muhsineen
verses.15:
Wa dakhalal madeenata 'alaa heene ghaflatim min ahlihaa fawajada feeha 
	raju laini yaqtatilaani haazaa min shee'atihee wa haaza min 'aduwwihee 
	fastaghaasahul lazee min shee'atihee 'alal lazee min 'aduwwihee fawakazahoo 
	Moosaa faqadaa 'alaihi qaala haaza min 'amalish Shaitaani innahoo 'aduwwum 
	mmudillum mubeen
verses.16:
Qaala Rabbi innee zalamtu nafsee faghfir lee faghafaralah; innahoo Huwal 
	Ghafoorur Raheem
verses.17: Qaala Rabbi bimaaa an'amta 'alaiya falan akoona zaheeral lilmujrimeen
verses.18:
Fa asbaha fil madeenati khaaa'ifany yataraqqabu fa izal lazis tansarahoo 
	bil amsi yastasrikhuh; qaala lahoo moosaaa innaka laghawiyyum mubeen
verses.19:
Falammaaa an araada ai yabtisha billazee huwa 'aduwwul lahumaa qaala yaa 
	Moosaaa atureedu an taqtulanee kamaa qatalta nafsam bil amsi in tureedu 
	illaaa an takoona jabbaaram fil ardi wa maa tureedu an takoona minal 
	musliheen
verses.20:
Wa jaaa'a rajulum min aqsal madeenati yas'aa qaala yaa Moosaaa innal 
	mala a yaa tamiroona bika liyaqtulooka fakhruj innee laka minan naasiheen
verses.21:
Fakharaja minhaa khaaa 'ifany-yataraqqab; qaala Rabbi najjinee minal 
	qawmiz zaalimeen (section 2)
verses.22:
Wa lammaa tawajjaha tilqaaa'a Madyana qaala 'asaa Rabbeee ai yahdiyanee 
	Sawaaa'as Sabeel
verses.23:
Wa lammaa warada maaa'a Madyana wajada 'alaihi ummatam minannaasi 
	yasqoona wa wajada min doonihimum ra ataini tazoodaani qaala maa khatbukumaa 
	qaalataa laa nasqee hatta yusdirar ri'aaa'u wa aboonaa shaikhun kabeer
verses.24:
Fasaqaa lahumaa summa tawallaaa ilaz zilli faqaala Rabbi innee limaaa 
	anzalta ilaiya min khairin faqeer
verses.25:
Fajaaa'at hu ihdaahumaa tamshee 'alas tihyaaa'in qaalat inna abee 
	yad'ooka li yajziyaka ajra maa saqaita lanaa; falammaa jaaa'ahoo wa qassa 'alaihil 
	qasasa qaala laa takhaf najawta minal qawmiz zaalimeen
verses.26:
Qaalat ihdaahumaa yaaa abatis taajirhu inna khaira manistaajartal 
	qawiyyul ameen
verses.27:
Qaala innee ureedu an unkihaka ihdab nataiya haataini 'alaaa an 
	taajuranee samaaniya hijaj; fa in atmamta 'ashran famin 'indika wa maaa 
	ureedu an ashuqqa 'alaik; satajiduneee in shaaa'al laahu minas saaliheen
verses.28:
Qaala zaalika bainee wa bainaka aiyamal ajalaini qadaitu falaa 'udwaana 
	'alaiya wallaahu 'alaa ma naqoolu Wakeel (section 3)
verses.29:
Falammmaa qadaa Moosal ajala wa saara bi ahliheee aanasa min jaanibit 
	Toori naaran qaala li ahlihim kusooo inneee aanastu naaral la 'alleee 
	aateekum minhaa bikhabarin aw jazwatim minan naari la 'allakum tastaloon
verses.30:
Falammaaa ataahaa noodiya min shaati'il waadil aimani fil buq'atil 
	muubaarakati minash shajarati ai yaa Moosaaa inneee Anal laahu Rabbul 'aalameen
verses.31:
Wa an alqi 'asaaka falam maa ra aahaa tahtazzu ka annnahaa jaaannunw 
	wallaa mudbiranw wa lam yu'aqqib; yaa Moosaa aqbil wa laa takhaf innaka 
	minal aamineen
verses.32:
Usluk yadaka fee jaibika takhruj baidaaa'a min ghairi sooo'inw wadmum 
	ilaika janaahaka minar rahbi fazaanika burhaanaani mir Rabbika ilaa Fir'awna 
	wa mala'ih; innahum kaanoo qawman faasiqeen
verses.33: Qaala Rabbi innee qataltu minhum nafsan fa akhaafu ai yaqtuloon
verses.34:
Wa akhee Haaroonu huwa afsahu minnee lisaanan fa arsilhu ma'iya rid ai 
	yusaddiquneee innee akhaafu ai yukazziboon
verses.35:
Qaala sanashuddu 'adudaka bi akheeka wa naj'alu lakumaa sultaanan falaa 
	yasiloona ilaikumaa; bi Aayaatinaa antumaa wa manit taba'akumal ghaaliboon
verses.36:
Falammaa jaaa'ahum Moosaa bi Aayaatinaa baiyinaatin qaaloo maa haazaaa 
	illaa sihrum muftaranw wa maa sami'naa bihaazaa feee aabaaa'inal awwaleen
verses.37:
Wa qaala Moosaa Rabbeee a'alamu biman jaaa'a bilhudaa min 'indihee wa 
	man takoonu lahoo 'aaqibatud daari innahoo laa yuflihuz zaalimoon
verses.38:
Wa qaala Fir'awnu yaaa aiyuhal mala-u maa 'alimtu lakum min ilaahin 
	ghairee fa awqid lee yaa Haamaanu 'alatteeni faj'al lee sarhal la'alleee 
	attali'u ilaaa ilaahi Moosaa wa innee la azunnuhoo minal kaazibeen
verses.39:
Wastakbara huwa wa junooduhoo fil ardi bighairil haqqi wa zannooo 
	annahum ilainaa laa yurja'oon
verses.40:
Fa akhaznaahu wa junoo dahoo fanabaznaahum fil yammi fanzur kaifa kaana 
	'aaqibatuz zaalimeen
verses.41:
Wa ja'alnaahum a'immatany yad'oona ilan Naari wa Yawmal Qiyaamati laa 
	yunsaroon
verses.42:
Wa atba'naahum fee haazihid dunyaa la'natanw wa Yawmal Qiyaamati hum 
	minal maqbooheen (section 4)
verses.43:
Wa laqad aatainaa Moosal Kitaaba mim ba'di maaa ahlaknal quroonal oolaa 
	basaaa'ira linnaasi wa hudanw wa rahmatal la'allahum yata zakkkaroon
verses.44:
Wa maa kunta bijaanibil gharbiyyi iz qadainaaa ilaa Moosal amra wa maa 
	kunta minash shaahideen
verses.45:
Wa laakinnaa anshaanaa quroonan fatataawala 'alaihimul 'umur; wa maa 
	kunta saawiyan feee ahli Madyana tatloo 'alaihim Aayaatinaa wa laakinnaa 
	kunnaa mursileen
verses.46:
Wa maa kunta bijaanibit Toori iz naadainaa wa laakir rahmatam mir 
	Rabbika litunzira qawmam maaa ataahum min nazeerim min qablika la'allahum 
	yatazakkaroon
verses.47:
Wa law laaa an tuseebahum museebatum bimaa qaddamat aideehim fa yaqooloo 
	Rabbanaa law laaa arsalta ilainaa Rasoolan fanattabi'a Aayaatika wa nakoona 
	minal mu'mineen
verses.48:
Falammaa jaaa'ahumul haqqu min 'indinaa qaaloo law laa ootiya misla maaa 
	ootiyaa Moosaa; awalam yakfuroo bimaaa ootiya Moosaa min qablu qaaloo 
	sihraani tazaaharaa wa qaalooo innaa bikullin kaafiroon
verses.49:
Qul faatoo bi Kitaabim min 'indil laahi huwa ahdaa minhu maaa attabi'hu 
	in kuntum saadiqeen
verses.50:
Fa il lam yastajeeboo laka fa'lam annamaa yattabi'oona ahwaaa'ahum; wa man adallu mimmanit taba'a hawaahu bighari hudam minal laah; innal laaha 
	laa yahdil qawmaz zaalimeen (section 5)
verses.51: Wa laqad wassalnaa lahumul qawla la'allahum yatazakkaroon
verses.52: Allazeena aatainaahu mul Kitaaba min qablihee hum bihee yu'minoon
verses.53:
Wa izaa yutlaa 'alaihim qaaloo aamannaa biheee innahul haqqu mir 
	rabbinaaa innaa kunnaa min qablihee muslimeen
verses.54:
Ulaaa'ika yu'tawna ajrahum marratayni bimaa sabaroo wa yadra'oona bil 
	hasanatis saiyi'ata wa mimmmaa razaq naahum yunfiqoon
verses.55:
Wa izaa sami'ul laghwa a'radoo 'anhu wa qaaloo lanaaa a'maalunaa wa 
	lakum a'maalukum salaamun 'alaikum laa nabtaghil jaahileen
verses.56: Innaka laa tahdee man ahbabta wa laakinn Allaha yahdee mai yashaaa'; wa huwa a'lamu bil muhtadeen
verses.57:
Wa qaalooo in nattabi'il hudaa ma'aka nutakhattaf min ardinaa; awalam 
	numakkkil lahum haraman aaminany yujbaaa ilaihi samaraatu kulli shai'ir 
	rizqam mil ladunnaa wa laakinna aksarahum laa ya'lamoon
verses.58:
Wa kam ahlaknaa min qaryatim batirat ma'eeshatahaa fatilka masaakinuhum 
	lam tuskam mim ba'dihim illaa qaleelaa; wa kunnaa Nahnul waariseen
verses.59:
Wa maa kaana Rabbuka muhlikal quraa hattaa yab'asa feee ummihaa 
	Rasoolany yatloo 'alaihim aayaatina; wa maa kunnaa muhlikil quraaa illaa wa 
	ahluhaa zaalimoon
verses.60:
Wa maaa ooteetum min shai'in famataa'ul hayaatid dunyaa wa zeenatuhaa; 
	wa maa 'indal laahi khairunw wa abqaa; afalaa ta'qiloon (section 6)
verses.61:
Afamanw wa'adnaahu wa'dan hasanan fahuwa laaqeehi kamam matta'naahu 
	mataa'al hayaatid dunyaa summa huwa Yawmal Qiyaamati minal muhdareen
verses.62:
Wa Yawma yunaadeehim fa-yaqoolu aina shurakaaa 'iyal lazeena kuntum 
	taz'umoon
verses.63:
Qaalal lazeena haqqa 'alaihimul qawlu Rabbanaa haaa'ulaaa'il lazeena 
	aghwainaa aghwainaahu kamaa ghawainaa tabarraanaaa ilaika maa kaanoo 
	iyyaanaa ya'budoon
verses.64:
Wa qeelad 'oo shurakaaa'akum fada'awhum falam yastajeeboo lahum wa ra 
	awul 'azaab; law annahum kaanoo yahtadoon
verses.65: Wa Yawma yunaadeehim fa yaqoolu maazaaa ajabtumul mursaleen
verses.66: Fa'amiyat 'alaihimul ambaaa'u Yawma'izin fahum laa yatasaaa'aloon
verses.67:
Fa ammaa man taaba wa aamana wa 'amila saalihan fa'asaaa ai yakoona 
	minal mufliheen
verses.68:
Wa Rabbuka yakhuluqu maa yashaaa'u wa yakhtaar; maa kaana lahumul 
	khiyarah; Subhannal laahi wa Ta'aalaa 'ammmaa yushrikoon
verses.69: Wa Rabbuka ya'lamu maa tukinnu sudooruhum wa maa yu'linoon
verses.70:
Wa Huwal laahu laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa lahul hamdu fil oolaa wal 
	Aakhirati wa lahul hukmu wa ilaihi turja'oon
verses.71:
Qul ara'aitum in ja'alal laahu 'alaikumul laila sarmadan ilaa Yawmil 
	Qiyaamati man ilaahun ghairul laahi yaa teekum bidiyaaa'in afalaa tasma'oon
verses.72:
Qul ara'aitum in ja'alal laahu 'alaikumun nahaara sarmadan ilaa Yawmil 
	Qiyaamati man ilaahun ghairul laahi yaateekum bilailin taskunoona feehi 
	afalaa tubsiroon
verses.73:
Wa mir rahmatihee ja'ala lakumul laila wannahaara litaskunoo feehi wa 
	litabtaghoo min fadlihee wa la'allakum tashkuroon
verses.74:
Wa Yawma yunaadeehim fa yaqoolu aina shurakaaa'iyal lazeena kuntum 
	tazz'umoon
verses.75:
Wa naza'naa min kulli ummatin shaheedan faqulnaa haatoo burhaanakum 
	fa'alimooo annal haqqa lillaahi wa dalla 'anhum maa kaanoo yaftaroon 
	(section 7)
verses.76:
Inna Qaaroona kaana min qawmi Moosaa fabaghaaa 'alaihim wa aatainaahu 
	minal kunoozi maaa inna mafaati hahoo latanooo'u bil'usbati ulil quwwati iz 
	qaala lahoo qawmuhoo laa tafrah innal laahaa laa yuhibbul fariheen
verses.77:
Wabtaghi feemaaa aataakal laahud Daaral Aakhirata wa laa tansa naseebaka 
	minad dunyaa wa ahsin kamaaa ahsanal laahu ilaika wa laa tabghil fasaada fil 
	ardi innal laaha laa yuhibbul mufsideen
verses.78:
Qaala innamaaa ootee tuhoo 'alaa 'ilmin 'indeee; awalam ya'lam annal 
	laaha qad ahlaka min qablihee minal qurooni man huwa ashaddu minhu quwwatanw 
	wa aksaru jam'aa; wa laa yus'alu 'an zunoobihimul mujrimoon
verses.79:
Fakharaja 'alaa qawmihee fee zeenatih; qaalal lazeena yureedoonal 
	hayaatad dunyaa yaalaita lanaa misla maaa ootiya Qaaroonu innahoo lazoo 
	hazzin 'azeem
verses.80:
Wa qaalal lazeena ootul 'ilma wailakum sawaabul laahi khairul liman 
	aamana wa 'amila saalihaa; wa laa yulaq qaahaaa illas saabiroon
verses.81:
Fakhasafnaa bihee wa bidaarihil arda famaa kaana lahoo min fi'atiny 
	yansuroo nahoo min doonil laahi wa maa kaana minal muntasireen
verses.82:
Wa asbahal lazeena tamannaw makaanahoo bil amsi yaqooloona waika annal 
	laaha yabsutur rizqa limany ya shaaa'u min 'ibaadihee wa yaqdiru law laaa am 
	mannal laahu 'alainaa lakhasafa binaa waika annahoo laa yuflihul kaafiroon 
	(section 8)
verses.83:
Tilkad Daarul Aakhiratu naj'aluhaa lillazeena laa yureedoona 'uluwwan 
	fil ardi wa laa fasaadaa; wal 'aaqibatu lilmuttaqeen
verses.84:
Man jaaa'a bilhasanati falahoo khairum minhaa wa man jaaa'a bissaiyi'ati 
	falaa yujzal lazeena 'amilus saiyiaati illaa maa kaanoo ya'maloon
verses.85: Innal lazee farada 'alaikal Qur-aana laraaadduka ilaa ma'aad; qur Rabbeee a'lamu man jaaa'a bil hudaa wa man huwa fee dalaalim mubeen
verses.86:
Wa maa kunta tarjooo ai yulqaaa ilaikal Kitaabu illaa rahmatan mir 
	Rabbika falaa takoonanna zaheeral lil kaafireen
verses.87:
Wa laa yasuddunnaka 'an Aayaatil laahi ba'da iz unzilat ilaika wad'u 
	ilaa Rabbika wa laa takoonanna minal mushrikeen
verses.88:
Wa laa tad'u ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhar; laaa ilaaha illaa Hoo; kullu 
	shai'in haalikun illaa Wajhah; lahul hukkmu wa ilaihi turja'oon (section 9)

verses.2: Ahasiban naasu any yutrakooo any yaqoolooo aamannaa wa hum la yuftanoon
verses.3:
Wa laqad fatannal lazeena min qablihim fala ya'lamannal laahul lazeena 
	sadaqoo wa la ya'lamannal kaazibeen
verses.4:
Am hasibal lazeena ya'maloonas sayyiaati any yasbiqoonaa; saaa'a maa 
	yahkumoon
verses.5:
Man kaana yarjoo liqaaa 'allaahi fa inna ajalal laahi la'aat; wa Huwass 
	Sameeul 'Aleem
verses.6:
Wa man jaahada fainnamaa yujaahidu linafsih; innal laaha laghaniyyun 'anil 
	'aalameen
verses.7:
Wallazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati lanukaf firanna 'anhum 
	saiyiaatihim wa lanajziyannahum ahsanal lazee kaanoo ya'maloon
verses.8:
Wa wassainal insaana biwaalidaihi husnanw wa in jaahadaaka litushrika 
	bee maa laisa laka bihee 'ilmun falaa tuti'humaa; ilaiya marji'ukum fa 
	unabbi'ukum bimaa kuntum ta'maloon
verses.9: Wallazeena aamanoo wa'amilus saalihaati lanudkhilan nahum fis saaliheen
verses.10:
Wa minan naasi many yaqoolu aamannaa billaahi faizaaa ooziya fil laahi 
	ja'ala fitnatan naasi ka'azaabil laahi wa la'in jaaa'a nasrum mir Rabbika la 
	yaqoolunna innaa kunnaa ma'akum; awa laisal laahu bi a'lama bimaa fee 
	sudooril 'aalameen
verses.11: Wa la ya'lamannal laahul lazeena aamanoo wa la ya'lamannal munaafiqeen
verses.12:
Wa qaalal lazeena kafaroo lillazeena aamanut tabi'oo sabeelanaa 
	walnahmil khataayaakum wa maa hum bihaamileena min khataa yaahum min shai'in 
	innahum lakaaziboon
verses.13:
Wa la yahmilunna asqaa lahum wa asqaalam ma'a asqaalihim wa la 
	yus'alunna Yawmal Qiyaamati 'ammaa kaanoo yaftaroon
(section 1)
verses.14:
Wa laqad arsalnaa Noohan ilaa qawmihee falabisa feehim alfa sanatin 
	illaa khamseena 'aaman fa akhazahumut toofaanu wa hum zaalimoon
verses.15:
Fa anjainaahu wa as haabas safeenati wa ja'alnaahaaa Aayatal 
	lil'aalameen
verses.16:
Wa Ibraheema iz qaala liqawmihi' budul laaha wattaqoohu zaalikum khayrul 
	lakum in kuntum ta'lamoon
verses.17:
Innamaa ta'budoona min doonil laahi awsaananw-wa takhluqoona ifkaa; 
	innal lazeena ta'budoona min doonil laahi laa yamlikoona lakum rizqan 
	fabtaghoo 'indal laahir rizqa wa'budoohu 
	washkuroo lahooo ilaihi turja'oon
verses.18:
Wa in tukazziboo faqad kazzaba umamum min qablikum wa maa'alar Rasooli 
	illal balaaghul mubeen
verses.19:
Awa lam yaraw kaifa yubdi'ul laahul khalqa summa yu'eeduh; inna zaalika 
	'alal laahi yaseer
verses.20:
Qul seeroo fil ardi fanzuroo kaifa bada al khalqa thumm Allahu yunshi''un 
	nash atal Aakhirah; innal laaha 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer
verses.21: Yu'azzibu many yashaaa'u wa yarhamu many yashaaa'; wa ilaihi tuqlaboon
verses.22:
Wa maaa antum bimu'jizeena fil ardi wa laa fissamaaa'i wa maa lakum min 
	doonil laahi minw waliyyinw wa laa naseer 
(section 2)
verses.23:
Wallazeena kafaroo bi Aayaatil laahi wa liqaaa'iheee ulaaa'ika ya'isoo 
	mir rahmatee wa ulaaa'ika lahum 'azaabun aleem
verses.24:
Famaa kaana jawaaba qawmiheee illaaa an qaaluqtuloohu aw harriqoohu 
	fa anjaahul laahu minan naar; inna fee zaalika la Aayaatil li qawminy 
	yu'minoon
verses.25:
Wa qaala innamat takhaz tum min doonil laahi awsaanam mawaddata bainikum 
	fil hayaatid dunyaa summa Yawmal Qiyaamati yakfuru ba'dukum biba'dinw wa 
	yal'anu ba'dukum ba'danw wa ma'waakumun Naaru wa maa lakum min naasireen
verses.26:
Fa aamana lahoo Loot; wa qaala innee muhajirun ilaa Rabbee innahoo 
	Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem
verses.27:
Wa wahabnaa lahoo Ishaaqa wa Ya'Qooba wa ja'alnaa fee zurriyyatihin 
	Nubuwwata wal Kitaaba wa aatainaahu ajrahoo fid dunyaa wa innahoo fil 
	aakhirati laminas saaliheen
verses.28:
Wa Lootan iz qaala liqawmiheee innakum la ta'toonal faahishata maa 
	sabaqakum bihaa min ahadin minal 'aalameen
verses.29:
A'innakum la ta'toonar rijaala wa taqta'oonas sabeela wa ta'toona fee naadeekumul munkara famaa kaana jawaaba qawmiheee illaaa an qaalu' tinaaa 
	bi'azaabil laahi in kunta minas saadiqeen
verses.30:
Qaala Rabbin surnee 'alal qawmil mufsideen 
	(section 3)
verses.31:
Wa lammaa jaaa'at Rusulunaaa Ibraaheema bil bushraa qaalooo innaa 
	muhlikoo ahli haazihil qaryati inna ahlahaa kaanoo zaalimeen
verses.32:
Qaala inna feeha Lootaa; qaaloo nahnu a'lamu biman feehaa 
	lanunajjjiyannahoo wa ahlahooo illam ra atahoo kaanat minal ghaabireen
verses.33:
Wa lammaaa an jaaa'at Rusulunaa Lootan seee'a bihim wa daaqa bihim 
	zar'anw wa qaaloo laa takhaf wa laa tahzan innaa munajjooka wa ahlaka illam 
	ra ataka kaanat minal ghaabireen
verses.34:
Innaa munziloona 'alaaa ahli haazihil qaryati rijzan minas samaaa'i 
	bimaa kaanoo yafsuqoon
verses.35: Wa laqad taraknaa min haaa aayatan baiyinatan liqawminy ya'qiloon
verses.36:
Wa ilaa Madyana akhaahum Shu'ayban faqaala yaa qawmi'-budul laaha warjul 
	yawmal aakhira wa laa ta'saw fil ardi mufsideen
verses.37: Fakazzaboohu fa akhazat humur rajfatu fa asbahoo fee daarihim jaasimeen
verses.38:
Wa 'Aadanw wa Samooda wa qad tabaiyana lakum min masaakinihim wa zaiyana 
	lahumush Shaitaanu a'maalahum fasaddahum 'anis sabeeli wa kaanoo 
	mustabsireen
verses.39:
Wa Qaaroona wa Fir'awna wa haamaana wa laqad jaaa'ahum Moosa 
	bilbaiyinaati fastakbaroo fil ardi wa maa kaanoo saabiqeen
verses.40:
Fakullan akhaznaa bi zanbihee faminhum man arsalnaa 'alaihi haasibaa; wa 
	minhum man akhazat hus saihatu wa minhum man khasafnaa bihil arda wa minhum 
	man aghraqnaa; wa maa kaanal laahu li yazlimahum wa laakin kaanoo anfusahum 
	yazlimoon
verses.41:
Masalul lazeenat takhazoo min doonil laahi awliyaaa'a kamasalil 'ankaboot, 
	ittakhazat baitaa; wa inna awhanal buyooti la baitul 'ankaboot; law kaanoo 
	ya'lamoon
verses.42:
Innal laaha ya'lamu maa yad'oona min doonihee min shai'; wa Huwal 'Azeezul 
	Hakeem
verses.43: Wa tilkal amsaalu nadribuhaa linnaasi wa maa ya'qiluhaaa illal 'aalimoon
verses.44: Khalaqal laahus samaawaati wal arda bilhaqq; inna fee zaalika la aayatan lil mu'mineen (section 4)
verses.45:
Utlu maaa oohiya ilaika minal Kitaabi wa aqimis Salaata innas Salaata 
	tanhaa 'anil fahshaaa'i wal munkar; wa lazikrul laahi akbar; wal laahu 
	ya'lamu maa tasna'oon (End Juz 20)
verses.46:
Wa laa tujaadilooo Ahlal Kitaabi illaa billatee hiya ahsanu illal 
	lazeena zalamoo minhum wa qoolooo aamannaa billazeee unzila ilainaa wa 
	unzila ilaikum wa illaahunna wa ilahukum waahidunw-wa nahnu lahoo muslimoon
verses.47:
Wa kazaalika anzalnaaa ilaikal Kitaab; fallazeena aatainaahumul kitaaba 
	yu'minoona bihee wa min haaa'ulaaa'i many yu'minu bih; wa maa yajhadu 
	bi'Aayaatinaa illal kaafiroon
verses.48:
Wa maa kunta tatloo min qablihee min kitaabinw wa laa takhuttubhoo bi 
	yameenika izal lartaabal mubtiloon
verses.49:
Bal huwa aayaatum baiyinaatun fee sudooril lazeena ootul 'ilm; wa maa 
	yajhadu bi aayaatinaa illaz zaalimoon
verses.50:
Wa qaaloo law laaa unzila 'alaihi aayaatum mir Rabbihee qul innamal 
	aayaatu 'indal laahi wa innamaaa ana nazeerum mubeen
verses.51:
Awa lam yakfihim annaaa anzalnaa 'alaikal kitaaba yutlaa 'alaihim; inna 
	fee zaalika larahmatanw wa zikraa liqawminy yu'minoon 
(section 5)
verses.52:
Qul kafaa billaahi bainee wa bainakum shaheedaa; ya'lamu maa fis 
	samaawaati wal ard; wallazeena aamanoo bil baatili wa kafaroo billaahi 
	ulaaa'ika humul khaasiroon
verses.53:
Wa yasta'jiloonaka bil'azaab; wa law laaa ajalum musammal lajaaa'ahumul 
	a'zaab; wa la ya'tiannahum baghta tanw wa hum laa yash'uroon
verses.54: Yasta'jiloonaka bil'azaab; wa inna Jahannama la muheetatum bil kaafireen
verses.55:
Yawma yaghshaahumul 'azaabu min fawqihim wa min tahti arjulihim wa yaqoolu 
	zooqoo maa kuntum ta'maloon
verses.56:
Yaa 'ibaadiyal lazeena aamanooo inna ardee waasi 'atun fa iyyaaya 
	fa'budoon
verses.57: Kullu nafsin zaaa'iqatul mawti summa ilainaa turja'oon
verses.58:
Wallazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati la nubawwi 'annahum minal 
	Jannati ghurafan tajree min tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena feehaa; ni'ma ajrul 
	'aamileen
verses.59: Allazeena sabaroo wa 'alaa Rabbihim yatawakkaloon
verses.60:
Wa ka ayyim min daaabbatil laa tahmilu rizqahaa; al laahu yarzuquhaa wa 
	iyyaakum; wa Huwas Samee'ul Aleem
verses.61:
Wa la'in sa altahum man khalaqas samaawaati wal arda wa sakhkharash 
	shamsa wal qamara la yaqoolunnal laahu fa anna yu'fakoon
verses.62:
Allaahu yabsutur rizqa limany yashaaa'u min 'ibaadihee wa yaqdiru lah; 
	innal laaha bikulli shai'in Aleem
verses.63:
Wa la'in sa altahum man nazzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa ahyaa bihil 
	arda min ba'di mawtihaa la yaqoolunnal laah; qulil hamdu lillah; bal 
	aksaruhum laa ya'qiloon 
	(section 6)
verses.64:
Wa maa haazihil hayaa tud dunyaaa illaa lahwunw-wa la'ib; wa innad 
	Daaral Aakhirata la hiyal ha yawaan; law kaanu ya'lamoon
verses.65:
Fa-izaa rakiboo fil fulki da'awul laaha mukhliseena lahud deena falammaa 
	najjaa hum ilal barri izaa hum yushrikoon
verses.66: Li yakfuroo bimaaa aatainaahum wa li yatamatta'oo fasaw fa ya'lamoon
verses.67:
Awalam yaraw annaa ja'alnaa haraman aaminanw wa yutakhattafun naasu min 
	haw lihim; afabil baatili yu'minoona wa bini'matil laahi yakfuroon
verses.68:
Wa man azlamu mimma nif taraa 'alal laahi kaziban aw kazzaba bilhaqqi 
	lammaa jaaa'ah; alaisa fee jahannama maswal lil kaafireen
verses.69:
Wallazeena jaahadoo feenaa lanahdiyannahum subulana; wa innal laaha 
	lama'al muhsineen (section 7)

verses.3: Feee adnal ardi wa hummim ba'di ghalabihim sa-yaghliboon
verses.4:
Fee bid'i sineen; lillaahil amru min qablu wa mim ba'd; wa yawma'iziny 
	yafrahul mu'minoon
verses.5: Binasril laa; yansuru mai yashaaa'u wa Huwal 'Azeezur Raheem
verses.6:
Wa'dal laahi laa yukhliful laahu wa'dahoo wa laakin na aksaran naasi laa 
	ya'lamoon
verses.7:
Ya'lamoona zaahiram minal hayaatid dunya wa hum 'anil Aakhirati hum 
	ghaafiloon
verses.8:
Awalam yatafakkaroo feee anfusihim; maa khalaqal laahus samaawaati wal 
	arda wa maa bainahumaaa illaa bil haqqi wa ajalim musammaa; wa inna kaseeram 
	minan naasi biliqaaa'i Rabbihim lakaafiroon
verses.9:
Awalam yaseeroo fil ardi fa-yanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul lazeena min 
	qablihim; kaanooo ashadda minhhum quwwatanw wa asaarul arda wa 'amaroohaaa 
	aksara mimmaa 'amaroohaa wa jaaa'athum Rusuluhum bil baiyinaati famaa kaanal 
	laahu liyazli mahum wa laakin kaanooo anfusahum yazlimoon
verses.10:
Summa kaana'aaqibatal lazeena asaaa'us sooo aaa an kazzaboo bi aayaatil 
	laahi wa kaanoo bihaa yastahzi'oon 
	(section 1)
verses.11: Allaahu yabda'ul khalqa summa yu'eeduhoo summa ilaihi turja'oon
verses.12: Wa yawma taqoomus Saa'atu yublisul mujrimoon
verses.13:
Wa lam yakul lahum min shurakaaa'ihim shufa'aaa'u wa kaanoo 
	bishurakaaa'ihim kaafireen
verses.14: Wa Yawma taqoomus Saa'atu Yawma'iziny yatafarraqoon
verses.15:
Fa ammal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati fahum fee rawdatiny 
	yuhbaroon
verses.16:
Wa ammal lazeena kafaroo wa kazzaboo bi-Aayaatinaa wa liqaaa'il 
	Aakhirati faulaaa'ika fil'azaabi muhdaroon
verses.17: Fa Subhaanal laahi heena tumsoona wa heena tusbihoon
verses.18: Wa lahul hamdu fis samaawaati wal ardi wa 'ashiyyanw wa heena tuzhiroon
verses.19:
Yukhrijul haiya minal maiyiti wa yukhrijul maiyita minal haiyi wa yuhyil 
	arda ba'da mawtihaa; wa kazaalika tukhrajoon 
 (section 2)
verses.20:
Wa min Aayaatiheee an khalaqakum min turaabin summa izaaa antum basharun 
	tantashiroon
verses.21:
Wa min Aayaatiheee an khalaqa lakum min anfusikum azwaajal litaskunooo 
	ilaihaa wa ja'ala bainakum mawad datanw wa rahmah; inna fee zaalika la 
	Aayaatil liqawminy yatafakkaroon
verses.22:
Wa min Aayaatihee khalqus samaawaati wal aardi wakhtilaafu alsinatikum 
	wa alwaanikum; inna fee zaalika la Aayaatil lil'aalimeen
verses.23:
Wa min Aayaatihee manaamukum bil laili wannahaari wabtighaaa'ukum min 
	fadlih; inna fee zaalika la Aayaatil liqawminy yasma'oon
verses.24:
Wa min Aayaatihee yureekumul barqa khawfanw wa tama'anw wa yunazzilu 
	minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa yuhyee bihil arda ba'da mawtihaaa inna fee zaalika 
	la Aayaatil liqawminy ya'qiloon
verses.25:
Wa min Aayaatihee an taqoomas samaaa'u wal ardu bi-amrih; summa izaa 
	da'aakum da'watam minal ardi izaaa antum takhrujoon
verses.26: Wa lahoo man fissamaawaati wal ardi kullul lahoo qaanitoon
verses.27:
Wa Huwal lazee yabda'ul khalqa summa yu'eeduhoo wa huwa ahwanu 'alaih; wa lahul masalul a'laa fissamaawaati wal-ard; wa Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem 
 (section 3)
verses.28:
Daraba lakum masalam min anfusikum hal lakum mimmaa malakat aymaanukum 
	min shurakaaa'a fee maa razaqnaakum fa antum feehi sawaaa'un takhaafoonahum 
	kakheefa tikum anfusakum; kazaalika nufassilul Aayaati liqawminy ya'qiloon
verses.29:
Balit taba'al lazeena zalamooo ahwaaa'ahum bighairi 'ilmin famai yahdee 
	man adallal laahu wa maa lahum min naasireen
verses.31:
Muneebeena ilaihi wattaqoohu wa aqeemus Salaata wa laa takoonoo minal 
	mushrikeen
verses.32:
Minal lazeena farraqoo deenahum wa kaanoo shiya'an kullu hizbim bimaa 
	ladaihim farihoon
verses.33:
Wa izaa massan naasa durrun da'aw Rabbahum muneebeena ilaihi summa izaaa 
	azaqahum minhu rahmatan izaa fareequm minhum be Rabbihim yushrikoon
verses.34: Li yakfuroo bimaaa aatainaahum; fatamatta'oo fasawfa ta'lamoon
verses.35:
Am anzalnaa 'alaihim sultaanan fahuwa yatakallamu bimaa kaanoo bihee 
	yushrikoon
verses.36:
Wa izaaa azaqnan naasa rahmatan farihoo bihaa wa in tusibhum sayyi'atum 
	bimaa qaddamat aydeehim izaa hum yaqnatoon
verses.37:
Awalam yaraw annal laaha yabsutur rizqa limai yashaaa'u wa yaqdir; inna 
	fee zaalika la Aayaatil liqawminy yu'minoon
verses.38:
Fa aati zal qurbaa haqqahoo walmiskeena wabnassabeel; zaalika khairul 
	lil lazeena yureedoona Wajhal laahi wa ulaaa'ika humul muflihoon
verses.39:
Wa maaa aataitum mir ribal li yarbuwa feee amwaalin naasi falaa yarboo 'indal 
	laahi wa maaa aataitum min zaakaatin tureedoona wajhal laahi fa ulaaa'ika 
	humul mud'ifoon
verses.40:
Allaahul lazee khalaqa kum summa razaqakum summa yumeetukum summa 
	yuhyeekum hal min shurakaaa'ikum mai yaf'alu min zaalikum min shai'; Sub 
	haanahoo wa Ta'aalaa 'ammaa yushrikoon 
 (section 4)
verses.41:
Zaharal fasaadu fil barri wal bahri bimaa kasabat aydinnaasi li 
	yuzeeqahum ba'dal lazee 'amiloo la'allahum yarji'oon
verses.42:
Qul seeroo fil ardi fanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul lazeena min qabl; 
	kaana aksaruhum mushrikeen
verses.43:
Fa aqim wajhaka lid deenil qaiyimi min qabli any yaatiya Yawmul laa 
	maradda lahoo minal laahi Yawma'iziny yassadda'oon
verses.44:
Man kafara fa'alaihi kufruhoo wa man 'amila saalihan fali anfusihim 
	yamhadoon
verses.45:
Li yajziyal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati min fadlih; innahoo 
	laa yuhibbul kaafireen
verses.46:
Wa min Aayaatiheee anyyursilar riyaaha mubashshi raatinw wa li 
	yuzeeqakum mir rahmatihee wa litajriyal fulku bi amrihee wa litabtaghoo min 
	fadlihee wa la'allakum tashkuroon
verses.47:
Wa laqad arsalnaa min qablika Rusulan ilaa qawmihim fajaaa'oohum bil 
	baiyinaati fantaqamnaa minal lazeena ajramoo wa kaana haqqan 'alainaa nasrul 
	mu'mineen
verses.48:
Allaahul lazee yursilur riyaaha fatuseeru sahaaban fa yabsutuhoo fis 
	samaaa'i kaifa yashaaa'u wa yaj'aluhoo kisafan fataral wadqa yakhruju min 
	khilaalihee fa izaaa asaaba bihee mai yashaaa'u min 'ibaadiheee izaa hum 
	yastabshiroon
verses.49: Wa in kaanoo min qabli any yunazzala 'alaihim min qablihee lamubliseen
verses.50:
Fanzur ilaaa aasaari rahmatil laahi kaifa yuhyil arda ba'da mawtihaa; 
	inna zaalika lamuhyil mawtaa wa Huwa 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer
verses.51:
Wa la'in arsalnaa reehan fara awhu musfarral lazalloo mim ba'dihee 
	yakfuroon
verses.52:
Fa innaka laa tusmi'ul mawtaa wa laa tusmi'us summad du'aaa'a izaa 
	wallaw mudbireen
verses.53:
Wa maa anta bihaadil 'umyi 'an dalaalatihim in tusmi'u illaa mai yuminu 
	bi aayaatinaa fahum muslimoon  (section 
	5)
verses.54:
Allahul lazee khalaqa kum min du'fin summa ja'ala mim ba'di du'fin 
	quwwatan summa ja'ala mim ba'di quwwatin du'fanw wa shaibah; yakhluqu maa 
	yashaaa'u wa Huwal 'Aleemul Qadeer
verses.55:
Wa Yawma taqoomus Saa'atu yuqsimul mujrimoona maa labisoo ghaira saa'ah; 
	kazaalika kaanoo yu'fakoon
verses.56:
Wa qaalal lazeena ootul 'ilma wal eemaana laqad labistum fee kitaabil 
	laahi ilaa yawmil ba'si fahaazaa yawmul ba'si wa laakinnakum kuntum laa 
	ta'lamoon
verses.57:
Fa Yawma'izil laa yanfa'ul lazeena zalamoo ma'ziratu hum wa laa hum 
	yusta'taboon
verses.58:
Wa laqad darabnaa linnaasi fee haazal Quraani min kulli masal; wa la'in 
	ji'tahum bi aayatil la yaqoolannal lazeena kafaroo in antum illaa mubtiloon
verses.59: Kazaalika yatba'ul laahu 'alaa quloobil lazeena laa ya'lamoon
verses.60:
Fasbir inna wa'dal laahi haqqunw wa laa yastakhif fannakal lazeena laa 
	yooqinoon  (section 6)

verses.3: Hudanw wa rahmatal lilmuhsineen
verses.4:
Allazeena yuqeemoonas Salaata wa yu'toonaz Zakaata wa hum bil Aakhirati 
	hum yooqinoon
verses.5: Ulaaa'ika 'alaa hudam mir Rabbihim wa ulaaa'ika humul muflihoon
verses.6:
Wa minan naasi mai-yashtaree lahwal haddesi li yudilla 'an sabeelil 
	laahi bighairi 'ilminw wa yattakhizahaa huzuwaa; ulaaa'ika lahum 'azaabum 
	muheen
verses.7:
Wa izaa tutlaa 'alayhi Aayaatunaa wallaa mustakbiran ka al lam yasma'haa 
	ka anna feee uzunaihi waqran fabashshiru bi'azaabin aleem
verses.8: Innal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati lahum Janaatun Na'eem
verses.9: Khaalideena feeha wa'dal laahi haqqaa; wa Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem
verses.10:
Khalaqas samaawaati bi ghairi 'amadin tarawnahaa wa alqaa fil ardi 
	rawaasiya an tameeda bikum wa bassa feehaa min kulli daaabbah; wa anzalnaa 
	minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa ambatnaa feeha min kulli zawjin kareem
verses.12:
Wa laqad aatainaa Luqmaanal hikmata anishkur lillaah; wa many yashkur fa 
	innamaa yashkuru linafsihee wa man kafara fa innal laaha Ghaniyyun Hameed
verses.13:
Wa iz qaala luqmaanu libnihee wa huwa ya'izuhoo ya bunaiya laa tushrik 
	billaah; innash shirka lazulmun 'azeem
verses.14:
Wa wassainal insaana bi waalidaihi hamalat hu ummuhoo wahnan 'alaa wahninw wa 
	fisaaluhoo fee 'aamaini anishkur lee wa liwaalidaika ilaiyal maseer
verses.15:
Wa in jaahadaaka 'alaaa an tushrika bee maa laisa laka bihee 'ilmun 
	falaa tuti'humaa wa saahib humaa fid dunyaa ma'roofanw wattabi' sabeela man 
	anaaba ilayy; summa ilaiya marji'ukum fa unabbi'ukum bimaa kuntum ta'maloon
verses.16:
Ya bunaiya innahaaa in taku misqaala habbatim min khardalin fatakun fee 
	sakhratin aw fis samaawaati aw fil ardi yaati bi Allah; innal laaha 
	lateefun Khabeer
verses.17:
Yaa bunaiya aqimis-Salaata waamur bilma'roofi wanha 'anil munkari wasbir 
	'alaa maaa asaabaka inna zaalika min 'azmil umoor
verses.18:
Wa laa tusa'-'ir khaddaka linnaasi wa laa tamshi fil ardi maarahan innal 
	laaha laa yuhibbu kulla mukhtaalin fakhoor
verses.19:
Waqsid fee mashyika waghdud min sawtik; inna ankaral aswaati lasawtul 
	hameer (section 2)
verses.20:
Alam taraw annal laaha sakhkhara lakum maa fis sa maawaati wa maa fil 
	ardi wa asbagha 'alaikum ni'amahoo zaahiratanw wa baatinah; wa minan naasi 
	many yujaadilu fil laahi bighayri 'ilminw wa laa hudanw wa laa Kitaabim 
	muneer
verses.21:
Wa izaa qeela lahumut-tabi'oo maaa anzalal laahu qaaloo bal nattabi'u 
	maa wajadnaa 'alaihi aabaaa'anaa; awalaw kaanash Shaitaanu yad'oohum ilaa 'azaabis 
	sa'eer
verses.22:
Wa many yuslim wajha hooo ilal laahi wa huwa muhsinun faqadistamsaka 
	bil'ur watil wusqaa; wa ilal laahi 'aaqibatul umoor
verses.23:
Wa man kafara falaa yahzunka kufruh; ilainaa marji'uhum fanunabbi'uhum 
	bimaa 'amiloo; innal laaha 'aleemum bizaatis sudoor
verses.24: Numatti'uhum qaleelan summa nadtarruhum ilaa 'azaabin ghaleez
verses.25:
Wa la'in sa altahum man khalaqas samaawaati wal arda la yaqoolunnal laah; 
	qulil hamdu lillaah; bal aksaruhum laa ya'lamoon
verses.26: Lillahi ma fis samaa waati wal ard; innal laaha Huwal Ghaniyyul Hameed
verses.27:
Wa law annamaa fil ardi min shajaratin aqlaamunw wal bahru yamudduhoo 
	mim ba'dihee sab'atu abhurim maa nafidat Kalimaatul laah; innal laaha 'azeezun 
	Hakeem
verses.28:
Maa khalqukum wa laa ba'sukum illaa kanafsinw-waa hidah; innal laaha 
	Samee'um Baseer
verses.29:
Alam tara annal laaha yoolijul laila fin nahaari wa yoolijun nahaara fil 
	laili wa sakhkharash shamsa wal qamara kulluny yajreee ilaaa ajalim 
	musammanw wa annal laaha bimaa ta'maloona Khabeer
verses.30:
Zaalika bi annal laaha Huwal Haqqu wa anna maa yad'oona min doonihil 
	baatilu wa annal laaha Huwal 'Aliyyul Kabeer 
	(section 3)
verses.31:
Alam tara annal fulka tajree fil bahri bini'matil laahi li yuriyakum min 
	Aayaatih; inna fee zaalika la Aayaatil likulli sabbaarin shakoor
verses.32:
Wa izaa ghashiyahum mawjun kazzulali da'a-wul laaha mukhliseena lahud 
	deena fa lammaa najjaahum ilal barri faminhum muqtasid; wa maa yajhadu bi 
	Aayaatinaa illaa kullu khattaarin kafoor
verses.33:
Yaaa ayyuhan naasuttaqoo Rabbakum wakhshaw Yawmal laa yajzee waalidun 'anw 
	waladihee wa laa mawloodun huwa jaazin 'anw waalidihee shai'aa; innaa wa'dal 
	laahi haqqun falaa taghurran nakumul hayaatud dunyaa wa laa yaghur rannakum 
	billaahil gharoor
verses.34:
Innal laaha 'indahoo 'ilmus saa'ati wa yunazzilul ghaisa wa ya'lamu maa 
	fil arhaami wa maa tadree nafsum maazaa taksibu ghadaa; wa maa tadree nafsum 
	bi ayyi ardin tamoot; innal laaha 'Aleemun Khabeer 
(section 4)

verses.2: Tanzeelul Kitaabi laa raiba feehi mir rabbil 'aalameen
verses.3:
Am yaqooloonaf taraahu bal huwal haqqu mir rabbika litunzira qawma maaa 
	ataahum min nazeerim min qablika la'allahum yahtadoon
verses.4:
Allaahul lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal arda wa maa bainahumaa fee 
	sittati ayyaamin thummas tawaa 'alal 'arsh; maa lakum min doonihee 
	minw-waliyyinw-wala shafee'; afalaa tatazakkaroon
verses.5:
Yudabbirul amra minas samaaa'i ilal ardi thumma ya'ruju ilaihi fee 
	yawmin kaana miqdaaruhooo alfa sanatim mimmaa ta'uddoon
verses.6: Zaalika 'aalimul ghaybi wash shahaadatil 'azeezur raheem
verses.7: Allazee ahsana kulla shai in khalaqa; wa bada a khalqal insaani min teen
verses.8: Thumma ja'ala naslahoo min sulaalatim mim maaa'immaheen
verses.9:
Thumma sawwaahu wa nafakha feehi mir roohihih; wa ja'ala lakumus sam'a 
	wal-absaara wal-af'idah; qaleelam maa tashkuroon
verses.10:
Wa qaalooo 'a-izaa dalalnaa fil ardi 'a-innaa lafee khalqin jadeed; bal 
	hum biliqaaa'i rabbihim kaafiroon
verses.11:
Qul yatawaffaakum malakul mawtil lazee wukkila bikum Thumma ilaa 
	rabbikum turja'oon (section 1)
verses.12:
Wa law taraaa izil mujrimoona naakisoo ru'oosihim 'inda rabbihim 
	rabbanaaa absarnaa wa sami'naa farji'naa na'mal saalihan innaa mooqinoon
verses.13:
Wa law shi'naa la-aatainaa kulla nafsin hudaahaa wa laakin haqqal qawlu 
	minnee la amla'anna jahannama minal jinnati wannaasi ajma'een
verses.14:
Fazooqoo bimaa naseetum liqaaa'a yawmikum haaza innaa naseenaakum wa 
	zooqoo 'azaabal khuldi bimaa kuntum ta'maloon
verses.15:
Innamaa yu'minu bi aayaatinal lazeena izaa zukkiroo bihaa kharroo 
	sujjadanw wa sabbahoo bihamdi rabbihim wa hum laa yastakbiroon (make 
	sajda)
verses.16:
Tatajaafaa junoobuhum 'anil madaaji'i yad'oona rabbahum khawfanw wa 
	tama'anw wa mimmaa razaqnaahum yunfiqoon
verses.17:
Falaa ta'lamu nafsum maaa ukhfiya lahum min qurrati a'yunin jazaaa'am 
	bimaa kaanoo ya'maloon
verses.18: Afaman kaana mu'minan kaman kaana faasiqaa; laa yasta woon
verses.19:
Ammal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati falahum jannaatul ma'waa 
	nuzulam bimaa kaanoo ya'maloon
verses.20:
Wa ammal lazeena fasaqoo fama'waahumun Naaru kullamaaa araadooo any 
	yakhrujoo minhaaa u'eedoo feehaa wa qeela lahum zooqoo 'azaaaban Naaril lazee 
	kuntum bihee tukazziboon
verses.21: Wa lanuzeeqan nahum minal 'azaabil adnaa doonal 'azaabil akbari la'allahum yarji'oon
verses.23:
Wa laqad aatainaa Moosal Kitaaba falaa takun fee miryatim mil 
	liqaaa'ihee wa ja'alnaahu hudal li Baneee Israaa'eel
verses.24:
Wa ja'alnaa minhum a'immatany yahdoona bi amrinaa lammaa sabaroo wa 
	kaanoo bi aayaatinaa yooqinoon
verses.25:
Inna rabbaka huwa yafsilu bainahum yawmal qiyaamati feemaa kaanoo feehi 
	yakhtalifoon
verses.26:
Awalam yahdi lahum kam ahlaknaa min qablihim minal qurooni yamshoona fee 
	masaakinihim; inna fee zaalika la aayaatin afalaa yasma'oon
verses.27:
Awalam yaraw annaa nasooqul maaa'a ilal ardil juruzi fanukhriju bihee 
	zar'an ta'kulu minhu an'aamuhum wa anfusuhum afalaa yubsiroon
verses.28: Wa yaqooloona mataa haazal fath hu in kuntum saadiqeen
verses.29:
Qul yawmal fath hi laa yanfa'ul lazeena kafarooo eemaanuhum wa laa hum 
	yunzaroon
verses.30:
Fa a'rid 'anhum wantazir innahum muntaziroon 
(section 3)

verses.1:
Yaa aiyuhan Nabiyyut taqil laaha wa laa tuti'il kaafireena wal 
	munaafiqeen; innal laaha kaana 'aleeman Hakeemaa
verses.2:
Wattabi' maa yoohaaa ilaika mir Rabbik; innal laaha kaana bimaa 
	ta'maloona Khabeera
verses.3: Wa tawakkal 'alal laah; wa kafaa billaahi Wakeelaa
verses.4:
Maa ja'alal laahu lirajulim min qalbaini fee jawfih; wa maa ja'ala 
	azwaajakumul laaa'ee tuzaahiroona minhunna ummahaatikum; wa maa ja'ala 
	ad'iyaaa'akum abnaaa'akum; zaalikum qawlukum bi afwaa hikum wallaahu 
	yaqoolul haqqa wa Huwa yahdis sabeel
verses.5:
Ud'oohum li aabaaa'ihim huwa aqsatu 'indal laah; fa illam ta'lamooo 
	aabaaa'ahum fa ikhwaanukum fid deeni wa mawaaleekum; wa laisa 'alaikum 
	junaahun feemaaa akhtaatum bihee wa laakim maa ta'ammadat quloobukum; wa 
	kaanal laahu Ghafoorar Raheemaa
verses.6:
An-Nabiyyu awlaa bil mu'mineena min anfusihim wa azwaajuhoo ummahatuhum 
	wa ulul arhaami ba'duhum awlaa biba'din fee Kitaabil laahi minal mu'meneena 
	wal Muhaajireena illaaa an taf'alooo ilaaa awliyaaa'ikum ma'roofaa; kaana 
	zaalika fil kitaabi mastooraa
verses.7:
Wa iz akhaznaa minan Nabiyyeena meesaaqahum wa minka wa min Noohinw wa 
	Ibraaheema wa Moosaa wa Eesab-ni-Maryama wa akhaznaa minhum meesaaqan 
	ghaleezaa
verses.8:
Liyas'alas saadiqeena 'an sidqihim; wa a'adda lilkaa fireena 'azaaban 
	aleemaa (section 1)
verses.9:
Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanuz kuroo ni'matal laahi 'alaikum iz jaaa'atkum 
	junoodun fa arsalnaa 'alaihim reehanw wa junoodal lam tarawhaa; wa kaanal 
	laahu bimaa ta'maloona Baseera
verses.10:
Iz jaaa'ookum min fawqikum wa min asfala minkum wa iz zaaghatil absaaru 
	wa balaghatil quloobul hanaajira wa tazunnoona billaahiz zunoonaa
verses.11: Hunaalikab tuliyal mu'minoona wa zulziloo zilzaalan shadeedaa
verses.12:
Wa iz yaqoolul munaafiqoona wallazeena fee quloobihim maradum maa 
	wa'adanal laahu wa Rasooluhooo illaa ghurooraa
verses.13:
Wa iz qaalat taaa'ifatum minhum yaaa ahla Yasriba laa muqaamaa lakum 
	farji'oo; wa yastaazinu fareequm minhumun Nabiyya yaqooloona inna buyootanaa 
	'awrah; wa maa hiya bi'awratin iny yureedoona illaa firaaraa
verses.14:
wa law dukhilat 'alaihim min aqtaarihaa summa su'ilul fitnata la 
	aatawhaa wa maa talabbasoo bihaaa illaa yaseeraa
verses.15:
Wa laqad kaanoo 'aahadul laaha min qablu laa yuwal loonal adbaar; wa 
	kaana 'ahdul laahi mas'oolaa
verses.16:
Qul lany yanfa'akumul firaaru in farartum minal mawti awil qatli wa 
	izal laa tumatta'oona illaa qaleelaa
verses.17:
Qul man zal lazee ya'simukum minal laahi in araada bikum sooo'an aw 
	araada bikum rahmah; wa laa yajidoona lahum min doonil laahi waliyyanw wa 
	laa naseeraa
verses.18:
Qad ya'lamul laahul mu'awwiqeena minkum walqaaa'ileena li ikhwaanihim 
	halumma ilainaa, wa laa yaatoonal baasa illaa qaleelaa
verses.19:
Ashihhatan 'alaikum faizaa jaaa'al khawfu ra aytahum yanzuroona ilaika 
	tadooru a'yunuhum kallazee yughshaa 'alaihi minal mawti fa izaa zahabal 
	khawfu salqookum bi alsinatin hidaadin ashihhatan 'alal khayr; ulaaa'ika lam 
	yu'minoo fa ahbatal laahu a'maalahum; wa kaana zaalika 'alal laahi yaseeraa
verses.20:
Yahsaboonal Ahzaaba lam yazhaboo wa iny yaatil Ahzaabu yawaddoo 
	law annahum baadoona fil A'raabi yasaloona 'an ambaaa'ikum wa law kaanoo 
	feekum maa qaatalooo illaa qaleela (section 2)
verses.21:
Laqad kaana lakum fee Rasoolil laahi uswatun hasanatul liman kaana 
	yarjul laaha wal yawmal Aakhira wa zakaral laaha kaseeraa
verses.22:
Wa lammaa ra al mu'minoonal Ahzaaba qaaloo haazaa maa wa'adanal laahu wa 
	Rasooluh; wa sadaqal laahu wa Rasooluh; wa maa zaadahum illaaa eemaananw wa tasleemaa
verses.23:
Minal mu'mineena rijaalun sadaqoo maa 'aahadul laaha 'alaihi faminhum 
	man qadaa nahbahoo wa minhum mai yantaziru wa maa baddaloo tabdeelaa
verses.24:
Li yajziyal aahus saadiqeena bisidqihim wa yu'azzibal munaafiqeena in 
	shaaa'a aw yatooba 'alaihim; innal laaha kaana Ghafoorar Raheemaa
verses.25:
Wa raddal laahul lazeena kafaroo bighaizihim lam yanaaloo khairaa; wa 
	kafal laahul mu'mineenal qitaal; wa kaanal laahu Qawiyyan 'Azeezaa
verses.26:
Wa anzalal lazeena zaaha roohum min Ahlil Kitaabi min sa yaaseehim wa 
	qazafa fee quloobihimm mur ru'ba fareeqan taqtuloona wa taasiroona fareeqaaa
verses.27:
Wa awrasakum ardahum wa diyaarahum wa amwaalahum wa ardal lam tata'oohaa; 
	wa kaanal laahu 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeeraa (section 3)
verses.28:
Yaaa aiyuhan Nabiyyu qul li azwaajika in kuntunna turidnal hayaatad 
	dunyaa wa zeenatahaa fata'aalaina umatti'kunna wa usarrihkunna saraahan 
	jameela
verses.29:
Wa in kuntunna turidnal laaha wa Rasoolahoo wad Daaral Aakhirata fa 
	innal laaha a'adda lil muhsinaati min kunna ajjran 'azeemaa
verses.30:
Yaa nisaaa'an Nabiyyi mai yaati minkunna bifaa hishatim mubaiyinatiny 
	yudaa'af lahal 'azaabu di'fain wa kaana zaalika 'alal laahi yaseera 
(End Juz 21)
verses.31:
Wa mai yaqnut minkunna lillaahi wa Rasoolihee wa ta'mal saalihan 
	nu'tihaaa ajrahaa marratayni wa a'tadnaa lahaa rizqan kareema
verses.32:
Yaa nisaaa'an Nabiyyi lastunna ka ahadim minan nisaaa'i init taqaitunna 
	falaa takhda'na bilqawli fa yatma'al lazee fee qalbihee maradunw wa qulna 
	qawlam ma'roofaa
verses.33:
Wa qarna fee bu yoo tikunna wa laa tabarrajna tabarrujal Jaahiliyyatil 
	oolaa wa aqimnas Salaata wa aaateenaz Zakaata wa ati'nal laaha wa Rasoolah; 
	innamaa yureedul laahu liyuzhiba 'ankumur rijsa Ahlal Bayti wa yutahhirakum 
	tatheeraa
verses.34:
Wazkurna maa yutlaa fee bu yootikunna min aayaatil laahi wal Hikmah; 
	innal laaha kaana lateefan Khabeera (section 4)
verses.35:
Innal muslimeena wal muslimaati wal mu'mineena wal mu'minaati 
	walqaaniteena walqaanitaati wassaadiqeena wassaadiqaati wassaabireena 
	wassaabiraati walkhaashi'eena walkhaashi'aati walmutasaddiqeena 
	walmutasaddiqaati wassaaa'imeena wassaaa'imaati walhaafizeena furoojahum 
	walhaafizaati waz zaakireenal laaha kaseeranw waz zaakiraati a'addal laahu 
	lahum maghfiratanw wa ajran 'azeemaa
verses.36:
Wa maa kaana limu'mininw wa laa mu'minatin izaa qadal laahu wa 
	Rasooluhooo amran ai yakoona lahumul khiyaratu min amrihim; wa mai ya'sil 
	laaha wa Rasoolahoo faqad dalla dalaalam mubeenaa
