verses.37:
Wa iz taqoolu lillazeee an'amal laahu 'alaihi wa an'amta 'alaihi amsik 'alaika 
	zawjaka wattaqil laaha wa tukhfee fee nafsika mal laahu mubdeehi wa takhshan 
	naasa wallaahu ahaqqu an takhshaah; falammaa qadaa Zaidum minhaa wataran 
	zawwajnaa kahaa likay laa yakoona 'alal mu'mineena harajun feee azwaaji 
	ad'iyaaa'ihim izaa qadaw minhunna wataraa; wa kaana amrul laahi maf'oolaa
verses.38:
Maa kaana 'alan nabiyyyi min harajin feemaa faradal laahu lahoo sunnatal 
	laahi fil lazeena khalaw min qabl; wa kaana amrul laahi qadaram maqdooraa
verses.39:
Allazeena yuballighoona Risaalaatil laahi wa yakhshaw nahoo wa laa 
	yakkhshawna ahadan illal laah; wa kafaa billaahi Haseebaa
verses.40:
Maa kaana Muhammmadun abaaa ahadim mir rijaalikum wa laakir Rasoolal 
	laahi wa Khaataman Nabiyyeen; wa kaanal laahu bikulli shai'in 'Aleema 
	(section 5)
verses.41: Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanuz kurul laaha zikran kaseera
verses.42: Wa sabbihoohu bukratanw wa aseela
verses.43:
Huwal lazee yusallee 'alaikum wa malaaa'ikatuhoo liyukhrijakum 
	minazzulumaati ilan-noor wa kaana bilmu'mineena Raheemaa
verses.44: Tahiyyatuhum Yawma yalqawnahoo salaamunw wa a'adda lahum ajran kareemaa
verses.45:
Yaaa aiyuhan Nabiyyu innaaa arsalnaaka shaahidanw wa mubashshiranw wa 
	nazeeraa
verses.46: Wa daa'iyan ilal laahi bi iznihee wa siraajam muneeraa
verses.47: Wa bashshiril mu'mineena bi annna lahum minal laahi fadlan kabeera
verses.48:
Wa laa tuti'il kaafireena walmunaafiqeena wa da'azaahum wa tawakkal 'alallaah; 
	wa kafaa billaahi Wakeelaa
verses.49:
Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanooo izaa nakahtumul mu'minaati summa tallaqtu 
	moohunna min qabli an tamas soohunna famaa lakum 'alaihinna min 'iddatin 
	ta'taddoonahaa famatti'oohunna wa sarri hoohunna saraahan jameelaa
verses.50:
Yaaa aiyuhan Nabiyyu innaaa ahlalnaa laka azwaa jakal laatee aataiyta 
	ujoora hunna wa maa malakat yameenuka mimmaaa afaaa'al laahu 'alaika wa 
	banaati 'ammika wa banaati 'ammaatika wa banaati khaalika wa banaati khaalaa 
	tikal laatee haajarna ma'aka wamra' atan mu'minatan inw wahabat nafsahaa lin 
	Nabiyyi in araadan Nabiyyu ai yastan kihahaa khaalisatan laka min doonil 
	mu'mineen; qad 'alimnaa maa faradnaa 'alaihim feee azwaajihim wa maa 
	malakat aimaanuhum li kailaa yakoona 'alaika haraj; wa kaanal laahu Ghafoorar 
	Raheema
verses.51:
Turjee man tashaaa'u minhunna wa tu'weee ilaika man tashaaa'u wa manibta 
	ghaita mimman 'azalta falaa junaaha 'alaik; zaalika adnaaa an taqarra 
	a'yunuhunna wa laa yahzanna wa yardaina bimaa aataitahunna kulluhunn; wal 
	laahu ya'lamu maa fee quloo bikum; wa kaanal laahu 'Aleeman haleemaa
verses.52:
Laa yahillu lakan nisaaa'u mim ba'du wa laaa an tabaddala bihinna min 
	azwaajinw wa law ajabaka husnuhunna illaa maa malakat yameenukk; wa kaanal 
	laahu 'alaa kulli shai'ir Raqeeba (section 6)
verses.53:
Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa tadkhuloo bu yootan Nabiyyi illaaa ai 
	yu'zana lakum ilaa ta'aamin ghaira naazireena inaahu wa laakin izaa du'eetum 
	fadkhuloo fa izaa ta'imtum fantashiroo wa laa mustaaniseena lihadees; inna 
	zaalikum kaana yu'zin Nabiyya fa yastahyee minkum wallaahu laa yastahyee minal haqq; wa izaa sa 
	altumoohunna mataa'an fas'aloohunna minw waraaa'i hijaab; zaalikum atharu 
	liquloobikum wa quloobihinn; wa maa kaana lakum an tu'zoo Rasoolal laahi wa 
	laaa an tankihooo azwaajahoo mim ba'diheee abadaa; inna zaalikum kaana 'indal 
	laahi 'azeema
verses.54: In tubdoo shai'an aw tukhfoohu fa innal laaha kaana bikulli shai'in 'Aleemaa
verses.55:
Laa junaaha 'alaihinna feee aabaaa'ihinna wa laaa abnaaa'ihinna wa laaa 
	ikhwaanihinnna wa laaa abnaaa'i ikhwaanihinna wa laaa abnaaa'i 
	akhawaatihinna wa laa nisaaa'i hinna wa laa Maa malakat aimaanuhunn; 
	wattaqeenal laah; innal laaha kaana 'alaa kulli shai'in Shaheedaa
verses.56:
Innal laaha wa malaaa'i katahoo yusalloona 'alan Nabiyy; yaaa aiyuhal 
	lazeena aamanoo salloo 'alaihi wa sallimoo tasleemaa
verses.57:
Innal lazeena yu'zoonal laaha wa Rasoolahoo la'anahumul laahu fid dunyaa 
	wal Aakhirati wa a'adda lahum 'azaabam muheenaa
verses.58:
Wallazeena yu'zoonal mu'mineena wal mu'minaati bighairi mak tasaboo 
	faqadih tamaloo buhtaananw wa ismam mubeenaa (section 7)
verses.59:
Yaaa aiyuhan Nabiyyu qul li azwaajika wa banaatika wa nisaaa'il 
	mu'mineena yudneena 'alaihinna min jalaabee bihinn; zaalika adnaaa ai 
	yu'rafna falaa yu'zain; wa kaanal laahu Ghafoorar Raheemaa
verses.60:
La'il lam yantahil munaafiqoona wallazeena fee quloobihim maradunw 
	walmur jifoona fil madeenati lanughri yannaka bihim summa laa yujaawiroonaka 
	feehaaa illaa qaleela
verses.61: Mal'ooneena ainamaa suqifoo ukhizoo wa quttiloo taqteelaa
verses.62:
Sunnatal laahi fil lazeena khalaw min qablu wa lan tajida lisunnatil 
	laahi tabdeelaa
verses.63:
Yas'alukan naasu 'anis Saa'ati qul innamaa 'ilmuhaa 'indal laah; wa maa 
	yudreeka la'allas Saa'ata takoonu qareebaa
verses.64: Innal laaha la'anal kaafireena wa a'adda lahum sa'eeraa
verses.65: Khaalideena feehaaa abadaa, laa yajidoona waliyyanw wa laa naseeraa
verses.66:
Yawma tuqallabu wujoohuhum fin Naari yaqooloona yaa laitanaaa ata'nal 
	laaha wa ata'nar Rasoolaa
verses.67:
Wa qaaloo Rabbanaaa innaaa ata'naa saadatanaa wa kubaraaa'anaa fa 
	adalloonas sabeelaa
verses.68:
Rabbanaaa aatihim di'fai ni minal 'azaabi wal'anhum la nan kabeera 
	(section 8)
verses.69:
Yaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa takoonoo kalla zeena aazaw Moosaa fa 
	barra ahul laahu mimma qaaloo; wa kaana 'indal laahi wajeehaa
verses.70: Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanut taqul laaha wa qooloo qawlan sadeedaa
verses.71:
Yuslih lakum a'maalakum wa yaghfir lakum zunoobakum; wa mai yuti'il 
	laaha wa Rasoolahoo faqad faaza fawzan 'azeemaa
verses.72:
Innaa 'aradnal amaanata 'alas samaawaati walardi wal jibaali fa abaina 
	ai yahmil nahaa wa ashfaqna minhaa wa hamalahal insaanu innahoo kaana 
	zalooman jahoolaa
verses.73:
Liyu 'azzibal laahul munaafiqeena wal munaafiqaati walmushrikeena wal 
	mushrikaati wa yatoobal laahu 'alal mu'mineena walmu'minaat; wa kaanal laahu 
	Ghafoorar Raheema (section 9)

verses.1:
Alhamdu lillaahil lazee lahoo maa fis samaawaati wa maa fil ardi wa 
	lahul hamdu fil aakhirah; wa Huwal Hakeemul Khabeer
verses.2:
Ya'lamu maa yaliju fil ardi wa maa yakhruju minhaa wa maa yanzilu minas 
	samaaa'i wa maa ya'ruju feehaa; wa Huwar Raheemul Ghafoor
verses.3:
Wa qaalal lazeena kafaroo laa taateenas Saa'ah; qul balaa wa Rabbee 
	lataatiyannakum 'Aalimul Ghaib; laa ya'zubu 'anhu misqaalu zarratin fis 
	samaawaati wa laa fil ardi wa laaa asgharu min zaalika wa laaa akbaru illaa 
	fee kitaabim mubeen
verses.4:
Liyajziyal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaat; ulaaa'ika lahum 
	maghfiratunw wa rizqun kareem
verses.5:
Wallazeena sa'aw feee aayaatinaa mu'aajizeena ulaaa 'ika lahum 'azaabum 
	mir rijzin aleem
verses.6:
Wa yaral lazeena ootul 'ilmal lazeee unzila ilaika mir Rabbika huwal 
	haqqa wa yahdeee ilaaa siraatil 'Azeezil Hameed
verses.7:
Wa qaalal lazeena kafaroo hal nadullukum 'alaa rajuliny yunabbi 'ukum 
	izaa muzziqtum kulla mumazzaqin innakum lafee khalqin jadeed
verses.8:
Aftaraa 'alal laahi kaziban am bihee jinnah; balil lazeena laa 
	yu'minoona bil Aakhirati fil'azaabi wad dalaalil ba'eed
verses.10:
Wa laqad aatainaa Daawooda minnaa fadlany yaa jibaalu awwibee ma'ahoo 
	wattaira wa alannaa lahul hadeed
verses.11:
Ani'mal saabighaatinw wa qaddir fis sardi wa'maloo saalihan innee bimaa 
	ta'maloona Baseer
verses.12:
Wa li-Sulaimaanar reeha ghuduwwuhaa shahrunw wa ra-waahuhaa shahrunw wa 
	asalnaa lahoo 'ainal qitr; wa minal jinni mai ya'malu baina yadaihi bi izni 
	Rabbih; wa mai yazigh minhum 'an amrinaa nuziqhu min 'azaabis sa'eer
verses.13:
Ya'maloona lahoo ma yashaaa'u mim mahaareeba wa tamaaseela wa jifaanin 
	kaljawaabi wa qudoorir raasiyaat; i'maloo aala Daawooda shukraa; wa qaleelum 
	min 'ibaadiyash shakoor
verses.14:
Falammaa qadainaa 'alaihil mawta ma dallahum 'alaa mawtiheee illaa 
	daaabbatul ardi taakulu minsa atahoo falammaa kharra tabaiyanatil jinnu al 
	law kaanoo ya'lamoonal ghaiba maa labisoo fil 'azaabil muheen
verses.15:
Laqad kaana li Saba-in fee maskanihim Aayatun jannataani 'any yameeninw 
	wa shimaalin kuloo mir rizqi Rabbikum washkuroolah; baldatun taiyibatunw wa 
	Rabbun Ghafoor
verses.16:
Fa a'radoo fa-arsalnaa 'alaihim Sailal 'Arimi wa baddalnaahum 
	bijannataihim jannataini zawaatai ukulin khamtinw wa aslinw wa shai'im min 
	sidrin qaleel
verses.17: Zaalika jazainaahum bimaa kafaroo wa hal nujaazeee illal kafoor
verses.18: Wa ja'alnaa bainahum wa bainal qural latee baaraknaa feehaa quran zaahiratanw wa qaddarnaa feehas sayr; seeroo feehaa la yaaliya wa aiyaaman aamineen
verses.19:
Faqaaloo Rabbanaa baa'id baina asfaarinaa wa zalamooo anfusahum 
	faja'alnaahum ahaadeesa wa mazzaq naahum kulla mumazzaq; inna fee zaalika la 
	Aayaatil likulli sabbaarin shakoor
verses.20:
Wa laqad saddaq 'alaihim Ibleesu zannabhoo fattaba'oohu illaa fareeqam 
	minal mu'mineen
verses.21:
Wa maa kaana lahoo 'alaihim min sultaanin illaa lina'lama mai yu minu 
	bil Aakhirati mimman huwa minhaa fee shakk; wa Rabbuka 'alaa kulli shai'in 
	Hafeez (section 2)
verses.22:
Qulid 'ul lazeena za'amtum min doonil laahi laa yamlikoona misqaala 
	zarratin fissamaawaati wa laa fil ardi wa maa lahum feehimaa min shirkinw wa 
	maa lahoo minhum min zaheer
verses.23:
Wa laa tanfa'ush shafaa'atu 'indahooo illaa liman azina lah; hattaaa 
	izaa fuzzi'a 'an quloobihim qaaloo maazaa qaala Rabbukum; qaalul haqq, wa 
	Huwal 'Aliyul Kabeer
verses.24:
Qul mai yarzuqukum minas samaawaati wal ardi qulil laahu wa innaaa aw 
	iyyaakum la'alaa hudan aw fee dalaalim mubeen
verses.25: Qul laa tus'aloona 'ammaaa ajramnaa wa laa nus'alu 'ammaa ta'maloon
verses.26:
Qul yajma'u bainanaa Rabbunaa summa yaftahu bainanaa bilhaqq; wa Huwal 
	Fattaahul 'Aleem
verses.27:
Qul arooniyal lazeena alhaqtum bihee shurakaaa'a kallaa; bal Huwal 
	Laahul 'Azeezul Hakeem
verses.28:
Wa maaa arsalnaaka illaa kaaffatal linnaasi basheeranw wa nazeeranw wa 
	laakinna aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon
verses.29: Wa yaqooloona mataa haazal wa'du in kuntum saadiqeen
verses.30: Qul lakum mee'aadu Yawmil laa tasta'khiroona 'anhu saa'atanw wa laa tastaqdimoon (section 3)
verses.31:
Wa qaalal lazeena kafaroo lan nu'mina bihaazal Quraani wa laa billazee 
	baina yadayh; wa law taraaa iziz zaalimoona mawqoofoona 'inda Rabbihim 
	yarji'u ba'duhum ilaa ba'dinil qawla yaqoolul lazeenas tud'ifoo lillazeenas 
	takbaroo law laaa antum lakunnaa mu'mineen
verses.32:
Qaalal lazeenas takbaroo lillazeenas tud'ifooo anahnu sadadnaakum 'anil 
	hudaa ba'da iz jaaa'akum bal kuntum mujrimeen
verses.33:
Wa qaalal lazeenastud'ifoo lillazeenas takbaroo bal makrul laili 
	wannahaari iz ta'muroonanaaaa an nakfura billaahi wa naj'ala lahooo andaadaa; 
	wa asarrun nadaamata lammaa ra awul 'azaab; wa ja'alnal aghlaala feee 
	a'naaqil lazeena kafaroo; hal yujzawna illaa maa kaanoo ya'maloon
verses.34:
Wa maaa arsalnaa' fee qaryatin min nazeerin illaa qaala mutrafoohaa innaa 
	bimaaa ursiltum bihee kaafiroon
verses.35: Wa qaaloo nahnu aksaru amwaalanw wa awlaadanw wa maa nahnu bimu 'azzabeen
verses.36:
Qul inna Rabbee yabsutur rizqa limai yashaaa'u wa yaqdiru wa laakinna 
	aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon (section 4)
verses.37:
Wa maaa amwaalukum wa laaa awlaadukum billatee tuqarribukum 'indanaa 
	zulfaaa illaa man aamana wa 'amila saalihan fa ulaaa'ika lahum jazaaa'ud 
	di'fi bimaa 'amiloo wa hum fil ghurufaati aaminoon
verses.38:
Wallazeena yas'awna feee Aayaatinaa mu'aajizeena ulaaa'ika fil'azaabi 
	muhdaroon
verses.39:
Qul inna Rabbee yabsutur rizqa limai yashaaa'u min 'ibaadihee wa yaqdiru 
	lah; wa maaa anfaqtum min shai'in fahuwa yukhlifuhoo wa Huwa khairur 
	raaziqeen
verses.40:
Wa yawma yahshuruhum jamee'an summa yaqoolu lilmalaaa'ikati a-haaa'ulaaa'i 
	iyyaakum kaanoo ya'budoon
verses.41:
Qaaloo Subhaanaka Anta waliyyunaa min doonihim bal kaanoo ya'budoonal 
	jinna aksaruhum bihim mu'minoon
verses.42:
Fal Yawma laa yamliku ba'dukum liba'din naf'anw wa laa darraa; wa 
	naqoolu lil lazeena zalamoo zooqoo 'azaaban Naaril latee kuntum bihaa 
	tukazziboon
verses.43:
Wa izaa tutlaa 'alaihim Aayaatunaa baiyinaatin qaaloo maa haazaa illaa 
	rajuluny yureedu ai-yasuddakum 'ammaa kaana ya'budu aabaaa'ukum wa qaaloo 
	maa haazaaa illaaa ifkum muftaraa; wa qaalal lazeena kafaroo lilhaqqi lammaa 
	jaaa'ahum in haazaaa illaa sihrum mubeen
verses.44:
Wa maaa aatainaahum min Kutubiny yadrusoonahaa wa maaa arsalnaaa ilaihim 
	qablaka min nazeer
verses.45:
Wa kazzabal lazeena min qablihim wa maa balaghoo mi'shaara maaa 
	aatainaahum fakazzaboo Rusulee; fakaifa kaana nakeer (section 5)
verses.46:
Qul innamaaa a'izukum biwaahidatin an taqoomoo lillaahi masnaa wa 
	furaadaa summa tatafakkaroo; maa bisaahibikum min jinnah; in huwa illaa 
	nazeerul lakum baina yadai 'azaabin shadeed
verses.47:
Qul maa sa-altukum min ajrin fahuwa lakum in ajriya illaa 'alal laahi wa 
	Huwa 'alaa kulli shai'in Shaheed
verses.48: Qul inna Rabbee yaqzifu bilhaqq 'Allaamul Ghuyoob
verses.49: Qul jaaa'al haqqu wa maa yubdi'ul baatilu wa maa yu'eed
verses.50:
Qul in dalaltu fainnamaaa adillu 'alaa nafsee wa inih-tadaitu fabimaa 
	yoohee ilaiya Rabbee; innahoo Samee'un Qareeb
verses.51: Wa law taraaa iz fazi'oo falaa fawta wa ukhizoo min makaanin qareeb
verses.52: Wa qaaloo aamannaa bihee wa annaa lahumut tanaawushu min makaanin ba'eed
verses.53:
Wa qad kafaroo bihee min qablu wa yaqzifoona bilghaibi min makaanin 
	ba'eed
verses.54:
Wa heela bainahum wa baina maa yashtahoona kamaa fu'ila bi-ashyaa'ihim 
	min qabl; innahum kaanoo fee shakkin mureeb (section 6)

verses.1:
Alhamdu lillaahi faatiris samaawaati wal ardi jaa'ilil malaaa'ikati 
	rusulan uleee ajnihatim masnaa wa sulaasa wa rubaa'; yazeedu fil khalqi maa 
	yashaaa'; innal laaha 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer
verses.2:
Maa yaftahil laahu linnaaasi mir rahmatin falaa mumsika lahaa wa maa 
	yumsik falaa mursila lahoo mimba'dihi; wa Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem
verses.3:
Yaaa ayyuhan naasuzkuroo ni'matal laahi 'alaikum; hal min khaaliqin 
	ghairul laahi yarzuqukum minas samaaa'i wal ard; laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa fa 
	annaa tu'fakoon
verses.4:
Wa iny yukazzibooka faqad kuzzibat Rusulum min qablik; wa ilal laahi 
	turja'ul umoor
verses.5:
Yaaa ayyuhan naasu inna wa'dal laahi haqqun falaa taghurrannakumul 
	hayaatud dunyaa; wa laa yaghurran nakum billaahil gharoor
verses.6:
Innash shaitaana lakum 'aduwwun fattakhizoohu 'aduwwaa; innamaa yad'oo 
	hizbahoo liyakoonoo min ashaabis sa'eer
verses.7:
Allazeena kafaroo lahum 'azaabun shadeed; wallazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus 
	saalihaati lahum maghfiratunw wa ajrun kabeer 
	(section 1)
verses.8:
Afaman zuyyina lahoo sooo'u 'amalihee fara aahu hasanaa; fa innal laaha 
	yudillu mai yashaaa'u wa yahdee mai yashaaa'u falaa tazhab nafsuka 'alaihim 
	hasaraat; innal laaha 'aleemun bimaa yasna'oon
verses.9:
Wallaahul lazeee arsalar riyaaha fatuseeru sa haaban fasuqnaahu ilaa 
	baladim maiyitin fa ahyaynaa bihil arda ba'da mawtihaa; kazaalikan nushoor
verses.10:
Man kaana yureedul 'izzata falillaahil 'izzatu jamee'aa; ilaihi yas'adul 
	kalimut taiyibu wal'amalus saalihu yarfa'uh; wallazeena yamkuroonas 
	sayyiaati lahum 'azaabun shadeed; wa makru ulaaa'ika huwa yaboor
verses.11:
Wallaahu khalaqakum min turaabin summa min nutfatin summa ja'alakum 
	azwaajaa; wa maa tahmilu min unsaa wa laa tada'u illaa bi'ilmih; wa maa 
	yu'ammaru mim mu'ammarinw wa laa yunqasu min 'umuriheee illaa fee kitaab; 
	inna zaalika 'alal laahi yaseer
verses.12:
Wa maa yastawil bahraani haaza 'azbun furaatun saaa'ighun sharaabuhoo wa 
	haazaa milhun ujaaj; wa min kullin ta'kuloona lahman tariyyanw wa 
	tastakhrijoona hilyatan talbasoonahaa wa taral fulka feehi mawaakhira 
	litabtaghoo min fadlihee wa la'allakum tashkuroon
verses.13:
Yoolijul laila fin nahaari wa yoolijun nahaara fil laili wa sakhkharash 
	shamsa wal qamara kulluny yajree li ajalim musammaa; zaalikumul laahu 
	Rabbukum lahul mulk; wallazeena tad'oona min doonihee maa yamlikoona min 
	qitmeer
verses.15:
Yaaa ayyunhan naasu antumul fuqaraaa'u ilallaahi wallaahu Huwal 
	Ghaniyyul Hameed
verses.16: Iny yasha' yuzhibkum wa ya'ti bikhalqin jadeed
verses.17: Wa maa zaalika 'alal laahi bi'azeez
verses.18:
Wa laa taziru waaziratun wizra ukhraa; wa in tad'u musqalatun ilaa 
	himlihaa laa yuhmal minhu shai'unw wa law kaana zaa qurbaa; innamaa tunzirul 
	lazeena yakhshawna Rabbahum bilghaibi wa aqaamus Salaah; wa man tazakkaa fa 
	innamaa yatazakkaa linafsih; wa ilal laahil maseer
verses.19: Wa maa yastawil a'maa wal baseer
verses.20: Wa laz zulumaatu wa lan noor
verses.21: Wa laz zillu wa lal haroor
verses.22:
Wa maa yastawil ahyaaa'u wa lal amwaat; innal laaha yusmi'u mai 
	yashaaa'u wa maaa anta bi musmi'im man fil quboor
verses.23: In anta illaa nazeer
verses.24:
Innaa arsalnaaka bil haqqi basheeranw wa nazeeraa; wa im min ummatin 
	illaa khalaa feehaa nazeer
verses.25:
Wa iny yukazzibooka faqad kazzabal lazeena min qablihim jaaa'at hum 
	Rusuluhum bilbaiyinaati wa biz Zuburi wa bil Kitaabil Muneer
verses.26:
Summa akhaztul lazeena kafaroo fakaifa kaana nakeer 
	(section 3)
verses.27:
Alam tara annal laaha anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa akhrajnaa bihee 
	samaraatim mukhtalifan alwaanuhaa; wa minal jibaali judadum beedunw wa 
	humrum mukhtalifun alwaanuhaa wa gharaabeebu sood
verses.29:
Innal lazeena yatloona Kitabbal laahi wa aqaamus Salaata wa anfaqoo 
	mimmaa razaqnaahum sirranw wa 'alaa niyatany yarjoona tijaaratal lan taboor
verses.30:
Liyuwaffiyahum ujoorahum wa yazeedahum min fadlih; innahoo Ghafoorun 
	Shakoor
verses.31:
Wallazeee awhainaaa ilaika minal Kitaabi huwal haqqu musaddiqal limaa 
	baina yadayh; innal laaha bi'ibaadihee la khabeerum Baseer
verses.32:
Summa awrasnal Kitaaballazeenas tafainaa min 'ibaadinaa faminhum 
	zaalimul linafsihee wa minhum muqtasidu, wa minhum saabiqum bilkhairaati bi 
	iznil laah; zaalika huwal fadlul kabeer
verses.33:
Jannaatu 'adniny yad khuloonahaa yuhallawna feeha min asaawira min 
	zahabinw wa lu'lu'anw wa libaa suhum feehaa hareer
verses.34:
Wa qaalul hamdu lillaahil lazeee azhaba 'annal hazan; inna Rabbanaa la 
	Ghafoorun Shakoor
verses.35:
Allazeee ahallanaa daaral muqaamati min fadlihee laa yamassunaa feehaa 
	nasabunw wa laa yamassunaa feehaa lughoob
verses.36:
Wallazeena kafaroo lahum naaru Jahannama laa yuqdaa 'alaihim fa yamootoo 
	wa laa yukhaffafu 'anhum min 'azaabihaa; kazaalika najzee kulla kafoor
verses.37:
Wa hum yastarikhoona feehaa Rabbanaa akhrijnaa na'mal saalihan ghairal 
	lazee kunnaa na'mal; awa lamnu 'ammirkum maa yatazak karu feehi man 
	tazakkara wa jaaa'akumun nazeeru fazooqoo famaa lizzaalimeena min naseer 
	(section 4)
verses.38:
Innal laaha 'aalimu ghaibis samaawaati wal ard; innahoo 'aleemum 
	bizaatis sudoor
verses.39:
Huwal lazee ja'alakum khalaaa'ifa fil ard; faman kafara fa'alaihi 
	kufruhoo; wa laa yazeedul kaafireena kufruhum 'inda Rabbihim illaa maqtanw 
	wa laa yazeedul kaafireena kufruhum illaa khasaaraa
verses.40:
Qul ara'aytum shurakaaa'a kumul lazeena tad'oona min doonil laahi; 
	aroonee maazaa khalaqoo minal ardi am lahum shirkun fis samaawaati am 
	aatainaahum Kitaaban fahum 'alaa baiyinatim minh; bal iny ya'iduz 
	zaalimoona ba 'duhum ba'dan illaa ghurooraa
verses.41:
Innal laaha yumsikus samaawaati wal arda an tazoolaaa; wa la'in 
	zaalataaa in amsa kahumaa min ahadim mim ba'dih; innahoo kaana Haleeman 
	Ghafooraa
verses.42:
Wa aqsamoo billaahi jahda aymaanihim la'in jaaa'ahum nazeerul 
	layakoonunna ahdaa min ihdal umami falam maa jaaa'ahum nazeerum maa zaadahum 
	illaa nufooraa
verses.43:
Istikbaaran fil ardi wa makras sayyi'; wa laa yaheequl makrus sayyi'u 
	illaa bi ahlih; fahal yanzuroona illaa sunnatal awwaleen; falan tajida 
	lisunnatil laahi tabdeelanw wa lan tajida lisunnatil laahi tahweela
verses.44:
Awalam yaseeroo fil ardi fa yanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul lazeena min 
	Qablihim wa kaanoo ashadda minhum quwwah; wa maa kaanal laahu liyu'jizahoo 
	min shai'in fis samaawaati wa laa fil ard; innahoo kaana 'Aleeman Qadeeraa
verses.45:
Wa law yu'aakhizul laahun naasa bima kasaboo maa taraka 'alaa zahrihaa 
	min daaabbatinw wa laakiny yu'akhkhiruhum ilaaa ajalim musamman fa izaa 
	jaaa'a ajaluhum fa innal laaha kaana bi'ibaadihee Baseeraa 
(section 5)

verses.3: Innaka laminal mursaleen
verses.4: 'Alaa Siraatim Mustaqeem
verses.5: Tanzeelal 'Azeezir Raheem
verses.6:
Litunzira qawmam maaa unzira aabaaa'uhum fahum 
					ghaafiloon
verses.7: Laqad haqqal qawlu 'alaaa aksarihim fahum laa yu'minoon
verses.8:
Innaa ja'alnaa feee a'naaqihim aghlaalan fahiya ilal 
					azqaani fahum muqmahoon
verses.9:
Wa ja'alnaa min baini aydeehim saddanw-wa min khalfihim 
					saddan fa aghshai naahum fahum laa yubsiroon
verses.10:
Wa sawaaa'un 'alaihim 'a-anzartahum am lam tunzirhum laa 
					yu'minoon
verses.11:
Innamaa tunziru manit taba 'az-Zikra wa khashiyar 
					Rahmaana bilghaib, fabashshirhu bimaghfiratinw-wa ajrin 
					kareem
verses.12:
Innaa Nahnu nuhyil mawtaa wa naktubu maa qaddamoo wa 
					aasaarahum; wa kulla shai'in ahsainaahu feee Imaamim Mubeen
verses.13:
Wadrib lahum masalan Ashaabal Qaryatih; iz jaaa'ahal 
					mursaloon
verses.14:
Iz arsalnaaa ilaihimusnaini fakazzaboohumaa fa'azzaznaa 
					bisaalisin faqaalooo innaaa ilaikum mursaloon
verses.15:
Qaaloo maaa antum illaa basharum mislunaa wa maaa 
					anzalar Rahmaanu min shai'in in antum illaa takziboon
verses.16: Qaaloo Rabbunaa ya'lamu innaaa ilaikum lamursaloon
verses.17: Wa maa 'alainaaa illal balaaghul mubeen
verses.18:
Qaaloo innaa tataiyarnaa bikum la'il-lam tantahoo lanar 
					jumannakum wa la-yamassan nakum minnaa 'azaabun aleem
verses.19:
Qaaloo taaa'irukum ma'akum; a'in zukkirtum; bal antum 
					qawmum musrifoon
verses.20:
Wa jaaa'a min aqsal madeenati rajuluny yas'aa qaala yaa 
					qawmit tabi'ul mursaleen
verses.21: Ittabi'oo mal-laa yas'alukum ajranw-wa hum muhtadoon
verses.22:
Wa maa liya laaa a'budul lazee fataranee wa ilaihi 
					turja'oon
verses.23:
'A-attakhizu min dooniheee aalihatan iny-yuridnir 
					Rahmaanu bidurril-laa tughni 'annee shafaa 'atuhum shai 
					'anw-wa laa yunqizoon
verses.24: Inneee izal-lafee dalaa-lim-mubeen
verses.25: Inneee aamantu bi Rabbikum fasma'oon
verses.26: Qeelad khulil Jannnah; qaala yaa laita qawmee ya'lamoon
verses.27:
Bimaa ghafara lee Rabbee wa ja'alanee minal mukrameen
					(End Juz 22)
verses.28:
Wa maaa anzalnaa 'alaa qawmihee mim ba'dihee min jundim 
					minas-samaaa'i wa maa kunnaa munzileen
verses.29:
In kaanat illaa saihatanw waahidatan fa-izaa hum 
					khaamidoon
verses.30:
Yaa hasratan 'alal 'ibaaad; maa ya'teehim mir Rasoolin 
					illaa kaanoo bihee yastahzi 'oon
verses.31:
Alam yaraw kam ahlak naa qablahum minal qurooni annahum 
					ilaihim laa yarji'oon
verses.32: Wa in kullul lammaa jamee'ul-ladainaa muhdaroon
verses.33:
Wa Aayatul lahumul ardul maitatu ahyainaahaa wa 
					akhrajnaa minhaa habban faminhu ya'kuloon
verses.34:
Wa ja'alnaa feehaa jannaatim min nakheelinw wa a'naabinw 
					wa fajjarnaa feeha minal 'uyoon
verses.35:
Li ya'kuloo min samarihee wa maa 'amilat-hu aideehim; 
					afalaa yashkuroon
verses.36:
Subhaanal lazee khalaqal azwaaja kullahaa mimmaa 
					tumbitul ardu wa min anfusihim wa mimmaa laa ya'lamoon
verses.37:
Wa Aayatul lahumul lailu naslakhu minhun nahaara fa-izaa 
					hum muzlimoon
verses.38:
Wash-shamsu tajree limustaqarril lahaa; zaalika 
					taqdeerul 'Azeezil Aleem
verses.39:
Walqamara qaddarnaahu manaazila hattaa 'aada kal'ur 
					joonil qadeem
verses.40:
Lash shamsu yambaghee lahaaa an tudrikal qamara walal 
					lailu saabiqun nahaar; wa kullun fee falaki yasbahoon
verses.41:
Wa Aayatul lahum annaa hamalnaa zurriyatahum fil fulkil 
					mashhoon
verses.42: Wa khalaqnaa lahum mim-mislihee maa yarkaboon
verses.43:
Wa in nashaa nughriqhum falaa sareekha lahum wa laa hum 
					yunqazoon
verses.44: Illaa rahmatam minnaa wa mataa'an ilaa heen
verses.45:
Wa izaa qeela lahumuttaqoo maa baina aideekum wa maa 
					khalfakum la'allakum turhamoon
verses.46:
Wa maa ta'teehim min aayatim min Aayaati Rabbihim 
					illaa kaanoo 'anhaa mu'rideen
verses.47:
Wa izaa qeela lahum anfiqoo mimmaa razaqakumul laahu 
					qaalal lazeena kafaroo lillazeena aamanooo anut'imu mal-law yashaaa'ul laahu at'amahooo in antum illaa fee dalaalim 
					mubeen
verses.48: Wa yaqooloona mataa haazal wa'du in kuntum saadiqeen
verses.49:
Maa yanzuroona illaa saihatanw waahidatan ta'khuzuhum 
					wa hum yakhissimoon
verses.50:
Falaa yastatee'oona taw siyatanw-wa laaa ilaaa ahlihim 
					yarji'oon
verses.51:
Wa nufikha fis-soori faizaa hum minal ajdaasi ilaa 
					Rabbihim yansiloon
verses.52:
Qaaloo yaa wailanaa mam ba'asanaa mim marqadinaa; haaza 
					maa wa'adar Rahmanu wa sadaqal mursaloon
verses.53:
In kaanat illaa saihatanw waahidatan fa-izaa hum 
					jamee'ul ladainaa muhdaroon
verses.54:
Fal-Yawma laa tuzlamu nafsun shai'anw-wa laa tujzawna 
					illaa maa kuntum ta'maloon
verses.55: Inna Ashaabal jannatil Yawma fee shughulin faakihoon
verses.56:
Hum wa azwaajuhum fee zilaalin 'alal araaa'iki 
					muttaki'oon
verses.57: Lahum feehaa faakiha tunw-wa lahum maa yadda'oon
verses.58: Salaamun qawlam mir Rabbir Raheem
verses.59: Wamtaazul Yawma ayyuhal mujrimoon
verses.60:
Alam a'had ilaikum yaa Baneee Aadama al-laa ta'budush 
					Shaitaana innahoo lakum 'aduwwum mubeen
verses.61: Wa ani'budoonee; haazaa Siraatum Mustaqeem
verses.62:
Wa laqad adalla minkum jibillan kaseeraa; afalam 
					takoonoo ta'qiloon
verses.63: Haazihee Jahannamul latee kuntum too'adoon
verses.64: Islawhal Yawma bimaa kuntum takfuroon
verses.65:
Al-Yawma nakhtimu 'alaaa afwaahihim wa tukallimunaaa 
					aideehim wa tashhadu arjuluhum bimaa kaanoo yaksiboon
verses.66:
Wa law nashaaa'u lata masna 'alaaa aiyunihim fasta 
					baqus-siraata fa-annaa yubsiroon
verses.67:
Wa law nashaaa'u lamasakhnaahum 'alaa makaanatihim 
					famas-tataa'oo mudiyyanw-wa laa yarji'oon
verses.68:
Wa man nu 'ammirhu nunakkishu fil-khalq; afalaa 
					ya'qiloon
verses.69:
Wa maa 'allamnaahush shi'ra wa maa yambaghee lah; in 
					huwa illaa zikrunw-wa Qur-aanum mubeen
verses.70: Liyunzira man kaana haiyanw-wa yahiqqal qawlu 'alal-kaafireen
verses.71:
Awalam yaraw annaa khalaqnaa lahum mimmaa 'amilat 
					aideenaaa an'aaman fahum lahaa maalikoon
verses.72:
Wa zallalnaahaa lahum faminhaa rakoobuhum wa minhaa 
					ya'kuloon
verses.73:
Wa lahum feehaa manaa fi'u wa mashaarib; afalaa 
					yashkuroon
verses.74:
Wattakhazoo min doonil laahi aalihatal la'allahum 
					yunsaroon
verses.75: Laa yastatee'oona nasrahum wa hum lahum jundum muhdaroon
verses.76:
Falaa yahzunka qawluhum; innaa na'lamu maa yusirroona wa 
					maa yu'linoon
verses.77:
Awalam yaral insaanu annaa khalaqnaahu min nutfatin 
					fa-izaa huwa khaseemum mubeen
verses.78:
Wa daraba lanaa maslanw-wa nasiya khalqahoo qaala 
					mai-yuhyil'izaama wa hiya rameem
verses.79:
Qul yuh yeehal lazeee ansha ahaaa awwala marrah; wa Huwa 
					bikulli khalqin 'Aleem
verses.80:
Allazee ja'ala lakum minash shajaril akhdari naaran 
					fa-izaaa antum minhu tooqidoon
verses.81:
Awa laisal lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal arda biqaadirin 
					'alaaa ai-yakhluqa mislahum; balaa wa Huwal Khallaaqul 'Aleem
verses.82:
Innamaa amruhooo izaaa araada shai'an ai-yaqoola lahoo 
					kun fa-yakoon
verses.83:
Fa Subhaanal lazee biyadihee malakootu kulli shai-inw-wa 
					ilaihi turja'oon

37.name: As-Saffat - Those who set the Ranks

verses.3: Fattaaliyaati Zikra
verses.4: Inna Illaahakum la Waahid
verses.5: Rabbus samaawaati wal ardi wa maa bainahumaa wa Rabbul mashaariq
verses.6: Innaa zaiyannas samaaa 'ad dunyaa bizeenatinil kawaakib
verses.7: Wa hifzam min kulli Shaitaanim maarid
verses.8: Laa yassamma 'oona ilal mala 'il a'alaa wa yuqzafoona min kulli jaanib
verses.9: Duhooranw wa lahum 'azaabunw waasib
verses.10: Illaa man khatifal khatfata fa atba'ahoo shihaabun saaqib
verses.11:
Fastaftihim ahum ashaddu khalqan am man khalaqnaa; innaa khalaqnaahum 
	min teenil laazib
verses.12: Bal'ajibta wa yaskharoon
verses.13: Wa izaa zukkiroo laa yazkuroon
verses.14: Wa izaa ra aw Aayatany yastaskhiroon
verses.15: Wa qaalooo in haazaa illaa sihrum mubeen
verses.16: 'A-izaa mitnaa wa kunnaa turaabanw wa 'izaaman 'a innaa lamab'oosoon

Haazaa Yawmul Faslil lazee kuntum bihee tukaziboon 
 
	(section 1)

	anneee azbahuka fanzur maazaa taraa; qaala yaaa abatif 'al maa tu'maru 
	satajidunee in shaaa'allaahu minas saabireen

Wa baaraknaa 'alaihi wa 'alaaa Ishaaq; wa min zurriyya tihimaa muhsinunw 
	wa zaalimul linafsihee mubeen 
	(section 3)

verses.115: Wa najjainaahumaa wa qawmahumaa minal karbil 'azeem

verses.126: Allaaha Rabbakum wa Rabba aabaaa'ikumul awwaleen

verses.2: Balil lazeena kafaroo fee 'izzatinw wa shiqaaq
verses.3: Kam ahlaknaa min qablihim min qarnin fanaadaw wa laata heena manaas
verses.4:
Wa 'ajibooo an jaaa'a hum munzirum minhum wa qaalal kaafiroona haazaa 
	saahirun kazzaab
verses.5: Aja'alal aalihata Ilaahanw Waahidan inna haazaa lashai'un 'ujaab
verses.6:
Wantalaqal mala-u minhum anim shoo wasbiroo 'alaaa aalihatikum innna 
	haazaa lashai 'uny yuraad
verses.7: Maa sami'naa bihaazaa fil millatil aakhirati in haazaaa illakh tilaaq
verses.8:
'A-unzila 'alaihiz zikru min baininaa; bal hum fee shakkin min Zikree 
	bal lammaa yazooqoo 'azaab
verses.9: Am'indahum khazaaa 'inu rahmati Rabbikal 'Azeezil Wahhab
verses.10:
Am lahum mulkus samaawaati wal ardi wa maa bainahumaa falyartaqoo fil 
	asbaab
verses.11: Jundum maa hunaalika mahzoomum minal Ahzaab
verses.12: Kazzabat qablahum qawmu Noohinw wa 'Aadunw wa Fir'awnu zul awtaad
verses.13: Wa Samoodu wa qawmu Lootinw wa Ashaabul 'Aykah; ulaaa'ikal Ahzaab
verses.14:
In kullun illaa kazzabar Rusula fahaqqa 'iqaab 
(section 1)
verses.15:
Wa maa yanzuru haaa ulaaa'i illaa saihatanw waahidatam maa lahaa min 
	fawaaq
verses.16: Wa qaaloo Rabbanaa 'ajjil lanaa qittanaa qabla Yawmil Hisaab
verses.17:
Isbir 'alaa maa yaqooloona wazkur 'abdanaa Daawooda zal aidi 
	innahooo awwaab
verses.18: Innaa sakhkharnal jibaala ma'ahoo yusabbihna bil'ashiyyi wal ishraaq
verses.19: Wattayra mahshoorah; kullul lahooo awwaab
verses.20: Wa shadadnaa mulkahoo wa aatainaahul Hikmata wa faslal khitaab
verses.21: Wa hal ataaka naba'ul khasm; iz tasawwarul mihraab
verses.22:
Iz dakhaloo 'alaa Daawooda fafazi'a minhum qaaloo laa takhaf khasmaani 
	baghaa ba'dunaa 'alaa ba'din fahkum bainanaaa bilhaqqi wa laa tushtit 
	wahdinaaa ilaa Sawaaa'is Siraat
verses.23:
Inna haazaaa akhee lahoo tis'unw wa tis'oona na'jatanw wa liya na'jatunw 
	waahidah; faqaala akfilneeha wa 'azzanee filkhitaab
verses.24:
Qaala laqad zalamaka bisu 'aali na'jatika ilaa ni'aajih; wa inna 
	kaseeran minal khulataaa'i la-yabghee ba'duhum 'alaa ba'din illal lazeena 
	aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati wa qaleelun maa hum; wa zanna Daawoodu annamaa 
	fatannaahu fastaghfara Rabbahoo wa kharra raaki'anw wa anaab 
	(make sajdah)
verses.25:
Faghafarnaa lahoo zaalik; wa inna lahoo 'indanaa lazulfaa wa husna ma 
	aab
verses.26:
Yaa Daawoodu innaa ja'alnaaka khaleefatan fil ardi fahkum bainan naasi 
	bilhaqqi wa laa tattabi'il hawaa fayudillaka 'an sabeelil laah; innal 
	lazeena yadilloona 'an sabeelil laah; lahum 'azaabun shadeedum bimaa nasoo 
	Yawmal Hisaab (section 2)
verses.27:
Wa maa khalaqnas samaaa'a wal arda wa maa bainahumaa baatilaa; zaalika 
	zannul lazeena kafaroo; fa waylul lil lazeena kafaroo minan Naar
verses.28:
Am naj'alul lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati kalmufisdeena fil ardi 
	am naj'alul muttaqeena kalfujjaar
verses.29:
Kitaabun anzalnaahu ilaika mubaarakul liyaddabbarooo Aayaatihee wa 
	liyatazakkara ulul albaab
verses.30: Wa wahabnaa li Daawooda Sulaimaan; ni'mal 'abd; innahoo awwaab
verses.31: Iz 'urida 'alaihi bil'ashiy yis saafinaatul jiyaad
verses.32:
Faqaala inneee ahbabtu hubbal khairi 'an zikri Rabbee hattaa tawaarat 
	bilhijaab
verses.33: Ruddoohaa 'alaiya fa tafiqa mas-ham bissooqi wal a'naaq
verses.34:
Wa laqad fatannaa Sulaimaana wa alqainaa 'alaa kursiyyihee jasadan summa 
	anaab
verses.35:
Qaala Rabbigh fir lee wa hab lee mulkal laa yambaghee li ahadin min 
	ba'dee innaka Antal Wahhaab
verses.36: Fa sakharnaa lahur reeha tajree bi amrihee rukhaaa'an haisu asaab
verses.37: Wash Shayaateena kulla bannaaa'inw wa ghawwaas
verses.38: Wa aakhareena muqarraneena fil asfaad
verses.39: Haazaa 'ataaa'unaa famnun aw amsik bighairi hisaab
verses.40:
Wa inna lahoo 'indanaa lazulfaa wa husna ma-aab 
(section 3)
verses.41:
Wazkur 'abdanaaa Ayyoob; iz naada Rabbahooo annee massaniyash Shaitaanu 
	bi nusbinw wa 'azaab
verses.42: Urkud bi rijlika haaza mughtasalun baaridunw wa sharaab
verses.43:
Wa wahabnaa lahoo ahlahoo wa mislahum ma'ahum rahmatan minna wa zikraa 
	li ulil albaab
verses.44:
Wa khuz biyadika dighsan fadrib bihee wa laa tahnas, innaa wajadnaahu 
	saabiraa; ni'mal 'abd; innahooo awwaab
verses.45:
Wazkur 'ibaadanaaa Ibraaheema wa Is-haaqa wa Ya'qooba ulil-aydee 
	walabsaar
verses.46: Innaaa akhlasnaahum bi khaalisatin zikrad daar
verses.47: Wa innahum 'indanaa laminal mustafainal akhyaar
verses.48: Wazkur Ismaa'eela wal Yasa'a wa Zal-Kifli wa kullun minal akhyaar
verses.49: Haazaa zikrun wa inna lil muttaqeena la husna ma aab
verses.50: Jannaati 'adnin mufattahatan lahumul abwaab
verses.51: Muttaki'eena feehaa yad'oona feehaa bifaakihatin kaseeratinw wa sharaab
verses.52: Wa 'indahum qaasiraatut tarfi atraab
verses.53: Haazaa maa too'adoona li Yawmil Hisaab
verses.54: Inna haazaa larizqunaa maa lahoo min nafaad
verses.55: Haazaa; wa inna littaagheena lasharra ma-aab
verses.56: Jahannama yaslawnahaa fa bi'sal mihaad
verses.57: Haazaa falyazooqoohu hameemunw wa ghassaaq
verses.58: Wa aakharu min shakliheee azwaaj
verses.59: Haazaa fawjun muqtahimun ma'akum laa marhaban bihim; innahum saalun Naar
verses.60:
Qaaloo bal antum laa marhaban bikum; antum qaddamtumoohu lanaa fabi'sal 
	qaraar
verses.61: Qaaloo Rabbanaa man qaddama lanaa haazaa fa zidhu 'azaaban di'fan fin Naar
verses.62: Wa qaaloo maa lanaa laa naraa rijaalan kunnaa na'udduhum minal ashraar
verses.63: Attakhaznaahum sikh riyyan am zaaghat 'anhumul absaar
verses.64:
Inna zaalika lahaqqun takhaasumu Ahlin Naar 
(section 4)
verses.65:
Qul innamaaa ana munzirunw wa maa min laahin illal laahul Waahidul 
	Qahhaar
verses.66: Rabbus samaawaati wal ardi wa maa bainahumal 'Azeezul Ghaffaar
verses.67: Qul huwa naba'un 'azeem
verses.68: Antum 'anhu mu'ridoon
verses.69: Maa kaana liya min 'ilmin bil mala'il a'laaa iz yakhtasimoon
verses.70: Iny-yoohaaa ilaiya illaaa anna maaa ana nazeerun mubeen
verses.71: Iz qaala Rabbuka lilmalaaa'ikati innee khaaliqun basharan min teen
verses.72: Fa-iza sawwaituhoo wa nafakhtu feehi mir roohee faqa'oo lahoo saajideen
verses.73: Fasajadal malaaa'ikatu kulluhum ajma'oon
verses.74: Illaaa Iblees; stakbara wa kaana minal kaafireen
verses.75: Qaala yaaa Ibleesu maa mana'aka an tasjuda limaa khalaqtu bi yadaiya 'a stakbarta am kunta min al 'aaleen
verses.76: Qaala ana khairum minhu; khalaqtanee min naarinw wa khalaqtahoo min teen
verses.77: Qaala fakhruj minhaa fa innaka rajeem
verses.78: Wa inna 'alaika la'nateee ilaa Yawmid Deen
verses.79: Qaala Rabbi fa anzirneee ilaa Yawmi yub'asoon
verses.80: Qaala fa innaka minal munzareen
verses.81: Ilaa Yawmil waqtil ma'loom
verses.82: Qaala fa bi 'izzatika la ughwiyannahum ajma'een
verses.83: Illaa 'ibaadaka minhumul mukhlaseen
verses.84: Qaala falhaqq, walhaqqa aqool
verses.85: La amla'anna Jahannama minka wa mimman tabi'aka minhum ajma'een
verses.86: Qul maaa as'alukum 'alaihi min ajrinw wa maaa ana minal mutakallifeen
verses.87: In huwa illaa zikrul lil'aalameen
verses.88:
Wa lata'lamunna naba ahoo ba'da heen 
(section 5)

verses.2:
Innaaa anzalnaaa ilaikal Kitaaba bilhaqqi fa'budil laaha mukhlisal lahud 
	deen
verses.3:
Alaa lillaahid deenul khaalis; wallazeenat takhazoo min dooniheee 
	awliyaaa'a maa na'buduhum illaa liyuqar riboonaaa ilal laahi zulfaa; innal 
	laaha yahkumu baina hum fee maa hum feehi yakhtalifoon; innal laaha laa 
	yahdee man huwa kaazibun kaffaar
verses.4:
Law araadal laahu aiyattakhiza waladal lastafaa mimmaa yakhluqu maa 
	yashaaa'; Subhaanahoo Huwal laahul Waahidul Qahhaar
verses.5:
Khalaqas samaawaati wal arda bilhaqq; yukawwirul laila 'alan nahaari wa 
	yukawwirun nahaara 'alaal laili wa sakhkharash shamsa walqamara kulluny 
	yajree li ajalim musammaa; alaa Huwal 'Azeezul Ghaffaar
verses.6:
Khalaqakum min nafsinw waahidatin summa ja'ala minhaa zawjahaa wa anzala 
	lakum minal-an'aami samaani yata azwaaj; yakhlu qukum fee butooni 
	ummahaatikum khalqam mim ba'di khalqin fee zulumaatin salaas; zaalikumul 
	laahu Rabbukum lahul mulk; laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa fa annaa tusrafoon
verses.8:
Wa izaa massal insaana durrun da'aa Rabbahoo muneeban ilaihi summa izaa 
	khawwalahoo ni'matam minhu nasiya maa kaana yad'ooo ilaihi min qablu wa 
	ja'ala lillaahi andaadal liyudilla 'ansabeelih; qul tamatta' bikufrika 
	qaleelan innaka min Ashaabin Naar;
verses.9:
Amman huwa qaanitun aanaaa'al laili saajidanw wa qaaa'imai yahzarul 
	Aakhirata wa yarjoo rahmata Rabbih; qul hal yastawil lazeena ya'lamoona 
	wallazeena laa ya'lamoon; innamaa yatazakkaru ulul albaab (section 1)
verses.10:
Qul yaa 'ibaadil lazeena aamanut taqoo Rabbakum; lillazeena ahsanoo fee 
	haazihid dunyaa hasanah; wa ardul laahi waasi'ah; innamaa yuwaffas 
	saabiroona ajrahum bighayri hisab
verses.11: Qul inneee umirtu an a'budal laaha mukhlisal lahud deen
verses.12: Wa umirtu li an akoona awwalal muslimeen
verses.13: Qul inneee akhaafu in 'asaitu Rabbee 'azaaba Yawmin 'azeem
verses.14: Qulil laaha a'budu mukhlisal lahoo deenee
verses.15:
Fa'budoo maa shi'tum min doonih; qul innal khaasireenal lazeena 
	khasirooo anfusahum wa ahleehim yawmal qiyaamah; alaa zaalika huwal 
	khusraanul mubeen
verses.16:
Lahum min fawqihim zulalum minan Naari wa min tahtihim zulal; zaalika 
	yukhaw wiful laahu bihee 'ibaadah; yaa 'ibaadi fattaqoon
verses.17:
Wallazeenaj tanabut Taaghoota ai ya'budoohaa wa anaabooo ilal laahi 
	lahumul bushraa; fabashshir 'ibaad
verses.18:
Allazeena yastami'oonal qawla fayattabi'oona ahsanah; ulaaa'ikal lazeena 
	hadaahumul laahu wa ulaaa'ika hum ulul albaab
verses.19: Afaman haqqa 'alaihi kalimatul 'azaab; afa anta tunqizu man fin Naar
verses.20:
Laakinil lazeenat taqaw Rabbahum lahum ghurafum min fawqihaa ghurafum 
	mabniyyatun tajree min tahtihal anhaar; wa'dal laah; laa yukhliful laahul 
	mee'aad
verses.21:
Alam tara annal laaha anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an fasalakahoo 
	yanaabee'a fil ardi summa yukhriju bihee zar'am mukhtalifan alwaanuhoo summa 
	yaheeju fatarahu musfarran summa yaj'aluhoo hutaamaa; inna fee zaalika 
	lazikraa li ulil albaab (section 2)
verses.22:
Afaman sharahal laahu sadrahoo lil Islaami fahuwa 'alaa noorim mir 
	Rabbih; fa wailul lilqaasiyati quloobuhum min zikril laah; ulaaa'ika fee 
	dalaalim mubeen
verses.23:
Allahu nazzala ahsanal hadeesi Kitaabam mutashaa biham masaaniy 
	taqsha'irru minhu juloodul lazeena yakhshawna Rabbahum summa taleenu 
	julooduhum wa quloo buhum ilaa zikril laah; zaalika hudal laahi yahdee bihee 
	mai yashaaa'; wa mai yudlilil laahu famaa lahoo min haad
verses.24:
Afamai yattaqee biwaj hihee sooo'al 'azaabi Yawmal Qiyaamah; wa qeela 
	lizzaali meena zooqoo maa kuntum taksiboon
verses.25:
Kazzabal lazeena min qablihim fa ataahumul 'azaabu min haisu laa 
	yash'uroon
verses.26:
Fa azaaqahumul laahul khizya fil hayaatid dunyaa wa la'azaabul Aakhirati 
	akbar; law kaanoo ya'lamoon
verses.27:
Wa laqad darabnaa linnaasi fee haazal Qur-aani min kulli masalil 
	la'allahum yatazakkaroon
verses.28: Qur-aanan 'Arabiyyan ghaira zee 'iwajil la'allahum yattaqoon
verses.29: Darabal laahu masalar rajulan feehi shurakaaa'u mutashaakisoona wa rajulan salamal lirajulin hal yastawi yaani masalaa; alhamdu lillaah; bal aksaruhum laa ya'lamoon
verses.30: Innaka maiyitunw wa inna hum maiyitoon
verses.31:
Summa innakum Yawmal Qiyaamati 'inda Rabbikum takhtasimoon (section 3)
	(End Juz 23)
verses.32:
Faman azlamu mimman kazaba 'alal laahi wa kazzaba bissidqi iz jaaa'ah; 
	alaisa fee Jahannama maswal lilkaafireen
verses.33: Wallazee jaaa'a bissidqi wa saddaqa biheee ulaaa'ika humul muttaqoon
verses.34: Lahum maa yashaaa'oona 'inda Rabbihim; zaalika jazaaa'ul muhsineen
verses.35:
Liyukaffiral laahu 'anhum aswa allazee 'amiloo wa yajziyahum ajrahum bi 
	ahsanil lazee kaano ya'maloon
verses.36:
Alaisal laahu bikaafin 'abdahoo wa yukhawwi foonaka billazeena min 
	doonih; wa mai yudlilil laahu famaa lahoo min haad
verses.37:
Wa mai yahdil laahu famaa lahoo min mudil; alai sal laahu bi'azeezin zin 
	tiqaam
verses.38:
Wa la'in sa altahum man khalaqas samaawaati wal arda la yaqoolunal laah; 
	qul afara'aitum maa tad'oona min doonil laahi in araadaniyal laahu bidurrin 
	hal hunna kaashi faatu durriheee aw araadanee birahmatin hal hunna 
	mumsikaatu rahmatih; qul hasbiyal laahu 'alaihi yatawakkalul mutawakkiloon
verses.39: Qul yaa qawmi'maloo 'alaa makaanatikum innee 'aamilun fasawfa ta'lamoon
verses.40: Mai yaateehi 'azaabuny yukhzeehi wa yahillu 'alaihi 'azaabum muqeem
verses.41:
Innaa anzalnaa 'alaikal Kitaaba linnaasi bilhaqq; famanih tadaa 
	falinafsihee wa man dalla fa innamaa yadillu 'alaihaa wa maaa anta 'alaihim 
	biwakeel (section 4)
verses.42:
Allaahu yatawaffal anfusa heena mawtihaa wallatee lam tamut fee 
	manaamihaa fa yumsikul latee qadaa 'alaihal mawta wa yursilul ukhraaa ilaaa 
	ajalim musammaa; inna fee zaalika la Aayaatil liqawmai yatafakkarroon
verses.43:
Amit takhazoo min doonillaahi shufa'aaa'; qul awalaw kaanoo laa 
	yamlikoona shai'aw wa laa ya'qiloon
verses.44:
Qul lillaahish shafaa'atu jamee'aa; lahoo mulkus samaawaati wal ardi 
	summa ilaihi turja'oon
verses.45:
Wa izaa zukiral laahu wahdahush ma azzat quloobul lazeena laa yu'minoona 
	bil Aakhirati wa izaa zukiral lazeena min dooniheee izaa hum yastabshiroon
verses.46:
Qulil laahumma faatiras samaawaati wal ardi 'Aalimal Ghaibi 
	washshahaadati Anta tahkumu baina 'ibaadika fee maa kaanoo feehee yakhtalifoon
verses.47:
Wa law anna lillazeena zalamoo maa fil ardi jamee'anw wa mislahoo 
	ma'ahoo laftadaw bihee min sooo'il azaabi Yawmal Qiyaamah; wa badaa lahum 
	minal laahi maa lam yakoonoo yahtasiboon
verses.48:
Wa badaa lahum saiyiaatu maa kasaboo wa haaqa bihim maa kaanoo bihee 
	yastahzi'oon
verses.49:
Fa izaa massal insaana durrun da'aanaa summa izaa khawwalnaahu ni'matam 
	minna qaala innamaaa ootee tuhoo 'alaa 'ilm; bal hiya fitna tunw wa laakinna 
	aksarahum laa ya'lamoon
verses.50:
Qad qaalahal lazeena min qablihim famaaa aghnaa 'anhum maa kaanoo 
	yaksiboon
verses.51:
Fa asaabahum saiyi aatu maa kasaboo; wallazeena zalamoo min haaa'ulaaa'i 
	sa yuseebuhum saiyi aatu maa kasaboo wa maa hum bimu'jizeen
verses.52:
Awalam ya'lamooo annal laaha yabsutur rizqa limai yashaaa'u wa yaqdir; 
	inna fee zaalika la Aayaatil liqawminy yu'minoon (section 5)
verses.53:
Qul yaa'ibaadiyal lazeena asrafoo 'alaaa anfusihim laa taqnatoo 
	mirrahmatil laah; innal laaha yaghfiruz zunooba jamee'aa; innahoo Huwal 
	Ghafoorur Raheem
verses.54:
Wa aneebooo ilaa Rabbikum wa aslimoo lahoo min qabli any yaatiyakumul 'azaabu 
	summa laa tunsaroon
verses.55:
Wattabi'ooo ahsana maaa unzila ilaikum mir Rabbikum min qabli 
	aiyaatiyakumal 'azaabu baghtatanw wa antum laa tash'uroon
verses.56:
An taqoola nafsuny yaahasrataa 'alaa maa farrattu fee jambil laahi wa in 
	kuntu laminas saakhireen
verses.57: Aw taqoola law annal laaha hadaanee lakuntu minal muttaqeen
verses.58:
Aw taqoola heena taral 'azaaba law anna lee karratan fa akoona minal 
	muhsineen
verses.59:
Balaa qad jaaa'atka aayaatee fa kazzabta bihaa wa stakbarta wa kunta 
	minal kaafireen
verses.60:
Wa Yawmal Qiyaamati taral lazeena kazaboo 'alallaahi wujoohuhum 
	muswaddah; alaisa fee Jahannama maswal lilmutakabbireen
verses.61:
Wa yunajjil laahul lazee nat taqaw bimafaazatihim laa yamassuhumus 
	sooo'u wa laa hum yahzanoon
verses.62: Allaahu khaaliqu kulli shai'inw wa Huwa 'alaa kulli shai'inw Wakeel
verses.63:
Lahoo maqaaleedus sa maawaati wal ard; wallazeena kafaroo bi ayaatil 
	laahi ulaaa'ika humul khaasiroon (section 6)
verses.64: Qul afaghairal laahi taamurooonneee a'budu ayyuhal jaahiloon
verses.65:
Wa laqad oohiya ilaika wa ilal lazeena min qablika la in ashrakta la 
	yahbatanna 'amalu ka wa latakoonanna minal khaasireen
verses.66: Balil laahha fa'bud wa kum minash shaakireen
verses.67:
Wa maa qadarul laaha haqqa qadrihee wal ardu jamee 'an qabdatuhoo Yawmal 
	Qiyaamati wassamaawaatu matwiyyaatum biyameenih; Subhaanahoo wa Ta'aalaa 'amma 
	yushrikoon
verses.68:
Wa nufikha fis Soori fasa'iqa man fis samaawaati wa man fil ardi illaa 
	man shaa'al lahu summa nufikha feehi ukhraa fa izaa hum qiyaamuny yanzuroon
verses.69:
Wa ashraqatil ardu binoori Rabbihaa wa wudi'al Kitaabu wa jeee'a bin 
	nabiyyeena wash shuhadaaa'i wa qudiya bainahum bilhaqqi wa hum laa yuzlamoon
verses.70:
Wa wuffiyat kullu nafsim maa 'amilat wa Huwa a'lamu bimaa yaf'aloon 
	(section 7)
verses.71:
Wa seeqal lazeena kafaroo ilaa jahannama zumaraa hattaaa izaa 
	jaaa'oohaa futihat abwaabuhaa wa qaala lahum khazanatuhaaa alam ya'tikum Rusulun minkum yatloona 'alaikum Aayaati Rabbikum wa yunziroonakum liqaaa'a 
	Yawmikum haazaa; qaaloo balaa wa laakin haqqat kalimatul 'azaabi 'alal 
	kaafireen
verses.72:
Qeelad khuloo abwaaba jahannama khaalideena feeha fabi'sa maswal 
	mutakabbireen
verses.73:
Wa seeqal lazeenat taqaw Rabbahum ilal Jannati zumaraa hattaaa izaa 
	jaaa'oohaa wa futihat abwaabuhaa wa qaala lahum khazanatuhaa salaamun 'alaikum 
	tibtum fadkhuloohaa khaalideen
verses.74:
Wa qaalull hamdulillaahil lazee sadaqanaa wa'dahoo wa awrasanal arda 
	natabaw wa-u minal jannati haisu nashaaa'u fani'ma ajrul 'aamileen
verses.75:
Wa taral malaaa'ikata haaaffeena min hawlil 'Arshi yusabbihoona bihamdi 
	Rabbihim wa qudiya bainahum bilhaqqi wa qeelal hamdu lillaahi Rabbil 'aalameen 
	(section 8)

verses.3:
Ghaafiriz zambi wa qaabilit tawbi shadeedil 'iqaabi zit tawli laaa 
	ilaaha illaa Huwa ilaihil maseer
verses.4:
Maa yujaadilu feee Aayaatil laahi illal lazeena kafaroo falaa yaghrurka 
	taqallubuhum fil bilaad
verses.5:
Kazzabat qablahum qawmu Noohinw wal Ahzaabu min ba'dihim wa hammat kullu 
	ummatin bi Rasoolihim li ya'khuzoohu wa jaadaloo bilbaatili li yud hidoo 
	bihil haqqa fa akhaztuhum fa kaifa kaana 'iqaab
verses.6:
Wa kazaalika haqqat Kalimatu Rabbika 'alal lazeena kafarooo annahum 
	Ashaabun Naar
verses.7:
Allazeena yahmiloonal 'Arsha wa man hawlahoo yusabbihoona bihamdi 
	Rabbihim wa yu'minoona bihee wa yastaghfiroona lillazeena aamanoo Rabbanaa 
	wasi'ta kulla shai'ir rahmatanw wa 'ilman faghfir lillazeena taaboo 
	wattaba'oo sabeelaka wa qihim 'azaabal Jaheem
verses.8:
Rabbanaa wa adkhilhum Jannaati 'adninil latee wa'attahum wa man salaha 
	min aabaaa'ihim wa azwaajihim wa zurriyyaatihim; innaka Antal 'Azeezul 
	Hakeem
verses.9:
Wa qihimus saiyi-aat; wa man taqis saiyi-aati Yawma'izin faqad rahimtah; 
	wa zaalika huwal fawzul 'azeem (section 1)
verses.10:
Innal lazeena kafaroo yunaadawna lamaqtul laahi akbaru mim maqtikum 
	anfusakum iz tud'awna ilal eemaani fatakfuroon
verses.11:
Qaaloo Rabbanaaa amat  tanasnataini wa ahyaitanas nataini 
	fa'tarafnaa bizunoo binaa fahal ilaa khuroojim min sabeel
verses.12:
Zaalikum bi annahooo izaa du'iyal laahu wahdahoo kafartum wa iny yushrak 
	bihee tu'minoo; falhukmu lillaahil 'Aliyyil Kabeer
verses.13:
Huwal lazee yureekum Aayaatihee wa yunazzilu lakum minas samaaa'i 
	rizqaa; wa maa yatazakkaru illaa mai yuneeb
verses.14: Fad'ul laaha mukhliseena lahud deena wa law karihal kaafiroon
verses.15:
Rafee'ud darajaati zul 'Arshi yulqir rooha min amrihee 'alaa mai 
	yashaaa'u min 'ibaadihee liyunzira yawmat talaaq
verses.16:
Yawma hum baarizoona laa yakhfaa 'alal laahi minhum shai; limanil mulkul 
	Yawma lillaahil Waahidil Qahaar
verses.17:
Al-Yawma tujzaa kullu nafsim bimaa kasabat; laa zulmal Yawm; innal laaha 
	saree'ul hisaab
verses.18:
Wa anzirhum yawmal aazifati izil quloobu ladal hanaajiri kaazimeen; maa 
	lizzaalimeena min hameeminw wa laa shafee'iny-yutaa'
verses.19: Ya'lamu khaaa'inatal a'yuni wa maa tukhfis sudoor
verses.20:
Wallaahu yaqdee bilhaqq, wallazeena yad'oona min doonihee laa yaqdoona 
	bishai'; innal laaha Huwas Samee'ul Baseer 
(section 2)
verses.21:
Awalam yaseeroo fil ardi fa yanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul lazeena 
	kaanoo min qablihim; kaanoo hum ashadda minhum quwwatanw wa aasaaran fil 
	ardi fa akhazahumul laahu bizunoobihim wa maa kaana lahum minal laahi minw 
	waaq
verses.22:
Zaalika bi annahum kaanat taateehim Rusuluhum bilbaiyinaati fakafaroo fa 
	akhazahumul laah; innahoo qawiyyun shadeedul 'iqaab
verses.23: Wa laqad arsalnaa Moosaa bi Aayaatinaa wa sultaanim mubeen
verses.24: Ilaa Fir'awna wa Haamaana wa Qaaroona faqaaloo saahirun kazzaab
verses.25:
Falamma jaaa'ahum bil haqqi min 'indinaa qaaluq tulooo abnaaa'al 
	lazeena aamanoo ma'ahoo wastahyoo nisaaa'ahum; wa maa kaidul kaafireena 
	illaa fee dalaal
verses.26:
Wa qaala Fir'awnu zarooneee aqtul Moosaa walyad'u Rabbahoo inneee 
	akhaafu ai yubaddila deenakum aw ai yuzhira fil ardil fasaad
verses.27:
Wa qaala Moosaaaa innee 'uztu bi Rabbee wa Rabbikum min kulli 
	mutakabbiril laayu'minu bi Yawmil Hisaab 
(section 3)
verses.28:
Wa qaala rajulum mu'minummin Aali Fir'awna yaktumu eemaanahooo 
	ataqtuloona rajulan ai yaqoola Rabbi yal laahu wa qad jaaa'akum bil 
	baiyinaati mir Rabbikum wa iny yaku kaaziban fa'alaihi kazibuh wa iny 
	yaku saadiqany yasibkum ba'dul lazee ya'idukum innal laaha laa yahdee man 
	huwa musrifun kazzaab
verses.29:
Yaa qawmi lakumul mulkul yawma zaahireena fil ardi famai yansurunaa mim 
	baasil laahi in jaaa'anaa; qaala Fir'awnu maaa ureekum illaa maaa araa wa 
	maaa ahdeekum illaa sabeelar Rashaad
verses.30:
Wa qaalal lazee aamana yaa qawmi inneee akhaafu 'alaikum misla yawmil 
	Ahzaab
verses.31:
Misla daabi qawmi Noohinw wa 'aadinw wa Samooda wallazeena mim ba'dihim; 
	wa mal laahu yureedu zulmal lil'ibaad
verses.32: Wa yaa qawmi inneee akhaafu 'alaikum yawmat tanaad
verses.33:
Yawma tuwalloona mud bireena maa lakum minal laahi min 'aasim; wa mai 
	yudlilil laahu famaa lahoo min haad
verses.34:
Wa laqad jaaa'akum Yoosufu min qablu bil baiyinaati famaa ziltum fee 
	shakkim mimmaa jaaa'akum bihee hattaaa izaa halaka qultum lai yab asal laahu 
	mim ba'dihee Rasoolaa; kazaalika yudillul laahu man huwa Musrifum murtaab
verses.35:
Allazeena yujaadiloona feee Aaayaatil laahi bighairi sultaanin ataahum 
	kabura maqtan 'indal laahi wa 'indal lazeena aamanoo; kazaalika yatbahul laahu 'alaa kulli qalbi mutakabbirin jabbaar
verses.36: Wa qaala Fir'awnu yaa Haamaanub-ni lee sarhal la'alleee ablughul asbaab
verses.37:
Asbaabas samaawaati faattali'a ilaaa ilaahi Moosaa wa innee la azunnuhoo 
	kaazibaa; wa kazaalika zuyyina li-Fir'awna sooo'u 'amalihee wa sudda 'anis 
	sabeel; wa maa kaidu Fir'awna illaa fee tabaab 
(section 4)
verses.38: Wa qaalal lazeee aamana yaa qawmit tabi'ooni ahdikum sabeelar rashaad
verses.39:
Yaa qawmi innamaa haazihil hayaatud dunyaa mataa'unw wa innal Aakhirata 
	hiya daarul qaraar
verses.40:
Man 'amila saiyi'atan falaa yujzaaa illaa mislahaa wa man 'amila 
	saaliham min zakarin aw unsaa wa huwa mu'minun fa ulaaa'ika yadkhuloonal 
	Jannata yurzaqoona feehaa bighairi hisaab
verses.41: Wa yaa qawmi maa leee ad'ookum ilan najaati wa tad'oonaneee ilan Naar
verses.42:
Tad'oonanee li-akfura billaahi wa ushrika bihee maa laisa lee bihee 
	'ilmunw wa ana ad'ookum ilal'Azeezil Ghaffaar
verses.43:
Laa jarama annamaa tad'oonanee ilaihi laisa lahoo da'watun fid dunyaa wa 
	laa fil Aakhirati wa anna maraddanaaa ilal laahi wa annal musrifeenahum 
	Ashaabun Naar
verses.44:
Fasatazkuroona maaa aqoolu lakum; wa ufawwidu amreee ilal laah; 
	innallaaha baseerum bil'ibaad
verses.45:
Fa waqaahul laahu saiyiaati maa makaroo wa haaqa bi Aali-Fir'awna 
	sooo'ul 'azaab
verses.46:
An Naaru yu'radoona 'alaihaa ghuduwwanw wa 'ashiyyanw wa Yawma taqoomus 
	Saa'aatu adkhilooo Aala Fir'awna ashaddal 'azaab
verses.47:
Wa iz yatahaaajjoona fin Naari fa-yaqoolud du'afaaa'u lillazeenas 
	takbarooo innaa kunnaa lakum taba'an fahal antum mughnoona annaa naseebam 
	minan Naar
verses.48:
Qaalal lazeenas takbarooo innaa kullun feehaaa innal laaha qad hakama 
	baynal'ibaad
verses.49:
Wa qaalal lazeena fin Naari likhazanati Jahannamad-'oo Rabbakum yukhaffif 
	'annaa yawmam minal 'azaab
verses.50:
Qaalooo awalam taku taateekum Rusulukum bilbaiyinaati qaaloo balaa' 
	qaaloo fad'oo; wa maa du'aaa'ul kaafireena illaa fee dalaal 
(section 5)
verses.51:
Innaa lanansuru Rusulanaa wallazeena aamanoo fil hayaatid dunyaa wa 
	Yawma yaqoomul ashhaad
verses.52:
Yawma laa yanfa'uz zaalimeena ma'ziratuhum wa lahumul la'natu wa lahum 
	soooud daar
verses.53: Wa laqad aatainaa Moosal hudaa wa awrasnaa Baneee Israaa 'eelal Kitaab
verses.54: Hudanw wa zikraa li ulil albaab
verses.55:
Fasbir inna wa'dal laahi haqqunw wastaghfir lizambika wa sabbih bihamdi 
	Rabbika bil'ashiyyi wal ibkaar
verses.56:
Innal lazeena yujaadi loona feee Aayaatil laahi bighairi sultaanin 
	ataahum in fee sudoorihim illaa kibrum maa hum bibaaligheeh; fasta'iz 
	billaahi innahoo Huwas Samee'ul Baseer
verses.57:
Lakhalqus samaawaati wal ardi akbaru min khalqin naasi wa laakinna 
	aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon
verses.58:
Wa maa yastawil a'maa walbaseeru wallazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus 
	saalihaati wa lal museee'; qaleelam maa tatazakkaroon
verses.59:
Innas Saa'ata la aatiyatul laa raiba feehaa wa laakinna aksaran naasi 
	laa yu'minoon
verses.60:
Wa qaala Rabbukumud 'ooneee astajib lakum; innal lazeena yastakbiroona 
	an 'ibaadatee sa yadkhuloona jahannama daakhireen 
(Section 6)
verses.61:
Allaahul lazee ja'ala lakumul laila littaskunoo feehi wannahaara 
	mubsiraa; innal laaha lazoo fadlin 'alan naasi wa laakinna aksaran naasi laa 
	yashkuroon
verses.62:
Zaalikumul laahu Rabbukum khaaliqu kulli shai'in; laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa 
	fa annaa tu'fakoon
verses.63: Kazaalika yu'fakul lazeena kaanoo bi Aayaatil laahi yajhadoon
verses.64:
Allaahul lazee ja'ala lakumul arda qaraaranw wassa maaa'a binaaa'anw wa 
	sawwarakum fa ahsana suwarakum wa razaqakum minat taiyibaat; zaalikumul 
	laahu Rabbukum fatabaarakal laahu Rabbul 'aalameen
verses.65:
Huwal Hayyu laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa fad'oohu mukh liseena lahud-deen; 
	alhamdu lillaahi Rabbil 'aalameen
verses.66:
Qul innee nuheetu an a'budal lazeena tad'oona min doonil laahi lammaa 
	jaaa'a niyal baiyinaatu mir Rabbee wa umirtu an uslima li Rabbil 'aalameen
verses.67:
Huwal lazee khalaqakum min turaabin summa min nutfatin summa min 
	'alaqatin summa yukhrijukum tiflan summa litablughooo ashuddakum summa 
	litakoonoo shuyookhaa; wa minkum mai yutawaffaa min qablu wa litablughooo 
	ajalam musam manw-wa la'allakum ta'qiloon
verses.68:
Huwal lazee yuhyee wa yumeetu fa izaa qadaaa amran fa innamaa yaqoolu 
	lahoo kun fa yakoon (section 7)
verses.69: Alam tara ilal lazeena yujaadiloona feee Aayaatil laahi annaa yusrafoon
verses.70:
Allazeena kazzaboo bil Kitaabi wa bimaa arsalnaa bihee Rusulanaa fasawfa 
	ya'lamoon
verses.71: Izil aghlaalu feee a'naaqi-him wassalaasilu yushaboon
verses.72: Fil hameemi summa fin Naari Yasjaroon
verses.73: Summaa qeela lahum ayna maa kuntum tushrikoon
verses.74:
Min doonil laahi qaaloo dalloo 'annaa bal lam nakun nad'oo min qablu 
	shai'aa; kazaalika yudillul laahul kaafireen
verses.75:
Zaalikum bimaa kuntum tafrahoona fil ardi bighairil haqqi wa bimaa 
	kuntum tamrahoon
verses.76:
Udkhulooo abwaaba Jahannama khaalideena feehaa fabi'sa maswal 
	mutakabbireen
verses.77:
Fasbir inna wa'dal laahi haqq; fa immaa nuriyannak ba'dal lazee na'i 
	duhum aw natawaffayannaka fa ilainaa yurja'oon
verses.78:
Wa laqad arsalnaa Rusulam min qablika minhum man qasasnaa 'alaika wa 
	minhum mal lam naqsus 'alaik; wa maa kaana li Rasoolin any yaatiya bi 
	Aayatin illaa bi iznil laah; fa izaa jaaa'a amrul laahi qudiya bilhaqqi wa 
	khasira hunaalikal mubtiloon 
	(section 8)
verses.79:
Allaahul lazee ja'ala lakumul an'aama litarkaboo minhaa wa minhaa 
	taakuloon
verses.80:
Wa lakum feehaa manaafi'u wa litablughoo 'alaihaa haajatan fee 
	sudoorikum wa 'alaihaa wa 'alal fulki tuhmaloon
verses.81: Wa yureekum Aayaatihee fa ayya Aayaatil laahi tunkiroon
verses.82:
Afalam yaseeroo fil ardi fa yanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul lazeena min 
	qablihim; kaanoo aksara minhum wa ashadda quwwatanw wa aasaaran fil ardi 
	famaaa aghnaa 'anhum maa kaanoo yaksiboon
verses.83:
Falammaa jaaa'at hum Rusuluhum bilbaiyinaati farihoo bimaa 'indahum 
	minal 'ilmi wa haaqa bihim maa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon
verses.84:
Falammaa ra aw baasanaa qaalooo aamannaa billaahi wahdahoo wa kafarnaa 
	bimaa kunnaa bihee mushrikeen
verses.85:
Falam yaku yanfa 'uhum eemaanuhum lammaa ra-aw ba'sana sunnatal laahil 
	latee qad khalat fee 'ibaadihee wa khasira hunaalikal kaafiroon 
(section 9)

verses.3: Kitaabun fussilat Aayaatuhoo Qur-aanan 'Arabiyyal liqawminy ya'lamoon
verses.4: Basheeranw wa nazeeran fa-a'rada aksaruhum fahum laa yasma'oon
verses.5:
Wa qaaloo quloobunaa feee akinnatim mimmaa tad'oonaaa ilaihi wa feee 
	aazaaninaa waqrunw wa mim baininaa wa bainika hijaabun fa'mal innanaa 
	'aamiloon
verses.6:
Qul innamaaa ana basharum mislukum yoohaaa ilaiya annamaaa ilaahukum 
	Ilaahunw Waahidun fastaqeemooo ilaihi wastaghfirooh; wa wailul lil mushrikeen
verses.7: Allazeena laa yu'toonaz Zakaata wa hum bil-Aakhiratihum kaafiroon
verses.8:
Innal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati lahum ajrun ghairu mamnoon
	(section 1)
verses.9:
Qul a'innakum latakfuroona billazee khalaqal arda fee yawmaini wa 
	taj'aloona lahooo andaadaa; zaalika Rabbul 'aalameen
verses.10:
Wa ja'ala feehaa rawaa siya min fawqihaa wa baaraka feehaa wa qaddara 
	feehaaaa aqwaatahaa feee arba'ati ayyaamin sawaaa'al lissaaa'ileen
verses.11:
Summas tawaaa ilas-samaaa'i wa hiya dukhaanun faqaala lahaa wa lil 
	ardi'tiyaaa taw'an aw karhan qaalataaa atainaa taaa'i'een
verses.12:
Faqadaahunna sab'a samaawaatin fee yawmaini wa awhaa fee kulli samaaa'in 
	amarahaa; wa zaiyannassa maaa'ad dunyaa bimasaabeeha wa hifzaa; zaalika 
	taqdeerul 'Azeezil 'Aleem
verses.13:
Fa-in a'radoo faqul anzartukum saa'iqatam misla saa'iqati 'Aadinw wa 
	Samood
verses.14:
Iz jaaa'at humur Rusulu mim baini aydeehim wa min khalfihim allaa 
	ta'budooo illal laaha qaaloo law shaaa'a Rabunaa la anzala malaaa 'ikatan fa 
	innaa bimaaa ursiltum bihee kaafiroon
verses.15:
Fa ammaa 'Aadun fastak baroo fil ardi bighairul haqqi wa qaaloo man 
	ashaddu minnaa quwwatan awalam yaraw annal laahal lazee khalaqahum Huwa 
	ashaddu minhum quwwatanw wa kaanoo bi Aayaatinaa yajhadoon
verses.16:
Fa arsalnaa 'alaihim reehan sarsaran feee ayyaamin nahisaatil 
	linuzeeqahum 'azaabal khizyi fil hayaatid dunyaa wa la'azaabul Aakhirati 
	akhzaa wa hum laa yunsaroon
verses.17:
Wa ammaa Samoodu fahadinaahum fastahabbul 'ama 'alal huda fa akhazathum 
	saa'iqatul 'azaabil hooni bimaa kaanoo yaksiboon
verses.18:
Wa najjainal lazeena aamanoo wa kaanoo yattaqoon 
(section 2)
verses.19: Wa yawma yuhsharu a'daaa'ul laahi ilan Naari fahum yooza'oon
verses.20:
Hattaaa izaa maa jaaa'oohaa shahida 'alaihim samu'uhum wa absaaruhum wa 
	julooduhum bimaa kaanoo ya'maloon
verses.21:
Wa qaaloo lijuloodihim lima shahittum 'alainaa qaaloo antaqanal laahul 
	lazeee antaqa kulla shai'inw wa Huwa khalaqakum awwala marratinw wa ilaihi 
	turja'oon
verses.22:
Wa maa kuntum tastatiroona ai-yashhada 'alaikum sam'ukum wa laaa 
	absaarukum wa laa juloodukum wa laakin zanantum annal laaha laa ya'lamu 
	kaseeram mimmaa ta'maloon
verses.23:
Wa zaalikum zannukumul lazee zanantum bi-Rabbikum ardaakum fa asbahtum 
	minal khaasireen
verses.24:
Fa-iny yasbiroo fan Naaru maswal lahum wa iny-yasta'tiboo famaa hum 
	minal mu'tabeen
verses.25:
Wa qaiyadnaa lahum quranaaa'a fazaiyanoo lahum maa baina aideehim wa maa 
	khalfahum wa haqqa 'alaihimul qawlu feee umamin  qad khalat min 
	qablihim minal jinni wal insi innahum kaanoo khaasireen 
(section 3)
verses.26:
Wa qaalal lazeena kafaroo laa tasma'oo lihaazal Quraani walghaw feehi 
	la'allakum taghliboon
verses.27:
Falanuzeeqannal lazeena kafaroo 'azaaban shadeedanw wa lanajziyannahum 
	aswallazee kaanoo ya'maloon
verses.28:
Zaalika jazaaa'u a'daaa'il laahin Naaru lahum feehaa daarul khuld, 
	jazaaa'am bimaa kaanoo bi aayaatinaa yajhadoon
verses.29:
Wa qaalal lazeena kafaroo Rabbanaaa arinal lazaini adal laanaa minal 
	jinni wal insi naj'alhumaa tahta aqdaaminaa liyakoonaa minal asfaleen
verses.30:
Innal lazeena qaaloo Rabbunal laahu summas taqaamoo tatanazzalu 
	'alaihimul malaaa 'ikatu allaa takhaafoo wa laa tahzanoo wa abshiroo bil 
	Jannnatil latee kuntum too'adoon
verses.31:
Nahnu awliyaaa'ukum fil hayaatid dunyaa wa fil Aakhirati wa lakum feehaa 
	maa tashtaheee anfusukum wa lakum feehaa ma tadda'oon
verses.32:
Nuzulam min Ghafoorir Raheem 
(section 4)
verses.33:
Wa man ahsanu qawlam mimman da'aaa ilal laahi wa 'amila saalihanw wa 
	qaala innanee minal muslimeen
verses.34:
Wa laa tastawil hasanatu wa las saiyi'ah; idfa' billatee hiya ahsanu 
	fa'izal lazee bainaka wa bainahoo 'adaawatun ka'annahoo waliyun hameem
verses.35:
Wa maa yulaqqaahaaa illal lazeena sabaroo wa maa yulaqqaahaaa illaa zoo 
	hazzin 'azeem
verses.36:
Wa immaa yanzaghannaka minash Shaitaani nazghun fasta'iz billaahi 
	innahoo Huwas Samee'ul 'Aleem
verses.37:
Wa min Aayaatihil lailu wannahaaru washshamsu walqamar; laa tasjudoo 
	lishshamsi wa laa lilqamari wasjudoo lillaahil lazee khala qahunna in kuntum 
	iyyaahu ta'budoon
verses.38:
Fa inis-takbaroo fallazee na 'inda Rabbika yusabbihoona lahoo billaili 
	wannnahaari wa hum laa yas'amoon (make sajda)
verses.40:
Innal lazeena yulhidoona feee Aayaatina laa yakhfawna 'alainaa' afamai 
	yulqaa fin Naari khayrun am mai yaateee aaminai Yawmal Qiyaamah; i'maloo ma 
	shi'tum innahoo bimaa ta'maloona Baseer
verses.41:
Innal Lazeena kafaroo biz Zikri lammaa jaa'ahum wa innahoo la Kitaabun 
	'Azeez
verses.42:
Laa yaateehil baatilu mim baini yadaihi wa laa min khalfihee tanzeelum 
	min Hakeemin Hameed
verses.43:
Maa yuqaalu laka illaa maa qad qeela lir Rusuli min qablik; inna Rabbaka 
	lazoo maghfiratinw wa zoo 'iqaabin aleem
verses.44:
Wa law ja'alnaahu Qur-aanan A'jamiyyal laqaaloo law laa fussilat 
	Aayaatuhoo 'a A'jamiyyunw wa 'Arabiyy; qul huwa lillazeena aamanoo hudanw wa 
	shifaaa'unw wallazeena la yu'minoona feee aazaanihim waqrunw wa huwa 
	'alaihim 'amaa; ulaaa'ika yunaadawna mim maakaanim ba'eed 
(section 5)
verses.45:
Wa laqad aatainaa Moosal Kitaaba fakhtulifa fee; wa lawlaa Kalimatun 
	sabaqat mir Rabbika laqudiya bainahum; wa innahum lafee shakkim minhu mureeb
verses.46:
Man 'amila salihan falinafsihee wa man asaaa'a fa'alaihaa; wamaa 
	rabbuka bizallaamil lil 'abeed (End Juz 24)
verses.47:
Ilaihi yuraddu 'ilmus Saaa'ah; wa maa takhruju min samaraatim min 
	akmaamihaa wa maa tahmilu min unsaa wa laa tada'u illaa bi'ilmih; wa Yawma 
	yunaadeehim aina shurakaaa'ee qaalooo aazannaaka maa minnaa min shaheed
verses.48:
Wa dalla 'anhum maa kaanoo yad'oona min qablu wa zannoo maa lahum mim 
	mahees
verses.49:
Laa yas'amul insaanu min du'aaa'il khairi wa im massa hush sharru fa 
	ya'oosun qanoot
verses.50:
Wa la in azaqnaahu rahmatam minnaa mim ba'di dar raaa'a massat hu la 
	yaqoolanna haazaa lee wa maaa azunnus Saa'ata qaaa'imatanw wa la'in ruji'tu 
	ilaa Rabbeee inna lee 'indahoo lalhusnaa; falanu nabbi'annal lazeena kafaroo 
	bimaa 'amiloo wa lanuzeeqan nahum min 'azaabin ghaleez
verses.51:
Wa izaaa an'amnaa 'alal insaani a'rada wa na-aa bijaani bihee wa izaa 
	massahush sharru fazoo du'aaa'in 'areed
verses.52:
Qul araaitum in kaana min 'indil laahi summa kafar tum bihee man adallu 
	mimman huwa fee shiqaqim ba'eed
verses.53:
Sanureehim Aayaatinaa fil aafaaqi wa feee anfusihim hattaa yatabaiyana 
	lahum annahul haqq; awa lam yakfi bi Rabbika annahoo 'alaa kulli shai-in 
	Shaheed
verses.54:
Alaaa innahum fee miryatim mil liqaaa'i Rabbihim; alaaa innahoo bikulli 
	shai'im muheet (section 6)

verses.3:
Kazaalika yooheee ilaika wa ilal lazeena min qablikal laahul 'Azeezul 
	Hakeem
verses.4: Lahoo maa fis samaa waati wa maa fil ardi wa Huwal 'Aliyul 'Azeem
verses.5:
Takaadus samaawaatu yatafattarna min fawqihinn; walmalaaa'ikatu 
	yusabbihoona bihamdi Rabbihim wa yastaghfiroona liman fil ard; alaaa innal 
	laaha huwal Ghafoorur Raheem
verses.6:
Wallazeenat takhazoo min dooniheee awliyaaa'al laahu hafeezun 'alaihim 
	wa maaa anta 'alaihim biwakeel
verses.7:
Wa kazaalika awhainaaa llaika Qur-aanan 'Arabiyyal litunzira Ummal Quraa 
	wa man hawlahaa wa tunzira Yawmal Jam'i laa raiba feeh; fareequn fil jannati 
	wa fareequn fissa'eer
verses.8:
Wa law shaaa'al laahu laja'alahum ummatanw waahi datanw walaakiny 
	yudkhilumany yashaaa'u fee rahmatih; waz zaalimoona maa lahum minw waliyyinw 
	wa laa naseer
verses.9:
Amit takhazoo min dooniheee awliyaaa'a fallaahu Huwal Waliyyu wa Huwa 
	yuhyil mawtaa wa Huwa 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer 
	(section 1)
verses.10:
Wa makh-talaftum feehi min shai'in fahukmuhooo ilallaah; zaalikumul 
	laahu Rabbee 'alaihi tawakkaltu wa ilaihi uneeb
verses.11:
Faatirus samaawaati wal ard; ja'ala lakum min anfusikum azwaajanw wa 
	minal an'aami azwaajai yazra'ukum feeh; laisa kamislihee shai'unw wa Huwas 
	Samee'ul Baseer
verses.12:
Lahoo maqaaleedus samaawaati wal ardi yabsutur rizqa limai yashaaa'u wa 
	yaqdir; innahoo bikulli shai'in 'Aleem
verses.13:
Shara'a lakum minad deeni maa wassaa bihee Noohanw wallazeee awhainaaa 
	ilaika wa maa wassainaa biheee Ibraaheema wa Moosa wa 'Eesaaa an aqeemud deena wa laa tatafarraqoo feeh; kabura 'alal mushrikeena maa tad'oohum 
	ilaih; Allaahu yajtabee ilaihi mai yashaaa'u wa yahdeee ilaihi mai yuneeb
verses.14:
Wa maa tafarraqooo illaa mim ba'di maa jaaa'ahumul 'ilmu baghyam 
	bainahum; wa law laa Kalimatun sabaqat mir Rabbika ilaaa ajalim musammal 
	laqudiya bainahum; wa innal lazeena oorisul Kitaaba mim ba'dihim lafee 
	shakkim minhu mureeb
verses.15:
Falizaalika fad'u wastaqim kamaaa umirta wa laa tattabi' ahwaaa'ahum wa 
	qul aamantu bimaaa anzalal laahu min Kitaab, wa umirtu li a'dila bainakum 
	Allaahu Rabbunaa wa Rabbukum lanaaa a'maa lunaa wa lakum a'maalukum laa 
	hujjata bainanaa wa baina kumul laahu yajma'u bainanaa wa ilaihil maseer
verses.16:
Wallazeena yuhaaajjoona fil laahi mim ba'di mastujeeba lahoo hujjatuhum 
	daahidatun 'inda Rabbihim wa 'alaihim ghadabunw wa lahum 'azaabun shadeed
verses.17:
Allahul lazeee anzalal Kitaaba bilhaqqi wal Meezaan; wa ma yudreeka 
	la'allas Saa'ata qareeb
verses.18:
Yasta'jilu bihal lazeena laa yu'minoona bihaa wallazeena aamanoo 
	mushfiqoona minhaa wa ya'lamoona annahal haqq; alaaa innal lazeena 
	yumaaroona fis Saa'ati lafee dalaalin ba'eed
verses.19:
Allahu lateefum bi'ibaadihee yarzuqu mai yashaaa'u wa Huwal Qawiyyul 'Azeez 
	(Section 2)
verses.20:
Man kaana yureedu harsal Aakhirati nazid lahoo fee harsihee wa man kaana 
	yureedu harsad dunyaa nu'tihee minhaa wa maa lahoo fil Aakhirati min naseeb
verses.21:
Am lahum shurakaaa'u shara'oo lahum minad deeni maa lam ya'zan bihil 
	laah; wa law laa kalimatul fasli laqudiya bainahum; wa innaz zaalimeena 
	lahum 'azaabun aleem
verses.23:
Zaalikal lazee yubash shirul laahu 'ibaadahul lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus 
	saalihaat; qul laaa as'alukum 'alaihi ajran illal mawaddata fil qurbaa; wa 
	mai yaqtarif hasanatan nazid lahoo feehaa husnaa; innal laaha Ghafoorun 
	Shakoor
verses.24:
Am yaqooloonaf tara 'alal laahi kaziban fa-iny yasha' illaahu yakhtim 'alaa 
	qalbik; wa yamhul laahul baatila wa yuhiqqul haqqa bi Kalimaatih; innahoo 'Aleemun 
	bizaatis sudoor
verses.25:
Wa Huwal lazee yaqbalut tawbata 'an 'ibaadihee wa ya'foo 'anis saiyiaati 
	wa ya'lamu maa taf'aloon
verses.26:
Wa yastajeebul lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilu saalihaati wa yazeeduhum min 
	fadlih; wal kaafiroona lahum 'azaabun shadeed
verses.27:
Wa law basatal laahur rizqa li'ibaadihee labaghaw fil ardi wa laakiny 
	yunazzilu biqadarim maa yashaaa'; innahoo bi'ibaadihee Khabeerun Baseer
verses.28:
Wa Huwal lazee yunazzilul ghaisa min ba'di maa qanatoo wa yanshuru 
	rahmatah; wa Huwal Waliyyul Hameed
verses.29:
Wa min Aayaatihee khalqus samaawaati wal ardi wa maa bassa feehimaa min 
	daaabbah; wa Huwa 'alaa jam'ihim izaa yashaaa'u Qadeer 
(section 3)
verses.30:
Wa maaa asaabakum min museebatin fabimaa kasabat aydeekum wa ya'foo 'an 
	kaseer
verses.31:
Wa maaa antum bimu'jizeena fil ardi wa maa lakum min doonil laahi minw 
	wa liyyinw wa laa naseer
verses.32: Wa min Aayaatihil ja waarifil bahri kal a'lam
verses.33: Iny yashaaa yuskinir reeha fa yazlalna rawaakida 'alaa zahrihi; inna fee zaalika la Aayaatil likulli sabbaarin shakoor
verses.34: Aw yoobiqhunna bimaa kasaboo wa ya'fu 'an kaseer
verses.35: Wa ya'lamal lazeena yujaadiloona feee Aayaatinaa maa lahum min mahees
verses.36:
Famaa ooteetum min shai'in famataa'ul hayaatid dunyaa wa maa 'indal 
	laahi khairunw wa abqaa lillazeena aamanoo wa 'alaa Rabbihim yatawakkaloon
verses.37:
Wallazeena yajtaniboona kabaaa'iral ismi wal fawaahisha wa izaa maa 
	ghadiboo hum yaghfiroon
verses.38:
Wallazeenas tajaaboo li Rabbihim wa aqaamus Salaata wa amruhum shooraa 
	bainahum wa mimmaa razaqnaahum yunfiqoon
verses.39: Wallazeena izaa asaabahumul baghyu hum yantasiroon
verses.40:
Wa jazaaa'u saiyi'atin saiyi'atum misluha faman 'afaa wa aslaha fa 
	ajruhoo 'alal laah; innahoo laa yuhibbuz zaalimeen
verses.41: Wa lamanin tasara ba'da zulmihee fa ulaaa'ika maa 'alaihim min sabeel
verses.42:
Innamas sabeelu 'alal lazeena yazlimoonan naasa wa yabghoona fil ardi 
	bighairil haqq; ulaaa'ika lahum 'azaabun aleem
verses.43:
Wa laman sabara wa ghafara inna zaalika lamin 'azmil umoor 
(section 4)
verses.44:
Wa mai yudli lillaahu famaa lahoo minw waliyyin min ba'dih; wa taraz 
	zaalimeena lammaa ra awul 'azaaba yaqooloona hal ilaa maraddin min sabeel
verses.45:
Wa taraahum yu'radoona 'alaihaa khaashi'eena minazzulli yanzuroona min 
	tarfin khafiyy; wa qaalal lazeena aamanooo innal khaasireenal lazeena 
	khasirooo anfusahum wa ahleehim Yawmal Qiyaamah; alaaa innaz zaalimeena fee 'azaabin muqeem
verses.46:
Wa maa kaana lahum min awliyaaa'a yansuroonahum min doonil laah; wa mai 
	yudlilil laahu famaa lahoo min sabeel
verses.47:
Istajeeboo li Rabbikum min qabli any yaatiya Yawmul laa maradda lahoo 
	min Allah; maa lakum min malja' iny yawma'izinw wa maa lakum min nakeer
verses.48:
Fa-in a'radoo famaaa arsalnaaka 'alaihim hafeezan in 'alaika illal 
	balaagh; wa innaaa izaaa azaqnal insaana minnaa rahmatan fariha bihaa wa in 
	tusibhum saiyi'atun bimaa qaddamat aydeehim fa innal insaana kafoor
verses.49:
Lillaahi mulkus samaawaati wal ard; yakhluqu maa yashaaa'; yahabu limai 
	yashaaa'u inaasanw wa yahabu limai yashaaa'uz zukoor
verses.50:
Aw yuzawwijuhum zukraananw wa inaasanw wa yaj'alu mai yashaaa'u 'aqeemaa; 
	innahoo 'Aleemun Qadeer
verses.52:
Wa kazaalika awhainaaa ilaika roohan min amrinaa; maa kunta tadree mal 
	Kitaabu wa lal eemaanu wa laakin ja'alnaahu nooran nahdee bihee man 
	nashaaa'u min 'ibaadinaa; wa innaka latahdeee ilaaa Siraatin Mustaqeem
verses.53:
Siraatil laahil lazee lahoo maa fis samaawaati wa maa fil ard; alaaa 
	ilal laahi taseerul umoor (section 5)

verses.3: Innaa ja'alnaahu Quraanan 'Arabiyyal la'allakum ta'qiloon
verses.4: Wa innahoo feee Ummil Kitaabi Ladainaa la'aliyyun hakeem
verses.5: Afa nadribu 'ankumuz Zikra safhan an kuntum qawman musrifeen
verses.6: Wa kam arsalnaa min Nabiyyin fil awwaleen
verses.7: Wa maa yaateehim min Nabiyyin illaa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon
verses.8: Fa ahlaknaaa ashadda minhum batshanw wa madaa masalul awwaleen
verses.9:
Wa la'in sa altahum man khalaqas samaawaati wal arda la yaqoolunna 
	khalaqa hunnal 'Azeezul 'Aleem
verses.10:
Allazee ja'ala lakumul arda mahdanw wa ja'ala lakum feehaa subulan 
	la'allakum tahtadoon
verses.11: Wallazee nazzala minas samaaa'i maaa'am biqadarin fa ansharnaa bihee baldatam maitaa' kazaalika tukhrajoon
verses.12:
Wallazee khalaqal azwaaja kullahaa wa ja'ala lakum minal fulki 
	wal-an'aami maa tarkaboon
verses.13:
Litastawoo 'alaa zuhoorihee summa tazkuroo ni'mata Rabbikum izastawaitum 
	'alaihi wa taqooloo Subhaanal lazee sakhkhara lana haaza wa maa kunnaa lahoo 
	muqrineen
verses.14: Wa innaaa ilaa Rabbinaa lamunqaliboon
verses.15:
Wa ja'aloo lahoo min 'ibaadihee juz'aa; innal insaana la kafoorun mubeen
	(section 1)
verses.16: Amit takhaza mimmaa yakhluqu banaatinw wa asfaakum bilbaneen
verses.17:
Wa izaa bushshira ahaduhum bimaa daraba lir Rahmaani masalan zalla 
	wajhuhoo muswaddanw wa huwa kazeem
verses.18: Awa mai yunashsha'u fil hilyati wa huwa fil khisaami ghairu mubeen
verses.19: Wa ja'alul malaaa'ikatal lazeena hum 'ibaadur Rahmaani inaasaa; 'a shahidoo khalqahum; satuktabu shahaadatuhum wa yus'aloon
verses.20:
Wa qaaloo law shaaa'ar Rahmaanu maa 'abadnaahum; maa lahum bizaalika min 
	'ilmin in hum illaa yakhrusoon
verses.21: Am aatainaahum Kitaaban min qablihee fahum bihee mustamsikoon
verses.22:
Bal qaalooo innaa wajadnaaa aabaaa'anaa 'alaaa ummatinw wa innaa 'alaaa 
	aasaarihim muhtadoon
verses.23:
Wa kazaalika maaa arsalnaa min qablika fee qaryatim min nazeerin illaa 
	qaala mutrafoohaaa innaa wajadnaaa aabaaa'anaa 'alaaa ummatinw wa innaa 'alaaa 
	aasaarihim muqtadoon
verses.24:
Qaala awa law ji'tukum bi ahdaa mimmaa wajatdtum 'alaihi aabaaa'akum 
	qaalooo innaa bimaaa ursiltum bihee kaafiroon
verses.25:
Fantaqamnaa minhum fanzur kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul mukazzibeen 
(section 2)
verses.26: Wa iz qaala Ibraaheemu liabeehi wa qawmiheee innane baraaa'um mimmaa ta'budoon
verses.27: Illal lazee fataranee fa innahoo sa yahdeen
verses.28: Wa ja'alahaa kalimatan baaqiyatan fee 'aqibihee la 'allahum yarji'oon
verses.29:
Bal matta'tu haaa'ulaaa'i wa aabaaa'ahum hattaa jaaa'a humul haqqu wa 
	Rasoolun mubeen
verses.30:
Wa lammaa jaaa'ahumul haqqu qaaloo haazaa sihrunw wa innaa bihee 
	kaafiroon
verses.31:
Wa qaaloo law laa nuzzila haazal Quraanu 'alaa rajulin minal qaryataini 
	'azeem
verses.32:
'A hum yaqsimoona rahmata Rabbik; Nahnu qasamnaa bainahum ma'eeshatahum 
	fil hayaatid dunyaa wa rafa'naa ba'dahum fawqa ba'din darajaatin li yattakhiza ba'duhum ba'dan sukhriyyaa; wa rahmatu Rabbika khairun mimmaa 
	yajma'oon
verses.33:
Wa law laaa any yakoonan naasu ummatanw waahidatan laja'alnaa limany 
	yakfuru bir Rahmaani li buyootihim suqufan min fiddatinw wa ma'aarija 'alaihaa 
	yazharoon
verses.34: Wa li buyootihim abwaabanw wa sururan 'alaihaa yattaki'oon
verses.35:
Wa zukhrufaa; wa in kullu zaalika lammaa mataa'ul hayaatid dunyaa; wal 
	aakhiratu 'inda Rabbika lilmuttaqeen 
(section 3)
verses.36:
Wa mai ya'shu 'an zikrir Rahmaani nuqaiyid lahoo Shaitaanan fahuwa lahoo 
	qareen
verses.37:
Wa innahum la yasuddoo nahum 'anis sabeeli wa yahsaboona annahum 
	muhtadoon
verses.38:
Hattaaa izaa jaaa'anaa qaala yaa laita bainee wa bainaka bu'dal 
	mashriqaini fabi'sal qareen
verses.39: Wa lai yanfa'akumul Yawma iz zalamtum annakum fil 'azaabi mushtarikoon
verses.40: Afa anta tusmi'us summa aw tahdil 'umya wa man kaana fee dalaalin mubeen
verses.41: Fa immaa nazhabanna bika fa innaa minhum muntaqimoon
verses.42: Aw nuriyannakal lazee wa'adnaahum fa innaa 'alaihim muqtadiroon
verses.43: Fastamsik billazeee oohiya ilaika innaka 'alaa Siraatin Mustaqeem
verses.44: Wa innahoo la zikrun laka wa liqawmika wa sawfa tus'aloon
verses.45:
Was'al man arsalnaa min qablika mir Rusulinaaa 'a ja'alnaa min doonir 
	Rahmaani aalihatany yu'badoon 
	(section 4)
verses.46:
Wa laqad arsalnaa Moosaa bi aayaatinaaa ilaa Fir'awna wa mala'ihee 
	faqaala innee Rasoolu Rabbil 'aalameen
verses.47: Falamma jaaa'ahum bi aayaatinaaa izaa hum minhaa yadhakoon
verses.48:
Wa maa nureehim min aayatin illaa hiya akbaru min ukhtihaa wa 
	akhaznaahum bil'azaabi la'allahum yarji'oon
verses.49:
Wa qaaloo yaaa ayyuhas saahirud'u lanaa Rabbaka bimaa 'ahida 'indaka 
	innanaa lamuhtadoon
verses.50: Falammaa kashafnaa 'anhumul 'azaaba izaa hum yankusoon
verses.51:
Wa naadaa Fir'awnu fee qawmihee qaala yaa qawmi alaisa lee mulku Misra 
	wa haazihil anhaaru tajree min tahtee afalaa tubsiroon
verses.52: Am ana khairun min haazal lazee huwa maheenunw wa laa yakaadu yubeen
verses.53:
Falaw laa ulqiya 'alaihi aswiratun min zahabin aw jaaa'a ma'ahul 
	malaaa'ikatu muqtarineen
verses.54: Fastakhaffa qawmahoo fa ataa'ooh; innahum kaanoo qawman faasiqeen
verses.55: Falammaaa aasafoonan taqamnaa minhum fa aghraqnaahum ajma'een
verses.56:
Faja'alnaahum salafanw wa masalan lil aakhireen 
(section 5)
verses.57: Wa lammaa duribab nu Maryama masalan izaa qawmuka minhu yasiddoon
verses.58:
Wa qaalooo 'a-aalihatunaa khairun am hoo; maa daraboohu laka illaa 
	jadalaa; balhum qawmun khasimoon
verses.59:
In huwa illaa 'abdun an'amnaa 'alaihi wa ja'alnaahu masalan li Baneee 
	Israaa'eel
verses.60: Wa law nashaaa'u laja'alnaa minkum malaaa'ikatan fil ardi yakhlufoon
verses.61:
Wa innahoo la 'ilmun lis Saa'ati fa laa tamtarunna bihaa wattabi'oon; 
	haazaa Siraatun Mustaqeem
verses.62: Wa laa yasuddan nakumush Shaitaanu innahoo lakum 'aduwwun mubeen
verses.63:
Wa lammaa jaaa'a 'Eesaa bilbaiyinaati qaala qad ji'tukum bil Hikmati wa 
	li-ubaiyina lakum ba'dal lazee takhtalifoona feehi fattaqul laaha wa 
	atee'oon
verses.64: Innal laaha Huwa Rabbee wa Rabbukum fa'budooh; haaza Siraatum Mustaqeem
verses.65:
Fakhtalafal ahzaabu min bainihim fa wailun lil lazeena zalamoo min 'azaabi 
	Yawmin aleem
verses.66:
Hal yanzuroona illas Saa'ata an ta'tiyahum baghtatanw wa hum laa 
	yash'uroon
verses.67:
Al akhillaaa'u Yawma'izin ba'duhum liba'din 'aduwwun illal muttaqeen 
	(section 6)
verses.68: Yaa 'ibaadi laa khawfun 'alaikumul Yawma wa laaa antum tahzanoon
verses.69: Allazeena aamanoo bi Aayaatinaa wa kaanoo muslimeen
verses.70: Udkhulul Jannata antum wa azwaajukum tuhbaroon
verses.71: Yutaafu 'alaihim bisihaa fim min zahabinw wa akwaab, wa feehaa maatashtaheehil anfusu wa talazzul a'yunu wa antum feehaa khaalidoon
verses.72: Wa tilkal jannatul lateee ooristumoohaa bimaa kuntum ta'maloon
verses.73: Lakum feehaa faakihatun kaseeratun minhaa ta'kuloon
verses.74: Innal mujrimeena fee 'azaabi jahannama khaalidoon
verses.75: Laa yufattaru 'anhum wa hum feehi mublisoon
verses.76: Wa maa zalamnaahum wa laakin kaanoo humuz zaalimeen
verses.77: Wa naadaw yaa Maaliku liyaqdi 'alainaa Rabbuka qaala innakum maakithoon
verses.78: Laqad ji'naakum bilhaqqi wa laakinna aksarakum lil haqqi kaarihoon
verses.79: Am abramooo amran fainnaa mubrimoon
verses.80:
Am yahsaboona annaa laa nasma'u sirrahum wa najwaahum; balaa wa 
	Rusulunaa ladaihim yaktuboon
verses.81: Qul in kaana lir Rahmaani walad; fa-ana awwalul 'aabideen
verses.82: Subhaana Rabbis samaawaati wal ardi Rabbil Arshi 'ammaa yasifoon
verses.83:
Fazarhum yakhoodoo wa yal'aboo hattaa yulaaqoo Yawmahumul lazee 
	yoo'adoon
verses.84:
Wa Huwal lazee fissamaaa'i ilaahunw wa fil ardi ilaah; wa Huwal 
	Hakeemul 'Aleem
verses.85:
Wa tabaarakal lazee lahoo mulkus samaawaati wal ardi wa maa bainahumaa 
	wa 'indahoo 'ilmus Saa'ati wa ilaihi turja'oon
verses.86:
Wa laa yamlikul lazeena yad'oona min doonihish shafaa'ata illaa man 
	shahida bilhaqqi wa hum ya'lamoon
verses.87:
Wa la'in sa altahum man khalaqahum la yaqoolun nallaahu fa annaa 
	yu'fakoon
verses.88: Wa qeelihee yaa Rabbi inna haaa'ulaaa'i qawmul laa yu'minoon
verses.89:
Fasfah 'anhum wa qul salaam; fasawfa ya'lamoon 
	(section 7)

verses.3: Innaaa anzalnaahu fee lailatim mubaarakah; innaa kunnaa munzireen
verses.4: Feehaa yufraqu kullu amrin hakeem
verses.5: Amram min 'indinaaa; innaa kunnaa mursileen
verses.6: Rahmatam mir rabbik; innahoo Huwas Samee'ul 'Aleem
verses.7: Rabbis samaawaati wal ardi wa maa bainahumaa; in kuntum mooqineen
verses.8:
Laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa yuhyee  wa yumeetu Rabbukum wa Rabbu 
	aabaaa'ikumul awwaleen
verses.9: Bal hum fee shakkiny yal'aboon
verses.10: Fartaqib Yawma ta'tis samaaa'u bi dukhaanin mubeen
verses.11: Yaghshan naasa haazaa 'azaabun aleem
verses.12: Rabbanak shif 'annal 'azaaba innaa mu'minoon
verses.13: Annaa lahumuz zikraa wa qad jaaa'ahum Rasoolum mubeen
verses.14: Summaa tawallaw 'anhu wa qaaloo mu'allamum majnoon
verses.15: Innaa kaashiful 'azaabi qaleelaa; innakum 'aaa'idoon
verses.16: Yawma nabtishul batsha tal kubraa innaa muntaqimoon
verses.17: Wa laqad fatannaa qablahum qawma Fir'awna wa jaaa'ahum Rasoolun kareem
verses.18: An addooo ilaiya 'ibaadal laahi innee lakum Rasoolun ameen
verses.19: Wa al laa ta'loo 'alal laahi innee aateekum bisultaanim mubeen
