verses.20: Wa innee 'uztu bi Rabbee wa rabbikum an tarjumoon
verses.21: Wa il lam tu'minoo lee fa'taziloon
verses.22: Fada'aa rabbahooo anna haaa'ulaaa'i qawmum mujrimoon
verses.23: Fa asri bi'ibaadee lailan innakum muttaba'oon
verses.24: Watrukil bahra rahwan innahum jundum mughraqoon
verses.25: Kam tarakoo min jannaatinw wa 'uyoon
verses.26: Wa zuroo'inw wa maqaa min kareem
verses.27: Wa na'matin kaanoo feehaa faakiheen
verses.28: Kazaalika wa awrasnaahaa qawman aakhareen
verses.29: Famaa bakat 'alaihimus samaaa'u wal ardu wa maa kaanoo munzareen
verses.30: Wa laqad najjainaa Baneee Israaa'eela minal'azaabil muheen
verses.31: Min Fir'awn; innahoo kaana 'aaliyam minal musrifeen
verses.32: Wa laqadikh tarnaahum 'alaa 'ilmin 'alal 'aalameen
verses.33: Wa aatainaahum minal aayaati maa feehi balaaa'um mubeen
verses.34: Inna haaa'ulaaa'i la yaqooloon
verses.35: In hiya illaa mawtatunal oolaa wa maa nahnu bimun shareen
verses.36: Fa'too bi aabaaa'inaaa inkuntum saadiqeen
verses.37:
Ahum khayrun am qawmu Tubba'inw wallazeena min qablihim; ahlaknaahum 
	innahum kaanoo mujrimeen
verses.38: Wa maa khalaqnas samaawaati wal arda wa maa baina humaa laa'ibeen
verses.39: Maa khalaqnaahumaaa illaa bilhaqqi wa laakinna aksarahum laa ya'lamoon
verses.40: Inna yawmal fasli meeqaatuhum ajma'een
verses.41: Yawma laa yughnee mawlan 'am mawlan shai'anw wa laa hum yunsaroon
verses.42: Illaa mar rahimal laah' innahoo huwal 'azeezur raheem
verses.43: Inna shajarataz zaqqoom
verses.44: Ta'aamul aseem
verses.45: Kalmuhli yaghlee filbutoon
verses.46: Kaghalyil hameem
verses.47: Khuzoohu fa'tiloohu ilaa sawaaa'il Jaheem
verses.48: Summa subboo fawqa ra'sihee min 'azaabil hameem
verses.49: Zuq innaka antal 'azeezul kareem
verses.50: Inna haazaa maa kuntum bihee tamtaroon
verses.51: Innal muttaqeena fee maqaamin ameen
verses.52: Fee jannaatinw wa 'uyoon
verses.53: Yalbasoona min sundusinw wa istabraqim mutaqaabileen
verses.54: Kazaalika wa zawwajnaahum bihoorin 'een
verses.55: Yad'oona feehaa bikulli faakihatin aamineen
verses.56:
Laa yazooqoona feehal mawtaa illal mawtatal oolaa wa waqaahum 'azaabal 
	jaheem
verses.57: Fadlam mir rabbik; zaalika huwal fawzul 'azeem
verses.58: Fa innamaa yassarnaahu bilisaanika la'allahum yatazakkaroon
verses.59: Fartaqib innahum murta qiboon

verses.3: Innaa fis samaawaati wal ardi la Aayaatil lilmu'mineen
verses.4:
Wa fee khalaqikum wa maa yabussu min daaabbatin Aayaatul 
	liqawminy-yooqinoon
verses.5:
Wakhtilaafil laili wannahaari wa maaa anzalal laahu minas samaaa'i mir 
	rizqin fa ahyaa bihil arda ba'da mawtihaa wa tasreefir riyaahi Aayaatul 
	liqawminy ya'qiloon
verses.6:
Tilka Aayatul laahi natloohaa 'alaika bil haqq, fabiayyi hadeesim ba'dal 
	laahi wa Aayaatihee yu'minoon
verses.7: Wailul likulli affaakin aseem
verses.8:
Yasma'u Aayaatil laahi tutlaa 'alaihi summa yusirru mustakbiran ka-al 
	lam yasma'haa fabashshirhu bi'azaabin aleem
verses.9:
Wa izaa 'alima min Aayaatinaa shai' 'anit takhazahaa huzuwaa; ulaaa'ika 
	lahum 'azaabum muheen
verses.10:
Minw waraaa'ihim Jahannamu wa laa yughnee 'anhum maa kasaboo shai'anw wa 
	laa mat takhazoo min doonil laahi awliyaaa; wa lahum 'azaabun 'azeem
verses.11:
Haazaa hudaa; wal lazeena kafaroo bi aayaati Rabbihim lahum 'azaabum mir 
	rijzin 'aleem (section 1)
verses.12:
Allaahul lazee sahkhara lakumul bahra litajriyal fulku feehi bi amrihee 
	wa litabtaghoo min fadlihee wa la'allakum tashkuroon
verses.13:
Wa sakhkhara lakum maa fis samaawaati wa maa fil ardi jamee'am minhu; 
	inna feezaalika la Aayaatil liqawminy yatafakkaroon
verses.14:
Qul lillazeena aamanoo yaghfiroo lillazeena laa yarjoona ayyaamal laahi 
	liyajziya qawmam bimaa kaanoo yaksiboon
verses.15:
Man 'amila saalihan falinafsihee wa man asaaa'a fa'alaihaa summa ilaa 
	Rabbikum turja'oon
verses.16:
Wa laqad aatainaa Baneee Israaa'eelal Kitaaba walhukma wan Nubuwwata wa 
	razaqnaahum minat taiyibaati wa faddalnaahum;alal 'aalameen
verses.17:
Wa aatainaahum baiyinaatim minal amri famakh talafooo illaa mim ba'di 
	maa jaaa'ahumul 'ilmu baghyam bainahum; inna Rabbaka yaqdee bainahum Yawmal 
	Qiyaamati feemaa kaanoo feehi yakhtalifoon
verses.18:
Summa ja'alnaaka 'alaa sharee'atim minal amri fattabi'haa wa laa 
	tattabi'ahwaaa'al-lazeena laa ya'lamoon
verses.19:
Innahum lany yughnoo 'anka minal laahi shai'aa; wa innaz zaalimeena 
	ba'duhum awliyaaa'u ba'dinw wallaahu waliyyul muttaqeen
verses.20: Haazaa basaaa'iru linnaasi wa hudanw wa rahmatul liqawminy yooqinoon
verses.21:
Am hasibal lazeenaj tarahus saiyiaati an naj'alahum kallazeena aamanoo 
	wa 'amilu saalihaati sawaaa'am mahyaahum wa mamaatuhum; saaa'a maa yahkumoon
	(section 2)
verses.22:
Wa khalaqal laahus samaawaati wal arda bilhaqqi wa litujzaa kullu nafsim 
	bimaa kasabat wa hum laa yuzlamoon
verses.23:
Afara'ayta manit takhaza ilaahahoo hawaahu wa adal lahul laahu 'alaa 'ilminw 
	wa khatama 'alaa sam'ihee wa qalbihee wa ja'ala 'alaa basarihee ghishaawatan 
	famany yahdeehi mim ba'dil laah; afalaa tazakkaroon
verses.24:
Wa qaaloo maa hiya illaa hayaatunad dunyaa namootu wa nahyaa wa maa 
	yuhlikunaaa illad dahr; wa maa lahum bizaalika min 'ilmin in hum 
	illaayazunnoon
verses.25:
Wa izaa tutlaa 'alaihim aayaatuna baiyinaatim maa kaana hujjatahum 
	illaaa an qaalu'too bi aabaaa'inaaa in kuntum saadiqeen
verses.26:
Qulil laahu yuhyeekum summa yumeetukum summa yajma'ukum ilaa Yawmil 
	Qiyaamati laa raiba feehi wa laakinna aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon 
	(section 3)
verses.27:
Wa lillaahi mulkus samaawaati wal ard; wa Yawma taqoomus Saa'atu Yawma 'iziny 
	yakhsarul mubtiloon
verses.28:
Wa taraa kulla ummatin jaasiyah; kullu ummatin tud'aaa ilaa kitaabihaa 
	al Yawma tujzawna maa kuntum ta'maloon
verses.29:
Haazaa kitaabunaa yantiqu 'alaikum bilhaqq; innaa kunnaa nastansikhu maa 
	kuntum ta'maloon
verses.30:
Fa ammal lazeena aamaanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati fayudkhiluhum Rabbuhum 
	fee rahmatih; zaalika huwal fawzul mubeen
verses.31:
Wa ammal lazeena kafarooo afalam takun Aayaatee tutlaa 'alaikum 
	fastakbartum wa kuntum qawmam mujrimeen
verses.32:
Wa izaa qeela inna wa'dallaahi haqqunw was Saa'atu laa raiba feehaa 
	qultum maa nadree mas Saa'atu in nazunnu illaa zannanw wa maa nahnu 
	bimustaiqineen
verses.33:
Wa badaa lahum saiyiaatu maa 'amiloo wa haaqa bihim maa kaanoo bihee 
	yastahzi'oon
verses.34:
Wa qeelal yawma nansaakum kamaa naseetum liqaaa'a yawmikum haazaa wa 
	maawaakumun Naaru wa maa lakum min naasireen
verses.35:
Zaalikum bi annakumut takhaztum aayaatil laahi huzuwanw wa gharratkumul 
	hayaatud dunyaa; fal yawma laa yukhrajoona minhaa wa laahum yusta'taboon
verses.36: Falillaahil hamdu Rabbis samaawaati wa Rabbil ardi Rabbil-'aalameen
verses.37:
Wa lahul kibriyaaa'u fissamaawaati wal ardi wa Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem 
	(section 4) (End Juz 25)

verses.3:
Maa khalaqnas samaawaati wal arda wa maa bainahumaaa illaa bilhaqqi wa 
	ajalim musammaa; wallazeena kafaroo 'ammaaa unziroo mu'ridoon
verses.4:
Qul ara'aytum maa tad'oona min doonil laahi aroonee maazaa khalaqoo 
	minal ardi am lahum shirkun fis samaawaati eetoonee bi kitaabim min qabli 
	haazaaa aw asaaratim min 'ilmin in kuntum saadiqeen
verses.5:
Wa man adallu mimmany yad'oo min doonil laahi mallaa yastajeebu lahooo 
	ilaa Yawmil Qiyaamati wa hum'an du'aaa'ihim ghaafiloon
verses.6:
Wa izaa hushiran naasu kaanoo lahum a'daaa'anw wa kaanoo bi'ibaadatihim 
	kaafireen
verses.7:
Wa izaa tutlaa 'alaihim Aayaatunaa baiyinaatin qaalal lazeena kafaroo 
	lilhaqqi lammaa jaaa'ahum haazaa sihrum mubeen
verses.8:
Am yaqooloonaf taraahu qul inif taraituhoo falaa tamlikoona lee minal 
	laahi shai'an Huwa a'lamu bimaa tufeedoona feehi kafaa bihee shaheedam 
	bainee wa bainakum wa Huwal Ghafoorur Raheem
verses.9:
Qul maa kuntu bid'am minal Rusuli wa maaa adreee ma yuf'alu bee wa laa 
	bikum in attabi'u illaa maa yoohaaa ilaiya wa maaa ana illaa nazeerum mubeen
verses.10:
Qul ara'aytum in kaana min 'indil laahi wa kafartum bihee wa shahida 
	shaahidum mim Banee Israaa'eela 'alaa mislihee fa aamana wastak bartum innal 
	laaha laa yahdil qawmaz zaalimeen 
(section 1)
verses.11:
Wa qaalal lazeena kafaroo lillazeena aamanoo law kaana khairam maa 
	sabaqoonaaa ilyh; wa iz lam yahtadoo bihee fasa yaqooloona haazaaa ifkun 
	qadeem
verses.12:
Wa min qablihee kitaabu Moosaaa imaamanw-wa rahmah; wa haazaa Kitaabum 
	musad diqul lisaanan 'Arabiyyal liyunziral lazeena zalamoo wa bushraa 
	lilmuhsineen
verses.13:
Innal lazeena qaaloo Rabbunal laahu summas taqaamoo falaa khawfun 'alaihim 
	wa laahum yahzanoon
verses.14:
Ulaaa'ika Ashabul Jannati khaalideena feehaa jazaaa'am bimaa kaano 
	ya'maloon
verses.15:
Wa wassainal insaana biwaalidaihi ihsaana; hamalat hu ummuhoo kurhanw-wa 
	wada'at hu kurhanw wa hamluhoo wa fisaaluhoo salaasoona shahraa; hattaaa izaa 
	balagha ashuddahoo wa balagha arba'eena sanatan qaala Rabbi awzi' neee an 
	ashkura ni'matakal lateee an'amta 'alaiya wa 'alaa waalidaiya wa an a'mala 
	saalihan tardaahu wa aslih lee fee zurriyyatee; innee tubtu ilaika wa innee 
	minal muslimeen
verses.16:
Ulaaa'ikal lazeena nata qabbalu 'anhum ahsana maa 'amiloo wa natajaawazu 
	'an saiyiaatihim feee Ashaabil jannati Wa'das sidqil lazee kaanoo yoo'adoon
verses.17:
Wallazee qaala liwaali daihi uffil lakumaaa ata'idanineee an ukhraja wa 
	qad khalatil quroonu min qablee wa humaa yastagheesaanil laaha wailaka aamin 
	inna wa'dal laahi haqq, fa yaqoolu maa haazaaa illaaa asaateerul awwaleen
verses.18:
Ulaaa'ikal lazeena haqqa 'alaihimul qawlu feee umamin qad khalat min 
	qablihim minal jinni wal insi innahum kaanoo khaasireen
verses.19:
Wa likullin darajaatum mimmaa 'amiloo wa liyuwaf fiyahum a'maalahum wa 
	hum laa yuzlamoon
verses.20:
Wa Yawma yu'radul lazeena kafaroo 'alan Naari azhabtum taiyibaatikum fee 
	hayaatikumud dunyaa wastam ta'tum bihaa fal Yawma tujzawna 'azaabal hooni 
	bimaa kuntum tastakbiroona fil ardi bighairil haqqi wa bimaa kuntum 
	tafsuqoon (section 2)
verses.21:
Wazkur akhaa’Aadin iz anzara qawmahoo bil Ahqaafi wa qad khalatin nuzuru 
	mim baini yadaihi wa min khalfiheee allaa ta'budooo illal laaha inneee 
	akhaafu 'alaikum 'azaaba Yawmin 'azeem
verses.22:
Qaaloo aji'tanaa li taa fikanaa 'an aalihatinaa fa'tinaa bimaa ta'idunaaa 
	in kunta minas saadiqeen
verses.23:
Qaala innamal 'ilmu indal laahi wa uballighukum maaa ursiltu bihee wa 
	laakinneee araakum qawman tajhaloon
verses.24:
Falammaa ra awhu 'aaridam mustaqbila awdiyatihim qaaloo haazaa 'aaridum 
	mumtirunaa; bal huwa masta'jaltum bihee reehun feehaa 'azaabun aleem
verses.25:
Tudammiru kulla shai'im bi-amri Rabbihaa fa asbahoo laa yuraaa illaa 
	masaakinuhum; kazaalika najzil qawmal mujrimeen
verses.26:
Wa laqad makkannaahum feemaaa im makkannaakum feehi waj'alnaa lahum 
	sam'anw wa absaaranw wa af'idatan famaaa aghnaa 'anhum sam'uhum wa laaa 
	absaaruhum wa laaa af'idatuhum min shai'in iz kaanoo yajhadoona bi Aayaatil 
	laahi wa haaqa bihim maa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon 
	(section 3)
verses.27:
Wa laqad ahlaknaa ma hawlakum minal quraa wa sarrafnal Aayaati 
	la'allahum yarji'oon
verses.28:
Falaw laa nasarahumul lazeenat takhazoo min doonil laahi qurbaanan 
	aalihatam bal dalloo 'anhum' wa zaalika ifkuhum wa maa kaanoo yaftaroon
verses.29:
Wa iz sarafinaaa ilaika nafaram minal jinni yastami'oonal Quraana 
	falammaa hadaroohu qaalooo ansitoo falammaa qudiya wallaw ilaa qawmihim 
	munzireen
verses.30:
Qaaloo yaa qawmanaaa innaa sami'naa Kitaaban unzila mim ba'di Moosa 
	musaddiqal limaa baina yadihi yahdeee ilal haqqi wa ilaa Tareeqim Mustaqeem
verses.31:
Yaa qawmanaaa ajeeboo daa'iyal laahi wa aaminoo bihee yaghfir lakum min 
	zunoobikum wa yujirkum min 'azaabin aleem
verses.32:
Wa mal laa yujib daa'iyal laahi falaisa bimu'jizin fil ardi wa laisa 
	lahoo min dooniheee awliyaaa'; ulaaa ika fee dalaalim mubeen
verses.33: Awalam yaraw annal laahal lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal arda wa lam ya'ya bikhal qihinna biqaadirin 'alaaa aiyuhyiyal mawtaa; balaaa innahoo 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer
verses.34:
Wa Yawma yu'radul lazeena kafaroo 'alan naari alaisa haaza bil haqq; 
	qaaloo balaa wa Rabbinaa; qaala fazooqul 'azaaba bimaa kuntum takfuroon
verses.35:
Fasbir kamaa sabara ulul 'azmi minar Rusuli wa laa tasta'jil lahum; ka 
	annahum Yawma yarawna maa yoo'adoona lam yalbasooo illaa saa'atam min nahaar; 
	balaagh; fahal yuhlaku illal qawmul faasiqoon 
(section 4)

verses.1: Allazeena kafaroo wa saddoo'an sabeelil laahi adalla a'maalahum
verses.2:
Wallazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati wa aamanoo bimaa nuzzila 'alaa 
	Muhammadinw-wa huwal haqqu mir Rabbihim kaffara 'anhum saiyiaatihim wa 
	aslaha baalahum
verses.3:
Zaalika bi annal lazeena kafarut taba'ul baatila wa annal lazeena 
	aamanut taba'ul haqqa mir Rabbihim; kazaalika yadribul laahu linnaasi 
	amsaalahum
verses.4:
Fa-izaa laqeetumul lazeena kafaroo fadarbar riqaabi, hattaaa izaa askhan 
	tumoohum fashuddul wasaaqa, fa immaa mannnam ba'du wa immaa fidaaa'an hattaa 
	tada'al harbu awzaarahaa; zaalika wa law yashaaa'ul laahu lantasara minhum 
	wa  laakin li yabluwa ba'dakum bi ba'd; wallazeena qutiloo fee sabeelil laahi 
	falany yudilla a'maalahum
verses.5: Sa-yahdeehim wa yuslihu baalahum
verses.6: Wa yudkhiluhumul jannata 'arrafahaa lahum
verses.7:
Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanooo in tansurul laaha yansurkum wa yusabbit 
	aqdaamakum
verses.8: Wallazeena kafaroo fata' sal lahum wa adalla a'maalahum
verses.9: Zaalika bi annahum karihoo maaa anzal allaahu fa ahbata a'maalahum
verses.10:
Afalam yaseeroo fil ardi fayanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul lazeena min 
	qablihim;  dammaral laahu 'alaihim wa lilkaafireena amsaaluhaa
verses.11:
Zaalika bi annal laaha mawlal lazeena aamanoo wa annal kaafireena laa 
	mawlaa lahum (section 1)
verses.12:
Innal-laaha yudkhilul lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati Jannaatin 
	tajree min tahtihal anhaaru wallazeena kafaroo yatamatta'oona wa ya'kuloona kamaa ta'kulul an'aamu wan Naaru maswan lahum
verses.13:
Wa ka ayyim min qaryatin hiya ashaddu quwwatam min qaryatikal lateee 
	akhrajatka ahlaknaahum falaa naasira lahum
verses.14:
Afaman kaana 'alaa baiyinatim mir Rabbihee kaman zuyyina lahoo sooo'u 'amalihee 
	wattaba'ooo ahwaaa'ahum
verses.15:
Masalul jannatil latee wu'idal muttaqoona feehaaa anhaarum min maaa'in 
	ghayri aasininw wa anhaarum mil labanil lam yataghaiyar ta'muhoo wa anhaarum 
	min khamril lazzatin li shaaribeena wa anhaarum min 'asalim musaffanw wa 
	lahum feeha min kullis samaraati wa maghfiratum mir Rabbihim kaman huwa 
	khaalidun fin naari wa suqoo maaa'an hameeman faqatta'a am'aaa'ahum
verses.16:
Wa minhum mai yastami'u ilaika hattaaa izaa kharajoo min 'indika qaaloo 
	lil lazeena ootul 'ilma maazaa qaala aanifaa; ulaaa'ikal lazeena taba'al 
	laahu 'alaa quloobihim wattaba'ooo ahwaaa'ahum
verses.17: Wallazeenah tadaw zaadahum hudanw wa aataahum taqwaahum
verses.18:
Fahal yanzuroona illas Saa'ata an ta'tiyahum baghtatan faqad jaaa'a 
	ashraatuhaa; fa annaa lahum izaa jaaa'at hum zikraahum
verses.19:
Fa'lam annahoo laaa ilaaha illal laahu wastaghfir lizambika wa 
	lilmu'mineena walmu'minaat; wallaahu ya'lamu mutaqallabakum wa maswaakum 
(section 2)
verses.20:
Wa yaqoolul lazeena aamanoo law laa nuzzilat Sooratun fa izaaa unzilat 
	Sooratum Muhkamatunw wa zukira feehal qitaalu ra aytal lazeena fee 
	quloobihim maraduny yanzuroona ilaika nazaral maghshiyyi 'alaihi minal mawti 
	fa'awlaa lahum
verses.21:
Taa'atunw wa qawlum ma'roof; fa izaa 'azamal amru falaw sadaqul laaha 
	lakaana khairal lahum
verses.22:
Fahal 'asaitum in tawallaitum an tufsidoo fil ardi wa tuqatti'ooo 
	arhaamakum
verses.23: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena la'anahumul laahu fa asammahum wa a'maaa absaarahum
verses.24: Afalaa yatadabbaroonal Qur-aana am 'alaa quloobin aqfaaluhaa
verses.25:
Innal lazeenar taddoo 'alaaa adbaarihim min ba'di maa tabaiyana lahumul 
	hudash Shaitaanu sawwala lahum wa amlaa lahum
verses.26:
Zaalika bi annahum qaaloo lillazeena karihoo maa nazzalal laahu 
	sanutee'ukum fee ba'dil amri wallaahu ya'lamu israarahum
verses.27:
Fakaifa izaa tawaffat humul malaaa'ikatu yadriboona wujoohahum wa adbaa 
	rahum
verses.28:
Zaalika bi annahumut taba'oo maaa askhatal laaha wa karihoo ridwaanahoo 
	fa ahbata a'maalahum (section 
	3)
verses.29:
Am hasibal lazeena fee quloobihim maradun al lany yukhrijal laahu 
	adghaanahum
verses.30:
Wa law nashaaa'u la-arainaakahum fala 'araftahum bi seemaahum; wa 
	lata'rifan nahum fee lahnil qawl; wallaahu ya'lamu a'maalakum
verses.31:
Wa lanabluwannakum hattaa na'lamal mujaahideena minkum wassaabireena wa 
	nabluwa akhbaarakum
verses.32:
Innal lazeena kafaroo wa saddoo 'an sabeelil laahi wa shaaaqqur Rasoola 
	min ba'di maa tabaiyana lahumul hudaa lany yadurrul laaha shai'anw wa sa 
	yuhbitu a'maalahum
verses.33:
Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo atee'ul laaha wa atee'ur Rasoola wa laa 
	tubtilooo a'maalakum
verses.34:
Innal lazeena kafaroo wa saddoo 'an sabeelil laahi summa maatoo wa hum 
	kuffaarun falany yaghfirallaahu lahum
verses.35:
Falaa tahinoo wa tad'ooo ilas salmi wa antumul a'lawna wallaahu ma'akum 
	wa lany yatirakum a'maalakum
verses.36:
Innamal hayaatud dunyaa la'ibunw wa lahw; wa in tu'minoo wa tattaqoo 
	yu'tikum ujoorakum wa laa yas'alkum amwaalakum
verses.37: Iny yas'alkumoohaa fa yuhfikum tabkhaloo wa yukhrij adghaanakum
verses.38:
Haaa antum haaa'ulaaa'i tud'awna litunfiqoo fee sabeelillaahi faminkum 
	many yabkhalu wa many yabkhal fa innamaa yabkhalu 'an nafsih; wallaahu 
	Ghaniyyu wa antumul fuqaraaa'; wa in tatawallaw yastabdil qawman ghairakum 
	summa laa yakoonooo amsaalakum 
	(section 4)

verses.2:
Liyaghfira lakal laahu maa taqaddama min zambika wa maa ta akhkhara wa 
	yutimma ni'matahoo 'alaika wa yahdiyaka siraatan mustaqeema
verses.3: Wa yansurakal laahu nasran 'azeezaa
verses.4:
Huwal lazeee anzalas sakeenata fee quloobil mu'mineena liyazdaadooo 
	eemaanamma'a eemaanihim; wa lillaahi junoodus samawaati wal ard; wa kaanal 
	laahu 'Aleeman Hakeemaa
verses.5:
Liyudkhilal mu'mineena walmu'minaati jannaatin tajree min tahtihal 
	anhaaru khaalideena feehaa wa yukaffira 'anhum saiyi aatihim; wa kaana 
	zaalika 'indal laahi fawzan 'azeemaa
verses.6:
Wa yu'azzibal munaafiqeena walmunaafiqaati wal mushrikeena 
	walmushrikaatiz zaaanneena billaahi zannas saw'; 'alaihim daaa'iratus saw'i 
	wa ghadibal laahu 'alaihim wa la'anahum wa a'adda lahum jahannama wa saaa' 
	at maseeraa
verses.7:
Wa lillaahi junoodus samaawaati wal ard; wa kaanal laahu 'azeezan 
	hakeema
verses.8: Innaaa arsalnaaka shaahi danw wa mubashshiranw wa nazeera
verses.9:
Litu minoo billaahi wa Rasoolihee wa tu'azziroohu watuwaqqiroohu 
	watusabbi hoohu bukratanw wa aseelaa
verses.10:
Innal lazeena yubaayi'oonaka innamaa yubaayi'oonal laaha yadul laahi 
	fawqa aydeehim; faman nakasa fainnamaa yankusu 'alaa nafsihee wa man awfaa 
	bimaa 'aahada 'alaihullaaha fasa yu'teehi ajran 'azeemaa 
(section 1)
verses.11:
Sa yaqoolu lakal mukhal lafoona minal-A'raabi shaighalatnaaa amwaalunaa 
	wa ahloonaa fastaghfir lanaa; yaqooloona bi alsinatihim maa laisa fee 
	quloobihim; qul famany yamliku lakum minal laahi shai'an in araada bikum 
	darran aw araada bikum naf'aa; bal kaanal laahu bimaa ta'maloona Khabeeraa
verses.12:
Bal zanantum al lany yanqalibar Rasoolu walmu'minoona ilaaa ahleehim 
	abadanw wa zuyyina zaalika fee quloobikum wa zanantum zannnas saw'i wa 
	kuntum qawmam booraa
verses.13:
Wa mal lam yu'mim billaahi wa Rasoolihee fainnaaa a'tadnaa lilkaafireena 
	sa'eeraa
verses.14:
Wa lillaahii mulkus samaawaati wal ard; yaghfiru limany yashaaa'u wa 
	yu'azzibu many yashaaa'; wa kaanal laahu Ghafoorar Raheemaa
verses.15:
Sa yaqoolul mukhalla foona izan talaqtum ilaa maghaanima litaakhuzoohaa 
	zaroonaa nattabi'kum yureedoona any yubaddiloo Kalaamallaah; qul lan 
	tattabi'oonaa kazaalikum qaalal laahu min qablu fasa yaqooloona bal 
	tahsudoonanna; bal kaanoo laa yafqahoona illaa qaleela
verses.16:
Qul lilmukhallafeena minal A'raabi satud'awna ilaa qawmin ulee baasin 
	shadeedin tuqaati loonahum aw yuslimoona fa in tutee'oo yu'tikumul laahu 
	ajran hasananw wa in tatawallaw kamaa tawallaitum min qablu yu'azzibkum 'azaaban 
	aleemaa
verses.17:
Laisa 'alal a'maa harajunw wa laa 'alal a'raji harajunw wa laa 'alal 
	mareedi haraj' wa many yutil'il laaha wa Rasoolahoo yudkhilhu jannaatin 
	tajree min tahtihal anhaaru wa many yatawalla yu'azzibhu 'azaaban aleemaa
	(section 2)
verses.18:
Laqad radiyal laahu 'anil mu'mineena iz yubaayi 'oonaka tahtash 
	shajarati fa'alima maa fee quloobihim fa anzalas sakeenata 'alaihim wa asaa 
	bahum fat han qareebaa
verses.19:
Wa maghaanima kaseera tany yaakhuzoonahaa; wa kaanal laahu 'Azeezan 
	Hakeemaa
verses.20:
Wa'adakumul laahu ma ghaanima kaseeratan taakhuzoo nahaa fa'ajjala lakum 
	haazihee wa kaffa aydiyan naasi 'ankum wa litakoona aayatal lilmu'mineena wa 
	yahdiyakum siraatam mustaqeema
verses.21:
Wa ukhraa lam taqdiroo 'alaihaa qad ahaatal laahu bihaa; wa kaanal laahu 
	'alaa kulli shai'in qadeera
verses.22:
Wa law qaatalakumul lazeena kafaroo la wallawul adbaara summa laa 
	yajidoona waliyanw-wa laa naseeraa
verses.23:
Sunnatal laahil latee qad khalat min qablu wa lan tajida lisunnatil 
	laahi tabdeelaa
verses.24:
Wa Huwal lazee kaffa aydiyahum 'ankum wa aydiyakum 'anhum bibatni 
	Makkata mim ba'di an azfarakum 'alaihim; wa kaanal laahu bimaa ta'maloona 
	Baseera
verses.25:
Humul lazeena kafaroo wa saddookum 'anil-Masjidil-Haraami walhadya 
	ma'koofan any yablugha mahillah; wa law laa rijaalum mu'minoona wa nisaaa'um mu'minaatul lam ta'lamoohum an tata'oohum fatuseebakum 
	minhum ma'arratum bighairi 'ilmin liyud khilal laahu fee rahmatihee many 
	yashaaa'; law tazayyaloo la'azzabnal lazeena kafaroo minhum 'azaaban aleema
verses.26:
Iz ja'alal lazeena kafaroo fee quloobihimul hamiyyata hamiyyatal 
	jaahiliyyati fa anzalal laahu sakeenatahoo 'alaa Rasoolihee wa 'alal mu 
	mineena wa alzamahum kalimatat taqwaa wa kaanooo ahaqqa bihaa wa ahlahaa; wa 
	kaanal laahu bikulli shai'in Aleema 
(section 3)
verses.27:
Laqad sadaqal laahu Rasoolahur ru'yaa bilhaqq, latadkhulunnal 
	Masjidal-Haraama in shaaa'al laahu aamineena muhalliqeena ru'oosakum wa 
	muqassireena laa takhaafoona fa'alima maa lam ta'lamoo faja'ala min dooni 
	zaalika fathan qareebaa
verses.28:
Huwal lazeee arsala Rasoolahoo bilhudaa wa deenil haqqi liyuzhirahoo 'alad 
	deeni kullih; wa kafaa billaahi Shaheeda
verses.29:
Muhammadur Rasoolul laah; wallazeena ma'ahooo ashiddaaa'u 'alal 
	kuffaaari ruhamaaa'u bainahum taraahum rukka'an sujjadany yabtaghoona fadlam 
	minal laahi wa ridwaana seemaahum fee wujoohihim min asaris sujood; zaalika 
	masaluhum fit tawraah; wa masaluhum fil Injeeli kazar'in akhraja shat 'ahoo 
	fa 'aazarahoo fastaghlaza fastawaa 'alaa sooqihee yu'jibuz zurraa'a 
	liyagheeza bihimul kuffaar; wa'adal laahul lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus 
	saalihaati minhum maghfiratanw wa ajran 'azeemaa 
(section 4)

verses.1:
Yaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo la tuqaddimoo baina yada yil laahi wa 
	Rasoolihee wattaqul laah; innal laaha samee'un 'Aleem
verses.2:
Yaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa tarfa'ooo aswaatakum fawqa sawtin Nabiyi 
	wa laa tajharoo lahoo bilqawli kajahri ba'dikum liba 'din an tahbata a 'maalukum 
	wa antum laa tash'uroon
verses.3: Innal lazeena yaghud doona aswaatahum 'inda Rasoolil laahi ulaaa'ikal lazeenam tah anal laahu quloobahum littaqwaa; lahum maghfiratunw wa'ajrun 'azeem
verses.4:
Innal lazeena yunaadoo naka minw waraaa'il hujuraati aksaruhum laa 
	ya'qiloon
verses.5:
Wa law annahum sabaroo hatta takhruja ilaihim lakaana khairal lahum; 
	wallaahu Ghafoorur Raheem
verses.6: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo in jaaa'akum faasiqum binaba in fatabaiyanooo an tuseeboo qawmam bijahalatin fatusbihoo 'alaa maa fa'altum naadimeen
verses.7:
Wa'lamooo anna feekum Rasoolal laah; law yutee'ukum fee kaseerim minal 
	amrila'anittum wa laakinnal laaha habbaba ilaikumul eemaana wa zaiyanahoo 
	fee quloobikum wa karraha ilaikumul kufra walfusooqa wal'isyaan; ulaaaika 
	humur raashidoon
verses.8: Fadlam minal laahi wa ni'mah; wallaahu 'Aleemun Hakeem
verses.9:
Wa in taaa'ifataani minal mu'mineena naqtataloo fa aslihoo bainahumaa; fa-im 
	baghat ihdaahumaa 'alal ukhraa faqaatilul latee tabghee hattaa tafeee'a 
	ilaaa amril laah; fa-in faaa'at fa aslihoo bainahumaa bil'adli wa aqsitoo, 
	innal laaha yuhibbul muqsiteen
verses.10:
Innamal mu'minoona ikhwatun fa aslihoo baina akhawaykum wattaqul laaha 
	la'allakum turhamoon (section 1)
verses.11:
Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa yaskhar qawmum min qawmin 'asaaa 
	anyyakoonoo khairam minhum wa laa nisaaa'um min nisaaa'in 'Asaaa ay yakunna 
	khairam minhunna wa laa talmizooo anfusakum wa laa tanaabazoo bil alqaab; bi'sal ismul fusooqu ba'dal 
	eemaan; wa mal-lam yatub fa-ulaaa'ika humuz zaalimoon
verses.12:
Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanuj taniboo kaseeram minaz zanni inna ba'daz 
	zanniismunw wa laa tajassasoo wa la yaghtab ba'dukum ba'daa; a yuhibbu 
	ahadukum any yaakula lahma akheehi maitan fakarih tumooh; wattaqul laa; 
	innal laaha tawwaabur Raheem
verses.13:
Yaaa ayyuhan naasu innaa khalaqnaakum min zakarinw wa unsaa wa 
	ja'alnaakum shu'oobanw wa qabaaa'ila lita'aarafoo inna akramakum 'indal 
	laahi atqaakum innal laaha 'Aleemun khabeer
verses.14:
Qaalatil-A 'raabu aamannaa qul lam tu'minoo wa laakin qoolooo aslamnaa 
	wa lamma yadkhulil eemaanu fee quloobikum wa in tutee'ul laaha wa Rasoolahoo 
	laa yalitkum min a'maalikum shai'aa; innal laaha Ghafoorur Raheem
verses.15:
Innamal muu'minoonal lazeena aamanoo billaahi wa Rasoolihee summa lam 
	yartaaboo wa jaahadoo biamwaalihim wa anfusihim fee sabeelil laah; ulaaaika 
	humus saadiqoon
verses.16:
Qul atu'allimoonal laaha bideenikum wallaahu ya'lamu maa fis samaawaati 
	wa maa fil ard; wallaahu bikulli shai'in 'Aleem
verses.17:
Yamunnoona 'alaika an aslamoo qul laa tamunnoo 'alaiya Islaamakum 
	balillaahu yamunnu 'alaikum an hadaakum lil eemaani in kuntum saadiqeen
verses.18:
Innal laaha ya'lamu ghaibas samaawaati wal ard; wallaahu baseerum bimaa 
	ta'maloon (section 2)

verses.2:
Bal 'ajibooo an jaa'ahum munzirum minhum faqaalal kaafiroona haazaa 
	shai'un 'ajeeb
verses.3: 'A-izaa mitnaa wa kunnaa turaaban zaalika raj'um ba'eed
verses.4: Qad 'alimnaa maa tanqu-sul-ardu minhum wa 'indanaa Kitaabun Hafeez
verses.5: Bal kazzaboo bilhaqqi lammaa jaaa'ahum fahum feee amrim mareej
verses.6:
Afalam yanzurooo ilas samaaa'i fawqahum kaifa banainaahaa wa 
	zaiyannaahaa wa maa lahaa min furooj
verses.7:
Wal arda madadnaahaa wa alqainaa feehaa rawaasiya wa ambatnaa feehaa min 
	kulli zawjim baheej
verses.8: Tabsiratanw wa zikraa likulli 'abdim muneeb
verses.9:
Wa nazzalnaa minas samaaa'i maaa'am mubaarakan fa ambatnaa bihee 
	jannaatinw wa habbal haseed
verses.10: Wannakhla baasiqaatil laha tal'un nadeed
verses.11: Rizqal lil'ibaad, wa ahyainaa bihee baldatam maitaa; kazaalikal khurooj
verses.12: Kazzabat qablahum qawmu Noohinw wa Ashaabur Rassi wa Samood
verses.13: Wa 'Aadunw wa Fir'awnu wa ikhwaanu loot
verses.14:
Wa Ashaabul Aykati wa qawmu Tubba'; kullun kazzabar Rusula fahaqqa 
	wa'eed
verses.15: Afa'a yeenaa bilkhalqil awwal; bal hum fee labsim min khalqin jadeed
verses.16:
Wa laqad khalaqnal insaana wa na'lamu maa tuwaswisu bihee nafsuhoo wa 
	Nahnu aqrabu ilaihi min hablil wareed
verses.17: 'Iz yatalaqqal mutalaqqi yaani 'anil yameeni wa 'anish shimaali qa'eed
verses.18: Maa yalfizu min qawlin illaa ladaihi raqeebun 'ateed
verses.19: Wa jaaa'at sakratul mawti bilhaqq; zaalika maa kunta minhu taheed
verses.20: Wa nufikha fis Soor; zaalika yawmul wa'eed
verses.21: Wa jaaa'at kullu nafsim ma'ahaa saaa'iqunw wa shaheed
verses.22:
Laqad kunta fee ghaf latim min haazaa fakashafnaa 'anka ghitaaa'aka 
	fabasarukal yawma hadeed
verses.23: Wa qaala qareenuhoo haazaa maa ladaiya 'ateed
verses.24: Alqiyaa fee Jahannama kulla kaffaarin 'aneed
verses.25: Mannaa'il lilkhayri mu'tadim mureeb
verses.26:
Allazee ja'ala ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhara fa alqiyaahu fil'azaabish 
	shadeed
verses.27:
Qaala qareenuhoo Rabbanaa maaa atghaituhoo wa laakin kaana fee dalaalin 
	ba'eed
verses.28: Qaala laa takhtasimoo ladaayya wa qad qaddamtu ilaikum bilwa'eed
verses.29: Maa yubaddalul qawlu ladaiya wa maaa ana bizal laamil lil'abeed
verses.30: Yawma naqoolu li'jahannama halim talaati wa taqoolu hal mim mazeed
verses.31: Wa uzlifatil jannatu lil muttaqeena ghaira ba'eed
verses.32: Haaza maa too'adoona likulli awwaabin hafeez
verses.33: Man khashiyar Rahmaana bilghaibi wa jaaa'a biqalbim muneeb
verses.34: Udkhuloohaa bisalaamin zaalika yawmul khulood
verses.35: Lahum maa yashaaa'oona feehaa wa ladainaa mazeed
verses.36:
Wa kam ahlaknaa qablahum min qarnin hum ashaddu minhum batshan 
	fanaqqaboo fil bilaad, hal mim mahees
verses.37:
Inna fee zaalika lazikraa liman kaana lahoo qalbun aw alqas sam'a wa 
	huwa shaheed
verses.38:
Wa laqad khalaqnas samaawaati wal arda wa maa bainahumaa fee sittati 
	ayyaamin wa maa massanaa mil lughoob
verses.39:
Fasbir 'alaa maa yaqooloona wa sabbih bihamdi Rabbika qabla tuloo'ish 
	shamsi wa qablal ghuroob
verses.40: Wa minal laili fasabbih hu wa adbaaras sujood
verses.41: Wastami' yawma yunaa dil munaadi mim makaanin qareeb
verses.42: Yawma yasmaoonas sai hata bilhaqq zaalika yawmul khurooj
verses.43: Innaa Nahnu nuhyee wa numeetu wa ilainal maseer
verses.44: Yawma tashaqqaqul ardu 'anhum siraa'aa; zaalika hashrun 'alainaa yaseer
verses.45:
Nahnu a'lamu bimaa yaqooloona wa maaa anta 'alaihim bijabbaarin fazakkir 
	bil quraani many yakhaafu wa'eed

verses.3: Faljaariyaati yusraa
verses.4: Falmuqassimaati amraa
verses.5: Innamaa too'adoona la-saadiq
verses.6: Wa innad deena la waaqi'
verses.7: Wassamaaa'i zaatil hubuk
verses.8: Innakum lafee qawlim mukhtalif
verses.9: Yu'faku 'anhu man ufik
verses.10: Qutilal kharraasoon
verses.11: Allazeena hum fee ghamratin saahoon
verses.12: Yas'aloona ayyaana yawmud Deen
verses.13: Yawma hum 'alan naari yuftanoon
verses.14: Zooqoo fitnatakum haa zal lazee kuntum bihee tas ta'jiloon
verses.15: Innal muttaqeena fee jannaatinw wa 'uyoon
verses.16:
Aakhizeena maaa aataahum Rabbuhum; innahum kaanoo qabla zaalika 
	muhsineen
verses.17: kaanoo qaleelam minal laili maa yahja'oon
verses.18: Wa bil as haari hum yastaghfiroon
verses.19: Wa feee amwaalihim haqqul lissaaa'ili walmahroom
verses.20: Wa fil ardi aayaatul lilmooqineen
verses.21: Wa feee anfusikum; afalaa tubsiroon
verses.22: Wa fissamaaa'i rizqukum wa maa too'adoon
verses.23:
Fawa Rabbis samaaa'i wal ardi innahoo lahaqqum misla maa annakum 
	tantiqoon
verses.24: Hal ataaka hadeesu daifi Ibraaheemal mukrameen

verses.1: Sabbaha lillaahi maa fissamaawaati wal ard; wa Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem
verses.2:
Lahoo mulkus samaawaati wal ard; yuhyee wa yumeet; wa Huwa 'alaa kulli 
	shai'in Qadeer
verses.3:
Huwal Awwalu wal'Aakhiru waz Zaahiru wal Baatinu wa huwa bikulli shai'in 
	Aleem
verses.4:
Huwal lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal arda fee sittati ayyaamin summas 
	tawaa 'alal 'Arsh; ya'lamu maa yaliju filardi wa maa yakhruju minhaa wa maa 
	yanzilu minas samaaa'i wa maa ya'ruju feeha wa Huwa ma'akum ayna maa kuntum; 
	wallaahu bimaa ta'maloona Baseer
verses.5: Lahoo mulkus samaawaati wal ard; wa ilal laahi turja'ul umoor
verses.6:
Yoolijul laila fin nahaari wa yoolijun nahaara fil lail; wa Huwa 'Aleemum 
	bizaatis sudoor
verses.7:
Aaaminoo billaahi wa Rasoolihee wa anfiqoo mimmaa ja'alakum mustakh 
	lafeena feehi fallazeena aamanoo minkum wa anfaqoo lahum ajrun kabeer
verses.8:
Wa maa lakum laa tu'minoona billaahi war Rasoolu yad'ookum li tu'minoo 
	bi Rabbikum wa qad akhaza meesaaqakum in kuntum mu'mineen
verses.9:
Huwal lazee yunazzilu 'alaa 'abdiheee Aayaatim baiyinaatil liyukhrijakum 
	minaz zulumaati ilan noor; wa innal laaha bikum la Ra'oofur Raheem
verses.10:
Wa maa lakum allaa tunfiqoo fee sabeelil laahi wa lillaahi meeraasus 
	samaawaati wal-ard; laa yastawee minkum man anfaqa min qablil fat-hi wa 
	qaatal; ulaaa'ika a'zamu darajatam minal lazeena anfaqoo min ba'du wa 
	qaataloo; wa kullanw wa'ad allaahul husnaa; wallaahu bimaa ta'maloona Khabeer
verses.11:
Man zal lazee yuqridul laaha qardan hasanan fa yudaa'ifahoo lahoo wa 
	lahooo ajrun kareem
verses.12:
Yawma taral mu'mineena walmu'minaati yas'aa nooruhum baina aydeehim wa 
	bi  aymaanihim bushraakumul yawma jannaatun tajree min tahtihal anhaaru 
	khaalideena feeha; zaalika huwal fawzul 'azeem
verses.13:
Yawma yaqoolul munaafiqoona walmunaafiqaatu lil lazeena aamanu unzuroonaa 
	naqtabis min noorikum qeelarji'oo waraaa'akum faltamisoo nooran faduriba 
	bainahum bisooril lahoo baabun, baatinuhoo feehir rahmatu wa zaahiruhoo min 
	qibalihi-'azaab
verses.14:
Yunaadoonahum alam nakum ma'akum qaaloo balaa wa laakinnakum fatantum 
	anfusakum wa tarabbastum wartabtum wa gharratkumul amaaniyyu hatta jaaa'a 
	amrul laahi wa gharrakum billaahil gharoor
verses.15:
Fal Yawma laa yu'khazu minkum fidyatunw wa laa minal lazeena kafaroo; 
	ma'waakumun Naaru hiya maw laakum wa bi'sal maseer
verses.16:
Alam ya'ni lil lazeena aamanooo an takhsha'a quloobuhum lizikril laahi 
	wa maa nazala minal haqqi wa laa yakoonoo kallazeena ootul Kitaaba min qablu 
	fataala 'alaihimul amadu faqasat quloobuhum wa kaseerum minhum faasiqoon
verses.17:
I'lamooo annal laaha yuhyil arda ba'da mawtihaa; qad baiyannaa lakumul 
	Aayaati la'allakum ta'qiloon
verses.18:
Innal mussaddiqeena wal mussaddiqaati wa aqradul laaha qardan hassanany 
	yudaa'afu lahum wa lahum ajrun kareem
verses.20:
I'lamooo annamal hayaa tud dunyaa la'ibunw wa lahwunw wa zeenatunw wa 
	tafaakhurum bainakum wa takaasurun fil amwaali wal awlaad, kamasali ghaisin 
	a'jabal kuffaara nabaatuhoo summa yaheeju fataraahu musfarran summa yakoonu 
	hutaamaa; wa fil aakhirati 'azaabun shadeedunw wa magh firatum minal laahi 
	wa ridwaan; wa mal haiyaa tuddun yaaa illaa mataa'ul ghuroor
verses.21:
Saabiqooo ilaa maghfiratim mir Rabbikum wa jannatin 'arduhaa ka-'ardis 
	samaaa'i wal ardi u'iddat lillazeena aamanoo billaahi wa Rusulih; zaalika 
	fadlul laahi yu'teehi many yashaaa'; wal laahu zul fadlil 'azeem
verses.22:
Maaa asaaba min museebatin fil ardi wa laa feee anfusikum illaa fee 
	kitaabim min qabli an nabra ahaa; innaa zaalika 'alal laahi yaseer
verses.23:
Likailaa ta'saw 'alaa maa faatakum wa laa tafrahoo bimaaa aataakum; 
	wallaahu laa yuhibbu kulla mukhtaalin fakhoor
verses.24:
Allazeeena yabkhaloona wa yaamuroonan naasa bil bukhl; wa many yatawalla 
	fa innal laaha Huwal Ghaniyyul Hameed
verses.25:
Laqad arsalnaa Rusulanaa bilbaiyinaati wa anzalnaa ma'ahumul Kitaaba wal 
	Meezaana liyaqooman naasu bilqist, wa anzalnal hadeeda feehi baasun 
	shadeedunw wa manaafi'u linnaasi wa liya'lamal laahu many yansuruhoo wa 
	Rusulahoo bilghaib; innal laaha Qawiyyun 'Azeez
verses.26:
Wa laqad arsalnaa Noohanw wa Ibraaheema wa ja'alnaa fee zurriyyatihiman 
	nubuwwata wal Kitaaba faminhum muhtad; wa kaseerum minhum faasiqoon
verses.27:
Summa qaffainaa 'alaa aasaarihim bi Rusulinaa wa qaffainaa bi 'Eesab ni 
	Maryama wa aatainaahul Injeela wa ja'alnaa fee quloobil lazeenat taba'oohu ra'fatanw wa rahmatanw 
	wa rahbaaniyyatan ibtada'ooha maa katabnaahaa 'alaihim 
	illab tighaaa'a ridwaanil laahi famaa ra'awhaa haqqa ri'aayatihaa; fa 
	aatainal lazeena aamanoo minhum ajrahum; wa kaseerum minhum faasiqoon
verses.28:
Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamaanut taqullaaha wa aaminoo bi Rasoolihee 
	yu'tikum kiflaini mir rahmatihee wa yaj'al lakum nooran tamshoona bihee wa 
	yaghfir lakum; wallaahu Ghafoorur Raheem
verses.29:
Li'alla ya'lama Ahlul kitaabi allaa yaqdiroona 'alaa shai'in min fadlil 
	laahi wa annal fadla bi Yadil laahi yu'teehi many yashaaa'; wallaahu Zul 
	fadilil 'azeem (End Juz 27)

verses.1:
Qad sami'al laahu qawlal latee tujaadiluka fee zawjihaa wa tashtakeee 
	ilal laahi wallaahu yasma'u tahaawurakumaa; innal laaha samee'um baseer
verses.2:
Allazeena yuzaahiroona minkum min nisaaa'ihim maa hunnaa ummahaatihim in 
	ummahaatuhum illal laaa'ee waladnahum; wa innaahum la yaqooloona munkaram 
	minal qawli wa zooraa; wa innal laaha la'afuwwun ghafoor
verses.4:
Famal lam yajid fa siyaamu shahraini mutataabi'ayni min qabli any-yatamaaassaa 
	famal lam yastati' fa-it'aamu sitteena miskeena; zaalika litu'minoo billaahi 
	wa rasoolih'wa tilka hudoodul laah; wa lilkaafireena 'azaabun aleem
verses.5:
Innal lazeena yuhaaaddoonal laaha wa Rasoolahoo kubitoo kamaa kubital 
	lazeena min qablihim; wa qad anzalnaaa aayaatim baiyinaat; wa lilkaa fireena 
	'azaabum muheen
verses.6:
Yawma yab'asuhumul laahu jamee'an fayunabbi'uhum bimaa 'amiloo; ahsaahul 
	laahu wa nasooh; wallaahu 'alaa kulli shai'in shaheed
verses.7:
Alam tara annal laaha ya'lamu maa fis samaawaati wa maa fil ardi maa 
	yakoonu min najwaa salaasatin illaa Huwa raabi'uhum wa laa khamsatin illaa 
	huwa saadisuhum wa laaa adnaa min zaalika wa laaa aksara illaa huwa ma'ahum 
	ayna, maa kaanoo summa yunabbi'uhum bimaa 'amiloo yawmal qiyaamah; innal 
	laaha bikulli shai'in aleem
verses.8:
Alam tara ilal lazeena nuhoo 'anin najwaa summa ya'oodoona limaa nuhoo 'anhu 
	wa yatanaajawna bil ismi wal'udwaani wa ma'siyatir rasooli wa izaa jaaa'ooka 
	haiyawka bimaa lam yuhai yika bihil laahu wa yaqooloona fee anfusihim law 
	laa yu'azzibunal laahu bimaa naqool; hasbuhum jahannnamu yaslawnahaa 
	fabi'sal maseer
verses.9:
Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo izaa tanaajaytum falaa tatanaajaw bil ismi 
	wal 'udwaani wa ma'siyatir rasooli wa tanaajaw bil birri wattaqwaa wattaqul 
	laahal lazeee ilaihi tuhsharoon
verses.10:
Innaman najwaa minash shaitaani liyahzunal lazeena aamanoo wa laisa 
	bidaaarrihim shai'an illaa bi-iznil laah; wa 'alal laahi falyatawakkalil 
	mu'minoon
verses.11:
Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo izaa qeela lakum tafassahoo fil majaalisi 
	fafsahoo yafsahil laahu lakum wa izaa qeelan shuzoo fanshuzoo yarfa'il 
	laahul lazeena aamanoo minkum wallazeena ootul 'ilma darajaat; wallaahu 
	bimaa ta'maloona khabeer
verses.12:
Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanooo izaa naajitumur Rasoola faqaddimoo baina 
	yadai najwaakum sadaqah; zaalika khairul lakum wa athar; fa il lam tajidoo 
	fa innal laaha ghafoorur Raheem
verses.13:
'A-ashfaqtum an tuqaddimoo baina yadai najwaakum sadaqaat; fa-iz lam 
	taf'aloo wa taabal laahu 'alaikum fa aqeemus Salaata wa aatuz Zakaata wa 
	atee'ul laaha wa rasoolah; wallaahu khabeerum bimaa ta'maloon
verses.14:
Alam tara ilal lazeena tawallaw qawman ghadibal laahu 'alaihim maa hum 
	minkum wa laa minhum wa yahlifoona 'alal kazibi wa hum ya'lamoon
verses.15:
A'addal laahu lahum 'azaaban shadeedan innahum saaa'a maa kaanoo 
	ya'maloon
verses.16:
Ittakhazooo aymaanahum junnatan fasaddoo 'an sabeelil laahi falahum 'azaabum 
	muheen
verses.17:
Lan tughniya 'anhum amwaaluhum wa laaa awladuhum minal laahi shai'aa; 
	ulaaa 'ika As haabun Naari hum feehaa khaalidoon
verses.18:
Yawma yab'asuhumul laahujamee'an fa yahlifoona lahoo kamaa yahlifoona 
	lakum wa yahsaboona annahum 'alaa shai'; alaaa innahum humul kaaziboon
verses.19:
Istahwaza 'alaihimush shaitaanu fa ansaahum zikral laah; ulaaa'ika 
	hizbush shaitaaan; alaaa innaa hizbash shaitaani humul khaasiroon
verses.20: Innal lazeena yuhaaaddoonal laaha wa Rasoolahooo ulaaa'ika fil azalleen
verses.21: Katabal laahu la aghlibanna ana wa Rusulee; innal laaha qawiyyun 'Azeez
verses.22:
Laa tajidu qawmany yu'minoona billaahi wal yawmil aakhiri yuwaaaddoona 
	man haaaddal laaha wa Rasoolahoo wa law kaanooo aabaaa'ahum aw abnaaa'ahum 
	aw ikhwaa nahum aw 'asheeratahum; ulaaa'ika kataba fee quloobihi mul eemaana 
	wa ayyadahum biroohimminhu wa yudkhilu hum jannatin tajree min tahtihal 
	anhaaru khaalideena feehaa; radiyal laahu 'anhum wa radoo 'anhu; ulaaa 'ika 
	hizbul laah; alaaa inna hizbal laahi humul muflihoon

verses.1:
Sabbaha lillaahi maa fissamaawaati wa maa fil ardi wa Huwal 'Azeezul 
	Hakeem
verses.2:
Huwal lazeee akharajal lazeena kafaroo min ahlil kitaabi min diyaarihim 
	li awwalil Hashr; maa zanantum any yakhrujoo wa zannooo annahum maa 
	ni'atuhum husoonuhum minal laahi faataahumul laahu min haisu lam yahtasiboo 
	wa qazafa fee quloobihimur ru'ba yukhriboona bu yootahum bi aydeehim wa 
	aydil mu'mineena fa'tabiroo yaaa ulil absaar
verses.3:
Wa law laaa an katabal laahu 'alaihimul jalaaa'a la'azzabahum fid dunyaa 
	wa lahum fil Aakhirati 'azaabun Naar
verses.4:
Zaalika bi annahum shaaqqul laaha wa Rasoolahoo wa many yushaaaqqil 
	laaha fa innal laaha shadeedul-'iqaab
verses.5:
Maa qata'tum mil leenatin aw taraktumoohaa qaaa'imatan'alaaa usoolihaa 
	fabi iznil laahi wa liyukhziyal faasiqeen
verses.6:
Wa maaa afaaa'al laahu 'alaaa Rasoolihee minhum famaaa awjaftum 'alaihi 
	min khailiinw wa laa rikaabinw wa laakinnal laaha yusallitu Rusulahoo 'alaa 
	many yashaaa'; wallaahu 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer
verses.7:
Maaa afaaa'al laahu 'alaa Rasoolihee min ahlil quraa falillaahi wa lir 
	Rasooli wa lizil qurbaa wal yataamaa walmasaakeeni wabnis sabeeli kai laa 
	yakoona doolatam bainal aghniyaaa'i minkum; wa maaa aataakumur Rasoolu 
	fakhuzoohu wa maa nahaakum 'anhu fantahoo; wattaqul laaha innal laaha 
	shadeedul-'iqaab
verses.8:
Lilfuqaraaa'il Muhaaji reenal lazeena ukhrijoo min diyaarihim wa 
	amwaalihim yabtaghoona fadlam minal laahi wa ridwaananw wa yansuroonal laaha 
	wa Rasoolah; ulaaa'ika humus saadiqoon
verses.9:
Wallazeena tabawwa'ud daara wal eemaana min qablihim yuhibboona man 
	haajara ilaihim wa laa yajidoona fee sudoorihim haajatam mimmaa ootoo wa 
	yu'siroona 'alaa anfusihim wa law kaana bihim khasaasah; wa many yooqa 
	shuhha nafsihee fa ulaaa'ika humul muflihoon
verses.10:
Wallazeena jaaa'oo min ba'dihim yaqooloona Rabbanagh fir lanaa wa li 
	ikhwaani nal lazeena sabqoonaa bil eemaani wa laa taj'al fee quloobinaa 
	ghillalil lazeena aamanoo rabbannaaa innaka Ra'oofur Raheem
verses.11:
Alam tara ilal lazeena naafaqoo yaqooloona li ikhwaanihimul lazeena 
	kafaroo min ahlil kitaabi la'in ukhrijtum lanakhrujanna ma'akum wa laa 
	nutee'u feekum ahadan abadanw-wa in qootiltum lanansuran nakum wallaahu 
	yashhadu innahum lakaaziboon
verses.12:
La'in ukhrijoo laa yakhrujoona ma'ahum wa la'in qootiloo laa 
	yansuroonahum wa la'in nasaroohum la yuwallunnal adbaara summa laa yunsaroon
verses.13:
La antum ashaddu rahbatan fee sudoorihim minal laah; zaalika bi annahum 
	qawmul laa yafqahoon
verses.14:
Laa yuqaatiloonakum jamee'an illaa fee quram muhas sanatin aw minw 
	waraaa'i judur; baasuhum bainahum shadeed; tahsabuhum jamee'anw-wa 
	quloobuhum shatta; zaalika biannahum qawmul laa ya'qiloon
verses.15:
Kamasalil lazeena min qablihim qareeban zaaqoo wabaala amrihim wa lahum 
	'azaabun aleem
verses.16:
Kamasalish shaitaani izqaala lil insaanik fur falammaa kafara qaala 
	innee bareee'um minka inneee akhaaful laaha rabbal 'aalameen
verses.17:
Fakaana 'aaqibatahumaaa annahumaa fin naari khaalidaini feehaa; wa 
	zaalika jazaaa'uz zaalimeen
verses.18:
Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanut taqul-laaha; waltanzur nafsum maa qaddamat 
	lighadiw wattaqul laah; innal laaha khabeerum bimaa ta'maloon
verses.19:
Wa laa takoonoo kallazeena nasul laaha fa ansaahum anfusahum; ulaaa'ika 
	humul faasiqoon
verses.20:
Laa yastaweee as-haabun naari wa ashaabul jannah; as haabul jannati 
	humul faaa'izoon
verses.21:
Law anzalnaa haazal quraana 'alaa jabilil lara aytahoo khaashi'am muta 
	saddi'am min khashiyatil laah; wa tilkal amsaalu nadribuhaa linnaasi 
	la'allahum yatafakkaroon
verses.22:
Huwal-laahul-lazee laaa Ilaaha illaa Huwa 'Aalimul Ghaibi wash-shahaada; 
	Huwar Rahmaanur-Raheem
verses.23:
Huwal-laahul-lazee laaa Ilaaha illaa Huwal-Malikul Quddoosus-Salaamul 
	Muminul Muhaiminul-'aAzeezul Jabbaarul-Mutakabbir; Subhaanal laahi 'Ammaa 
	yushrikoon
verses.24:
Huwal Laahul Khaaliqul Baari 'ul Musawwir; lahul Asmaaa'ul Husnaa; 
	yusabbihu lahoo maa fis samaawaati wal ardi wa Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem

60.name: Al-Mumtahanah - The Woman Who Is Examined

verses.1:
Yaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa tattakhizoo 'aduwwee wa 'aduwaakum 
	awliyaaa'a tulqoona ilaihim bilmawaddati wa qad kafaroo bima jaaa'akum minal 
	haqq, yukhrijoonar Rasoola wa iyyaakum an tu'minoo billaahi rabbikum in 
	kuntum kharajtum jihaadan fee sabeelee wabtighaaa'a mardaatee; tusirroona 
	ilaihim bilma waddati wa ana a'alamu bimaaa akhfaitum wa maaa a'lantum; wa 
	many yaf'alhu minkum faqad dalla sawaaa'as sabeel
verses.2:
Iny yasqafookum yakoonoo lakum a'daaa'anw wa yabsutooo ilaikum aydiyahum 
	wa alsinatahum bissooo'i wa waddoo law takfuroon
verses.3:
Lan tanfa'akum arhaamukum wa laaa awlaadukum; yawmal qiyaamati yafsilu 
	bainakum; wallaahu bimaa ta'maloona baseer
verses.4:
Qad kaanat lakum uswatun hasanatun feee Ibraaheema wallazeena ma'ahoo iz 
	qaaloo liqawmihim innaa bura 'aaa'u minkum wa mimmaa ta'budoona min doonil 
	laahi kafarnaa bikum wa badaa bainanaa wa bainakumul 'adaawatu wal 
	baghdaaa'u abadan hattaa tu'minoo billaahi wahdahooo illaa qawla Ibraheema 
	li abeehi la astaghfiranna laka wa maaa amliku laka minal laahi min shai; 
	rabbanaa 'alaika tawakkalnaa wa ilaika anabnaa wa ilaikal maseer
verses.5:
Rabbana laa taj'alnaa fitnatal lillazeena kafaroo waghfir lanaa rabbanaa 
	innaka antal azeezul hakeem
verses.6:
Laqad kaana lakum feehim uswatunhasanatul liman kaana yarjul laaha wal 
	yawmal aakhir; wa many yatawalla fa innal laaha huwal ghaniyyul hameed
verses.7:
Asal laahu any yaj'ala bainakum wa bainal lazeena 'aadaitum minhum 
	mawaddah; wallahu qadeer; wallahu ghafoorur raheem
verses.8:
Laa yanhaakumul laahu 'anil lazeena lam yuqaatilookum fid deeni wa lam 
	yukhrijookum min diyaarikum an tabarroohum wa tuqsitooo ilaihim; innal laaha 
	yuhibbul muqsiteen
verses.9:
Innamaa yanhaakumul laahu 'anil lazeena qaatalookum fid deeni wa 
	akhrajookum min diyaarikum wa zaaharoo 'alaa ikhraajikum an tawallawhum; wa 
	many yatawallahum fa ulaaa'ika humuz zaalimoon
verses.10:
Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo izaa jaaa'akumul mu'minaatu muhaajiraatin 
	famtahinoo hunn; Allaahu a'lamu bi eemaani hinn; fa in 'alimtumoo hunna 
	mu'minaatin falaa tarji'oo hunna ilal kuffaar; laa hunna hillul lahum wa laa 
	hum yahilloona lahunna wa aatoohum maa anfaqoo wa laa junaaha 'alaikum an 
	tankihoohunna izaaa aataitumoohunna ujoorahunn; wa laa tumsikoo bi 'isamil 
	kawaafir; was'aloo maaa anfaqtum walyas'aloo maaa anfaqoo; zaalikum hukmul 
	laahi yahkumu bainakum; wallaahu 'aleemun hakeem
verses.11:
Wa in faatakum shai'un min azwaajikum ilal kuffaari fa 'aaqabtum fa aatul 
	lazeena zahabat azwaajuhum misla maaa anfaqoo; wattaqul laahal lazeee antum 
	bihee mu'minoon
verses.12:
Yaaa ayyuhan nabbiyyu izaa jaaa'akal mu'minaatu yubaayigh'naka 'alaaa allaa 
	yushrikna billaahi shai 'anw wa laa yasriqna wa laa yazneena wa laa yaqtulna 
	awlaadahunna wa laa ya'teena bibuhtaaniny yaftaree nahoo baina aydeehinna wa 
	arjulihinna wa laa ya'seenaka fee ma'roofin fa baayigh' hunna wastaghfir 
	lahunnalla hunn allaah; innallaaha ghafoorur raheem
verses.13:
Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena amanoo laa tatawallaw qawman ghadibal laahu 'alaihim 
	qad ya'isoo minal aakhirati kamaa ya'isal kuffaaru min as haabil quboor

verses.1:
Sabbaha lillaahi maa fisamaawaati wa maa fil ardi wa huwal 'Azeezul 
	Hakeem
verses.2:
Yaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo lima taqooloona maa laa 
	taf'aloon
verses.3: Kabura maqtan 'indal laahi an taqooloo maa laa taf'aloon
verses.4:
Innal laaha yuhibbul lazeena yuqaatiloona fee sabeelihee saffan 
	ka annahum bunyaanum marsoos
verses.5:
Wa iz qaala Moosa liqawmihee yaa qawmi lima tu'zoonanee wa qat 
	ta'lamoona annee Rasoolul laahi ilaikum falammaa zaaghooo azaaghal laahu 
	quloobahum; wallaahu laa yahdil qawmal faasiqeen
verses.6:
Wa iz qaala 'Eesab-nu-Maryama yaa Banee Israaa'eela innee Rasoolul laahi 
	ilaikum musaddiqal limaa baina yadayya minat Tawraati wa mubashshiram bi 
	Rasooliny yaatee mim ba'dis muhooo Ahmad; falammaa jaaa'ahum bil baiyinaati 
	qaaloo haazaa sihrum mubeen
verses.7:
Wa man azlamu mimma nif taraa 'alal laahil kaziba wa huwa yud'aaa ilal 
	Islaam; wallaahu laa yahdil qawmaz zaalimeen
verses.8:
Yureedoona liyutfi'oo nooral laahi bi afwaahihim wallaahu mutimmu 
	noorihee wa law karihal kaafiroon
verses.9:
Huwal lazee arsala Rasoolahoo bilhudaa wa deenil haqqi liyuzhirahoo 'alad 
	deeni kullihee wa law karihal mushrikoon
verses.10:
Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo hal adullukum 'alaa tijaaratin tunjeekum 
	min 'azaabin aleem
verses.11:
Tu'minoona billaahi wa Rasoolihee wa tujaahidoona fee sabeelil laahi bi 
	amwaalikum wa anfusikum; zaalikum khairul lakum in kuntum ta'lamoon
verses.12:
Yaghfir lakum zunoobakum wa yudkhilkum Jannaatin tajree min tahtihal 
	anhaaru wa masaakina taiyibatan fee Jannaati 'Adn; zaalikal fawzul 'Azeem
verses.13:
Wa ukhraa tuhibboonahaa nasrum minal laahi wa fat hun qareeb; wa 
	bashshiril mu 'mineen
verses.14:
Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo koonooo ansaaral laahi kamaa qaala 'Eesab-nu-Maryama 
	lil Hawaariyyeena man ansaareee ilal laah; qaalal Hawaariyyoona nahnu ansaa 
	rul laahi fa aamanat taaa'ifatum mim Banee Israaa'eela wa kafarat 
	taaa'ifatun fa ayyadnal lazeena aamanoo 'alaa 'aduwwihim fa asbahoo 
	zaahireen

verses.1:
Yusabbihu lilaahi maa fis samaawaati wa maa fil ardil Malikil Quddoosil 
	'Azeezil Hakeem
verses.2:
Huwal lazee ba'asa fil ummiyyeena Rasoolam min hum yatloo 'alaihim 
	aayaatihee wa yuzakkeehim wa yu'allimuhumul Kitaaba wal Hikmata wa in kaanoo 
	min qablu lafee dalaalim mubeen
verses.3: Wa aakhareena minhum lammaa yalhaqoo bihim wa huwal 'azeezul hakeem
verses.4: Zaalika fadlul laahi yu'teehi many-yashaaa; wallaahu zul fadlil 'azeem
verses.5:
Masalul lazeena hum milut tawraata summa lam yahmiloohaa kamasalil 
	himaari yah milu asfaaraa; bi'sa masalul qawmil lazeena kaazzaboo bi 
	aayaatil laah; wallaahu laa yahdil qawmazzaalimeen
verses.6:
Qul yaaa ayyuhal lazeena haadoo in za'amtum annakum awliyaaa'u lilaahi 
	min doonin naasi fatamannawul mawta in kuntum saadiqeen
verses.7:
Wa laa yatamannaw nahooo abadam bimaa qaddamat aydeehim; wallaahu 'aleemum 
	biz zaalimeen
verses.8:
Qul innal mawtal lazee tafirroona minhu fa innahoo mulaaqeekum summa 
	turaddoona ilaa 'Aalimil Ghaibi wash shahaadati fa yunabbi'ukum bimaa kuntum 
	ta'maloon
verses.9:
Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo izaa noodiya lis-Salaati miny yawmil 
	Jumu'ati fas'aw ilaa zikril laahi wa zarul bai'; zaalikum khayrul lakum in 
	kuntum ta'lamoon
verses.10:
Fa-izaa qudiyatis Salaatu fantashiroo fil ardi wabtaghoo min fadlil 
	laahi wazkurul laaha kaseeral la'allakum tuflihoon

verses.2:
Ittakhazoo aymaanahum junnatan fasaddoo 'an sabeelil laah; innahum 
	saaa'a maa kaanoo ya'maloon
verses.3:
Zaalika bi annahum aamanoo summa kafaroo fatubi'a 'alaa quloobihim fahum 
	laa yafqahoon
verses.5:
Wa izaa qeela lahum ta'aalaw yastaghfir lakum rasoolul laahi lawwaw 
	ru'oo sahum wa ra aytahum yasuddoona wa hum mustakbiroon
verses.6:
Sawaaa'un 'alaihim as taghfarta lahum am lam tastaghfir lahum lany 
	yaghfiral laahu lahum; innal laaha laa yahdil qawmal faasiqeen
verses.7:
Humul lazeena yaqooloona laa tunfiqoo 'alaa man inda Rasoolil laahi 
	hatta yanfaddoo; wa lillaahi khazaaa' inus samaawaati wal ardi wa laakinnal 
	munaafiqeena la yafqahoon
verses.8:
Yaqooloona la'ir raja'naaa ilal madeenati la yukhrijannal a'azzu minhal 
	azall; wa lillaahil 'izzatu wa li Rasoolihee wa lilmu'mineena wa laakinnal 
	munaafiqeena laa ya'lamoon
verses.9:
Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo la tulhikum amwaalukum wa laa awlaadukum 'anzikril 
	laah; wa mai-yaf'al zaalika fa-ulaaa'ika humul khaasiroon
verses.10:
Wa anfiqoo mim maa razaqnaakum min qabli any-ya'tiya ahadakumul mawtu fa 
	yaqoola rabbi law laaa akhkhartaneee ilaaa ajalin qareebin fa assaddaqa wa 
	akum minassaaliheen
verses.11:
Wa lany yu 'akhkhiral laahu nafsan izaa jaaa'a ajaluhaa; wallaahu 
	khabeerum bimaa ta'maloon

verses.1:
Yusabbihu lillaahi maa fis samaawaati wa maa fil ardi lahul mulku wa 
	lahul hamd, wa Huwa 'alaa kulli shai 'in Qadeer
verses.2:
Huwal lazee khalaqakum faminkum kaafirunw wa min kum mu'min ; wallaahu 
	bimaa ta'maloona Baseer
verses.3:
Khalaqas samaawaati wal arda bilhaqqi wa sawwarakum fa ahsana suwarakum 
	wa ilaihil maseer
verses.4:
Ya'lamu maa fis samaawaati wal ardi wa ya'lamu maa tusirroona wa maa 
	tu'linoon; wallaahu 'Aleemum bizaatis sudoor
verses.5:
Alam ya'tikum naba'ul lazeena kafaroo min qablu fazaaqoo wabaala amrihim 
	wa lahum 'azaabun aleem
verses.6:
Zaalika bi annahoo kaanat ta'teehim  Rusuluhum bilbaiyinaati 
	faqaaloo a basharuny yahdoonanaa fakafaroo  wa tawallaw; wastaghnal 
	laah; wallaahu ghaniyyun hameed
verses.7:
Za'amal lazeena kafarooo al-lany yub'asoo; qul balaa wa rabbee 
	latub'asunna summa latunabba'unna bimaa 'amiltum; wa zaalika 'alal laahi 
	yaseer
verses.8:
Fa-aaminoo billaahi wa rasoolihee wannooril lazeee anzalnaa; wallaahu 
	bima ta'maloona khabeer
verses.9:
Yawma yajma'ukum li yawmil jam'i zaalika yawmut taghaabun; wa many-yumim 
	billaahi wa ya'mal saalihany yukaffir 'anhu sayyi aatihee wa yudkhilhu 
	jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena feehaaa abadaa; zaalikal 
	fawzul 'azeem
verses.10:
Wallazeena kafaroo wa kazzaboo bi aayaaatinaaa ulaaa'ika ashaabun naari 
	khaalideena feehaa wa bi'sal maseer
verses.11:
Maaa asaaba mim musee batin illaa bi-iznil laah; wa many yu'mim billaahi 
	yahdi qalbah; wallaahu bikulli shai'in Aleem
verses.12:
Wa atee'ul laaha wa atee'ur Rasool; fa in tawallaitum fa innamaa 'alaa 
	Rasoolinal balaaghul mubeen
verses.13: Allaahu laaa ilaaha illaa Hoo; wa 'alal laahi falyata wakkalil mu'minoon
verses.14:
Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanooo inna min azwaaji kum wa awlaadikum 'aduwwal 
	lakum fahzaroohum; wa in ta'foo wa tasfahoo wa taghfiroo fa innal laaha 
	ghafoorur Raheem
verses.15: Innamaa amwaalukum wa awlaadukum fitnah; wallaahu 'indahooo ajrun 'azeem
verses.16:
Fattaqul laaha mastata'tum wasma'oo wa atee'oo wa anfiqoo khairal li 
	anfusikum; wa many-yooqa shuh ha nafsihee fa-ulaaa'ika humul muflihoon
verses.17:
In tuqridul laaha qardan hasanany yudaaifhu lakum wa yaghfir lakum; 
	wallaahu Shakoorun Haleem
verses.18: 'Aalimul-Ghaibi wash-shahaadatil 'Azeezul Hakeem

verses.1: Yaaa ayyuhan nabiyyu izaa tallaqtummun nisaaa'a fatalliqoohunna li'iddatihinna wa ahsul'iddata wattaqul laaha rabbakum; laa tukhri joohunna min bu-yootihinna wa laa yakhrujna illaaa any ya'teena bifaahishatim mubaiyinah; wa tilka hudoodul laah; wa many yata'adda hudoodal laahi faqad zalama nafsah; laa tadree la'allal laaha yuhdisu ba'dazaalika amraa
verses.2:
Fa izaa balaghna ajalahunna fa amsikoohunna bima'roofin aw faariqoohunna 
	bima'roofinw wa ashhidoo zawai 'adlim minkum wa aqeemush shahaadata lillaah; 
	zaalikum yoo'azu bihee man kaana yu'minu billaahi wal yawmil aakhir; wa many 
	yattaqil laaha yaj'al lahoo makhrajaa
verses.3:
Wa yarzuqhu min haisu laa yahtasib; wa many yatawakkal 'alal laahi 
	fahuwa hasbuh; innal laaha baalighu amrih; qad ja'alal laahu likulli shai'in 
	qadraa
verses.4:
Wallaaa'ee ya'isna minal maheedi min nisaaa 'ikum inir tabtum 
	fa'iddatuhunna salaasatu ashhurinw wallaaa'ee lam yahidn; wa ulaatul ahmaali 
	ajaluhunna any yada'na hamlahun; wa many yattaqil laaha yaj'al lahoo min 
	amrihee yusraa
verses.5:
Zaalika amrul laahi anzalahoo ilaikum; wa many yattaqil laaha yukaffir 'anhu 
	saiyi aatihee wa yu'zim lahoo ajraa
verses.6:
Askinoohunna min haisu sakantum minw wujdikum wa laa tudaaarroohunna 
	litudaiyiqoo 'alaihinn; wa in kunna ulaati hamlin fa anfiqoo 'alaihinna  
	hattaa yada'na hamlahunn; fain arda'na lakum fa aatoo hunna ujoorahunn; 
	wa'tamiroo bainakum bima'roofinw wa in ta'aasartum fasaturdi'u lahooo ukhraa
verses.7:
Liyunfiq zoo sa'atim min sa'atih; wa man qudira 'alaihi rizquhoo 
	falyunfiq mimmaaa aataahul laah; laa yukalliful laahu nafsan illaa maaa 
	aataahaa; sa yaj'alul laahu ba'da'usriny yusraa
verses.8:
Wa ka ayyim min qaryatin 'atat 'an amri Rabbihaa wa Rusulihee 
	fahaasabnaahaa hisaaban shadeedanw wa 'azzabnaahaa 'azaaban nukraa
verses.9: Fazaaqat wabbala amrihaa wa kaana 'aaqibatu amrihaa khusraa
verses.10: A'addal laahu lahum 'azaaban shadeeda; fattaqul laaha yaaa ulil albaab illazeena aammanoo; qad anzalal laahu ilaikum zikraa
verses.11:
Rasoolany yatloo 'alaikum aayaatil laahi mubaiyinaatil liyukhrijal 
	lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati minaz zulumaati ilan noor; wa many 
	yu'min billaahi wa ya'mal saalihany yudkhilhu jannaatin tajree min tahtihal 
	anhaaru khaalideena feehaa abadaa qad ahsanal laahu lahoo rizqaa
verses.12:
Allaahul lazee khalaqa Sab'a Samaawaatinw wa minal ardi mislahunna 
	yatanazzalul amru bainahunna lita'lamooo annal laaha 'alaa kulli shai'in 
	Qadeerunw wa annal laaha qad ahaata bikulli shai'in 'ilmaa

verses.1:
Yaaa ayyuhan nabiyyu lima tuharrimu maaa ahallal laahu laka tabtaghee 
	mardaata azwaajik; wallaahu ghafoorur raheem
verses.2:
Qad faradal laahu lakum tahillata aymaanikum; wallaahu mawlaakum wa 
	huwal 'aleemul hakeem
verses.3:
Wa iz asarran nabiyyu ilaa ba'di azwaajihee hadeesan falammaa nabba at 
	bihee wa azharahul laahu 'alaihi 'arrafa ba'dahoo wa a'rada 'am ba'din 
	falammaa nabba ahaa bihee qaalat man amba aka haaza qaala nabba aniyal 'aleemul 
	khabeer
verses.4:
In tatoobaaa ilal laahi faqad saghat quloobukumaa wa in tazaaharaa 'alaihi 
	fa innal laaha huwa mawlaahu wa jibreelu wa saalihul mu'mineen; wal malaaa'ikatu ba'da zaalika zaheer
verses.5:
'Asaa rabbuhooo in tallaqakunna anyyubdilahooo azwaajan khairam minkunna 
	muslimaatim mu'minaatin qaanitaatin taaa'ibaatin 'aabidaatin saaa'ihaatin 
	saiyibaatinw wa abkaaraa
verses.6:
Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo qooo anfusakum wa ahleekum naaranw waqoodu 
	han naasu wal hijaaratu 'alaihaa malaaa'ikatun ghilaazun shidaadul laa 
	ya'soonal laaha maa amarahum wa yaf'aloona maa yu'maroon
verses.7:
Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena kafaroo la ta'tazirul yawma innamaa tujzawna maa 
	kuntum ta'maloon
verses.8:
Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo toobooo ilal laahi tawbatan nasoohan 'asaa 
	rabbukum any-yukaffira 'ankum sayyi aatikum wa yudkhilakum jannaatin tajree 
	min tahtihal anhaaru yawma laa yukhzil laahun nabiyya wallazeena aamanoo 
	ma'ahoo nooruhum yas'aa baina aydeehim wa bi aymaanihim yaqooloona rabbanaaa 
	atmim lanaa nooranaa waghfir lana innaka 'alaa kulli shai'in qadeer
verses.9:
Yaaa ayyuhan nabiyyu jaahidil kuffaara walmunaa-fiqeena waghluz 'alaihim; 
	wa ma'waahum jahannamu wa bi'sal maseer
verses.10:
Darabal laahu masalal lillazeena kafarum ra ata Noohinw wamra ata Loot, 
	kaanataa tahta 'abdaini min 'ibaadinaa saalihaini fakhaanataahumaa falam 
	yughniyaa 'anhumaa minal laahi shai anw-wa qeelad khulan naara ma'ad 
	Daakhileen
verses.11:
Wa darabal laahu masalal lil lezeena aamanumra ata Fir'awn; iz qaalat 
	rab bibni lee 'indaka baitan fil jannati wa najjinee min Fir'awna wa 'amalihee 
	wa najjinee minal qawmiz zaalimeen
verses.12: Wa Maryamab nata 'Imraanal lateee ahsanat farjahaa fanafakhnaa feehee mir roohinaa wa saddaqat bi kalimaati Rabbihaa wa Kutubihee wakaanat minal qaaniteen (End Juz 28)

verses.1: Tabaarakal lazee biyadihil mulku wa huwa 'alaa kulli shai-in qadeer
verses.2:
Allazee khalaqal mawta walhayaata liyabluwakum ayyukum ahsanu 'amalaa; 
	wa huwal 'azeezul ghafoor
verses.3:
Allazee khalaqa sab'a samaawaatin tibaaqa; maa taraa fee khalqir 
	rahmaani min tafaawut farji'il basara hal taraa min futoor
verses.4:
Thummar ji'il basara karrataini yanqalib ilaikal basaru khaasi'anw wa 
	huwa haseer
verses.5:
Wa laqad zaiyannas samaaa'ad dunyaa bimasaa beeha wa ja'alnaahaa 
	rujoomal lish shayaateeni wa a'tadnaa lahum 'azaabas sa'eer
verses.6: Wa lillazeena kafaroo bi rabbihim 'azaabu jahannama wa bi'sal maseer
verses.7: Izaaa ulqoo feehaa sami'oo lahaa shaheeqanw wa hiya tafoor
verses.8:
Takaadu tamayyazu minal ghaizz kullamaaa ulqiya feehaa fawjun sa alahum 
	khazanatuhaaa alam ya'tikum nazeer
verses.9:
Qaaloo balaa qad jaaa'anaa nazeerun fakazzabnaa wa qulnaa maa nazzalal 
	laahu min shai in in antum illaa fee dalaalin kabeer
verses.10: Wa qaaloo law kunnaa nasma'u awna'qilu maa kunnaa feee as haabis sa'eer
verses.11: Fa'tarafoo bizambihim fasuhqal li as haabis sa'eer
verses.12:
Innal lazeena yakhshawna rabbahum bilghaibi lahum maghfiratunw wa ajrun 
	kabeer
verses.13: Wa asirroo qawlakum awijharoo bih; innahoo 'aleemum bizaatis sudoor
verses.14: Alaa ya'lamu man khalaqa wa huwal lateeful khabeer
verses.15:
Huwal lazee ja'ala lakumul arda zaloolan famshoo fee manaakibihaa wa 
	kuloo mir rizqih; wa ilaihin nushoor
verses.16:
'A-amintum man fissamaaa'i aiyakhsifa bi kumul arda fa izaa hiya 
	tamoor
verses.17:
Am amintum man fissamaaa'i ai yursila 'alaikum haasiban fasata'lamoona 
	kaifa nazeer
verses.18: Wa laqad kazzabal lazeena min qablihim fakaifa kaana nakeer
verses.19:
Awalam yaraw ilat tairi fawqahum saaaffaatinw wa yaqbidn; maa 
	yumsikuhunna il'lar rahmaan; innahoo bikulli shai im baseer
verses.20:
Amman haazal lazee huwa jundul lakum yansurukum min doonir rahmaan; 
	inilkaafiroona illaa fee ghuroor
verses.21:
Amman haazal lazee yarzuqukum in amsaka rizqah; bal lajjoo fee 'utuwwinw 
	wa nufoor
verses.22:
Afamai yamshee mukibban 'alaa wajhihee ahdaaa ammany yamshee sawiyyan 'alaa 
	siratim mustaqeem
verses.23:
Qul huwal lazee ansha akum wa ja'ala lakumus sam'a wal absaara wal 
	af'idata qaleelam maa tashkuroon
verses.24: Qul huwal lazee zara akum fil ardi wa ilaihi tuhsharoon
verses.25: Wa yaqooloona mataa haazal wa'du in kuntum saadiqeen
verses.26: Qul innamal 'ilmu 'indallaahi wa innamaaa ana nazeerum mubeen
verses.27:
Falammaa ra-awhu zulfatan seee'at wujoohul lazeena kafaroo wa qeela 
	haazal lazee kuntum bihee tadda'oon
verses.28:
Qul ara'aytum in ahlaka niyal laahu wa mam ma'iya aw rahimanaa 
	famai-yujeerul kaafireena min 'azaabin aleem
verses.29:
Qul huwar rahmaanu aamannaa bihee wa 'alaihi tawakkalnaa fasata'lamoona 
	man huwa fee dalaalim mubeen
verses.30:
Qul ara'aytum in asbaha maaa'ukum ghawran famai ya'teekum bimaaa'im 
	ma'een

verses.3: Wa inna laka la ajran ghaira mamnoon
verses.4: Wa innaka la'alaa khuluqin 'azeem
verses.5: Fasatubsiru wa yubsiroon
verses.6: Bi ayyikumul maftoon
verses.7:
Innaa Rabbaka Huwa a'lamu biman dalla 'an sabeelihee wa Huwa a'lamu 
	bilmuhtadeen
verses.8: Falaa tuti'il mukazzibeen
verses.9: Waddoo law tudhinu fa-yudhinoon
verses.10: Wa laa tuti' kulla hallaa fim maheen
verses.11: Hammaazim mash shaaa'im binameem
verses.12: Mannaa'il lilkhairi mu'tadin aseem
verses.13: 'Utullim ba'da zaalika zaneem

verses.1:
Qul oohiya ilaiya annna hustama'a nafarum minal jinni faqaalooo innaa 
	sami'naa quraanan ajaba
verses.2: Yahdeee ilar rushdi fa aamannaa bihee wa lan nushrika bi rabbinaaa 'ahada
verses.3: Wa annahoo Ta'aalaa jaddu Rabbinaa mat'takhaza saahibatanw wa laa walada
verses.4: Wa annahoo kaana yaqoolu safeehunaa 'al allahi shatata
verses.5: Wa annaa zanannaaa al lan taqoolal insu wal jinnu 'al allahi kaziba
verses.6:
Wa annahoo kaana rijaalun minal insi ya'oozoona bi rijaalin minal jinni 
	fa zaadoohum rahaqa
verses.7: Wa annahum zannoo kamaa zanantum al lany yab'asal laahu 'ahada
verses.8:
Wa annaa lamasnas samaaa'a fa wajadnaahaa muli'at harasan shadeedanw wa 
	shuhuba
verses.9: Wa annaa kunnaa naq'udu minhaa maqaa'ida lis'sam'i famany yastami'il 'aana yajid lahoo shihaabar rasada
verses.10: Wa annaa laa nadreee asharrun ureeda biman fil ardi 'am 'araada bihim rabbuhum rashada
verses.11: Wa annaa minnas saalihoona wa minnaa doona zaalika kunnaa taraaa'iqa qidada
verses.12:
Wa annaa zanan naaa al lan nu'jizal laaha fil ardi wa lan nu'jizahoo 
	haraba
verses.13:
Wa annaa lammaa sami'nal hudaaa aamannaa bihee famany yu'min bi rabbihee 
	falaa yakhaafu bakhsanw wa laa rahaqa
verses.14:
Wa annaa minnal muslimoona wa minnal qaasitoona faman aslama fa 
	ulaaa'ika taharraw rashada
verses.15: Wa ammal qaasitoona fa kaanoo li jahannama hataba
verses.16: Wa alla wis taqaamoo 'alat tareeqati la asqaynaahum maa'an ghadaqa
verses.17:
Linaftinahum feeh; wa many yu'rid 'an zikri rabbihee yasluk hu 'azaaban 
	sa'ada
verses.18: Wa annal masaajida lil laahi falaa tad'oo ma'al laahi 'ahada
verses.19:
Wa annahoo lammaa qaama 'abdul laahi yad'oohu kaadoo yakoonoona 'alaihi 
	libada
verses.20: Qul innamaaa ad'oo rabbee wa laaa ushriku biheee 'ahada
verses.21: Qul innee laaa amliku lakum darranw wa laa rashada
verses.22:
Qul innee lany yujeeranee minal laahi 'ahadunw, wa lan ajida min doonihee 
	multahada
verses.23:
Illaa balaagham minal laahi wa risaalaatih; wa many ya'sil laaha wa 
	rasoolahoo fa inna lahoo naara jahannama khaalideena feehaaa 'abada
verses.24:
Hattaaa izaa ra aw maa yoo'adoona fasaya'lamoona man ad'afu naasiranw wa 
	aqallu 'adada
verses.25: Qul in adreee a qareebum maa too'adoona am yaj'alu lahoo rabbeee 'amada
verses.26: 'Aalimul ghaibi falaa yuzhiru alaa ghaibiheee 'ahada
verses.27:
Illaa manir tadaa mir rasoolin fa innahoo yasluku min baini yadaihi wa 
	min khalfihee rasada
verses.28:
Liya'lama an qad ablaghoo risaalaati rabbihim wa ahaata bi maa ladaihim wa 
	ahsaa kulla shai'in 'adada

verses.3: Nisfahooo awinqus minhu qaleelaa
verses.4: Aw zid 'alaihi wa rattilil Qur'aana tarteela
verses.5: Innaa sanulqee 'alaika qawlan saqeelaa
verses.6: Inna naashi'atal laili hiya ashadddu wat anw wa aqwamu qeelaa
verses.7: Inna laka fin nahaari sabhan taweelaa
verses.8: Wazkuris ma rabbika wa tabattal ilaihi tabteelaa
verses.9:
Rabbul mashriqi wal maghriibi laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa fattakhizhu 
	wakeelaa
verses.10: Wasbir 'alaa maa yaqoo loona wahjurhum hajran jameelaa
verses.11: Wa zarnee walmukaz zibeena ulin na'mati wa mahhilhum qaleelaa
verses.12: Inna ladainaaa ankaalanw wa jaheemaa
verses.13: Wa ta'aaman zaa ghussa tinw wa'azaaban aleemaa
verses.14: Yawma tarjuful ardu waljibaalu wa kaanatil jibaalu kaseebam maheelaa
verses.15:
Innaa arsalnaaa ilaikum rasoolan shaahidan 'aleykum kamaaa arsalnaaa ilaa 
	Fir'awna rasoolaa
verses.16: Fa'asaa Fir'awnur Rasoola fa akhaznaahu akhzanw wabeelaa
verses.17: Fakaifa tattaqoona in kafartum yawmany yaj'alul wildaana sheeba
verses.18: Assamaaa'u munfatirum bih; kaana wa'duhoo maf'oola
verses.19: Inna haazihee tazkira; fa man shaaa'at takhaza ilaa Rabbihee sabeelaa
verses.20:
Inna Rabbaka ya'lamu annaka taqoomu adnaa min sulusa yil laili wa 
	nisfahoo wa sulusahoo wa taaa'ifatum minal lazeena ma'ak; wal laahu 
	yuqaddirul laila wanna haar; 'alima al lan tuhsoohu fataaba  'alaikum 
	faqra'oo maa tayassara minal quraan; 'alima an sa yakoonu minkum mardaa wa 
	aakharoona yadriboona fil ardi yabtaghoona min fadlil laahi wa aakharoona 
	yuqaatiloona fee sabeelil laahi faqra'oo ma tayassara minhu wa aqeemus 
	salaata wa aatuz zakaata wa aqridul laaha qardan hasanaa; wa maa tuqaddimoo 
	li anfusikum min khairin tajidoohu 'indal laahi huwa khayranw wa a'zama 
	ajraa; wastaghfirul laahaa innal laaha ghafoorur raheem.

74.name: Al-Muddaththir - The One Wrapping Himself Up
